title: Thailand Holiday- Couples
review: This was the first time that we went to Thailand. We were recommended the hotel from a travel company. Overall it was good it terms of location, relaxing areas e.g pools and food places.  We had a few issues on arrival which tainted the start of our holiday. We got assigned a room but the sound was horrendous outside, it was a million crickets and frogs outside the room.  The doors didn’t close properly so the sound was ridiculous. The hotel was accommodating and showed us 5 different rooms. We were much more comfortable after changing rooms. The staff were very helpful and understood our issues.  Other thing is that the hotel is so tired looking the pool is missing all the grout from each of the 3 pools fairly dangerous for children. Also in the height of summer holidays I can see the hotel getting very busy and crowded. The breakfast area is way too small, we had to queue on a couple of days and that wasn’t the busiest it could be.   Overall good hotel but not amazing for the 4* rating.…

title: Great Family Resort with lovely staff
review: We checked out today after staying in a superior room with my partner and son and my parents were next door. The rooms are big and spacious with excellent design. The went above and beyond for my son and had hidden little treasure hunts for him to find.  They set up his cot with teddies etc and he was given his own little ammenities kit. This is a great hotel for families as they have a kids club and kids swimming pool. However, it is not noisy  and over taken by children.  It is a bit of a walk to the shops or 7/11 but not too far.   The housekeep staff are so lovely and friendly and add an extra special touch.

title: Danae Mackie
review: Dear Reneeb716, Many thanks for your recent stay and so happy that you had such a great Family Time during you holidays! We love reading that you have enjoyed the comfort and design of our Rooms, as well as the professional service of our Heartists, or the Fun Games that we propose for every group age. Could we also share that we do propose a convenient store at the Resort, where you could find the favourites of a 7/11... We do hope that we will have the chance to welcoming you back soon and invite you to contacting me directly via jp.lovotti@accor.com as i would be delighted to personally assist you designing your next journey, Warm regards,

title: Thai massage
review: Excellent service lovely hotel friendly staff Brian and Taq were especially exceptional with their service did everything to make are stay enjoyable and relaxed  Would go back again and again  Definitely a place to stay

title: Back massage
review: Very relaxing! Thank you Sky and Fon Clean, nice music, ginger tea and foot wash. Sky is professional and speaks good English. Concerned to know about any injuries or any muscles needing special attention.  I'm not an absolute massage fan like some people, but would recommend

title: Understand T&C's prior to booking
review: Ensure you read and understand the full Terms and Conditions prior to booking as the hotel is rigid and shows no flexibility for any booking changes. This became apparent when attempting to shorten our stay by a few days. This was few days after booking, over a month out from the stay and was required as we had shortened out stay at Phuket. The resort would not change, cancel, or make any adjustments to the booking and would not refund any portion. Hotel discounts and offers were offered which while the gesture was appreciated, it seemed a little pointless as we wouldn't be there to appreciate them. The resort may be nice and the staff may be lovely however prior to booking ensure you read and understand the full T&C's with your booking as they seem to have strict rules and…

title: A wonderful hotel!
review: We stayed at the Novotel in Karon for four nights and thoroughly enjoyed out stay.  The hotel is located within minutes walk from Karon beach, which is beautiful. The entire hotel felt modern and clean and we had a spacious room with a balcony and fantastic air-con, which was needed.  We only sampled breakfast at the hotel which was delicious - lots of variety! They also have entertainment each night along with themed food evenings.  One improvement would be to the grouting in the pool - seems odd just you'd often catch your foot on a tile.  Overall, a very impressive hotel and I would highly recommend it.

title: Pretty Good
review: Everything was - the service, staff, cleanliness and food. The location seems a bit odd, right next to an extremely busy main road, with no intervening open space. That is why we declined the deluxe room facing the road and opted instead for an "ordinary" room in another block. Breakfast was excellent which means you will probably eat far too much, as we did.   One other thing - our bathroom had no shower curtain and it was necessary to clamber over the high bathtub rim to take a shower. A minor problem for us, but maybe not for the less nimble.   All in all - pretty good.

title: Lovely stay, but missed going the extra mile
review: Dear Tim, Many thanks for your recent stay. We are delighted that you had such a great stay and enjoyed the atmosphere and cleanliness of the Resort, the Quality of the Breakfast prepared by our Chef, but most importantly, that you could have experienced the genuine sense of Hospitality from our Heartists. Could we also share that we do propose and install shower curtain upon simple request. Nonetheless, we do hope that we will have the chance to welcoming you back in the future and invite you to contacting me directly then, as I would be glad to personally assist you then, Warm regards,

title: Close to town, but not in town
review: Great location and facilities, really close to the centre of Karon beach and just across the road to a wonderful beach.  Key tips - the sea has a strong top current so stay within the life guard area, the hotel could improve the signage and information on this item.   Also during the stay my wife was ill, the help from the staff to get a doctored was poor, also we had to book a taxi to take us the short distance to the clinic at a small cost but the staff didn’t go the extra mile to help or even supply a courtesy transport, it’s not the cost as it small, just the thought (the extra customer service mile)  Overall we loved our stay, could walk to Kata, short drive to Patong and Phuket night market and the big Buddha  So well worth the stay.

title: Thai massage
review: Taew and fob are amazing!! It’s such a relaxing and calm environment and treated me with the best they have to offer. Such a nice vibe and design and everyone was super friendly!! Definitely recommend

title: Good stay at Karon
review: Dear Maselina, it is our pleasure that you had such a relaxing time at InBalance SPA, and hope that we will have the chance to welcoming you back soon, Warm regards

title: In Balance Spa
review: Recently stayed at this hotel for 3 nights and it was a very comfortable stay. We were initially given a room in the most extreme corner of the hotel and were then shifted to a pool side room. Room was quite comfortable however the toilets are fairly small. Hotel was well maintained and the tiling is non slippery which is important for kids. They have many pools , we used only the one close to our room which had a large slide and the kid enjoyed it thoroughly. Kids club was quite good too and can be a game changer in your decision of you have little ones. Breakfast was okay and vegetarian folks may find choices quite limited. However staff was friendly. On our last day the flight got preponed and we had to check out early morning before breakfast timings at the cafe. They packed…

title: Perfection
review: Dear Rahul_Sipani, Many thanks for your recent stay, and love reading that you have enjoyed the comfort of our Rooms, the Quality of our Cuisine and Beverages, but most importantly, the dedicated Service from our Heartists. I will certainly share your appreciation for their utmost pleasure. Glad that you have also enjoyed the ideal location of the Resort in the Karon District, just opposite Karon Beach, one of the most beautiful beach according to the locals. We do hope that we will have the chance to welcoming you back in the future and invite you to contacting me directly then, via jp.lovotti@accor.com, as I would be delighted to personally assist you designing your next journey, Warm regards,

title: Great hotel & great people
review: Highly recommend treating yourself to a Jet lag facial and massage package at the In Balance Spa.  I had a wonderful 60 minute massage and 30 minute facial with Sky. Beautiful rooms and professional therapists and very well priced.

title: Lovely resort and perfect for family getaway
review: We visited Phuket in August for family vacation. We stayed here for 4 nights in plunge pool suite rooms. Resort is family friendly with great staff. Room was beautiful and we'll maintained. Fir my 5 year old son they provided kids bedsheet and toys to play. My son loved their kids club. Room service was cost effective and good.  Below is the list of pros and cons  Pros:  A) Family friendly Resort B) kids club which provide array of activities C) Reasonable room service D) Seperate vegetarian menu at dine in restaurant which is tasty as well. No brainer is to opt for thai options E) Seperate kids section at breakfast Buffett option  Cons A) Breakfast service is quite slow. They need to replenish items quickly. Also Buffett needs more variety with more vegetarian options  B) No…

title: Perfect for the family
review: Dear Gary, Delighted to read that you had such a lovely stay, and enjoyed the dedicated Service from our Heartists. Love that you also had a great Family time in the comfort of your Plunge Pool Suite, and that the Kids had so much FUN at Kids World! Many thanks too for your suggestions towards the Vegetarian selection. Could we share that we do propose vegetarian items on the different buffets as well as a specific Vegetarian and Gluten Free Menu. We do hope that we will have the chance to welcoming you back in the future and invite you to contacting me directly via jp.lovotti@accor.com as I would be glad to personally assist you then, Warm regards

title: Fantastic Hotel
review: The Novotel Karon was the perfect accomodation for our family! The staff were beautiful, always willing to go out of their way to make your stay enjoyable. The rooms are wonderful: spacious, clean and comfortable. And the facilities ... there is so much to do! You don’t need to go anywhere if you feel like a rest from day-tripping. A choice of 3 pools, all with a different feel, there is something for everyone! The kids loved the kids pool and kids club, not to mention the free activities on offer throughout the week like Muay Thai boxing classes and bubble pool! And of course the parents are forgotten ... free yoga every morning and the gym has all you need. With live music by one of the pools most nights and different buffet cuisines nights on offer, you have so much to choose…

title: Good hotel with 2 mins walk to the beach
review: My husband, two teenage daughters and I had a wonderful stay at this hotel . It’s fabulous. The staff are beyond fantastic and can’t do enough for you . We had a fab plunge pool room which was huge divided into two spaces with a large bathroom and double sinks . The hotel has three pools although we only used one . The pools are lovely . Some other reviews say the pools need a regrout. They probably do but they are still excellent and didn’t cause us any problems . The food is great and good portion sizes . Breakfast is also plentiful with good choices to suit anyone . The location is brilliant . Patong is only 10 mins in a tuk tuk for 300 baht ( 400 on the way back ) .  Taxis and tuk Turks outside the hotel . The beach is straight across the road and you can walk into Karon to…

title: Holiday
review: The location of the hotel is very good, one has to just cross a road to access the Karon beach which is much cleaner and less crowded than patong with quite a few restaurants near the beach and a  15-20 mins will get you to the karon market which is full of shops and food joints, a tuk tuk costs 200bhat one way  Hotel was nice, we had a junior family room with bunk bed, lots of the stuff for kids to do in the property, the water slide is super fun for the kids   The food is good and the pricing was very reasonable, they have English and kids channels which helps   Would definitely recommend for families and people who want to stay close the the beach

title: Super Relaxing Massage - Lovely Customer Service
review: My partner and I booked ourselves in for a 60 minute full body massage and we definitely weren't disappointed. We were treated with lovely customer service from Fon which was followed up by an amazing full body massage from the ladies. We will definitely be rebooking another session during our stay. 😌

title: Massage
review: Aree was a great masseuse I’ve been in Phuket for 2 weeks and have been getting massage everyday but it was nothing like this one it was so relaxing I fell asleep on the bed. The only thing about this one it’s a little more expensive then the other ones but it’s definitely worth every penny. I’ll definitely be coming back here for another one.

title: Good Pool and Location
review: The pool is great. It covers nearly the whole resort in one big pool which means everyone was spread out and no fighting for deck chairs or spots. The location is also good as its a short walk to the beach or bangla rd, but you dont get harassed by suits, shopping or massage etc. The staff were all very helpful and friendly. The breakfast can get repetitive (we were there for 8 days) and we needed to call about housekeeping a couple of times to get replacement items (tea/coffee etc) and get them to clean the rooms. The main negative was on checkout when they couldn't refund the arrival deposit as the machines weren't working.

title: Relaxing break😎
review: My partner and I spent 11 wonderful days at this beautiful friendly resort. The staff are friendly and attentive. I highly recommend this hotel which is situated in a great location. The beach is wonderful with lots of great restaurants. Thank you Novotel for the best holiday. I can’t wait to come back 😎🏖🇹🇭

title: Aromatherapy and Thai massage
review: Therapists were very friendly and experienced. Able to customize massage for pregnant ladies. Full body Thai massage was a good and relaxing treat after a long shopping trip. Private rooms available for couples, cosy and clean environment. Worth a visit!

title: In Balance Spa Review
review: The spa here is lovely. The girls bring you tea and make you aware of any specials to give you the best treatment available at the best price. The music is very soothign and design very beautiful and high class. I would visit any spa In Balance Spa again in a heartbeat. Great pricing and service.

title: Inbalance spa
review: บริการดีมากๆค่ะ คุณฝนใจดี ต้อนรับเป็นมิตรมากกกก ทุกคนยิ้มแย้มแจ่มใส คุณโบนวดพอดี ไม่หนักเกิน ไม่เบาเกิน หลับสบายและผ่อนคลายมากๆค่ะ กลับมาใช้บริการอีกแน่นอนค่ะ nice service, staff is so friendly, she gave me a really good massage. Love it!!  very recommended:)

title: Fantastic
review: Had 6 nights with my family. All staff very friendly and helpful but Minny went above and beyond and is a credit to the hotel and the hospitality industry. She was excellent.  Great swimming pools, great food and buffet breakfast.

title: Looking amazing spa treatment
review: I had the most blissfull treatment. So reasonably priced for the level of professionalism & service. I can’t recommend enough. Make sure you treat yourself!! The staff are so kind and make sure your every need is taken care of.

title: 8 Days is Karon
review: Overrall the hotel was lovely, I did find the staff struggled with the english language, so communication was not easy. Also there lacked a friendliness by staff members across the board, from cleaning staff to reception.

title: Spa place
review: Very friendly & comforting atmosphere. Ask for Pat for a firmer touch or then Tau for a softer touch. Least to say, the front office managed by a Very friendly Fon. Will certainly revisit as is also good for value & within the confines of the beautiful hotel.

title: Fantastic!!!
review: We had a 12 night stay here and LOVED it! So much for my 8 year old daughter to do there- kids activities, glow party, fantastic swimming pools. The Spa is highly recommended too- great Thai massages!  If you are Eco Conscious, they offer a 200 Baht voucher if you opt to skip your room clean for the day and re-use your towels, a great innovative which ended up equating to a free nights stay! We will be back!

title: Good choice in Karon, away from the crowds
review: Location is good, opposite beach and easy 10 min stroll into Karon shops and restaurants.  There are a couple of local restaurants close to the hotel offering lovely food.  Usual Novotel standard, good size rooms, comfy bed, beautifully maintained, staff friendly and helpful.  The spa is outstanding, I had one of the best massages I have ever had (and thats a lot!) here.  My only gripe is the wifi, it really didn't work for me.  Dropped out constantly and when it was working was very slow which is a problem if you are working (as I was).  Other minor complaint ... no bircher muesli (or healthy cereal) at breakfast.  Only sugary processed stuff and a watery porridge.  Otherwise would have been 5 stars.  Overall though I would recommend and probably stay here again.

title: In Balance Spa
review: Very professional. Excellent treatments. Highly recommended. Great therapists Pat and Fon for an awesome pampering session a sense of luxury package for 3 hours leaving you feeling refreshed and rejuvenated.

title: Inhalante spa
review: We had couple massage full body (1h), face massage (for me-30min) and foot massage (for him-30 min). It was really wonderful atmosphere, relaxing, the staff was friendly and respected our requests during massage.

title: In balance spa
review: Fon, Sky and Au are great. We have one of the best massage we have take ever.  It was a great experience. 100 % recomendable for turist that came to thailand.  Great hotel and great spa services.  Daniel y Alba

title: Spa place
review: My whole family took the massage. Everyone enjoyed it.  Good job and keep it up.  So relaxing. The place are clean, the staffs were all accommodating and good.  You'll have welcome drinks and free tea after massage

title: In balance spa
review: Great afternoon at spa.  Fantastic body scrub then very relaxing massage & beautiful facial.  Staff were lovely and very professional. Thank you to the ladies, i recommend highly to all visiting the area.

title: Great Spa Experience
review: I had a fantastic time at the spa here. The ladies were all very welcoming and service was great. I got the “looking amazing” package and highly recommend to anyone thinking of coming by. Very refreshing and I feel great- thank you ladies!

title: In Balance by novotel Phuket
review: Best massage I've ever had. My massage lady Tukta was very caring kept on asking if I'm comfortable which is very important. From reception to the massage room I rate 10/10. Service is amazing even the lady that gave me the massage was very good. I napped half way through the massage. Body scrub was amazing. Thank you.

title: Nice Hotel for Kids
review: Spent 4 nights at Novotel Karon. A lovely hotel which has all sorts of activities for kids.   Location  Karon beach is just across the road. Restaurants and convenient store are about 5-10mins walk away.   Pool 3 pools in the property including 01 with a slide.  Room  Clean and comfortable bed  Breakfast  Good selection of choices. The breakfast restaurant has open windows, this sometimes attracted the uninvited birds. It will be good if there is a netting to prevent those birds.   Staffs  Most staffs are pleasant and helpful.

title: Super family friendly
review: The staff made our stay very enjoyable. We had 2 birthdays and complimentary cakes and from the minute we arrived we were treated like royalty. The facilities and special nights were brilliant for our kids. Great room and breakfast. The restaurants and bars had quality food and drinks. Really cannot fault our stay and would happily come back.

title: Great Holiday Experience
review: The hotel was great, staff are all really nice. Hotel is clean and very relaxing. Breakfast buffet was really tasty, also a great place for anyone needing a gluten free diet. The hotel had a full gluten free menu available at breakfast upon request, with all super tasty options. Great activities available for kids throughout the day. Karon beach is across the road (very relaxing lovely each) , within a 10 min walk you also have a strip of restaurants and live music bars, perfect for couples and families. Will definitely be returning.

title: Amazing massage
review: Wonderful techniques, used a variety of techniques including Swedish and pressure point. So relaxing. Definitely recommend to anyone wanting an intimate experience, in privacy away from the often busy massage places in the main streets.

title: Amazing spa !
review: The spa services were amazing!!!! It is truly a luxury experience for a very reasonable price. Each room comes with a shower and it is very quiet and relaxing. I would highly recommend the spa buffet option so you can customize.

title: Spa Buffet
review: The staff are lovely and welcoming. We enjoyed a welcome drink and tea at the end of our session The massage, scrub, facial and head massage were great. The spa buffet is a very good deal and worth coming back for

title: Spa
review: The spa buffet was amazing. I really enjoyed the head massage, foot massage and ninety minute body massage. The deep tissue was just what I needed. They people were very lovely and welcoming. Thank you

title: Super relaxing massage!
review: Just completed a 90 minute body massage and face treatment and it was so relaxing. From the minute you walk in, to the time you leave, you feel like you've been treated like VIP. The massages are to your level of firmness. Sure, it's a little more pricey than the places you find "on the street", but you know why, as soon as you step into the spa. My therapist was Sky and she was great. Recommended.

title: could be really good
review: We have just come back from a 2 week stay at the Novotel Karon. and i have to say i was very pleased with our choice to stay there,  we arrived at 10pm and welcome was very nice, with a cold drink supplied and very much appreciated, staff took us to our room on a buggy, and luggage was delivered to our room not long after we were. the we stayed in a family suite which was very nice and roomy for 4 of us...the bathroom was bigger than my own bedroom!. house keeping clean everyday, however we only had our room cleaned every other day, when doing this the hotel leave a 200bht voucher to use at the hotel, very handy to have for odd lunches or treats at the hotel. food at the hotel was ok, pretty much in line with any other hotel you are likely to visit...i would recommend searching…

title: Not terrible, but chould Thai harder.
review: Increasingly, like many people, I use Tripadvisor to first review and then book hotels subject to my needs, and the Novotel Karon Beach apparently met all of those.    Travelled from the UK and check in was very fast and efficient.  We were taken to room 1102 on the ground floor - it had a strong smell of mould/mildew, and in retrospect we should have immediately asked to change room, but we were tired so we stayed.  For two days.  But the smell got increasingly worse, and we asked to be moved, which the staff did apologetically and efficiently, and we went to room 4311 which was infinitely better.  Pros: the staff couldn't have been more helpful and friendly. There was an awesome range of things for breakfast. Walkable to the main shops and restaurants of Karon. Close to the…

title: In Balance Spa
review: Me & my mum had the 90min massage and facial on our first day after arrival. It was the most amazing experience, very relaxing and refreshing just what we needed after our long flight from Australia. Highly recommended and all the girls were so polite and nice we will definitely be back for another massage before we leave. Thank you 🙏

title: Lovely facial and massage
review: The staff are lovely and welcoming We enjoyed a welcome drink and tea at the end of our session The massage and facial were so relaxing  Many different levels of pressure to ask for and they make sure you are comfortable the whole time  The products were organic and very subtle and fragrant  We loved it thank you

title: Good hotel but room for improvement
review: Stayed here for 2 nights as part of a birthday celebration for my brother in laws 40th birthday. There were a few headaches at check in. I’m not sure if it was time of day or sheer bad luck but check in / check out was full of people and quiet a queue to check in. As other reviewers have mentioned there was a problem with bedding and at one stage it was looking like a family of 4 needed to share one bed. Eventually it was resolved with a room upgrade at no extra cost due to misunderstanding. I needed a little space after spending 8 days already with the family so opted for a plunge pool suite which was fantastic. Suite was very well appointed and the plunge pool was a real joy in the warmer weather. As a few other people have mentioned maintenance does leave a bit to be desired…

title: In Balance, Friendly staff, Awesome massage, Excellent experience, Very calm and relaxing, Ask for Aree and Pat and Fon,
review: Best massage I've had in years, Very relaxing, Very friendly and polite staff, Make you feel welcome and not too pushy, Well worth the price about $40 for 90 minutes worth of soothing relaxation, Recommend highly

title: Thai massage
review: I have treated myself for early morning Massage, the staff are very professional and I’m really impressed with the service, highly recommend it. X  P.S there are few different pronunciations as well. Please check with the team.

title: In Balance Spa
review: Beautiful experience for our honeymoon!! A must if you are staying at the Novotel. Lovely staff helped us to understand the difference options available. We had a 30 Min coffee body scrub and a 60 Min full body massage. Amazing!!

title: Excellent hotel and SPA
review: Stayed here for 1 week as family of 5, 3 young kids aged 9, 5 and 2 years.   Excellent hotel, beautiful grounds and plunge pool room incredibly spacious.    Had 90 minute Thai massage as couple at least twice during our stay. Excellent. Highly skilled masseuse and excellent value for money. I will miss the quality of the spa for sure. You cannot come to Thailand and not enjoy a massage or two.  With young kids, having this done in hotel very convenient for us.    Thankyou

title: Beautiful hotel but it is NOT on the beach
review: I spent a long time trying to find a nice hotel with beach front rooms. My husband loves the pool and I love the beach. From pics and words such as beach front and ocean front I thought this hotel was on the beach. When I narrowed my search to only include beach front properties this came up. Yet when we turned up the hotel is NOT on beach. Near..yes. But you have to cross the busy main thoroughfare of phuket and then walk 5 minutes to a bridge that takes you over the Canal before you arrive at the beach. Really disappointed. If you don’t mind the actual hotel is beautiful. Staff are wonderful and pools are gorge. Everything about this hotel is wonderful except for the beach.

title: Poolside Bliss 🌴
review: This was our first Novotel experience and it did not disappoint. The check-in process went smoothly and we were escorted to our room by golf cart so we did not have to carry our luggage. We stayed in a Pool Plunge Suite, which included our own private pool beside our room. It was nice to escape the craziness of Patong for a weekend and relax beside any of the three pools scattered throughout the hotel grounds. Every night there was a themed buffet dinner served poolside and we particularly enjoyed the Surf and Turf night. We booked a couples Aromatherapy Massage at the In Balance Spa and it sixty minutes of pure bliss. Another plus, is that Karon Beach is directly across the street from the resort, and there is always a Security Guard on duty to escort you safely across the busy…

title: Novotel Karon Phuket - A Luxury Rejuvenating Retreat
review: If you want to experience the very best of Phuket, away from the humdrum of the entertainment hub, then stay at Novotel Karon is most recommended for you. It is a gorgeous luxury retreat offering an all-inclusive stay to visitors who love good beach holidays and all the beachy feels.   Our experience at the Novotel Karon Phuket Resort was really rewarding. The four days and the three nights that I and my husband spent at this stunning resort in the Plunge Pool Suite turned out to be remarkable as the place demonstrated above board hospitality. The immaculate Plunge Suite that was allotted to us had all kinds of amenities. The staff of the resort made us feel valued, registered our requirements and provided us with everything that was needed for a comfortable stay. It was a…

title: In balance spa
review: We absolutely loved our facial, body massage and body scrub as a couple treatment! Very relaxing and enjoyed our treatments! Fon is amazing at what she does and very welcoming!  Would highly recommend any service here! Will be back!

title: Stress relief massage
review: It's the first time we got a Thai stress relief massage and it was awesome. 60 minutes of it. Time management was excellent. You need to take a prior appointment and they follow the timings perfectly. Best place in Karon to get a massage.

title: Aloe Vera & Head Massage
review: Beautiful facilities at a stunning hotel, staff are lovely and the quality of the massages are really good. High level of professionalism and a very inviting atmosphere. The Aloe Vera Body Wrap was very soothing and the shower facilities were pristine with the nicest smelling body lotion to top things off.

title: excellent experience
review: had a jet lag 90 massage the day after arriving. It was amazing.  Best massage and facial I have ever had.  Fon the supervisor is very welcoming.  my partner fell asleep it was so good.  Very clean and calming place.  highly recommend.

title: Vacation
review: Absolutely incredible place. Feel very relaxed. Great Service. Great place for family and friends. Definitely recommend and would come back again. 3 swimming pools, 3 resturant. Great buffet breakfast and 5 min walk to the beach. Amazing

title: Below average
review: We stayed in the hotel between 11 and 16'th of August and were totally aware that it was not a high season for Phuket so  we did not have big expectations, however ther hotel appered to be even under our humble requirements.  - the architecture of the hotel is quite strange: you almost never walk among the greens and trees but in the labyrinths of endless corridors of the building so you can see plants only from the distance. - our room was shabby: there was a huge ‘painting’ made by ball pen on the wall just next to the bed.  I wonder why they did not bother to clean it somehow.  - there is a window between bathroom and living area and if the lights are on in the bathroom a person sitting on the bed can easily see what is going on in the bathroom and lavatory (!).  -the worst…

title: Needs Maintenance
review: We stayed for four nights in August at the start of a longer Thailand trip.   Unfortunately check-in was stressful since we had a booking for two adults and a child which stated there would be as many beds as people but the hotel insisted their policy was the child had to share and use existing bedding.   I doubt many parents relish sharing a single bed with a child almost their height.   There was a significant additional cost proposed for an additional bed which we felt was unreasonable given the wording on our booking. Eventually a bed was provided without charge.   The whole drama was entirely avoidable.  The grounds are lovely and well maintained, most staff are very friendly but we have to echo previous reports regarding the safety of the pool.  On the first and last day I…

title: Nice family hotel
review: The hotel has many facilities and activities for family. There are three pools and across road from the beach. Staff were polite and helpful. The service is good even though we spent almost 30 mins in both check-in and check-out because some special arrangements in our rates. They were handled by different people and I needed to explain it to them.   The hotel is not in the middle of the town but not too far away. We drove so not a big deal. We stayed in a suite. The cleanness is ok but furniture showed its age. There were some stain on the table and mirror. There were good spread of breakfast. Quality is average.  Generally it was a good stay and recommend to family.

title: Enjoyable
review: The Novotel at Karon beach is a nice, comfortable resort to stay. It has a great family/kids pool area and the family rooms/suites are set up nicely for families.  Breakfast was a highlight especially for the kids. They do go to a big effort to cater for the kids.  On the downside, the customer service was average. We had several issues with our bill upon arrival that took days to sort out with a lot of frustration and in the end never needed to be such an issue in the first place.  When our family fun suite was cleaned, it was done to a very basic standard. Quite often our sons bed was left unmade.  Some of the bar staff spoke little to no English and at different times took up to 45 mins to get a drink delivered.  The resort is in a good location and does have lovely swimming…

title: A beautiful Resort for people of all ages
review: The resort is located in a calm and serene location and just adjacent to the beach. The resort has facilities to please people of all ages. If you are travelling with kids then i can assure you that your kids will be enjoying the most and the best part is when they are engrossed then the whole stay looks like a blessing. The hotel has all what it takes to keep the guest happy at all times.

title: Very relaxing
review: We did the 4hours couple course, it was very relaxing. The room is clean and stylish, the staff is very professional and attentive. The 4hours went very fast.  We got sweets and tea at the end of the massage.

title: Great vacation
review: I spent a fantastic 10 days in this beautiful hotel. We had a nice suite with a plunge pool. It was a great experience. The staff of the hotel are very kind and welcoming from guest relation to front office team as well as food and beverage staff. The GM took a time to welcome us personally during our stay. Thank you guys for your efforts to make us happy.   Keep it up.

title: Poor Check-In Process
review: The check-in process was terrible. We were told that they were fully booked and needed some time for our rooms to be ready but that took ONE hour. The only compensated me with ONE complimentary drink each from the bar at the pool. We had to walk up to them at least 3 times to check on the status of the room but there were no definite answer or estimation time. The lobby was packed, messy, hot and stuffy. It was not comfortable to rest at all. After asking for the 3rd time, we got our room. Room was okay but have a lot to improve on. A separate shower with a glass door should be installed so that the whole toilet won't be wet after showers. There should be more than 1 place for breakfast as it was very crowded with a very long queue, we only managed to get a table after 20 mins.…

title: Disappointed
review: I brought my team from Singapore above the weekend ... Check in was ok even the ladies at the front desk were far of being friendly ...  We arrived 18 pax and I paid for 18 pax bed and breakfast ... they asked me to pay extra I don’t even why ! Since their English is poor I gave up ... They gave me the worse room ever ... far away from the reception and they are doing construction right below the window I called many times and nobody cared ... Room service is ok but be sure to repeat few times your order ...  I ordered calamari and fries and I received calamari and banana split ... Breakfast is average ! Nothing wahoo compare of what we can find in Thailand ... Check out took age and same ! First and last Impression is not good because the front desk doesn’t show a warm…

title: Good Place for a rest
review: Just had a wonderful 2 week stay,a place to rest and relax,Novotel Karon is a stand alone hotel that is in a great location,across the road from the beach and a gentle 5ish minute walk into town,staff are lovely and always willing to do that bit extra to help you a special mention to Mint and On for there great service. Massage at the spa are wonderful,food is good quality but expensive compared to local area.Lots of activity's for kids and there family.Pool area is great but in need of some work,loose tiles and decking surrounds are in poor order.Would recommend this hotel.

title: In Balance Spa Massage
review: Had an aroma massage and Indian head massage at the Spa today. Amazing experience and the ginger tea after was very nice and calming! Had it on special for 1099 only which included 60 minutes body massage and 30 minutes head massage. Highly recommend!

title: Great family hotel.
review: Pretty much agree with most of the other recent reviews on here, this is a great family hotel that unfortunately needs quite a bit of maintenance.   The kids absolutely loved all 3 pools and every staff member that we came across was accommodating and friendly. The room was spacious and comfortable (the see through window to the bathroom was slightly awkward though) and we had immediate access to a pool outside both our front and back doors.   With all the kids around, it was also quite quiet for the most part. The food was decent yet very expensive (as most resort food usually is).   However as another reviewer pointed out, the main pool needs a lot of maintenance, the tiles in the pool being extremely dangerous (we also saw the boy get his foot badly cut up).   Having said…

title: Disappointed
review: Having stayed in Karon on several occasions we chose the Novotel as it was new and we have stayed in several other Novotel hotels throughout the world. Given the age of the Hotel I was quite surprised that the buildings were showing significant issues with cracks in buildings, warped floor boards around the pools and cracks in stairwell cladding. Service Service was incredibly disappointing.  Not only was the service slow billing was inaccurate, we received a call to our room after 10pm one night asking if we had ordered a large pizza from the champions bar which was not ours, whether or not it eventually ended up on our bill I  have no idea. Power outage Whilst I understand that this was completely out of your control I would have thought that there should have been some…

title: Nice from far, far from nice.
review: From a distance, the hotel is beautiful and well appointed. Unfortunately, many of the common areas are in disrepair, and in some cases pose serious safety hazards. The main pool area in particular is in dire need of repair as the tile grout in the pool has eroded to a point where nearly every tile has sharp edges (a child cut his foot open quite severely while we there). The composite decking around the perimeter of the pool is also in a state of disrepair, with several loose board and sharp metals screws protruding from numerous parts. By comparison, the rooms are well appointed and maintained. Food on the resort is good by expensive (but I suspect this is common at most hotels in the area). The location is good with access to the beach across the road which a security guard…

title: one of the cleanest places
review: This Hotel was a very pleasant surprise, rooms very large with all you could want for a 10 night stay, clean clean clean.All the staff were so friendly and welcoming, the staff at the main pool and bar were just delightful, and catered to all our needs.This would be one of the cleanest Hotels we have ever stayed at.

title: Relaxing & cool resort
review: one the best beach resort in Phuket, spacious, clean, friendly.  Once you stay there, you will not think of leaving the resort.  Great for family holidays.  Must go to stay.  F & B outlets are great too.  Highly recommended.

title: Spa treatment <3
review: Dont hesitate to get a massage from these guys - they are wonderful! Tukta and fon's hospitality and service was awesome and for 690bht for 60mins - cant go wrong.. I'll be back for sure! Cheers guys!

title: Exceptional treatment
review: Fon, Pat and Aree are an exceptional team. From the warm welcome to their delicate and personal care. They looked after our every need, what a way to end our trip. I would definitely recommend them to anyone visiting. Thank you Team!

title: In Balance by Novotel Spa
review: Had an amazing couples massage. Warm and welcoming arrival. Fon, pat, aree were incredibly accommodating and catered to all our needs. The full body massage was a perfect way to end our last day here. I would definitely recommend them to anyone visiting :)

title: Family heaven
review: Words dont describe the magical 10 nights we had as a family.  We had a splash pool room, which was spacious and daily cleaned.  The breakfast was really good with a good variety of offerings.  The hotels restaurants offered a good selection of thai and international dishes at reasonable prices (similar to local prices) we ate a lot of pizzas as its our daughters favourite.  Nothing was too much trouble for the hotel staff and they make a lot of effort for the younger guests, my daughter went to the kids world, friday glow party, foam party and aqua aerobics,   Location... Karon avenue is a local parade of shops with restaurants and a supermarket (7/11) and a massage place. Hotel arranges cabs at reception and fixes the price.  Overall amazing hotel.

title: Very Nice Stay
review: Great Stay, Staff were nice, however only provided enough coffee for one person when there were two adults in the room. The breakfast was ok however need to move the addition food from the egg station as it adds difficulty for people who have ordered/waiting to order eggs and those who are attempting to get at the food on the counter. People are rude, not kind or considerate...did I say Chinese? The pools were nice however some stayed in the kids pools long after the 7;00 pm curfew...did I say the Chinese? The beach across the street was great and there are places to eat outside the hotel.

title: Inbalance ny novotel
review: The massage was very good. Clean roomes and nice people. Good service. Would live to come back. If you would like one relaxing hour you should try this place. There are manet different massage that you can have

title: Excellant Family Vacation
review: We spent a great holiday at the Novotel Karon. Although food and service was excellant, it was the friendliness of staff that made it a truely great vacation! A few people stood out. Jay at the Sport's bar is calm and very friendly no matter how busy it gets. Judy at breakfeast was always ready to assist with a friendly face and a great breakfeast. Her service was excellant. Mook and rest of runners was always friendly and ready to help. We enjoyed the evening dinners and food from room service, and sports bar was really super. The spa also is a must do on the list. Again a line of friendly faces will make you relax from the moment you enter. Mrs Fon welcomed us friendly and professionally. This was our third stay at Novotel Karon. Along with great service it is these people…

title: Cosy, close to Karon Beach, superb experience.
review: This was a perfect location, close proximity to clean and beautiful Karon Beach right across 1 road. Crossing the road is safe with all time road marshals to guide you.  Ying restaurant at karon beach was serving decent Thai and western food, visited twice within 4 night stay and had sumptuous snapper fish for dinner. Nearby Karon avenue had its big 7-11, a must go and try the iced espresso, didn't know it was that decent along with the pastries.   Right beside 7-11, you get a 3 month old newly opened massage place, relax Spa and massage. Wife and myself spent 2 separate sessions here on alternate days, ambience was clean, spick and span. Masseurs were well trained especially kudos on Joy, wife gave 2 thumbs up for skillfully coconut scrub and massage to ease her sores.   Family…

title: Family friendly hotel
review: We stayed in this hotel for 3 nights with our 2 kids (age 8 and 3). Overall, we enjoyed our stay and didn't encounter any major problems with the service or room. Here are a few pros and cons of this hotel:  Pros: 1. A very children friendly hotel with loads of activities for the kids 2. The service provided by the hotel staff was good. Everyone was friendly. 3. We stayed in the Family Fun room. The room was spacious and I loved the bright lighting available (some hotels have such dim, yellow lighting that I can hardly see anything!). 4. I especially loved the very spacious bathroom! 5. The buffet breakfast was good and there was a kid's corner. 6. It is a few minutes walk to the beach, restaurants, cafes and 7-11 store.  Cons: 1. The hotel is a little old and run down. The…

title: Service
review: We have been staying at the resort for a week now and I must say I am very impressed with the service staff.  In particular, a special mention needs to be made of Ae from the Joe Kool’s Grill.  I have special dietary needs due to being anaphylactic to nuts, and Ae has gone out of his way to provide comfort and security for our family and always remembering to take special care which enables us to relax and just enjoy your holiday. I come from a high end service background and Ae’s attention to detail and service is remarkable and above expectations.  Thanks for making the holiday so much more enjoyable and peaceful

title: In balance spa
review: Got nice spa treatment and the  friendly indian  receptionist janu is just excellent for recomemdation,was very helpful and always smiling and willing to help. I recommend travellers to visit in balance spa.

title: In Balance Spa Review
review: Nice spa with good massages at affordable price with discount for hotel guests. We took the Jet Lag Revival (or something like that) and that was 90 relaxing minutes after an early flight. Looking forward to trying other massages

title: Spa
review: The jet lag massage and facial package which you get discounted on arrival was very good. The therapist had firm reassuring strokes. Melted my tension away. Highly recommend a visit to the spa on the day u arrive to immediately unwind.

title: Good family hotel
review: Stayed here with our kids and grandkids, ages ranging from 4 to 14. Great activities for the grandkids. The suite we stayed in was large and very comfortable. Breakfast was a bit haphazard depending on what time you went there. Sometimes the food was not replaced and breakfast finished at 10 am, too early if you’re on holiday. The major criticism was the main pool which needs serious maintenance, the grouting between the tiles was missing in large parts of the pool and so there was many sharp edges which we saw a few cut foots . Not acceptable for a Branded hotel. Overall a good stay and really nice staff.

title: Excellent hotel
review: The staff is really gentle.   We are here with two families they have good Rooms and it is also good place for the children’s l.  I think it’s a little bit expensive for the food and drinks  normally you pay for a bottle water 7 bath and in hotel it is much expansive. But we enjoy everything in the hotel.

title: Very Quiet
review: Hotel is located across the road from the beach and is a short walk from shopping areas and 7-11/pharmacy etc.  Staff are very friendly and keen to help. The resort was very quiet when we were there - apart from breakfast which was very busy.  We ate in the poolside bar and the sports bar - food was excellent (though not all dishes were available). There is a good selection for breakfast.  The resorts shop is expensive and has a limited selection (some of which was not the best quality and had clearly been on the shelves a while). Better to walk to the 7-11.

title: Great way to relax.
review: Had a traditional Thai massage from ‘Anne’ it was wonderful. After a hectic few days just what the tired old body needed. Anne was very strong for a small lady she made me wince at times. But it was very good. Very relaxing and will do it again. All the staff are excellent. Highly recommended.

title: Beautiful spa treatment
review: My mum, sister and I all had the 90 minute spa massage treatment. I could definitely say that all three of us felt amazing after. The staff were very friendly and definitely recommend for everyone in future. I personally would come back!

title: Absolutely fantastic
review: We spent a wonderful week at Novotel with superb staff and daily activities for the whole family.  They took really good care of my son when he wasn't well.  The stuffed omelettes were amazing!  We will definitely be back.

title: Beautiful Spa Treatment
review: I had a 90 minute massage treatment at the onsite spa at NOVOTEL Phuket Karon which was exceptional. Beautiful ambience in the spa area and massage room and lovely friendly staff! Very relaxing treatment which I thoroughly enjoyed 😄

title: Poor at best
review: Difficult to understand why this hotel gets such ratings. It was our worse stay in Thailand and Asia to date. A family room ordered to have toys and bright bunk beds resulted in nothing except a bed that was unusable because it creaked at the slightest touch. At six am, the pool cleaner started the power washing industrial machine parked right outside the door. Breakfast was average at best, busy and noisy. Service frankly poor and we had to ask three times at poolside for basic order to be corrected.  The hotel offered us points but not a refund. Disappointing given that we didn’t get what we paid for, didn’t get a functional room and were inconvenienced in a way that spoilt the first day of holiday.  Phuket has many resorts. Avoid this one !

title: Novotel Karon Resort- an aspiring property in evolution.
review: Novotel has exceptionally good properties across the world and one would expect nothing less at 'Phuket' one of more visited resort island.But Novotel Karon Resort is inching its way up, having not reached the standards as yet.  Pros:  Location: Well placed resort, nearest to Karon Beach's prime section with lot of personal space. The Water sports and Shade Umbrelllas & Beach Chair rows are 25 metres away from prime section. Beach-side shacks are merely 400 metres from Novotel Karon.   - Front office staff is exceptionally efficient and responsive to needs. I must compiment 'JANE and NOOK' as two Star performers. - Planet-21 program that allows guests to let-go housekeeping services (saving water and eco-conservation) and in return, earn redeemable vouchers of THB 200/USD 7 per…

title: Family orientated hotel.
review: Unlike Patong, Novotel Karon is located in a quieter area of Phuket.  Directly across the road from the hotel is the beach and only about 10 minutes walk from the local shops and food stores.  There are daily dinner promotions so the meal are quite reasonably priced.  There are also happy hours at the bars.  The hotel caters especially well for children and when we were there we saw many young families.  There are 3 pools and are suitable for children.  There is also a kids club.  For the adults, you can have the promotional 60 minute massage and 30 minute facial for less than 1000 baht.  Overall, we had and enjoyable stay.

title: Lovely Staff and on point for kids!!
review: We visited here on a family holiday. We had two families and 3children between us 1, 1 and 3. I’ve rated it 4 for the staff!! They made our stay!  Pros : The staff are amazing!! Every morning they played with the kids after they had eaten. Always said hello when they saw them  The kids club is simple but enough  The kids activities are so fun Staff are always so happy to help with anything you need The food is great  The pools are awesome   Cons-  The hotel is old and needs to be cleaned up  The rooms smelt of mould  The cleaners didn’t change over our cups, mugs and spoons   All in all it was a pleasant stay at the hotel but probably wouldn’t stay again.

title: Best week ever!!
review: Everything was perfect from the moment we walked in, to the moment we left 1 week later. We were met with a huge smile and a very quick and smooth check in and our bags got delivered to the room very efficiently. Our room was so beautiful and spacious! Every morning we treated ourselves to a beautiful breakfast buffet, with lots of options and the chefs make some amazing omelettes! We spent a lot of time relaxing by the pool and being looked after by a fantastic poolside bar tender. Also the massages are amazing in the resort! There were heaps of dining options in the resort also with a poolside buffet with different cuisines every night, an authentic Thai restaurant and also a bar with your typical bar food options. Also the location is amazing and you can get a tuk tuk for…

title: Spacious room with private jacuzzi
review: This is situated in the more quiet beach area of Phuket. If you are travelling with kids and your family and wants a more relaxed ambience to enjoy the beach, this is a good option. If you want a more hip area, more nightlife, more night shopping to do, you should choose the other beach locations in Phuket. Novotel Karon Hotel is a nice place to stay. The suite is spacious. You can enjoy a private jacuzzi and have a small, secluded area to dine out of the room with your family. Room service is spectacular. The buffet breakfast has good options. They have an area in the breakfast hall for kids where they can draw, color and play. Transportation is not a problem as it is very accessible. There are nearby restaurants and convenience stores which are just a few meters by foot.

title: Nice place great location
review: We recently stayed here on our first trip to Phuket. Our first room we stayed in was pretty average to be honest. It was noisy and had a fountain right out front that could not be turned off. We spoke to reception and they kindly upgraded us for a small price to a gorgeous villa. We were thrilled with our new room it was very spacious with a beautiful bathroom and pool out front. The breakfast is ok definitely could do with some improvement. Overall nice stay and really good location. 5 mins from local shops and beach.

title: A excellent stay
review: Really nice hotel! Very impressed with the level of service...  We arrived here in the low season. Half of the hotel was empty and we got a free room upgrade. The staff are so eager to help you. They literally go above and beyond to make your stay more comfortable with a warm smile on their face.  The hotel is located on the west side of the Phuket island which is nice. We went to old Phuket in the evening and there were no open shops there while the area around the hotel was full of life. So many cheap massage places and restaurants in the walking distance.   The room and the bed was quite big and we had a very comfortable stay. Also the restaurant had different cuisines every night as well as the alacarte Thai food which were both tasty. The hotel has three pools but only one…

title: Top Notch Service
review: This Hotel knows how to treat a family. From having multiple pools to swim in (1 with a nice slide even). Down to letting kids eat free (especially those who are picky and don't eat). Today they held a pool bubble party, so s talking all about it. They even had a on call doctor who came to the room to check on my boys who were feeling sick. This is a top Notch family hotel if i have ever been to one. Highly recommend....

title: Pools need to be fixed!
review: We loved our room, but beds were way too hard and woke up with sore backs each day. Staff were lovely as are most Thai's. The biggest disappointment for us was the higeine of the swimming pools. There are three there and although they have great activities for the kids, all of them were like swimming in spas. Too hot and dirty. External pumps to keep pools clean which was not adequate for the size of the pools. Our daughter and two other children we met at the hotel got sick from swallowing the pool water. Not good enough for a Novotel Hotel!

title: Family Vacation
review: We stayed at Novotel Karon in May of this year  The room was very comfortable and nice the staff was very friendly and helpful, the Hotel was not on the beach but was just across the street.   The only negative thing We experienced was the restaurant at the Hotel , My Daughter went to the Bingo night and won a ticket that said complementary Dinner for two .because we were there celebrating our Anniversary my Daughter gave us the ticket when we went to the restaurant we were told that it was just a promotional ticket and it only cover 1 dinner and we could only choose the meal that the restaurant selected, we were not given a Menu except for drinks which we had have to purchase at full price . I think this was a deception. We heard similar experiences from other guests.  My wife…

title: Definitely Recommend for Travelling with Your little
review: kids friendly hotel and suitable for family too!  We staying 5D 4N on Oct 2018 for celebration our 13th year Anniversary! Hotel just located opposite of Karon beach which only need cross the road less that few foot steps..  Hotel have provide the nice and fresh breakfast everyday and sometimes you will able meet the hero too ! My boy is very enjoy the kids club which of pay a little fees..  The resort have 4 difference swimming pool..and also will have the pool party, nice try!  We also have offer free upgrade our room during we stay =)  Staff is helpful and friendly too, our boy fall as sick during we stay,  the front desk trying to give us help and provide us the nearest medical centre with help us arrange the transport to the medical centre too, is really thanks to thier…

title: Another Great Stay
review: Dear Jesphannie, it was a pleasure welcoming you and Family for your Anniversary, and love reading how much you have enjoyed your stay with us! We do propose a large choice of Fun activities for the entire Family, as well as our now famous Pool Party, glad that you had some fun :) Many thanks for your nice words towards the quality and variety of our Cuisine and for breakfast in particular, as well as for the friendliness and professionalism of our Heartists too. We will look forward to welcoming you and Family back soon, Warm regards, Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Very nice hotel
review: A very nice resort. Positioned close to Karon Beach yet still close to Patong and other attractions. Relaxing atmosphere and great service. Always Good value. Wifi could be a bit more regular but this seems par with most other hotels

title: Wonderful vacation
review: My family and I stayed at Novotel Phuket Karon for 8 days in May, we had 2 rooms. My husband and I was upgraded to a king size suite which was very spacious.  The staff was very pleasant and helpful from the moment we got there. The beach is across the road, very busy street but there is a crossing guard to help you and there’s always someone there. I thank all the staffs for a great week, I don’t remember everybody’s name,  but you were all good 😊 You must try the spa I had a full body massage for 1hr. right before I left, it was amazing thank you “Ayee” I’m not sure how she spell her name. Thanks again Novotel, we will return.

title: Plunge pool suite - poor room layout ( read conclusion )
review: Dear CDC1986, We were delighted to welcoming you and Family, and so happy that you have enjoyed a great stay! Indeed, the Resort is located on Karon Beach, considered by the locals as one of the most beautiful beach on the Island. Many thanks for your appreciation toward our Heartists, whom are dedicated to the comfort and well being of our Guests, as well as for the relaxing treatments from our Therapists at In-Balance SPA. We will look forward to welcoming you back soon and invite you to contact me directly as I would be glad to personally assist you then, Warm regards, Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Fantastic for families & couples alike
review: The location of the resort is far from the beach and you have to cross a high traffic road on a bending curve. Novotel hires a guard to help stop traffic but due to the nature of the road. It can be hazardous for young kids to cross as you may need speed  Room issue: We stayed in the plunge pool and the water was not clear  only after feedback it was ok. Plunge pool has very sharp edges and tiles are also uneven. Watch out for toddlers. See pic   The facilities are quite run down. The bathtub has issues with the shower head and overhead shower lever.  The sink gets stucked. Lampshade has white glue residue ( pic)   Horizon Cafe issue: Coffee and eggs : welcome to queue land   1) Super long coffee queue. Only 1 machine They use a Bon machine which takes an average minute plus to…

title: Amazing place
review: Dear aikiben77, We would like to thank you for your recent stay, however truly sorry that your experience did not meet your expectations. Your comments and suggestions are utmost valuable to us, and will certainly address the Service issue with the necessary training and supervision, as well as Wi-Fi inconsistency or pool environment. We also appreciate that this would not make up for your last visit, but do hope that we will have the chance to welcoming you back so we could serve you better. Could I invite you to contact me directly then, as I would be delighted to assist you designing your next journey, and ensure that you enjoy a blissful experience. Warm regards Jena Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Great
review: Stayed here last year & enjoyed it so much came back this year for longer.  Dunno if its cause it's a different time of year but this time I was really impressed with how much they do for families....the kids pool had food available round it...at breakfast theres cute beanbags seating area for kids...the Friday night glow party was so much fun...face painting/temporary tattoos, dancing/entertainment led by a German (?) & 2 Thai guys that had the crowd laughing and really enjoying the time...theres a phone by the main pool restaurant that kids can pickup and call to get free popsicles!! Happy hour at the pool is excellent value with buy 1,get 1 free from 4-6....always loungers there and lots of different spaces to chill out...pool table at both main pool and quieter pool by the…

title: Excellent Spa! Dont miss it
review: My cousin and I are staying at this hotel. We booked ourselves for a 2 hour spa and it was utter BLISS. the masseuse were really good. Room was very peaceful and I actually felt asleep. I did 30 mins of the coconut scrub which smelt heavenly, 60 mins of the aroma body massage and then a 30 min Indian head oil massage. I suggest you book yourself a treatment so you can bring them the memories of your trip home.!!!

title: Couple and Family Destination
review: [ Pros ] - Friendly staffs - Beautiful atmosphere - 3 swimming pools and 1 water slide (with foam party on Sunday) - Spacious room  - Close to the beach  [ Cons ] - Mosquitoes - Long queue breakfast  For me  9/10

title: Excellent and friendly service
review: Dear Chachakotch, We were delighted to welcoming you at the Resort, and love reading that you have enjoyed our facilities, the professional service and friendliness of our Heartists, or the ideal location of the Resort on the Karon Beach. Could we share that we also conduct regular preventive treatments to minimize the disturbance from mosquitoes, as well as propose two venues for breakfast, so everyone can enjoy a relaxing time. We will look forward to welcoming you back soon and invite you to contacting me directly via jp.lovotti@accor.com as i would be delighted to personally assist you designing your next journey, Warm regards

title: Great Staff, Great Location & Good Value
review: During my 4 days stay in this hotel, the receptionist lady Bow n Cindy were most helpful and friendly when I needed help to either return my rented bike or extention for another day. They were veri patient and warm in almost every moment. My room was clean and very comfortable bed too. Me and my son really had a great experience all together and indeed great memories created. We loved the welcome drinks too... Flower juice

title: Babymoon and prenatal massage
review: Dear Travel58329949687, it was a pleasure welcoming you at Novotel Phuket Karon, and delighted that you had such a great stay! Our Heartists are dedicated to create experiences our Guests Love, and we are so happy that you could have experienced their genuine sense of Hospitality. We do hope that we will have the chance to welcoming you again soon. Feel welcome to contacting me directly then via jp.lovotti@accor.com as I would be delighted assisting you designing your next journey, Warm regards

title: Really bad
review: Being so disappointed about this hotel. The room was not clean and was really bad smell. Actually was so bad that we almost never stayed in the room. It cuts your breath.  Definitely never ever again in this hotel!!! Never!!  I never found a guest paper in the room to write them a message but I think that they know already and they don’t care about the guest opinions!!  Really bad! Be careful!!!

title: Fantastic Novotel Karon
review: Dear 726adyl, Many thanks for your recent stay with us, however sincerely sorry that your experience did not meet your expectations. We are dedicated to the comfort and well being of our Clients, and reading your review, we have let you down. Please accept our deepest apologize. Rest assured that we have action on your suggestions, however appreciate it would not make up for your last stay. we do hope that we will have the chance to welcoming you back in the future and invite you to contact me directly then via jp.lovotti@accor.com, as I would be delighted to ensure that you enjoy a blissful experience. Warm regards Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Good but needs renovation
review: Spent 4 nights at Novotel Karon & wow like the hotel which surpassed those we have stayed during our numerous visits to Phuket.   Not at patong thus gave us the serene quietness & yet patong is just approximately 10 mins drive away with 300THB cab fare which gave us the fix of shopping & crowd if we want.  The hotel is very family oriented & yet conducive for friends & couple trip. Clean environment & self contain hotel without the need to go out if you wish to stay within the compound. Karon shopping belt is just 5-10 mins walk away but nothing much. As for the massage, spend abit more to enjoy the massage within Novotel, it is awesome.

title: Horrible Customer Service at Ocean's Italian Seafood
review: Dear Khim_attitude, It is a pleasure reading your review and so happy that you have enjoyed a great stay with us! The Hotel is indeed ideally located in the District of Karon, with lots of Boutiques, local restaurants and bars, traditional temples, night markets, and one of the most beautiful beach on the island. Most importantly, the Resort has been designed to accommodate both Families and Couples, with adequate structures for everyone to enjoy relaxing, FUN, or romantic holidays. We will look forward to welcoming you back soon. Feel welcome to contacting me directly via jp.lovotti@accor.com as I will be glad to assist you designing your next journey, Warm regards, Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Great Family Hotel
review: This hotel would have been great when it was first built but it it showing its age now. The rooms are really spacious but  the bed was like sleeping on a rock- two rocks pushed together with a big ridge in the middle actually. The bathroom was good with a big shower (room for 2) but for some reason no face towels are provided- odd.  The pool is massive but definitely needs re-grouting on the tiles and the depth at the pool bar is a weird knee/thigh height but the day bartender makes a great mojito! Overall it was a pleasant stay.

title: Excellent family hotel
review: We stayed here on our trip for 2 nights and this was a great family friendly hotel with amenities. Very comfortable room and a very good variety of food at breakfast for even the fussiest of eaters! Fab pool and spa. Would stay again!

title: OK, but..
review: We booked this hotel because of it´s Kids Club. There is really a kids club, but there are no activities with kids. They can stay in the club room and play X-Box. That is not what we have imagined. In front of the club is a nice Kids Pool, but they are not going there with kids. Even the club staff could not speak/understand English. Very disappointing. Otherwise the hotel is nice, three swimming pools, helpful staff at the reception, tried to fulfill all our requests. Breakfast always very crowded, long waiting before entry, not so well organized.

title: A great family stay
review: Dear ZuzKF,  Thank you for sharing your thoughts online. We are glad to read that you enjoyed the quality of our resort, the 3 swimming pools with a water slide, as well as the Genuine Sense of Hospitality of our Heartists. On the other hand, please allow me to apologize on my team’s behalf for not meeting your expectations in terms of staff professionalism. Rest assured, we will accompany them in the following English courses. Happy to share that we propose free Thai language initiation for our Guests to immerse in the local culture and an environment. Your feedback on the variety of activity at the kids club has been carefully noted by our team and will be taken into account for the next review of the program. We truly appreciate your feedback and hope to have the chance to welcome you again in the future. Moreover, if you have more feedback or making plans to visit us again, please feel welcome contact me directly, I will be delighted to personally ensure that you experience a blissful stay in our hotel.  Warm regards, Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Amazing Spa
review: My husband, son aged 11 and I  stayed at the Novotel Karon Beach from 5-14 April 2019.   On arrival the check in staff were fast, efficient and polite and were able to offer an early check in.  The superior room was a fair size and clean and very convenient as it was next to the kids pool with a slide.  Breakfast is an important part of any holiday and so i would like to give A special mention to Bow, Maria, Rasel, and Jar who worked tirelessly to ensure that the guests had a  wonderful start to the day with an amazing breakfast.   Nothing was too much trouble and they seemed handle all requests in a polite and professional manner.  In fact I’d like to thank all the staff for their hard work, the service we received was top quality.  There are a couple of areas I thought like…

title: Very comfortable, attractive resort.
review: Dear Anitashom,  Many thanks for taking the time to leave a very warm review. Moreover, thank you for sharing that you had such a great Family time with our Superior room near to the Kids pool with water slide, the quality of our breakfast, as well as the level of service from our Heartist. We hope that we will have a chance to welcoming you back in the future for much more great moment.  Warm regards, Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Good solid family hotel
review: 5 nights with kids aged 6 & 8 in a plunge pool suite.  Room was a good size with the kids having a trundle bed (sofa conversion) so we could position one of the kids beds anywhere in the room. Separate room for the adults. Lovely size bathroom with bath and separate shower. Did stink a bit for our entire stay (common place in Asia). Plunge pool was exactly that with a nice little sit out area. The staff must have added chlorine one day as the kids jumped out real quick itching and scratching.  Three other main pools, one a kids area with a great little slide, and kids foam parties twice a week (our kids got a bit scared after the first time due amount of foam). Other pools are ok, but be careful of sharp tiles in the pool. Standard issue of the Europeans reserving sun loungers…

title: Second visit
review: Dear hongkongtravelman,  Thank you for your recent stay at Novotel Karon, and delighted that you have enjoyed the resort location, the swimming pool with a fantastic water slide and the Foam Party on every Wednesday and Sunday, as well as the comfort of our Plunge Pool Suite. But most importantly is the genuine sense of hospitality of our Heartists.  Many thanks for your suggestions too, that will certainly support our commitment to delivering great experiences. Could we share then that the quality of the waters is tested on a daily basis, and that we follow strict procedures regarding its conditions. We are delighted that you have enjoyed the Cuisine in Ocean, again, value your recommendations there. As for breakfast, it is proposed in two venues during the busy season for everyone to enjoy a relaxing breakfast. We do propose extensive choices, with live cooking stations, hots and cold dishes, carving stations, fresh juices, tropical fruits, dairies, pastries, as well as an ‘a la carte’ selection for you to choose from. We are certainly sorry that you did not find your satisfaction there.   We do hope that we will have the chance to welcoming you back in the future and invite you to contact me directly, as I would be delighted to personally ensure that you enjoy a blissful experience.  Warm regards, Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Excellent hotel
review: Loved this hotel from previous year so decided to come back second time... Once again was met by the wonderful smiling Rena and colleagues...fast and efficient check in. Mr room this visit was bigger then previous year...clean and tidy. I will b booking my next stay hopefully November 2019.

title: Room to improve
review: Dear krjlfc86,  It was a pleasure welcoming you back again at the Resort and glad that you had a pleasant stay and relaxing holidays. We delighted that you have enjoyed the Genuine Sense of Hospitality of our Heartists, as well as, the spacious and cleanliness of your room. It's encouraging as our guest's satisfaction is our primary concern. We appreciate your honest feedback and look forward to seeing you enjoy your holidays with us again.  Warm regards, Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Didn’t feel I got value for money
review: Stayed with family. Got upgraded to a private pool villla and kids absolutely loved it.  Hotel is closely located to lot of activities around including a night market nearby with great options for food and shopping. Staff is courteous and helpful and special mention to those little breakfast boxes they pack if you are checking out early in the morning, especially helpful if you are traveling with kids.

title: Amazing hotel
review: I stayed at Novatel Karon beach in April 2019 for 8days. I would recommend this resort to anybody with kids as it is amazing and the staff will do anything to help you. Shoutout to staff such as Pat, Pa, Emma (and so much more but forgot their names) And staff who were working at the Joe Kools bar as they put so much effort into serving food with outstanding service, and always smiling no matter how hot they were. Myself and my family Would definitely return to this exact resort to experience this high quality hotel.

title: great place
review: Dear Mikhail-benoit,  Thank you for taking the time to leave a very warm review. Moreover, thank you for sharing that you had such a great Family time with the admiration of our staff and the resort. We truly appreciate your warm reviews and we look forward to welcoming you back soon for much more amazing time.  Warm regards, Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Relaxing Holiday
review: we visited for 3 days in janauary 2019. thd managment upgraded us to poolvillas whick were great. the villas had a great sit out, refrigerator, nice plunge pool to relax.  AC was working well. the decor and in room amenities were great.  Checkin and check out was smooth and quick.  the swimming pools were big and well maintained. staff was always polite and helpfull. the buffet breakfast used to be very crowded and getting a table was difficult after 9 am. its around 10 to 15 mins walk frim main street. beack is just opposite the resort. very peacefull location. lot of eating places, 7/11, across. definately coming back.

title: Great time to stay in this hotel
review: Dear pawar_uday,  Thank you for your warm reviews. We are pleased to read about your positive experience and perfect stay at our resort, and delighted that you have enjoyed the comfort of our Plunge Pool Site, the fantastic 3 swimming pools, the resort location just across Karon Beach where you will find a large panel of shops and restaurants, but most importantly is the Genuine Sense of Hospitality of our Heartists. On the other hand, we are sorry to read about your breakfast experience. In terms of the long queue during breakfast, we provide 2 venues for breakfast during the Holiday Season, to ensure that everyone can enjoy a relaxing and rejuvenating breakfast. We hope that we will have a chance to welcoming you back in the future.  Warm regards, Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Got upgraded to one of their best rooms, very family-friendly
review: We spent 12 nights here .Staff and Hotel was Great .Food Beautiful and lots of Variety. Hotel is across from the Beach which was Great for our Daily swim.I of the Managers Paula was Great made our Holiday very easy.

title: Excellent hotel
review: This hotel is super kids friendly and they won’t want to go outside the hotel as there are so many activities from 9 am till 7 pm for eg kids room , kids pool , even for breakfast they have kids table with chocolate cereals , marshmallows, cookies etc   Staff is very courteous and helpful and will try to accommodate all needs if possible   Rooms are big and deluxe room can easily accommodate 2 adults and 1 kid   Hotel has 3 swimming pools hence it’s never busy , kids will definitely enjoy kids swimming pool since it has a slide , kids menu ,and twice a week they have foam party which is just amazing   Karon beach is just across busy road (hotel has a staff specially for it ) and 2 min walking and 5 min walking to Karon view which has amazing lake view restaurant   Breakfast…

title: Okay at best
review: Dear rishi82in,  We are more than happy to welcoming you at Novotel Phuket Karon and very delighted that you had such a great stay. We are known as one of the best Phuket Family Resorts because, as you mentioned, we provide a lot of fun activities for kids and parents even for the breakfast. Our Heartists are also dedicated to create experiences our Guests Love, and it is our pleasure that you could have experienced their genuine sense of Hospitality.
