Also, the 3 swimming pools, the resort location is just across Karon Beach and we have deployed 24/7 security personnel to help our guests cross the road to get to the beach. On the other hand, your suggestion on the egg station has been carefully noted by our team and will be taken into account for the next improvement. Could we share that we propose breakfast in 2 venues during the Holiday Season, to ensure that everyone can enjoy a relaxing and rejuvenating breakfast. We do hope that we will have a chance to welcoming you back in the future and invite you to contact me directly, as I would be delighted to personally assist you then.  Warm regards, Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Worst hotel ever 13 buildings and 1 lift we have to do massive exercise to reach room all the time
review: We opted for a plunge pool room and I’m really pleased we did because we spent the majority of our time there and out of the way of the main pool areas.   The rooms are okay. The plunge pool area is small but was fine for just the two of us.   The main issue here is the location. It’s a good ten minute walk to the central restaurant/ shopping area - with not really anything in between except main road. I grant you this isn’t a lot but in the heat it really was. All the food in the hotel was good but hugely overpriced - however they got away with this because it wasn’t worth the sweaty walk to get anywhere else for breakfast or lunch (and minimum cost for a tuk tuk to get you there is 200 baht each way).  The hotel is next to a busy road too. There is a member of staff whose sole…

title: Great location with amazing pool side rooms
review: Dear loisdiane153,  Many thanks for choosing Novotel Karon. We do appreciate your nice words towards the dedicated attention from our Teams. In regards to the resort location, we are located just across Karon Beach, we have deployed 24/7 security personnel to help our guests cross the road to get to the beach. Could we share you that we do source and provide for great quality product, as well as conduct regular benchmark on the Island so you could enjoy the best quality & value. We do hope that we will have the chance to welcoming you back in the future and invite you to contact me directly, as I would be delighted to personally ensure that you enjoy a blissful experience.  Warm regards, Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: MR Stamatios Reissis
review: The experience of novotel karon beach was ruined at the time of check in only non co operative staff they gave us all rooms in 3 different buildings very far from each other our kids hate it "Strictly not recommended for families" Rooms very far you have to climb on 4 staircases to reach room worst hotel ever All rooms far away Only 1 lift For hundreds of rooms bad staff non co operative persons non practical people Extra charge for every thing u have to pay for kids activity you have to pay for any and every thing u do apart from the room  Mosquito terror in all rooms   Very far from karon beach .... no shuttle no transport remote area located food joints restaurants very far from hotel.....   They almost charge u double the price by charging u extra for things  Worst   They…

title: Disappointed
review: Really disappointed with this resort. Everything fell short of what a Novotel should be. Firstly we were told there is a free daily shuttle to and from Patong from the resort. That's why we booked at karon for the ease getting around. Upon arrival we are told there is no shuttle. Also were told the resort has its own sunbed area on the beach, again not true. The staff are nice enough but not everyone is openly friendly. Abit of a language barrier also , I put this down to the training received. They mostly did what was required and no more. Don't get me wrong most of them were lovely so it's probably the Novotels shortcomings in training that causes these issues. The breakfast was very average and the quality so so. Juices loaded with sugar, small fruit selection. For a hotel of…

title: Good location
review: Dear jacquelineo,  At Novotel Karon, we are dedicated to creating experiences our guest's Love, and reading your review, we have let you down. Please accept our sincere apologies.   Could we share in a first place that the Beaches in Thailand are under the public sector and that Operators have unfortunately no right or access to provide any kind of service. So goes with the complimentary shuttle service that had to be suspended.   In the morning, we do propose extensive breakfast in the morning, with live cooking stations, hots and cold dishes, carving stations, fresh juices, tropical fruits, dairies, pastries, as well as an ‘a la carte’ selection for you to choose from. We are certainly sorry that you did not find your satisfaction there.  We are also sorry that you have felt the mattress too firm to your comfort. Could we share here again that we do propose mattress toppers to ensure that everyone enjoys a rejuvenating sleep. Nonetheless, we will certainly review your suggestions regarding the bathroom and to ensure prompt action will be taken accordingly.  On the other hand, we value your nice words towards the resort and the gardens, as well as on the level of service from our Heartist. Rest assured that we accompany them in following English courses. Happy to share that we propose free Thai language initiation for our Guests too, great to immerse in the local culture and environment.  We do hope that your experience would not deter you from traveling back to Thailand and you could contact us directly shall you plan another visit.  Warm regards, Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Leisure at its best
review: Great hotel and staff very good and helpful at all times. Food good.  good location and ould stay again. Only downfall was pool is in desperate need of re tiling...  myself and children cut our feet several times.

title: An Oasis of Serenity
review: Dear Mazza19792013,  Thank you for choosing Novotel Karon for your Holiday destination, and delighted that you have enjoyed the great quality of our resort, the genuine sense of hospitality of our Heartists, the quality of our food, as well as the resort location on Karon Beach. Nonetheless, we are sorry about that inconvenience, please accept our apologies. We hope that she has recovered well since. We certainly value your recommendation and will certainly address the matter accordingly. We do hope that we will have a chance to welcoming you back in the future and invite you to contact me directly then,  Warm regards, Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Excellent location - will change soon
review: My family had the pleasure to return to this resort end of last year. We were here a couple of years ago and our memory were still fresh of this place. As soon as we arrived, we know we are going to have a great time as everything looks updated as the property is properly maintained.   Our Pool Plunge Suite is awesome as usual with the jacuzzi at our doorstep. The children were kept occupied with the endless activities at Kids World as well as at the pool such as Pool Foam Party, Boat ride with Batman and Walking on Water. All these activities are held free of charge.   We took the opportunity to pamper ourselves at the spa while the kids were in Kids World safely under the care of the staffs.   We took most of our meals at Joe Kool's as they have good selection in their Kid's…

title: Nice & modern hotel close to the beach
review: I stayed there for 10 days and really enjoyed my staying. The room was fresh and modern. Nice stuff, both at the front desk and restaurant. Very nice breakfast buffet with long hours service( until 10.30) the beach is just on the other side of the road. Closed to the restaurants and bars. Definitely is Recommended!

title: Recurring Visit in Novotel Karon
review: Dear BitiMax,  Many thanks for choosing Novotel Karon for your Holiday destination, and delighted that you have enjoyed the cleanliness and the modern decoration of our room, also our Buffet Breakfast offers a wide selection of hot dishes, cold cuts, live cooking sections, local and international dishes, freshly baked pastries, tropical fresh fruits or dairies. The resort is located just Karon Beach where you can find a large panel of restaurants and bars, local markets. We will look forward to welcoming you back to our Resort for more Romantic moments and you could contact me directly then.  Warm regards, Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Superb hotel
review: We first visted Novotel Karon in Mar 2018. The experience was fanastics. Kidz were busy on plenty of activities lead by the professional recreation team. Our parents enjoyed relaxing atmosphere everywhere in the hotel. We stayed several days, and originally planned to visit many places in the town, but finally we decided to just stay in the hotel to enjoy various activities in the hotel, such as Pizza Making Class, Walk On The Water and InSpa Massage ... and these experience is long-lasting.  Our kid keeps on recall her memory here and then we arrange another trip to Novotel Karon in Feb 2019. As usual, the service remains exceptional and kidz activities increases a lot. You can see kidz' smiles everywhere in the hotel and listen enjoyable "screaming" when there is something…

title: Central, great hotel - Novotel Karon, Phuket
review: Dear TaboPoon,  We are more than happy to welcoming you again at Novotel Phuket Karon and very delighted that you had such a great stay. We are known as one of the best Phuket Family Resorts because, as you mentioned, we provide a lot of fun activities for kids and parents. We always love to know that your children enjoyed the Pizza Making class and the walk on the water.  On top of our regular facilities, our In Balance SPA is recognized as a Signature Spa on the Island. We hope to be able to delight you even further when we welcome you back the next time.  We were very pleased to read that you appreciated the Friendliness and dedicated attention from our Heartists, especially to the recreation team MR.Ning, I shall pass on your kind words to him and share your comment to the rest of the team. On the other hand, your suggestion on the variety of Thai dish options has been carefully noted by our culinary team and will be taken into account for the next review of the menu. Thanks again or taking the time to review us and we hope to welcome you back to your holiday home again soon.    Warm regards, Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Amazing family holiday😍
review: What can I say about the hotel other than absolutely wonderful. From the min we arrived greeted by friendly and helpful smiling staff. The rooms are well air conditioned and Great showers with a nice balcony. The pool area is clean, open and inviting with lots of loungers to have a lazy day around the pool (champ) think his name was. Was always around to welcome you.  The food we had by the pool was excellent to, nicely presented. The breakfast is amazing and you will not struggle to find anything you like. Special mention to the lad from reception Shev who is a credit to the hotel, from the min we arrived he was smiling and helpful, giving us advice and help when needed. All in all if you want luxury in Phuket with good location to the beach and surrounding areas than look no…

title: Fab stay
review: Came from Uk and met with family from Australia,stayed 6 nights and really enjoyed our holiday.Decent rooms with good (as in quiet!) air con,nice breakfast, 3 pools and choice of places to eat,preferred Champions by the pool. We had 2 under nines and they loved it,the staff were very attentive,and we liked the ‘popsicle hotline’ where kids could ring for free ice lollies. Only negative was the grouting between the pool tiles was badly worn,leaving sharp edges under foot,my daughter cut her knee,and saw a few others do similar. Other than that fab stay in a good hotel with great staff.

title: very nice hotel near the beach
review: Dear 941neilb,  First of all, please allow me to apologize on behalf of the team for the small accident and the cut. We are truly sorry to read about it, and we hope that she has recovered well since. The work order regarding the pool tiles has been carefully noted by our maintenance team as the safety and security of our guests is one of high importance for us.   Moreover, thank you for choosing Novotel Karon for your Holiday destination. We are extremely delighted to find out that you had a great experience because of the quality of our room with an air-conditioning, the buffet breakfast, the 3 swimming pools in different atmosphere, free popsicle from the hotline, as well as the Champions bar – where you will find the best way to chilling out with our Live music from Monday to Friday at the evening. But most importantly, it is our Pleasure that you could have enjoyed the dedicated attention from our Heartists.  We hope that we will have a chance to welcoming you back in the future.  Warm regards, Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Worst Front Desk Staff
review: pros - the staff is extremely well trained and nice - the facilities are very good - the location is pretty convenient - very family friendly - rooms are clean - environment friendly : there is incentive to not service the room - nice facilities (3 pools, kids room, gym) cons - crossing the street is very dangerous in front of the hotel  - the squarish tiles of the pools are sharp. can cut your fingers - the breakfast is far from european standards - wifi constantly drops

title: Lovely hotel, great people, lots of cool activities
review: Dear pashmakk,  Many thanks for choosing Novotel Karon for your Holiday destination, and delighted that you have enjoyed our Family-Friendly resort concept, the Genuine Sense of Hospitality of our Heartists, the great facilities, the convenient location just across Karon Beach, the cleanliness of your room, as well as the 'Planet21' program to contribute to a better environment, we propose our Guests to follow the program “Planet 21”, were guests receive a resort credit if they choose not to have their room serviced for a day. On the other hand, we are sorry to read about your breakfast experience, could we share you that our Buffet Breakfast offers a wide selection of hot dishes, cold cuts, live cooking sections, local and international dishes, but your comment has been carefully noted by our culinary team and will be taken into account for the next review of the menu. In regards, the internet connection, we are consistently upgrading our WiFi and related services to keep up with the increasing demand. We do hope that we will have the chance to welcoming you back in the future and would invite you to contact me directly then, as I would be delighted to personally ensure that you enjoy a blissful experience.  Warm regards, Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Fabulous place to stay and relax
review: Resort and Stay is wonderful.   But, front beak staff need some serious hospitality lessons. They are very bad in receiving guests, their mood was constantly bad, they don’t even know how to welcome guest.

title: Great massage
review: Had a massage in the Spa and the treatment was super professional, relaxing and great value! I would highly recommend asking for Pat, she was great, Can t fault the hotel either. Great beach across the road and lots of nice swimming pools.

title: Amazing staff
review: Dear Muzza_00,  It was a pleasure welcoming you at the Resort and delighted that you had such a great stay. Our In Balance SPA is recognized as a Signature on the Island, and we do hope that you will have the chance to experience the Quality of the Treatments again during a next visit. Many thanks also for your compliment for our Team, dedicated to the pleasure and comfort of our Guests. We will look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Warm regards, Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Great Clean hotel, calm and relaxed with a lot of activities for kids not to close from adult sections
review: The staff are amazing, they really make the hotel an enjoyable place to stay. They are professionals, friendly, kind and empowered to make your stay very comfortable. I would highly recommend this property ” The facilities at the hotel are good and the hotel is clean and tidy. I would recommend getting to breakfast early as the restaurant can get busy. The staff are extremely helpful and if you have kids they will love the kids club, its great.

title: Delightful hotel
review: Dear will711,  We are so happy that you had such a great family time at the Resort, and enjoyed the genuine sense of hospitality and the dedicated service proposed by our Heartists. Also, the cleanliness of our resort. the great facilities, and the quality of our kid's club. Could we also share that we do propose two venues for breakfast during the festive season so everyone could enjoy a relaxing breakfast time. In the meantime, we will look forward to welcoming you back soon. Feel welcome to contact me directly then as I would be delighted to personally assist you then.  Warm regards, Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Great service!
review: Great hotel not too close from the city so good for the noise preservation. But still close enough at a walking distance with a nice walk along the beach. A decent level of animations everyday that are not too much invasive on your comfort and private space. The food for breakfast was great, a really good buffet, maybe only suggestion would be proper barista to make coffees than a machine. The rooms were great and spacious for our stay in family suite. The hotel does not have really high levels (max is 4) but not having a lift in the family even on level one might push your strength if you have to lift a pram.

title: Nice place, on busy road but walking distance to restaurants and bars
review: We did our honeymoon here and it was a beautiful resort, the restaurants are good and the staff are very friendly.  Loved the poolside cabanas and the swim up bar. Good variety of cuisine. Close enough to the town centre to walk although the road is very busy and they have a crossing guard.   Would stay here again despite the hassle we had after I had lost the original card I booked it on, they wanted a letter from my bank to prove it wasn’t stolen even though we had other cards and passports. That was a bit stressful when we were on our honeymoon and put a downer on things.

title: Nice pool landscape !
review: Dear mimiandpaddy,  We are so happy that you had such a great honeymoon time at the Resort, and enjoyed the quality of our 5 restaurants and bars, each with its own identity, the quality, and variety of our food. Also, the resort located just across Karon Beach just 5mins walk.   Regarding your check-in time, we are sorry for the inconvenience you could have encountered. Normally, the front desk will ask for the original credit card to protect our guest from credit card fraud. However, we have briefed our Team to ensure that we extend the utmost flexibility in those cases.  We do hope that we will have the chance to welcoming you back in the future and would invite you to contact me directly then, as I would be delighted to personally ensure that you enjoy a blissful experience.  Warm regards, Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: The best parts of our holiday were in the hotel (travelling as a Ceoliac)
review: This hotel have a lot to offer especially for families with children (kids pool, entertainment room, dedicated staff). We reached the hotel during Pabuk tropical storm, which reduced its intensity to the level of a tropical rain over Phuket. We stayed that day at the pool and enjoyed even that warm rain in the pool, with good food and drinks. The kids had their own foam party at the pool. The third pool also very nice. We had a big king size bed in the room, a lot of space in the room and in the bathroom and terrace. Very helpfull staff (helping us to arrange transportation and other requests), good breakfast and good location (in walking distance to Karon beach and some nice restaurants nearby), also not too far from Karon center.

title: Mr Ahmed
review: Dear Hans074,  Many thanks for choosing Novotel Karon for your Holiday destination, and delighted that you have enjoyed the Genuine Sense of Hospitality of our Heartists, the comfort of our room, bathroom and terrace, the kid’s activities, the 3 swimming pools, each other and offering a different atmosphere. Also, our Buffet Breakfast offers a wide selection of hot dishes, cold cuts, live cooking sections, local and international dishes, freshly baked pastries, tropical fresh fruits or dairies, we also propose a second venue during the Holiday season so you could find your preference. The resort located just across Karon Beach where you will find a large panel of restaurants and local markets. We will look forward to welcoming you back to our Family Resort.  Warm regards, Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Full of entertainment!
review: Our family of 5 ( 2 adults 3 kids aged 13, 11, 9) just returned from 9 days at the Novotel Karon Beach and we had a lot to be happy about.   The hotel doesn't have a room to fit all 5 of us, but were able to give us 2 neighbouring rooms with HUGE beds which was perfect, although the beds are very hard!  We were located at the back of the hotel, which was quite a walk to the pools, breakfast restaurants and the lobby.  But the hotel is on a very busy road, so I suspect it was actually to our advantage as we didn't really notice any road noise in our rooms and lets be honest our daily step count needed a bit of help when we just sat around the pool all day. ;) The staff were wonderful (and everywhere), so if you needed anything there is always someone waiting to help you with a…

title: Great place to stay
review: We stayed here for 2 weeks and the hotel was great.   Pros: Clean; lovely settings; staff were very friendly and helpful; quite close to the beach; lots of on-site facilities; very comfortable beds! Cons: We tried the breakfast once and it was actually really poor. We had a couple of evening meals too which were decent, but I really would not recommend the breakfast.

title: Awesome kids club
review: Dear mr_chopstick,  We love reading how much you have enjoyed your stay at the Resort, should it be for the Friendliness and dedicated attention from our Heartists, the comfort of our room, the great facilities, the resort location 5mins walk to Karon Beach. Could we share that we propose breakfast in 2 venues during the Holiday Season, to ensure that everyone can enjoy a relaxing and rejuvenating breakfast. We will look forward to welcoming you back soon.   Warm regards, Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Ok
review: This hotel is very kids friendly. Love all the staff in kids club. They are all so awesome, very good with kids and making sure that kids are really having a great time. Kids Activities are back to back. Shout out to Aoom and all the crew at Kids Club. You made our vacation so memorable!

title: LoveThailand
review: Dear Jadang86,  We are so happy that you have enjoyed your stay, for the quality of our resort. The resort is ideal for Families, we have a ton of Fun activities for both adults and kids. Our Heartists are dedicated to creating experiences our Guests Love, and it is our pleasure that you could have experienced their genuine sense of Hospitality, and a great level of service. We will look forward to welcoming you back soon.   Warm regards, Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Stayterrific!
review: The hotel has 3 pools. They must have been experiencing filter issues as they had external pumps and filters in operation at 2 of the pools. On our last day I did notice one of the pools was green.  Kids club was OK, really just 4 PlayStation consols that the kids were just left to play on. Any additional activities cost extra. My kids did do the Thai boxing, which they enjoyed.  Kids activities.  There were different activities going on during the day. Including foam party and walk on water. My kids did this once, I was a little concerned as they complained about not being able to breath well in the inflated ball. Some kids were left in for far too long.  Family room.  When we arrived the family room had an additional portacot which we did not require. Also we had expected some…

title: 5 Nights Family Holiday
review: This was our 1st time to stay at Novotel in Phuket, we usually stay at other 5 star resorts nearby or in Patong but wanted to try this resort so let me give you our review.   We are a family of 2 adults and a 5 year old Daughter, we flew in from HK and landed at 12 am so by the time we got our rental car sorted out and driving to Karon we arrived at the resort around 2.30 am. We booked a standard twin bed room through booking.com.  1. I parked my car in front of the checking in area and staff came to help with the luggage while my wife checked in, it was 3 am so it was fast as we didn't expect it be busy at such a strange time. I am an Accor member but was never asked about it.  We were asked to pay the whole amount for the whole stay in during check in which is fine but no…

title: Disappointed End To Our Holiday
review: Dear Wangtshuk,  At Novotel Karon, we are dedicated to creating experiences our Guests Love, and reading your review, we have let you down. Please accept our sincere apologies. We are sorry for the inconvenience you could have encountered regarding the deposit that you haven’t been informed properly about this at check-in time, and the room request. Rest assured that we have addressed the comments you were referring to, so we can deliver great experiences for our Guests.  Could we share you that we provide amenities in the room, the slippers also provide in the wardrobe. Also, the bathroom condition and the cleaning time. We have briefed our team to avoid this situation in the future.   We do provide extensive international buffet selection, live cooking station, local dishes, fresh pastries, cheeses or other Chef’s specialties in the tropical atmosphere. During the Holiday Season, we also open a second venue, with the choice of an air-conditioned restaurant or al fresco on the terrace.  As for your comfort, you could put the keycard in the power slot, while you left the resort, in order to turn the electricity for the room on.   Last but not least, we do appreciate your nice words towards the dedicated attention of our Heartists, the great car parking.  We do hope that we will have the chance to welcoming you back in the future and invite you to contact me directly, as I would be delighted to personally ensure that you enjoy a blissful experience.  Warm regards, Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Fab location and beautiful resort
review: We stayed at the resort for 6 nights and I must admit we were very underwhelmed with this place. Our first night we complained that the sink in our room was not draining and the Plunge pool of our room one of the jets were broken and was causing a bubbling noise outside our bedroom. After 6 nights these had still not been fixed. We had a very hard uncomfortable bed to sleep on, something I don't often come across with the Accor group. The room was clean and tidy and was very spacious, pleased with this. The first morning we attended the breakfast and waited inline for around 30 minutes to get a table. Once inside and seated we found that the food had basically run out and with only one person cooking in the kitchen egg station nothing was getting out to the other areas.We…

title: Not really beach front hotel
review: Dear Z4441DVdavidw,  At Novotel Karon, we are dedicated to creating experiences our Guests Love, and reading your review, we have let you down. Please accept our sincere apologies. Rest assured that we have addressed the room and the pool conditions you were referring to, so we can deliver great experiences for our Guests.  As for your comfort and sleeping preferences, we do propose mattress toppers so you can get the best possible sleep.   We are sorry to read about your breakfast experience. title: In Balance Spa - Superb
review: We have visited same with family it is bang on karon beach. Also very easy access to patong beach and Bangla street hotel also has 2 pools.there breakfast options are limited and not much for indian food but that’s fine only there front desk person is rude we have asked for early check in but he did t provided early check in

title: So disappointing
review: As a hold me member of the AccorHotels loyalty program I have been committed to the brand for many years now. After completing a 14 day Asian cruise at Christmas we decided to spend the last 6 nights of our holidays in here. What a mistake that was. Accor prides itself on great accommodation and quality food, that is unless you stay here. First day heading to breakfast we were waiting online for over 30 mins to get a table, once there the food had all but gone. What was left was cold leftovers. Next day after complaining we were offer the sit down restaurant breakfast, we tried and left it sitting on the plate, uncooked omelette cold toast and not even a plate to spread the toast. Powdered orange juice instead of the fresh juice advertised. Later that day we think a swim in the…

title: Great hotel!
review: We stayed here for a week over New Year at the end of a two week trip to Thailand involving Bangkok and Chiang Mai, travelling as a family of 4 (children 12 and 8). It’s a lovely hotel in a good (excluding the very busy road) location in Karon away from main Karon but only a few minutes walk, close to the beach, lovely backdrop view of the hills. We just found that after staying in Bangkok at Chatrium (small Thai chain) and Chiang Mai at Makkachiva (boutique hotel) we lost that feeling of being in Thailand whilst in the hotel. It’s a western chain and it’s aimed at westerners, which in hindsight isn’t what we needed and after the previous two hotel experiences didn’t quite meet the mark. The room was great, good size, kept clean, just not sure why you need a glass partition…

title: Not as expected
review: Dear markl074,  Many thanks for choosing Novotel Karon for your Holiday destination, and delighted that you have enjoyed the comfort and cleanliness of your room, the 3 swimming pools, each other and offering a different atmosphere, the genuine sense of hospitality and the dedicated service proposed by our Heartists. As for your comfort regarding the shower room, we do propose a curtain upon request. On the other hand, we are sorry if the quality of our Services did not meet your expectations. Rest assured that we will review and address any loophole so we can improve further on delivering great experiences. We do hope that we will have the chance to welcoming you back soon so you could enjoy a true Novotel Experience.  Warm Regards, Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Not worth a four star rating for service
review: We loved this hotel. Got a suite with a plunge pool. Room was wonderful. Staff very friendly. My girls loved the pools. Breakfast was fantastic with a great variety of foods. Got a one hour Thai massage that was fabulous. Would definitely stay again!

title: Excellent Kid Friendly Hôtel
review: I spent hours reading comments before choosing this hotel and am so happy we did! I had visited Phuket 6 times before this trip but it was my first one with a 4.5 year old girl so our priority was to choose a hotel with a good kid’s club so that my husband and I could enjoy some couple time while our child was having fun and boy she did! She really enjoyed the wonderful kid’s club which provides great staff and crafty activities. They have a program with many different activities crafts to choose from and take home as a souvenir. Special thank you to Apple at the kid’s club and as a night babysitter. The location is unbeatable, in front of a beautiful and peaceful beach. The hotel staff is very friendly and helpful. As some already mentioned the director is very present, kind…

title: Nice hotel but not great value.
review: Dear cybersoul,  Many thanks for choosing Novotel Karon for your Holiday destination. If we are glad that you have enjoyed the Genuine Sense of Hospitality of our Heartists, it is our pleasure that you could have experienced their genuine sense of Hospitality, and a great level of service. Also, the kids club and daily activities for kids, the quality of our food with a wide a wide selection of hot dishes, cold cuts, live cooking sections, local and international dishes, freshly baked pastries, tropical fresh fruits or dairies, the resort location on Karon beach. We will look forward to welcoming you back soon so you could enjoy a great holiday at our Family Resort.  Warm Regards, Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Really nice hotel
review: We stayed in a superior room with a plunge pool. The room and plunge pool are lovely,  although there isn't a great deal of privacy in the pool.  The bathroom is tiny, no hairdryer, and it's impossible to have a shower without creating a flood of biblical proportions every time.  Overall the property is very nice,  but they haven't thought about little things. There is only one set of towels,  despite us having a room with a pool. The mini bar comes empty and you have to call to have it stocked. There are only two hooks to hang towels in the bathroom,  and they're inside the shower cubicle,  so nowhere to hang hand or floor towels,  wet clothes etc. There was no iron in the room,  we had to call for one to be delivered.  The shower has a frosted glass design with clear areas on…

title: Beautiful hotel
review: Dear Sam M,  We are delighted that you have enjoyed such a great stay with us and enjoyed the Friendliness and dedicated attention from our Heartists, the comfort of our rooms, the In Balance Fitness, the 3 swimming pools, each other and offering a different atmosphere. Also, the quality an variety of our buffet breakfast, and the different themed night buffet dinner. The resort is ideally located on the Karon Beach, considered by the locals as one of the most beautiful on the Island. Could we also share that we do source and provide for a great quality product, as well as conduct regular benchmark on the Island so we could enjoy the best quality & value at the Resort during your Holidays. In the meantime, we will look forward to welcoming you back soon. Feel welcome to contact me directly then as I would be delighted to personally assist you then.  Warm Regards, Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Excellent Stay!
review: We spent a week at this hotel in a de luxe room with a little private pool. Our own little  furniture group outside our room.  The room itself is spacious and nice. No problem to fit two children and two adults.   Pool area is nice and has different sections if you want to play with smaller kids and teenagers.   The hotel is close to the beach. There is a hotel guard that assists you when you need to cross the street to get to the beach.   The beach area close to the hotel is nice with a small beach restaurant where you can beer, fruit, snacks and Thai food.   The hotel could use some minor improvements here and there. Nothing major but there are a few tiles missing in the pool for example.   Staff is service minded and nice. The speed of the service could be better. But then…

title: Amazing family friendly hotel
review: We stayed over Christmas at Novotel Karon beach. Lovely family friendly hotel, lots for the children and 3 lovely big pools one with water slide. We stayed in a suite room which had two areas one for kids and other amazing king bed for adults. The area for kids had toys and cubby house and own tv and PlayStation. Brilliant room choice.  The breakfast at the restaurant was lovely, wide range of buffet options and clean and well presented. They even have little kids breakfast area with seats and kids food and movies playing on big screen. Lots of dinner options on site and fast tasty room service.  The beach is just over the road and Karon beach centre a short walk or tuk tuk ride.  The staff are all warm and friendly and genuinely trying to ensure a perfect holiday.  It was a…

title: Comfortable stay
review: Dear alisondews47,  We were glad that you have also enjoyed relaxing moments in the resort, chilling out by one of the 3 swimming pools, each other and offering a different atmosphere, the kid's activities, the quality of breakfast with a wide selection of hot dishes, cold cuts, live cooking sections, local and international dishes, freshly baked pastries, tropical fresh fruits or dairies, we also propose a second venue during the Holiday season so you could find your preference, also the themed night buffet dinner. But most importantly, it is our Pleasure that you could have enjoyed the dedicated attention of our Heartists. We will look forward to welcoming you back soon at Novotel Karon, Phuket Family Resort.  Warm Regards, Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Perfect Vacation!
review: We recently stayed for 11 nights. The rooms were comfortable , breakfast was ok a little more variety would have been appreciated especially fruit and cold cuts offered, the beds were a little too hard with average pillows. The poolbwasbgreatvandvfruenflybdtaff. Easy place to stay Close enough to town and the beach Shuttle to Patong was fabulous Thank you

title: a nice getaway
review: Dear Traveldev,  Thank you for sharing your experience online. We were glad that you have enjoyed the Friendliness and dedicated attention from our Heartists, the comfort of our Rooms, or the free shuttle proposed by the Hotel. Also our Buffet Breakfast offers a wide selection of hot dishes, cold cuts, live cooking sections, local and international dishes, freshly baked pastries, tropical fresh fruits or dairies, we also propose a second venue during the Holiday season so you could find your preference. As for your comfort and sleeping preferences, we do propose mattress toppers so you can get the best possible sleep. We will look forward to welcoming you back soon so you could enjoy a great holiday in our Family Resort, Warm regards,  Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Beautiful stay!
review: My husband and I stayed here for 1 week from December 7-14th. I had booked a standard king room for our stay, but upon arrival, we were informed that we were upgraded to a king suite.  When I initially looked at this hotel, I saw many reviews regarding the construction of the other property, I was worried that we were going to be put in one of those rooms and have to listen to that all day!   We were put in room 822, in the back of the property against the neighboring hotel. And there was NO CONSTRUCTION. We actually loved being back here because we were somewhat secluded and away from the noise at the pool/ bar. It was actually really nice. The walk to the pool and breakfast takes about 2 minutes. We booked the option to have breakfast every morning and were very pleased with…

title: Perfect Vacation hotel
review: The hotel is perfect in every mean. They have excellent interiors, locality, restaurant (although v limited veg options and that's why i couldn't rate it 5 stars), and over and above all a very good staff.  Breakfast was very nice with a good spread. The coconut jam is delicious and they also have a shop if you wanna buy it from them. Although i found it quite expensive, hence didn't buy. But if you really really want it, then it is the only place you can get it. I couldn't find coconut jam in the most popular tourist areas. There is only one shop which I found through google, but it closes as early as 5PM. The beach is just across the hotel. Karon beach is very serene and clean. It also has very soft sand and you will not see crowd here. You can just find yourself a place and…

title: Perfect Hotel
review: Dear Nomad_smb,  We were delighted to welcome you to the resort, and that you had such a great time! The resort is ideally located on the Karon Beach, considered by the locals as one of the most beautiful on the Island. Also, the quality of our food. Could we share you we offer a vegetarian and gluten-free menu to complement our regular menus. We use locally sourced and seasonal products to create our menu, including some vegetables and herbs from our own organic garden. Vegetarian Menu is available every day in all outlets at Novotel Phuket Karon. In the meantime, we will look forward to welcoming you back soon.   Warm regards, Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Lovely venue for a family
review: We booked this lovely resort for our 3 day stay in Phuket. the room was very spacious and clean. We even had a room with a little pool outside. Staff was always very friendly and helpful. Unfortunately  we could not use the spa as we didnt have enough time but it looked very nice. The restaurant was very good especially the spare ribs. First time in Thailand i had good ribs. Khun Ben the Manager was very helpful in giving us adivise where to go and what to do. The Novotel is located within five minutes ride from the famous Patong Beach. Thank you Novotel for that superb stay.

title: Good stay
review: Dear Swiss_diver_90,  It was a pleasure welcoming you at the Resort and delighted that you had such a great stay. Our In Balance SPA is recognized as a Signature on the Island, and we do hope that you will have the chance to experience the Quality of the Treatments during a next visit. Many thanks also for your compliment for our Team, dedicated to the pleasure and comfort of our Guests. We will look forward to welcoming you back soon and invite you to contact me directly then, as I would be delighted to personally assist you designing your next journey.  Warm regards, Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: A True Sample of Excellent Hospitality!
review: We stayed in a private plunge pool suite and the room was lovely. Children's beds were made up with sweet doonan covers and a giant teddy bear on the bed. They also had a gift for them on arrival! Kids club was lovely and Apple was a true delight. Emma who worked in the restaurant was absolutely wonderful and lovely- my children were sad to say goodbye to her. I'd also like to thank the Guards who sat outfront in the heat everyday to help the guests cross the road .. this service didn't go unnoticed.   A few issues we encountered: 1. Expenses couldn't be charged to our room because we had a Debit Card (we've traveled to many places and never encountered this) - this was inconvenient and resulted in us eating out more than we otherwise would have.  2. On 2 instances, I had to…

title: Particularly enjoyed the fire and ice dining
review: Although I was travelling alone, Novotel karon made me feel at home. Everything from the welcome to the pool and gym options were excellent. Loved working out at the inbalance gym. I also enjoyed the fire and ice dining at the restaurant, which was amazing!

title: Good family hotel
review: Dear Abhi S,  We love reading how much you have enjoyed your stay and that you had such a great time, should it be for the warm welcoming upon your arrival, the pool, the InBalance Fitness open daily 24hr, the delicious or quality of Fire&Ice menu. We will look forward to welcoming you back to your holiday home again soon.    Warmest regards, Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Phuket
review: Pros : - family environment  - amazing/available staff - not far from the Karon village (around 10min walk - places to eat, shop, and massage, laundry services). There is a market every weekends.  Cons : - overpriced drinks/food at Novotel - no A/C in the breakfast room - need to cross a busy/dangerous road to get to the beach. Fortunately there is someone that will help you cross but still  Overall good/calm place to stay!

title: A family resort!
review: Dear Fatima,  Many thanks for choosing Novotel Karon for your Holiday destination. We are delighted that you have enjoyed the genuine sense of hospitality of our Heartists. Our resort is an ideal for Phuket Family Resort located just across Karon beach where you will find a large panel of restaurants and bars, local markets. As you rightfully mention to the prices of food and beverage at the resort, may we share with you that we conduct regular benchmark on the Island to make sure we propose a value for money offers to our guests. We will look forward to welcoming you back soon. Feel welcome to contact me directly then as I would be delighted to personally assist you then.  Warmest regards, Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Beautiful resort with three swimming pools
review: Thank you to Novotel team , espacially Nam ! We really enjoy to stay in the hotel ! We have a beauiful vew on sea . We woul tove to come back to Phuket and for sure to Novotel . Konstantin and Victoria

title: Resort for families
review: We were here for four days with two kids in a family fun room. They loved the beds and ps4 in  the room. Kids club was clean and spacious with different areas for ps games, painting, tv, indoor play ground. There is a kids pool outside the kids club. There is a water slide and afternoon foam party. If there could be shade over half of the pool, it would have been more popular with kids and parents.   Breakfast was busy with reasonable selection as the hotel was nearly full. Lunch and dinner at restaurants were very quiet, this was similar to a few hotel restaurants we visited in Patong. Food was good here, recommend Massaman curry with roti bread. There are a few restaurants at a nearby lake, but we found the food was better at the hotel.   GM dropped in to say hello when we…

title: Great location
review: Dear Echohz,  We are so happy that you had such a great family time at the Resort, and enjoyed the quality of the comfort of our bed and PS4 in room, the quality or cleanliness of the kids club, the kids pool with fantastic water slide and our foam party every Wednesday and Sunday, the quality of food with a large selection of international and local dishes, but most importantly for the friendliness and dedicated attention from our Heartists. We will look forward to welcoming you back soon so you could enjoy a great holiday at our Family Resort.  Warmest regards, Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: staff where amazing
review: My husband and I stayed here with our 6month old, we got a family room just for the bit of extra space with bub. The room was quite standard and smelt a little of stale water.  The second night Karon was hit with a large storm and lots of rain, here our room being on the very end didn't stand to well. We contacted the manager to shift rooms and we were actually going to swap hotels (due to my brother was staying down the road) but the manager was beyond helpful and gave us a fresh room and came and seen us directly, which was very nice and we just stayed the remaining nights. The staff were super friendly and so great with my son, he loved seeing them at breakfast.

title: Great stay at a beautiful resort!
review: Dear Case_Porta,  Many thanks for choosing Novotel Karon for your family holiday. We are delighted that you have enjoyed the Genuine Sense of Hospitality of our Heartists. We also appreciate that our proposal to change the new room can make you feel more comfortable. We will look forward to welcoming you back soon. Feel welcome to contacting me directly then as I would be glad to personally assist you in designing your next journey.  Warmest regards, Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Wonderful family resort
review: Clean room ,staff where amazing, if you have children the staff entertain them all day, plenty of food choices at reasonable prices , close to the beach, thats if you want to leave the pool with a swim up bar and happy hour

title: Great service!
review: We stayed here for a week. The children’s grandfather unfortunately got pneumonia and the hotel staff went above and beyond to help us. They were kind and caring, always smiling. The pools were meticulously kept and our kids (11 and 12) love the daily entertainment. Rooms were clean and fresh. Breakfast was delicious and the drinks at the bars well priced. Will definitely be returning! Thank you so much to all the staff.

title: Great place to stay with kids
review: Dear Footprints763918,  Many thanks for choosing Novotel Karon for your Holiday destination. We are delighted to know that you enjoyed the Genuine Sense of Hospitality of our Heartists, the 3 swimming pools, each other and offering a different atmosphere, the daily activities for kids, the cleanliness of our rooms, the quality of our breakfast, the drinks with value for money.  We would be more than happy to welcome you back to our family resort again soon.    Warmest regards, Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Very damp and dirty with no internet.
review: Novotel Karon was a great place for kids ! They have a nice play room, a swimming pool just for kids,  loads of activities and just, in general, a kid friendly place. Pros : A variety of swimming pools to suit every taste, reasonable proximity to Karon beach which is peaceful, nice rooms reasonably clean, just far (or close) enough to Patong which is crowded and more touristy, close to the town center near Karon which means lots of food options and massage places. Cons : Average breakfast spread and we were quite bored by the end of the week. I guess you get what you pay for, in that aspect. In-room dining was adequate but not exceptional. The hotel is not exactly beachfront which means it's a short walk to the public beach. For very young kids, the play area can get a bit…

title: Children friendly hotel
review: Dear Ruth G,  Many thanks for choosing Novotel Karon for your Holiday destination, and delighted that you have enjoyed the room cleanliness, the 3 swimming pools away from each other and offering a different atmosphere, the resort location 5mins walk to Karon beach - a beautiful beach with a relaxing and tranquil atmosphere. On the other hand, On the other hand, we are sorry if the quality of our Services did not meet your expectations. Rest assured that we will review and address any loophole so we can improve further on delivering great experiences. We do hope that we will have the chance to welcoming you back soon so you could enjoy a true Novotel Experience.  Warmest regards, Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Excellent resort, away from the crowds and perfect for a family trip with kids
review: This hotel has a lot of potential but is in serious need of some attention to detail. Overall I would have to say if I had not prepaid this hotel in full in advance we would have only stayed for 1 night and not 7. The 3 deal breakers for me are: Dampness, Cleanliness and Lack of Internet.   Dampness:   Upon arrival we were given a ground floor family room. (4112). The room I suspect is for overflow use only as no one would agree to spend a week there. It smelled of mold, there was no aircon on prior to arrival and was so damp it felt like a cold sauna. We immediately asked to be moved but all they had was a non family room and kids would have had to sleep on sofa. (Girls 9 and 11). We agreed to at least visit that room but the condition was not much better. So for night one we…

title: Excellent hospitality, luxurious resort & good location
review: I booked a stay at Novotel Karon as a treat and surprise for my husband's birthday weekend. I emailed the hotel beforehand to let them know my intentions and they handled everything smoothly, professionally and with discretion, so my husband never knew, for example, that the room we were staying in had been upgraded and that the front desk even asked me what's his favourite cake flavour so they can deliver a midnight treat (with 2 glasses of champagne) he'll be sure to enjoy. Special shout-out to Paula at the front desk; she was amazing and handled everything with grace and patience.  We spend 4 unforgettable days in the superior plunge pool suite. The hotel checked us in early and allowed us a late check-out. The room was next to the generator which kicks start at night so it's…

title: Absolute luxury
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for choosing stay at Novotel Phuket Karon and for sharing your review. We are gladness to know how much you enjoyed during stay with us for the wonderful moment to surprised celebrate your husband birthday, we delighted that you can meet your expectation from our sincere services, especially for the front desk. We will address your encouraging feedback to the team. About a spacious Plunge Pool Suite, just step away from your door, soak and chill out in your plunge pool or enjoy quality time with your friends and family in your private outdoor dining area even that is open area but you will not hear the noise from outside when you in the room, guests always love this room type. By the way, we also have 3 swimming pools in public area away from each other and offering a different atmosphere (Lagoon Pool at the Heart of the Resort, Oasis Pool is a perfect place for couples, and the Kids Pools with its Waterslide to entertain the little ones). Indeed, we are located in Karon Beach, our location is ideal for relaxing time with an easy access to entertainment, shops, and restaurants nearby, beach just across the road and easy access Patong by public transportation, furthermore, we provide the complimentary transfer from hotel to Patong as well. We will look forward to welcoming you back in the future.  Warmest regards, Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Unprepared rooms
review: We stayed for 4 nights and loved it ! We had 3 plunge pool rooms and used most of the resort facilities. The omelettes at the buffet brekkie are a great way to start the day but more fruit selection would have been nicer as there are many beautiful fruits in Thailand. Our rooms were very modern and comfortable, the beds firm but the pillows seemed old and lumpy. Plus side plenty of English speaking cable tv channels, perfect for when you need to escape the heat to air-con. We tried all restaurant outlets including room service and found most things pretty yummy. We would definitely stay here again

title: Good family option across from the beach and on the fringes of busy Karon main strip
review: Dear Lukerowen,  Thank you for choosing stay at Novotel Phuket Karon and for sharing on this website. We delighted to know that you can meet your expectation with great memorable experience on your recent stay. Regarding a large selection of tropical fruits and a variety of dishes especially the omelets. Our Culinary team will be very happy to see their effort could delight your morning. Moreover about the room which filled with useful amenities, comfy bed, good air conditioning. We also look forward to welcoming you back on your next trip.  Warmest regards, Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Super Family Friendly Hotel
review: Having arrived early evening, well after check-in time I expected my room to be ready. A friendly receptionist and a welcome drink started the check in experiences off quite nicely.   But then I had to wait for them to go and check if the room is ready which should have been ready hours ago. Eventually I could go to my room.  Having simply dropped my bag and then going out to eat, I never checked the room at all.  Getting ready to shower upon my return, all I found was a small bar of soap, a sanitary towel and 2 bath towels. Wondering whether this was the “new“ Novotel standard,I called reception and had to ask for hand towels, shower gel, shampoo, face cloth. They didn’t have any face cloths, I was told to wait till tomorrow when they would be getting some face cloths   Not a…

title: Excellent service
review: It’s was amazing Hotel with friendly staff, very cozy and nice room for us, My family was very happy to stay at Hotel with the kid club program, Phuket are wonderful city with a great beach, thank you to all reception, I will comeback again

title: Really good
review: Dear  Valued Guest,                  Thank you for taking time for sharing your amazing experience enjoyed the happy stay with our friendly staff, our room also with the kid club programme offers loads of games and entertainment to spend a fun-filled day in the safest environment! The little ones will enjoy jumping in the ball pool while preteens can comfortably play PS4 or watch a DVD and also have areas for parents to chill-out. We will look forward to welcoming you again in the near future.  Warmest regards, Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: An Oasis in bustling Phuket
review: After spending a month in Phuket, this hotel was our final destination. We really enjoyed everything about it. It's close to the Karon beach which is so far the best that we have seen in Phuket (with white sand). The breakfasts was delicious. We also tried fire and ice dinner which was out of this world! The pools were nice, even to play with our baby girl (8 months).

title: Standard Hotel for Families
review: Dear Karolina,  Thank you so much for taking your time to share your great review during your stay with us. We delighted to know that you enjoyed our delicious breakfast with several mixed Asian and International cuisine as well as our signature Fire & Ice menu that we have been working hard to create an outstanding dining experience to the guests. We are also pleased to read that our pool could impress you and that you have enjoyed the atmosphere around the resort. Indeed, our location is ideal for a relaxing time with an easy access to entertainment, shops, and restaurants nearby. We look forward to welcoming you back again the future.  Warmest regards, Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Accor style at his best
review: We have stayed at Novotel Karon and in Phuket particular for the first time.  The resort provides everything from entertainment, sport, culinary and quite area to just relax. Not to far from Karon and in a convenient distance to Patong, who need to go there.  The staff is super friendly and attentive with a big smile all day. We felt very welcome and good taken care off.  Would love to go again there!

title: Dreadful Experience
review: Want a hotel which charges your credit card without authorisation? Want a hotel which is falling apart? How about sleepless nights in a room facing the local taxi rank which plays music day and night? If so then the Novotel is for you!  Having visited the beautiful place that is Phuket previously, we returned again this time opting for the Novotel in Karon Beach. The hotel is looking its age the room we had was both in need of a new mattress and a balcony which was falling apart (see pictures)  The gym smelt of really bad dampness to the point it was unpleasant to be in there for more than 10 minutes.   Finally, on checkout the hotel couldn’t produce signed charges made to the room. They initially took the charges off however within 48 hours had charged my credit card for the…

title: Nothing wrong but nothing great either
review: Dear  Pete J,                  Thank you for taking time for sharing your review thoughts online. We are truly sorry to know that you did not meet your expectations during stay with us. Please rest assured that we carefully read all your comments regarding the room which falling apart balcony, the unpleasantly smell from the gym and also with the sleepless nights due to the music from the local taxi, we will share your comment to our account to do the necessary actions needed to maintain our high standard and protect the privacy of our guests.  As rightfully your mention about the credit card charge without authorization,  I would be grateful if you could contact me directly via jp.lovotti@accor.com for the details, I will seriously handle this matter. Please rest assured that I will personally share your comment to our account for improvements and please accept the sincere apologies for any inconvenience and disappointment, you experienced. Hope you will give us a second chance to welcome you back again in the future.                  Warmest regards, Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Great facility
review: The hotel is easy to find and check in was fast and uncomplicated.   The hotel complex is bigger then it looks from the lobby or entrance. The rooms are easy accessible and have elevators. The room itself was clean and the AC, mini fridge worked. The amenities and free water are good.   There are some knicks and Knacks where it is visible that the hotel is not brand new: the balcony had some scuffs and scratches and the bathroom flooded a bit when taking a shower - but nothing really bad.   The pools are good and well maintained but also there are some sharp corners and a few sights that look worth renovating. The slide was closed during my stay. There was aerobics and fun classes going on everyday.   Breakfast was pretty standard. I visited the Tai restaurant once and the food…

title: Paradise in Karon Beach.
review: Dear marcbglobetrotter,  Many thanks for choosing Novotel Karon for your Holiday destination, and delighted that you have enjoyed the comfort of our resort, the fast check-in process, the cleanliness of the room with great facilities and amenities in room, the quality of our swimming pools with fantastic water slide, the buffet breakfast, the daily activities for both kids and parents. But most importantly, it is our Pleasure that you could have enjoyed the dedicated attention from our Heartists. The resort is located just across Karon Beach, as for the Beaches, they are under the authority of the local government. Also the Karon Beach is considered by the locals as one of the most beautiful on the Island, the Hotel does not have authority for any action in this area. We do hope that we will have the chance to welcoming you back in the future and would invite you to contacting me directly then, as I would be delighted to personally ensure that you enjoy a blissful experience.  Warm regards, Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: A great family resort
review: This is a great place if you have the family, huge pool for kids and adults plus a great smaller pool with a slide for the kids. Breakfast was excellent and the meals poolside are also very good. I don’t think you can really swim at the beach as it looked a bit rough when we walked past a couple of times. It’s a good 10 minute walk to the main part of Karon which has quite a few restaurants, get some fried ice cream from the place right near the big roundabout about two shops in, this is fantastic. It’s a tuk tuk ride into Patong if you want to have a look around there although it’s pretty busy if you have younger kids.

title: Excellent hotel very good location
review: Our stay at Novotel didn't start to well, after arriving we were shown to our room and i opened the blinds to be greeted by a bush and electric wires, NO NO NO, we did not go all the way to thailand to look at electric wires so after talking to the duty manager we were able to change rooms, still not so good as the aircon was broken noisey and when you turned it off the floor in room got wet with the humidity, unfortunately had to take a trip to reception again but i can honestly say from that moment everything was just perfect, the managers were so polite and professional they apologised and upgraded me to a family suit at no extra cost which was fantastic. after a day i was sat by the pool and the general manager came to find to make sure everything was ok now,which it was and…

review: Dear nickt3238, Thank you for sharing your thoughts online. It is a pleasure reading how much you have enjoyed the unique atmosphere of our family-friendly resort, the lcomfort of rooms as well as the warm welcome from our Heartists. title: Nice hotel
review: wwe stayed here for 5 days and this was second time we have been to phuket. The karon beach was lovely. Not many people on the beach, The only thing i didnt like was the beach was not located at the hotel but opposite the hotel. Where we had to walked across the road and over a really smelly bridge that looked really unsafe.  Breakfast was very good in this hotel. My kids loved it. The kids club was good and my children spent every day there. This hotel had a lovely massage and spa which was lovely.  There were 3 pools in this hotel and my kids loved it.  We had interconnecting rooms for me and my children which was brilliant for us.  The staff were lovely at this hotel, especially the kids club staff and the security men who were at the outside the  main front day and night. …

title: Love the service!
review: The most good thing in the hotel is the staff were friendly and nice, the location is not so good you need to walk 15 min. To the center of Karon and it’s on the high way, the room is clean but the bed is not comfortable.

title: Positives and Negatives
review: Positives  Breakfast  Huge breakfast area with plenty to offer. Couldn’t compliment more. All your favourites plus more. Compliments to the restaurants, both casual dining and formal resultant.   Shuttlebus Free bus to Patong and back each day.  Gym  Weights, machines, bikes and treadmills. Plenty to keep you going.  Negatives Pool - great sized pool however no resort atmosphere. Too much concrete and super small pool bar. There are 3 pools in all however smaller pools looked like they were for children. Rooms - beds were way to big, like top doubles together. Had to go searching for my partner each night.  Distance  About a 5 - 10 minute walk to Karon round a bout and restaurants. Cut across road to take the short cut.  Foyer A little small and generally busy. Close to road and…

title: Wonderful, Family Hotel
review: My wife, 4 month old daughter and I stayed at Novotel for a night as a stop in before moving to another resort to attend a wedding. If we had not already booked the other resort we could have happily stayed on as the Novotel is probably far better than some other acclaimed resorts in the area. The resort is still fairly new and very neat/ tidy. It is spacious and has a number of pools.  The rooms are nice and located well within the complex, access to floors by stairs or elevators is catered for as well. The only thing I would say the room we got was not spacious enough for us when a baby crib was put in as it already had a bunk bed. One of the pool view rooms would have been far more convenient but this was not communicated to us when booking. As it was only for a night we made…

title: A hidden paradise that MUST be experienced!!
review: We found the Novotel on several top 10 lists for family resorts and it didn't disappoint. The resort was beautiful, perfectly located across the street from the beach (with a 24 hour crossing guard just for the hotel), and walking distance to Botha. playground and into Karon town. We rented a one bedroom, plunge pool suite which was amazing (and an incredible deal for the price). Even nicer were the little touches. Our son's bed was made with Hotel Transylvania sheets and pillows, as well as a Hotel Transylvania kids robe. Another night we were surprised with a mixed drinks setup fro the adults waiting when we returned from a day sightseeing. The pools were very nice. Our son LOVED the water slide in the kids pool and we could barely pry him away from the kids club (which gave…

title: Well managed family oriented hotel.
review: My room was comfortable and spacious (Superior Room) in a quiet part of the resort, and surrounded by beautifully laid out grounds. Food was good, and a nice variety of Thai and European choices.   The staff were without exception lovely and efficient during my stay and there was a great atmosphere throughout the hotel and a lot of laughter. I had a brilliant cookery lesson with the gorgeous chef from Tai restaurant and brought home the recipes to try out on the family.   I took part in daily aqua classes that put a smile on my face every day, there were also free yoga lessons three times a week. I chose the hotel, as I was traveling alone, and I wanted somewhere friendly and secure.  It is both. The place was spotless, and obviously, a lot of attention is paid to detail. I wish…

title: Good Family Resort

It is a pleasure reading how much you and your family have enjoyed your stay at the resort thanks to the facilities, the swimming pool, the comfort of room and the warm services from our Heartists. As you rightfully mention, Karon beach is a beautiful beach with a relaxing and tranquil atmosphere and located just across the resort, and our security guard I available 24/7 to help you cross the road safely.   We offer complimentary daily shuttle transfer to Patong, located few minutes’ drive from the resort. Indeed, the recreation team organize daily complimentary activities such as yoga to keep our guests entertained. I am also glad to read that you enjoy InBalance Spa experience, and our new convenience store “NShop”.  However, be sure that I am taking your comment into account regarding the TV signal. We would be more than happy to welcome you back to your holiday home again in the near future. title: family holiday
review: Ideal for family holiday. We took the family room and hotel just made it like we requested. The pools were great with one dedicated pool for the kids. Beach was across the road but very rough at this time of the year. All in all a very good family holiday. Breakfast was poor with very little choice and almost the same everyday. Halal food not served plus sometimes Ham omelets/scrambled eggs get mixed up with normal ones as they are made on the same pans.

title: Nice Resort - Value for money
review: the 1st room we were given on arrival was very poor, a double bed , a set of bunks & a single bed  , talk about cramped! we asked to be moved to another room , which was more spacious & looked a higher standard , but there was a constant smell coming from the bathroom.We had to keep air con on , constantly to combat this! the staff are very helpful & friendly , but on 3 occassions we had to ring house keeping to request clean towels , cleaning of room etc , as no one had been , and this was at approx 5 , in the evening....we found eating & drinking to be expensive enough , in the pool bars.  Overall we couldn't really fault the hotel , except for the constant asking for our credit card , which we had left behind us at home(we had fully paid , prior to going) , we couldn't…

title: Judy is the best!!
review: We had a wonderful stay at Novotel. Loved the room... the bar at the pool and the breakfast. Free transfers to Patong. Especially Judy made our stay memorable... she is an amazing guest relations person!! Will be back!l

title: Relaxing and pampering on a high level
review: I loved this hotel. It was big, very nice rooms and bathroom, comfy beds. Breakfast was amazing!!! Really enjoyed it. Restaurant at the pool was good, we lunch there a few thime. Drinks at the pool bar are pricy compare to the drinks in other hotels. Service was great! Make shure you take a cab to Patong beach.

title: Amazing first time at Novotel
review: We stayed for the first time at a Novotel Resort and we do not regret that decision. Everything was perfect, from the checking, over the food and activities. We were pampered everyday. What was impressive is, that the management is always around in case you have a problem. We had a quick chat with Ben, the manager, which was very nice. Big thank you to Mr. Peach and Mrs. Cherie who assist us every day. We will definitely return.  PS: try the cocktails at the pool bar, marvelous.

review: we are going back to this hotel again in the next few days. we have a young boy 3.5 years old and we loved our previous stay. hotel has a decent size, not too big, just nice. good diverse breakfast options. service is great - upon check in we changed our room as there were minor issues. beach is just across the street. lovely. looking forward to be back!

title: Great for families
review: At first glance we were very impressed with the hotel. The grounds were beautiful and very well kept and the rooms looked great!  However as days went by things started adding up: we noticed the wear and tear of the buildings, pool and furniture and that influenced our overall experience.  We were also not pleased with the bad smell constantly coming from the drains in our bathroom. Even had the hotel maintenance guy have a look at it. Didn't help. The humidity was very high and our towels were not able to dry up during the night. So one bathing towel per person was really insufficient. And the rooms soundproofing of the windows was REALLY poor.  We were also disappointed not to find an ATM at the hotel. We were directed to a roadside ATM (10 min. walk along a very trafficked…

title: Family fun
review: We stayed in this lovely hotel for over a week. We requested 2 rooms next to each other. One for us and another for the kids. The location is great, close to the beach and Karon town itself. The staff were polite and helpful. Breakfast set up was pretty good as well only ruined by other customers who sends their really young children to get food by themselves unassisted.  The room service was excellent. Loved the food and had the best fried rice in Thailand I reckon. This was a quick mid year holiday for my family. We had a great time, was all worth it. I highly recommend this hotel to family. It’s got everything, kids club, amazing pools, relaxing spa and great food.Some days you really don’t need to leave the place at all. Will be back.

title: Bad customer service
review: We have loved our stay here. The staff are amazing, so helpful and friendly and great with the kids.  Our kids love the pools and the kids club is brilliant, they’re constantly asking to go.  We have adjoining rooms which is perfect for us we have lots of space and two bathrooms.  Food and drinks are good and service around the pool is excellent.  There are games in the pool every day which are really popular with all the kids and the staff are great with the kids.  We’ll definitely be back!

title: Amazing Breakfast!!!
review: My boyfriend and I visited the hotel at the end of July. We enjoyed the sights, our trips, the weather, however our stay was made worse by the incompetent staff on the reception. We were asked to provide the credit card we used when booking the hotel upon our arrival. We didn’t have the card with us (never thought it would be required as we paid for the hotel in full at the time of booking). We were asked repeatedly for the card or a bank statement, my boyfriend had to make several phone calls (which cost us a lot of money) with no success. The management team should make it clear on the website that the card would be required upon arrival. We were never actually explained as to why it was required.   I would also like to add that the breakfast was very disappointing, it’s…

title: Incompetent reception staff
review: The hotel itself was nice with good facilities and friendly smiley staff. However I feel my holiday was ruined by the reception staff constantly hounding me wanting to see a bank statement with no explanation as to why. We paid the balance in full prior to arrival and did not have the card that was used with us. This just did not compute with the reception staff as they asked every single day and were given the same answer every single day. They even left notes in the room to come to reception. When I did go to the reception I was told there was no manager available and should wait in my room for them to call me.  It was never explained to me why they needed a bank statement from me as they had their own statement to show the money had been received by them.  I wouldn’t stay…

title: Pleasant stay, dedicated staff
review: Dear Roger, First and foremost, we would like to thank you for your recent stay at Novotel Karon, and certainly glad that you have enjoyed the Hotel and its facilities, as well as the genuine sense of hospitality of our Heartists. Nonetheless, we were really sorry that your stay would have been marred by some financial safety requirements. They have been set to protect consumers against potential fraud, and are compulsory, following the local and international financial institutions, also fully independent from the Hotels’ will. Rest assured that our Team always do its utmost to facilitate the resolution of those matter with the different parties involved, and believe that our Guests Experiences Manager would have well supported then. We do hope that this situation would not deter you from staying with us again in the future and invite you to contact us directly then. Warm regards, Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Trouble free, clean and comfortable
review: We stayed at the Novotel for a long weekend with our infant and thoroughly enjoyed our stay even though there was windy and somewhat rainy weather. While the hotel (as all Karon hotels) is on the land-side of the beach road the green landscaping is well done and it is quiet. The three pools are great and probably the most extensive we've seen in a Novotel. A security guard will assist in slowing traffic to cross the road and from there it's just a couple mins to the beach. Also the room is well appointed. The sheets are high-end, comfy, and the air conditioning is quiet. When we checked in, we appreciated the fact that the baby cot (a Graco Pack-n-Play with bedding) was already set up.  A special mention to the restaurant staff at the Horizon Cafe. We enjoyed the buffet…

title: Our Dream Holidays in Phuket
review: We stayed here for 10 nights in the plunge pool suite and it was just easy and enjoyable, there was nothing that went wrong. Everything was as expected, and the service was fantastic.   The pools The main pool is very nice although they do need to re-grout the tiles on the bottom as your toes slip into the gaps and that’s a bit annoying.  There is also a kid’s pool with slide and a quite pool.   The Restaurants  There are three on site, all of them are pretty good and offer reasonably priced food compared to the local town. We have an Accor club membership so 50% off food when two people are dining, and we pre-purchased the “my kids” package which gave our daughter all inclusive food and drinks from the kid’s menu. There is also Horizons where breakfast is served, food here is…

title: Lovely Phuket, But Tired Rooms
review: Stay was in June 2018 with my family. Booked family room for a 1 week stay.  Room was not furnished, old furniture, floorings, but clean room.  Breakfast was OK, but most food items were same. Breakfast was held in the hall, which does not come with any air conditioning, feel hot most of the time.  Swimming pool was nice, and children play room was good for the kids. They enjoy the play station games and drawing with the staffs in the play room.   Hotel staffs are friendly, but paying prices for a rather "tired" room seems to be on a high side.

title: Enjoyable but room for improvement
