title: Great Stay
review: close access to beach-across the road. Lollipop man to help you cross busy street.   Disappointing that the hotel has not invested in making the pathway to beach more safe and aesthetically appealing for hotel guests.   Rickety bricks substitute as steps onto the first bridge, and the second bridge crossing over the river has no railings. Not safe with hyperactive kids or accessible to families needing stroller or wheelchair accessibility.   Would also be nice to have hotel set up a few beach chairs and umbrellas for guests on the beach.   Most reception staff we encountered were glum and disinterested, avoiding eye contact and impatient. You'd be better off researching all you need to know online, as even the helpful staff are not very clued up with local attractions .  …

title: A place that should be better
review: Great room made better with bunk beds for the kids, 3 pools and lots of kids entertainment. Breakfast was fantastic with amazing omelettes made to order fresh bread and a wide variety of foods catering for everyone. Great location in Karon with the beach just across the road and a short walk to the local shops.

title: Having a lovely holiday , Thankyou Novotel Phuket Karon Beach !
review: My fourth night stay tonight and really enjoying this resort . Whilst it is very family friendly  I am not feeling uncomfortable as a solo traveller . Thankyou to Paula for the upgrade to the pool suite which I have very much enjoyed . The room consists of a "separate bed room , lounge with sofa and trundle bed underneath and a large bathroom with two sinks , bath and walk in shower . Also both rooms have a tv  and there is a separate closet area for suit cases and a big mirror . There is an umbrella to use if it's raining . The free shuttle in and out Patong is great also as taxis are very expensive . I wanted to try out the smart bus yesterday as I didn't want to wait for the free shuttle to come as there are only 3 services in and three out scheduled times and if you feel…

title: First time at Karon Beach, Phuket
review: Stayed here in June 2018 with family of 4 for 2 weeks in a plunge pool suite. We had an excellent stay, staff were all fantastic. Food quality was very good although the breakfasts could have had a little more choice. Food selection across the resort for lunches, snacks,dinner, drinks cocktails etc. was excellent and good value for money Plunge pool suite was excellent and room was cleaned very well every day. The only criticisms are the following - breakfast area can get a little crowded in peak times so get in early and main pool area needs to be re-grouted so be careful of some sharp edges. Would I stay again? - yes definitely. Thanks for a great stay Team Novotel Karon Beach

title: Really nice hotel

title: Great family option
review: We really enjoyed our stay at Novotel. We stayed in a Family room towards the back of the hotel which was great to be away from the busyness of the main road - which we found was the only negative of the location of this hotel (the main road runs between the beach and the hotel so the hotel is not located on the beach). The hotel grounds are very well kept (the swimming pools are great, just the pool floors need some attention). The general service was excellent and the staff very pleasant. We loved the special flowers placed on the beds at turndown in the evenings and the thought put in for the kids to make them also feel special. We had breakfast included and there was a reasonable variety to choose from however the dining area can get a little hot (no aircon) so we recommend…

title: A home in Phuket
review: A perfect location for us , quiet but not far from shopping/party. 10 mins walk to Karon shopping area, 15 mins car ride to Patong ( Hotel do provide free shuttle ). Special thanks the the kids club's staff for giving the kids a great time and the FO staff for attending to our needs. The only improvement require is to change is more on the breakfast selection, having almost the same selection for 7 days is a bit boring. Other than that, it's perfect stay for us in Phuket. Looking forward to be back again.

title: Hotel OK

First of all, I have to thank you for sharing your valuable feedback on the experience you have been having at our resort. Thanks for the praise you give to the recreation team, I will not miss sharing your encouraging feedback with them. It is a pleasure reading how much you have enjoyed our perfect resort location. Indeed, our location is ideal for relaxing time with an easy access to entertainment, shops and restaurants nearby. On the other hand, we also appreciate your recommendation regarding breakfast selection that we’ll take into account for further improvement. We really appreciate your feedback and do hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back to our resort again in the near future. Warmest regards, Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: You will not be disappointed
review: This is Ok if you want to be Australians,  well there is heaps of us over there.  The Hotel is very moderate but there is worse around!!   Staff Ok.  Shop attached is expensive and limited variety. Spa is very very expensive. half price just 200 metres down the track. Hotel is clean and staff are pleasant.

title: Great Family Friendly Resort
review: Dear Julianne, Greeting from Novotel Phuket Karon. First of all, I have to thank you for sharing your thoughts on the experience you have been having at our resort. It is a pleasure reading how much you have enjoyed the unique atmosphere of our family resort as well as a warm service from our Heartists.  May I share with you that our spa offers the service of professional spa therapists, which is arguable in the local spa shops around the resort.  We really appreciate your feedback and do hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back to our resort again in the near future for true Novotel experience. Warmest regards, Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Beach Hotel || Pools || Comfortable
review: We could not fault this hotel, beautiful rooms, friendly helpful staff and great food. We upgraded to a family pool room and would highly recommend, we had more than enough space for four and the pool was great for a cool off in the humidity. The kids club was great and all the staff so friendly and helpful, could not fault this place.

title: Great family destination
review: We had the pleasure of staying at this property for 5 nights.  Could not fault anything during our stay. The kids club catered well for our 7yr old &  11yr old. Tai restaurant was lovely if you wanted to spend a night in. We had a plunge pool suite which was spacious & handy if you wanted a quick cool off. Ofcourse the pools were also a big hit...the 3pm water bubble ball also put a smile on the kids faces. Overall, we had the most amazing time at Novotel. Highly recommended to all.

title: Fantastic Stay!!!!
review: Dear valued customer, Thank you for your wonderful feedback. It is a pleasure reading how much you have enjoyed the living space and comfort of rooms, as well as the modern facilities, or the warm services from our team. Our Heartist have a passion to delight our guests and I’m glad to read that we have successfully contributed to create memorable holidays. We will look forward to welcoming you back in the future for many more great moments here at Novotel Phuket Karon, feel welcome to contact me directly at jp.lovotti@accor.com  Warmest regards, Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: 10 STARS FOR SERVICE! Will go back again!
review: We stayed for 5 days and our arrival and departure experience was absolutely top notch... Breakfast spread was excellent and if you feel lazy heading out for a meal, the restaurants at the hotel is also quite decent.  Hotel has complimentary transport to Patong if you want to do shopping, and while it is just a 10 minute walk to Karon town if you want to go for a meal or massage around the hotel. Compliments to all the staff especially those at the Kids World and Champions Bar for their exceptional hospitality. Even my son feel at home here!! Look forward to come back to Novotel next time!!!

title: Great stay , great hotel

We are glad to read that you could have experienced the unique atmosphere of our tropical resort and the delicious cuisine from our Culinary team. As you rightfully mention, the Resort is located in the Karon District, where you will find a large panel of restaurants and bars, local markets, traditional temples, authentic Thai Boutiques… and just aside from one of the most beautiful beaches on the Island and it is our pleasure to read your appreciation. title: stayed here for 8 days in june
review: My wife and I stayed for 8 nights in early June in the delux room. It was an amazing room and great hotel. The food was amazing and hotel grounds- many hours spent by the pool relaxing and it's all only a 2min scooter ride to markets and shops ect.  One of the main points I want to make today is my wife fell very ill whilst we were in Thailand and the staff at the Novotel were very helpful in every way possible to ensure we got better. They drove us to the doctors, got us things we needed , helped translate for us etc. The staff at the hotel went above and beyond and I will be forever grateful for that.  I especially want to thank Lydie, Fuad and Aom.   I will stay at this hotel (and hotel chain) again as I know they always look out for their guests.

title: Great for kids and lay back trip
review: The hotel has a great family room as there is a bunk bed. So our kids love it. It’s like a battle ship for them 4-7 years old.  There is the kids club and the most love item. The slide in the children’s pool. So it’s free non stop sliding haa. The food is very easy for the kids but my partner and I don’t prefer after two days. In fact it’s more for western taste. Even the Thai food not spicy at all  So all in all a nice place for family   Oh the recovery when there is a mistake is superb very good and response well.

title: Fantastic hotel wonderful Staff 👍👍👍👍👍
review: Dear Tonysegolo, Thank you for sharing your great feedback on online. it is a pleasure reading how much you have enjoyed the unique atmosphere of our tropical resort, as well as the family room with the bunk bed. Indeed, the resort is the ideal place for family holiday. Kids can enjoy the water slide, the Kid’s Club, Kid’s menu as well as a lot of activities through the day. Could we share that the resort proposes 5 restaurants and bar, each with its identity, from Authentic Thai & Asian Cuisine, all Time international favorites, Pools Side selection, Chef’s recommendations…  So everyone can enjoy different flavors everyday… We will look forward to welcoming you back in the future for more great moments here at Novotel Phuket Karon. Feel welcome to contact me directly via jp.lovotti@accor.com  Warmest regards, Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Needs a management shakeup
review: This is our first time in Phuket and Novotel. It is a stunning hotel with beautiful & massive 3 different swimming pools. Decent size rooms and fab power shower.Very clean and food is delicious. We tried pasta, pizza and cocktails are delicious too. We are currently staying in this hotel & I thought they deserve a good review while we are staying and couldn’t wait till the end of the trip.   The highlight of our stay in this hotel is the Manager Henry. He is so helpful, friendly and very polite. I have worked in hotel in the past. I must say he is a perfect example of a great manager, always happy to help, humble and very accomodating, he is always smiling , it’s a massive 300 rooms hotel but Henry remembered us which was very impressive. I am a Vegeterian hence sometimes…

title: Lovely hotel and ideal for kids
review: My sister and I have just spent 7 nights at this hotel. And what a bitter disappointment it is for a Novotel. As an Accor Advantage Plus member for 6 years I have stayed in many Novotel hotels throughout Asia Pacific and this would be of the lowest standard I’ve ever seen.   I will say that upon arrival the front desk staff were helpful and courteous and quick to attend to us however that is where it ended.  The Food and Beverage outlets and their staff need a thorough shakeup. Don’t expect any service from anyone as they’re too busy talking to their friends or playing on their phone to even acknowledge you.   This happened every day and not just to us but was commented by others as well.  The staff need to be trained from scratch in Hospitality Basics, smile and greet people…

title: Great View
review: The one thing that amazed me was the View and the pool. It was outstanding. The staff really helpful when we asked for the direction and booked taxi. The Room quite big and clean. The Price and Taste of the Food from Room Service was Good.

review: We didn't have kids but they are well catered for.  Service by all the staff has been fantastic.  Suicidal mention to Henry and Jay in champions bar. Aleays happy and polite.  We had a superior room with plunge pool. Great idea and don't have to worry about the people around main pool. Plunge when you want.  The surf and turf night was absolutely delightful and plenty of food for 2. Breakfast had a huge selection on the buffet. Omelette made to order.  Can't fault anything here. Patak road is the main strip of shops restaurants convenience stores chemists massage and souvenir shops.  Hotel runs a…

review: You won’t regret being at this lovely place. The staff is very hospitable and loving . Our chef also was amazing and such a lovely guy. He got us chicken ham n sausages everyday for the breakfast only bcoz v dint want to eat pork. The surroundings of the hotel are all up to the mark. They also have scheduled ferry till the Patong market. This is the best plce to stay Whn in Karon ❤️

Housekeeping service was so good cleaness was super.service was so quick.i love the hotel.

title: A bit old and need some help
review: Stayed here almost for a week with my family and kids. Took their suite which comes with an attached outdoor private  plunge pool. Room was nice and big, can easily accommodate couple and 2 teenagers. We were here with toddlers though, only thing didn't like was plunge pool contains sea water. So if your sensitive you may have rashes if spend long time in the plunge pool. Bathroom is nice and huge with an indoor tub. Best part about resort is the kids play area where our kids used to freak out and was the biggest deciding factor in choosing this property over all others. Breakfast is nice spread and can't complain in that. They had everyday dinner themes which are quite good if you feel eating in the resort itself, recommended for stay.

title: Fantastic Experience
review: We are happy that we chose Novotel Karon Beach. The gentleman FUAD who checked us in is extremetly helpful and polite. He doesn't get tired or annoyed when we push him with a lot of questions. He gave us a room with a attched Jacuzzi and my children love it so mush that  they wish to be back. The staff around is very polite and helpful too. Thank you Fuad and the team. Sometime I am just wondering why we always have good experienec with Novotel and i must delcare that it is a good and respectable brand..

title: Fantastic Relaxing Holiday
review: This was our 2nd time in Phuket. 1st was when we stayed in Kamala. And now, in Karon.  Novotel Karon is a pretty nice hotel. Although it is not literally beach front, the beach in front of the hotel (you still have to cross the street to get to the beach) is pretty amazing. I love how quiet the place is (compared to how crowded Patong is) yet should you need to buy anything outside the hotel, it's all walking distance. Cheaper outdoor restaurants, 711, massage parlors, money exchange, etc are just 5 to 10 mims walk.  Talking about our accommodation, check in was pretty smooth. The Front Desk & bellman was courteous and welcoming. Although 1 thing was, we were not given an option on our bed preferrence. We were given 2 single beds that were pushed together to make it a King size…

title: Excellent facilities, food and service
review: Great Relaxing Holiday Place, Plunge Pool Suite Excellent , Very clean resort with emaculate gardens, All staff very friendly and helpful and especially Toto at Joe Kools Pool Bar,  Great place for families to stay , Beach right across the road and shops 10 mins walk

title: Fantastic family hotel
review: Visted here for two weeks with an 8 month and a 2 year old. Resort was beautiful, staff went above and beyond with any requests we had, food was good and facilities were fantastic for kids. They really enjoyed the kids pool, kids club and the random dressed up characters hanging around the resort. Us parents had a great time too, we even used the babysitting service on evening with no complaints.

title: Great stay and value
review: We went assuming it to be really close to beach but it takes a really long walk to cross some public gardens and streets to reach the beach. There is no market or 7/11 nearby, no taxis nearby. You end up taking expensive taxi from hotel or from a guy outside hotel . Essentially , it's a beautiful property in nowhere. If you wish markets around go for patong or maybe Kata. If you wish peace with beach and some accessibility to markets prefer south Karon. Talking about property, nice pools, average business rooms, superb food-breakfast and room dining both(prices pretty decent). Amazing if you are travelling with kids and have enough time in Phuket.

title: Novotel phuket
review: Decent hotel - my review will mainly help those travelling from the UK.   We took a Thai Airways flight from Heathrow and arrived the next day in the morning in Thailand. We pre-arranged our pick up through Alex Taxi google or tripadvisor it. He was pleasant, prompt and cheap. We arrived at 10am at the hotel and Checkout doesn’t start till 12 so please bear this in mind. As a result, was left to sit and wait for two hours. Although we were allowed to change and use facilities we were aware of this- we didn’t see much worth paying a full day for the sake of around two hours. Though because the lobby is all open it gets really hot as there isn’t ac so I would recommend on your way to the hotel from the airport you will go past plenty of shops visit one and get a cold bottle of…

title: Getaway trip
review: We had a relaxing and good getaway holiday. The hotel staffs were friendly. However, the breakfast selection and cooking were not very tasty and we had to wait for a long time for a table because there weren't enough tables for the morning crowd to have breakfast.

title: Nice Hotel can improve
review: Dear Kyle, Thank you for sharing your experience online. it is a pleasure reading how much you have enjoyed a relaxing stay as well as the friendly and warm service from our ‘Heartists’.  However, we are sorry that your breakfast did not meet fully your expectations. Could we share that the menu items for breakfast varies daily, and that we offer a selection of hot dishes, cold cuts, cheeses, pastries and breads, fresh fruits and dairy products, as well as a live kitchen. We do hope that we will have the chance to welcoming you back and invite you to contacting me directly via jp.lovotti@accor.com then. Warmest regards, Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: 適合各種年齡層旅客入住的溫馨酒店
review: Positives, nice property, great pools and friendly staff. Housekeeping were excellent, great help with a sick daughter. Negatives. The lobby/check in area is a busy crowded and cluttered place. We took a long time to be checked in. I pre-paid the whole trip on credit card, that credit card had been stolen and I had a new one to check in with. Reception wanted me to produce the Matercard statement showing the payment of the stay, ALTHOUGH it had been pre-paid in full months ago. Complete waste of everyones time. Plunge pool room we had booked not available the first night so they put us in another room. When trying to put the dinner tab on my room they wouldn't allow it and sent me back to reception. After a wait I was told they needed to block $500 off my credit card. Stayed in…

title: Nice but not amazing
review: 入住Novotel Phuket Karon Beach Resort & Spa酒店的對面就有海灘，走出去外面有熱鬧的night street。  Novotel Phuket Karon Beach Resort & Spa人員很親切，漂亮的泳池是讓人一整天都想賴在池邊不想動，因為整體氣氛太舒服了，另外在Novotel Phuket Karon Beach Resort & Spa酒店內隨處都看到與小朋友各種遊樂設施，由此可知道這是一個非常溫馨的酒店，另外酒店TAI餐廳內的fire and ice系列有機會一定要試試看，推薦喜歡喝調酒的朋友們，絕對要點調酒來喝，讓你立刻感受到到普吉島度假的滋味！  這是一個適合各種年齡層旅客入住的溫馨酒店。

title: Overbooked
review: The hotel was overbooked. We waited for 45mins at the priority check in counter and being platinum member of Accor Group, this is the first. Hotel lobby is just too small for the arrival groups.  Not mentioning the fact that due to brand loyalty, we brought along the entire family of at least another 5 rooms. Yet the check-in for everyone took ages. Rooms were not ready by 3pm although for my family members, they were brought to a waiting area with free drinks offered.  We had to queue for breakfast - also a first. Hotel was obviously under booked or either that, It was under staffed. Although, on the 2nd day onwards, the staff specially allocated seats at the Thai restaurants downstairs for our group of 20  for breakfast.   We had dinner most nights at the hotel. When we wanted…

title: Perfect Hotel!!!
review: We had a wonderful stay at the Novotel. The staff were friendly and could not do enough for us. The resort was lovely and clean. The buffer breakfast was amazing with such a wide variety of food. We had a four course breakfast.  The reception team were so friendly and I went to free yoga once and free aqua aerobics nearly every day. The Recreation Officer made it fun and Iwe thoroughly enjoyed the sessions. My daughter had a plunge pool outside her apartment which was great fun. Whilst there it was the Thai new year and the Novotel organised a Tuk Tuk water fight which drove through the streets of Karon Beach and Kata. My son and I both had water pistols and the hotel supplied a large plastic container of water which was refilled twice.  It was such fun and we felt like children…

review: Do yourself a favour and stay here! Awesome family friendly hotel and staff are very helpful. Get to know Peach, he is the activity manager and he is a funny man. Food is great at all the restaurants and the cocktails always cold! Great work Novotel!!!

title: Thailand Spring Break Vacation
review: It was an exceptional experience. We will be loyal Accor/Novotel guests from now on. Everything about our stay was wonderful, the staff, food, cleanliness, and our room was absolutely amazing. We will be back.

title: Great hotel.
review: Very Nice Hotel, Stay here only for a night, room was nice big and clean HK service is should improve, ask to change water boiler in the room and had to ring reception 3 times before sending new one wait almost 45 minutes, breakfast was okay, we went down around 10.00 am and there are no tables available guest have to wait in queue, but luckily we only waited few minutes, service in the restaurant was good for some staff specially  ROD & Mook,  Rod was very helpful and polite, mook is very welcoming. but some staff did't bother asking if we need baby chair for my 13 months old son, ending up looking for it myself and found 5 baby chairs in the corner. Pool was very nice they have 3 pool but we stayed in pool near kids club for my baby, if you dont want miss having sun bed better…

title: Great hotel with friendly staff and wide selection of amenities.
review: Brilliant location.opposite the beach. Great food and drinks Not to pricey. Great spa deals. Staff very friendly and helpful especially peach. Advised on the best places to see in phuket. Cant wait to go back :)

title: Wonderful staff
review: We had a number of rooms  across our family group. Ours was the plunge pool deluxe which our two children loved and we enjoyed the additional space. The hotel was great value for the quality offered and we thoroughly enjoyed our time here. The key differentiator that allows us to strongly recommend is the staff. There was a real culture of service and fun across all levels and service areas. We visited the Tai restaurant many times just for Emma who our girls loved ( and the food). The pool team, transport and check in were all great and housekeeping efficient and reliable.  The spa prices were great compared to EU expectations and treatments wonderful. We can certainly recommend to families and anyone wishing for a relaxing holiday.

review: Really relaxing. We didn’t have kids with us but they cater for the kids heaps. Bit of a walk to any action. But we all need a walk hey. Lovely resort. Brekkie is brilliant. 6 of us and not one complaint

title: Great for families
review: We recently returned from a 7 night stay at this resort. We booked the plunge pool suite and loved our room. Very spacious and the plunge pool was fantastic. First night we had no water for a few hours and staff was very apologetic and shouted us dinner buffet 1 night which we enjoyed.  Staff were always helpful and nothing was too much trouble for them.  The complementary shuttle to patong was great.

title: Another great stay
review: Checking out tomorrow after 6 nights here. We had interconnected superior rooms which were perfect for five of us. I was concerned about vegetarian food options but there was loads available at breakfast and the veggie pizzas were also good. Staff were helpful and friendly- the Easter activities for kids were excellent and thoroughly enjoyed by my younger children. Thanks to all the staff for a lovely holiday.

title: Really great stay
review: The hotel is very isolated and only families with small children stayed there. The restaurants in the hotel are expensive (compare to Thailand’s rates) breakfast was not included and the rate was 550B. The beach is about 5 minutes walk and not the as beautiful as other beaches in Thailand. The room is big and family oriented. Not 4.5 stars maybe 4.. stars. Shuttles to Patong runs only 3 times a day and sometimes if you don’t signup hours before it’s full and the taxi cost about 400B one way. My room smelled really bad like drainage. I’ve stayed in many hotels in Thailand and in the World and this hotel was not worth the money. Definitely don’t stay if you’re not with family.

title: Service at its best, great place to stay.
review: We arrived late evening and were given an upgrade to a deluxe room which was great. However I had a restless night sleep and wasn’t sure whether it was the road noise being a room along the roadside or just from the flight and late checkin. I mentioned the noise to the desk staff and my issue sleeping and they were fantastic. They organised for a change to a new room and at the upgraded level moving our luggage whilst we lazed around the pool. They also provided us with complimentary late checkout as we had a late night flight back home. This is the measure of true service when a hotel can deal with your issues effortlessly and without judgement and always done with a smile. Great work Novotel team. The facilities are great, pools are are excellent and the pool guys are fabulous…

title: Amazing! Thank you!
review: We stayed here in February 2018, and our stay was excellent! The rooms, facilities and especially the staff were fantastic! There were a few things that could have done with improvement, but understandably they get addressed as and when possible. The main pool area could do with a few more sunbeds, and the pool could use some grouting, but on the whole it was a really nice pool. The swim up bar was especially nice in the staggering heat too :-). The food was excellent, we didn't have a bad meal all holiday, it is a really high standard and tastes great! The staff around the pools, restaurants and reception were fantastic, but especially Kerr, Rod, Joker, Emma & Mint!   The hotel is around 10 minutes walk from the centre of Karon, and only 5 minutes walk to the beach, which is…

title: Great Hotel in a busy tourist location
review: We stayed with a large group of family and friends for my 40th - 15+ in our group. The service from the staff could not have been better. The rooms were beautiful and well cleaned and maintained. The food was outstanding. Our kids had the best time as the recreational staff were amazing - big shout our to Peach who's poolside manner was outstanding, not to mention hilarious! To Rod, Kerr, Mook, Mark, Tee, Toto and the other team members - THANK YOU! you are what made our stay beautiful and memorable and we will certainly be returning.   Easywalking distance to Karon Centre and the markets, short trip to Patong, minimal TukTuk ride to all the other wonderful sites .e.g. the Big Buddha, Tiger Kingdom, Elephant Sanctuary, Hanuman Zip Lining etc etc.   The only minor negative, which…

title: Wonderful Family Resort
review: Novotel is a wonderful 4 star resort in Karon. We had a young family with a 2 year old and 8 month old and we organised a family room. I requested ground floor and Novotel delivered a lovely ground floor huge room with bunk beds right next to one of the pools so our baby monitor reached the pool.. perfect! The Champions bar was one of our fav places to eat with delicious burgers and a great menu for the kids. The only downfall I would say was the mozzies as we were on the ground floor and everytime we opended the door they would come in, but Novotel were quick to spray room for us while cleaning.  The hotel is located a 10 min walk to main street of Karon so need to walk to get to any cafes or massages etc but that didnt bother us. The beach is not far stroll.

title: Prefect for family and friends gathering
review: After a night battling mosquitoes at our hotel in Patong, we are so glad to move here. Check-in is smooth, pity the staff perspiring due to the hot weather and there is no fan provided. I have emailed them before I check-in to remove the teddy in our family room and they replied stating that they will take note but somehow they have forgotten about my request.   Our family room 4312 was almost perfect and nice! I should have told them I have a little boy so they will give me blue theme instead of pink haha...   Room Bed is comfortable Pillow is way too flat Clean Toothbrush missing Baby cot, baby blanket, pillow, bolster all included Bathroom glass is slightly transparent? I have a teen with us and there is no privacy at all. They should state, the room is only suitable for…

title: Nice hotel
review: The lobby was open and not air-conditioned. But it was quite cool and not hot at all. The curb side design was great for enjoying the fresh air while sitting at the lobby. We had a suite on the third floor. It was huge, we loved it. Everything was well appointed. The room was very clean and modern. The ground and pool were well looked after. We loved walking on the ground in the evening when it lighted up and cooler. Insect repellent would be a MUST. The best thing was: All Pool Chairs had a huge sign tied on the back reminding guests that unattended items left on chair for more than 30 minutes will be removed. What a great idea. All hotels and cruise ship should do that. The Staffs were helpful and always with a smile. It would be an excellent hotel for family and group of…

title: Excellent
review: It was the best hotel ever. I was staying in a plunge pool suite room for 2 nights. A huge room with king size bed and very comfy cushion, and other living room, veranda and a private plunge pool. There are 3 pools, with huge pool in front. Varieties of breakfast and delicious. I order in dining delivery, it was good pad thai, i love it. Friendly staffs from the reception, bell boys, in dining delivery, restaurants, etc, that Novotel style. Fast wi fi connection. This place is very close to the beach. They provude shuttle to patong beach. It was my best holiday in Phuket ever. I really love their program on supporting go green action, and we got THB 200 credit if we suppirt the action, and we can use it in the restaurant.

title: Pool Suite is excellent
review: Lovely place to stay, not a long walk to the beach and shops , amazing views from your room, the breakfast was the best ever , very lovely and friendly staff, we would definitely Recommend staying here.

title: Our Phuket Holiday
review: We initially had a "deluxe" room which overlooked the main road and was ridiculously noisy all night (could still music going which I think was from tuk tuk at taxi stand on road at 6am). We chose to up grade and got a pool suite. Yes it was more money but it was definately worth it for a couple of nights at the end of a holiday where we had stayed in some dodgy bungalows. We had our own private pool (which was cool and refreshing unlike main pool), we had an outdoor lounge and an outdoor table with 4 chairs which was great for morning coffee or room service at night. The pool meant we didn't have to do the pre- breakfast dash to the main pool for a lounge chair. The suite itself was fantastic, seperate lounge, 2 TV so we could watch something different if we wanted to and a…

title: Great stay!
review: We left a crappy AirBnb and moved to this place - so glad we did!  We stayed in a plunge pool room, which was quite refreshing after a day in the hot sun.  Breakfast was great, lots of different choices, and the overall hotel ambiance was friendly and clean.  The gym was good for a hotel gym, and there was a separate pool for children.  The larger pool was HUGE with plenty of chairs for when we needed them. Karon Beach is across the street, and there was plenty of shopping and restaurants within a short walk.  Can't wait to go back!

title: Nice hotel and a good base to explore
review: Arrived at the hotel around 9:30 am and had to wait an hour and a half for our room - didn’t mind as offered cold juice and we had a little walk around the grounds.  Nice hotel and not too big and grounds and surrounding areas are very clean.  Our room was 4311 which was clean and spacious with an extremely large double bed and bunk beds for the girls which they loved as two massive teddy bears were sat at the end of each bed along with a little quiz which lead them to a box of chocolate coins each! I was under the impression that daily treats were available for kids but none were left! The only downside to the room was it did feel a little damp and there is no privacy when you use the bathroom (toilet and shower) due to the glass panel which you can see through to the bedroom…

title: Good service but bad pool and room
review: We stayed at the Novotel Phuket for 4 nights, as soon as we arrived we were impressed by how nice the hotel looked! Checking in was quick and easy and we were shown to our room which was clean, spacious and air conditioned. We had breakfast included, this was very good with a large variety of food and drinks. However on occasions there is a 5-6 minute wait for a table There are 3 pool areas (1 specifically for families and young children) all were clean and well staffed. I would mention that as soon as the sun comes up towels appear on sunbeds immediately with no occupants! During the day the pools are very busy and it is not always possible to get a sunbed. However, I did see staff enforcing the 30 min rule and removing towels from sunbeds unused for 30 mins, which was nice to…

title: A family resort
review: I had the privilege to stay at Novotel Karon for 7 days recently.  My reviews are the following... Cons: 1. Food service - Inconsistent. Room service was fast but for food ordered via My Kids, the service was quite slow. I understand that the hotel was full during our stay but  I wish that the drinks could've been served a bit faster. It only takes less than a minute to put ice cubes in a glass and get two cans of soda from the fridge.  2. Thai food- Bland. I was expecting more in terms of flavour given that it's a Novotel resort but I found the Thai food pretty ordinary. I found the dishes rather bland and lacking in wow factor. To me, the resort's Thai dishes are in the same category as those found in food courts-just okay. The presentation just so-so. My family and friends…

title: Great hotel choice for location, people, service
review: We have just returned from a holiday which included a 7 night stay at this hotel. I must congratulate the staff for making our stay here superb. From the free drink and iced towels at check in to the final day luggage collection from our room, the staff were excellent. We had a standard room which was housed in a 3 storey building in a part of the resort which was very quiet. Our view was excellent from the balcony, the mountains in the back ground and the lush vegetation outside the room was a pleasure to view. The room was large and well furnished and spotlessly clean. The wifi, which has been criticized by others was excellent, the improvements by the staff evident. We were in a room which was the furthest away from the reception but the staff and the golf buggies made the…

title: Pretty average
review: A hotel can make or break a vacation. Novotel Phuket Karon rounded out my family vacay of a 9 and 15 year old. We booked a family room lucked out with a ground floor and oasis pool right out the balcony door.  With this convenience there was no need to scramble for loungers or cabanas.  Appreciated the buffet breakfast included in our rate. The variety was outstanding. Food variety on the resort is in abundance as well as room service options. There are specials but being a resort the price always includes a resort fee.  It is a 10 minute walk to the main drag of Karon for other food options.  Housekeeping is on there toes but you can choose the planet 21 option and forego housekeeping with a 2090 baht credit per day.  We used the Spa almost everyday and big thanks to Noch and…

title: You can have quiet and peaceful time here.
review: My wife and 6 years old sun have spent 3 days here, it's pretty not bad. Have 3 pools, and the one for the kids which have a slide in second floor was good enough.  Crews are nice and friendly. Food was not bad too. But the hotel location is a little vague. To kata and karon is too far for walk and too close for the taxies even more, Grab Taxis were never answer.   Not bad for quiet staying.

Breakfast was excellent and thankyou to all staff who work so hard and were so efficiant especially Geow who looked after us very well.The pasta buffett night was very good.Good solo entertainer also.We ate once in the thai restaurant but were a little disappointed with the food considering the price (and one of the girls was not very friendly or very happy)  Had great snacks and service at the Sportsbar. They have 3 great pools , however I think the staff need to monitor the sunbeds more as alot of guests very early in the morning place there towels over the beds and do not return within the 30 min time frame so there are no beds left,I find this very rude and  inconsiderate of these guests to…

title: Mediocre.  Lack the hospitality the Thai are renowned for....
review: The biggest disappointment is the we felt that it lost the amazing hospitality Thailand is known for.  Customer service was poor, no smile, poor body language.  The only good service were the Phillipino staffs.  We had to change room because our initial room smelt like someone have just smoke in our room.  At the Tai Restaurant, it took them so long to serve us, almost 30 mins or more.  At the check out, they even charged us 30 baht for charity WITHOUT telling us.  I am all for charity but its unprofessional when you charged without telling us.  Utterly disappointed...

title: Perfect Holiday
review: I was originally booked in to stay at this resort for longer than the short stay I had.  We moved out pretty quick and here’s the reasons:  1.  We booked about 6months in advance on a pretty good rate.  However what that rate gets you is a room at the very very back of the hotel overlooking what seemed to be a workshop area and basically the last spot before the car park.  It was simply awful.  They agreed to move us the next day but basically in the same area.  We declined with thanks.  2.  The rooms are at best 3-Star standard.  One pillow each side of the bed that were lumpy and smelled horrible.  Shocked a resort like Novotel would take chances with guests by providing such an important item in such bad condition.  For the rest of the room issues look at the traveller photos…

title: Mediocre hotel
review: Dear Mr. Dantman, Thanks for sharing your feedback with us.  At Novotel, we are dedicated to create experiences our guests love, we are truly sorry to read that your experience at the Resort did not meet your expectation.  Regarding the room condition, be sure that I am taking your comments into account for further improvement. We are always happy to offer complimentary upgrade to the next room category when it’s possible, but it was not the case when you stayed with us.  Regarding breakfast area, may I share with you that we open our Tai restaurant during breakfast time, so guests can enjoy their breakfast in a less busy and quiet area.  Also, the resort features 3 swimming pools located in different areas of the resort, so guests can sit and relax on sun beds without hearing any traffic noise from the road.  Regarding the beach access, may I share with you that a security guard is available 24/7 to help you cross the road safely to go to Karon Beach, which is a public area. For facilities and shopping, Karon town is located only 10-minutes’ walk from the resort.  I remain hopeful that we will hear from you again and have a chance to welcome you at Novotel Phuket Karon again in near future.  Should you decide to give our hotel a second chance, I would be more than happy to personally take care of your arrangements. Warmest regards, Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: disappointed
review: We stayed for 10 days at Novotel Karon Beach Resort. The rooms, facilities, and staff were all first class. The main pool was pure luxury. Most of my meals were at the hotel restaurants and I maintained perfect health. The staff were so friendly and helpful. Location was great and a magnificent beach opposite. Would highly recommend this hotel especially if you have an Accor card. Only negatives were bad WiFi, not enough sun loungers, and too many kids at breakfast. Other than these, the resort is magnificent.

title: Nice hotel and good service.
review: The hotel is in goid location not too crowded and not too noisy. Ideal for long holiday. The room is clean and stylish. Staff provide excelldent service and helpful. We love karon beach because is less busy compare to patong. Was good decission for book 1 weeks holiday there.

review: We spent a week at the beginning of January and this hotel is within walking distance to the main beach and the main streets.    We had a private plunge pool and it was amazing.  The security guard on the front gate made the experience all the better!

title: Pleasant stay
review: This was my second stay here(January 2018 for 4 nights). I revisited, as the first time in April 2015 was awesome. The good: It’s a nice place, good location, great pools, friendly staff, comfy rooms.  Issues we had: 1. We paid extra for a deluxe room and got a room at the very far end of the resort near the noisy street. Not ideal. 2. The breakfast line was very long - If you’re catering to that many guests, you’ll need a bigger restaurant that sits more people and more food. Also, please get a coffee machine... 3. Problems with the room door - The cards to the door faulted and wouldn’t let us in 4-5 times. When you’re at the far end of the resort, it got very frustrating walking back to reception to ask them to fix it again and then it not be fixed properly.  4. Internet - the…

title: Good for families
review: December 2017. Pleasant location. Check in was slow despite arriving after 2pm. Wonderful staff. Breakfast was busy. Had to wait a while for a table. Clean resort.  Wonderful amenities.  Little far from CBD. Can walk. Small dark patch after crossing road. Otherwise not too far. Wonderful man to assist crossing busy road. Tuck tuck more expensive in Karon then Patong beach despite shorter distance. Beach chairs fewer available then Patong. Twice getting to beach late we had no beach chairs. Wonderful clean beach. Beautiful sunset views.  Decent swimming. Will return again.

title: Close to the beach, October weather was great
review: Visited Phuket for a week in mid October, rained for 1 single morning only.   Hotel was more a family hotel for sure. Outdoor lobby which was weird. Staff were very friendly and accommodated our late check in request, maybe because it's low season?  Breakfast had a decent enough selection, no halal option available even with prior notice. The breakfast hall was also not air conditioned making it quite stuffy and uncomfortable to eat  3 pool in the hotel probably making it bus right in relation to the capacity of the hotel  The beach location is fantastic, literally cross the road (with the ever present hotel chaperone) and the beach is there, 100 yards. Complementary beach towels provided by the hotel. Karon town is about 7 minute walk away from the hotel and has your usual…

review: Having stayed in many "Family Friendly" hotels around the world i feel that the Novotel Karon has the best balance for the kids need to be entertained and the parents needs to relax. Thoroughly enjoyed our stay and will definitely return.

title: Death by a thousand mediocrities
review: This is not a romantic couples hotel. My boyfriend and I stayed here for 4 nights and everything about this hotel was either overly priced, not well thought out, or just “meh”.   Unless you have kids, or plan to stay mostly at the resort, stay somewhere else. They have all kinds of mom/daughter, movie nights, playtimes, or Minion characters for kids. The pools look great with lots of chairs and cabanas, and wasn’t very busy. TV is like basic cable, so don’t plan on enjoying much of that.   The dinner buffet options were outside along the pool. We didn’t eat at the hotel except for breakfast - which was good! Honestly, the restaurants along that beach strip to the city were great (we ate at the last one twice)!  The activities concierge was a desk with pamphlets on it. When we…

title: Very good hotel
review: This hotel was perfect for our family trip and friends: 1) Good breakfast 2) Very clean hotel 3) Superb Kids room 4) Beach opposite to the hotel, is one of the best on the island 5) Very supportive and positive stuff members  One negative thing we didn't like is cold water in the swimming pool, especially in the kids pool. But it pushed us to visit very warm sea more often :)

I think this resort is much better for young families, rather than couples.

Staff like Shanay(very proactive sorted my trips & flight meals)  James (always smiling & helpful at meal times), Annie (who organised my Veggie Thai Class) & Meaw were exceptional & made our stay very easy. Senior Staff also went out of their way to chat & talk to us to ensure that we were happy.   Hotel location was just what I was looking for with walking distance to shops & restaurants.  The hotel is on…

title: Relaxing!
review: Great hotel in a great location! The food, service and overall experience was exceptional. Thoroughly enjoyed happy hours by the pool, food and the buffets of an evening - gave a great variety with different cuisines. Only downfall was the hotel wifi being very poor in most areas. Otherwise a fantastic stay, highly recommend!

title: Wonderful stay, but a few small improvements could make a world of difference!

But what made this place from good to great was not just the service but the service recovery. Christmas day came back to a room engulfed with a pungent smell from a non toxic fumigation the hotel did next door; which of course really displeased us as we were worried for the baby. Long story short it wasn't thrown to the junior staff but the senior people stepped in with immediate apologies, assurances and assistance. Impressive and well done. If there is one thing left to fix, it's the bathtub- it needs a shower door or curtain ;)  To all the staff who served us, you made it feel like home with genuine smiles and…

title: Great family holiday
review: We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Novotel Karon Beach. The customer service was outstanding overall and staff did all that they could to make our stay wonderful.   Only two things could be improved in regards to customer service: 1. Not all staff were aware of the promoted specials. On more than one occasion, staff did not seem to know about the promotions, e.g. the offer of a free beer with Italian night and a free beer with a burger. 2. On our last day there, at 11.50 am, we went to order the Wake Up special on drinks from the pool bar. The barman there saw me, but continued sifting through receipts at the registerl. I waited for five minutes until another young waiter arrived and then ordered my drink. He spoke to the bar tender and the bar tender said that the special was…

title: Great GetAway
review: This property has a lot to offer. We had an amazing time in this resort. Well located, very well designed. Rooms were strategically located. Service was excellent. However, needs some fine-tuning on the restaurant staff. Buffet-Breakfast was good (should be covered and air conditioned). Had an amazing time.

We could cool off whenever we wanted and the constant sound of running water was calming. The beds were massive and extremely comfortable too. The main pool area is fantastic with activities to keep the children busy and enough loungers for just kicking back. Our favourite place was Joe Kool's where we could  hang out, drink beer and play snooker. Buffet breakfast had lots of delicious options. Providing free yoga four times a week is a fantastic idea for those of us who like to keep fit this way. All the resort staff were very friendly and helpful, particularly when they discovered one of my…

review: With so many resorts on the island, one would have thought the competition to provide the best experience to the guests will be the key focus and priority.   My family (Me, wife and 3.5 years old) stay there for 4 days earlier this month.The resort is fairly new and with amenities like a typical 4 stars resort- no complaint there. The staff there in general looks disinterested and bordering on unhappy. Cases in point: 1. Ask to leave my 3.5years old in the kids club to play on his own while me and wife to visit the spa downstairs. The straight reply from the staff "no,  kids below 4 years old must be accompanied by a adult. unless (we) pay for child minding service". I tried to reason with the staff that my kis is happy playing on this own and he is quite independant and we are…

title: Great Stay but a little disappointed with cook.
review: We stayed here for 5 nights with the family and the hotel is very nice and relaxing. I wish to thank all the staff who are by large very helpful and pleasant, with the exception of one cook that decided to curse my wife in Thai using some very colourful language that would have made a Monk blush. This was very disappointing as it is not the traditional "THAI" way and unfortunately for her we understood all that she was saying and god knows how many other times she has conducted herself in this manner believing that the patrons would not understand. Admittedly she was dealt with but this left a very bad taste in our mouths that detracted from our stay. We avoided the breakfast kitchen in the morning due to this incident. The Executive Chef apologised on behalf of his staff…

title: Thumbs Up!! A great family vacation.
review: Below is my review of the Novotel Phuket Karon Beach Resort & Spa Phuket, previously a Ramada Hotel a few years back.  STAR RATING: - I would only rate this hotel 3 stars, it is not a 4 star hotel as claimed.  GOOD: - The massage & spa was amazing.  This was definitely the highlight for us. - Acceptable level of English at the main counter and in areas where customer interaction occurred. - Access to the resort and facilities was good. - Shower itself was great. Choice of cable or true over the head with good heat and pressure.  FOR IMPROVEMENT: - The private pool room on the edge do have a noisy waterfall that runs from 8am to 6pm.  Very noisy during the day... Get rid of it, seriously why. - Poor TV channels. You cater for English & Russian customers, so why dont you have…

title: Great hotel for the whole family!
review: Dear Pedro,  It was a pleasure having you as a guest and meeting you during your stay.  We are glad that you have enjoyed the facilities of the Resort, for the dedicated attention of our Teams, as well as the great treatments proposed in our Spa.  The resort has been designed to create a comfortable environment, with tropical gardens. Water features are complementing this atmosphere and we are sorry if you have been disturbed by the sound from the waterfall feature. In your room, we propose a selection of 23 TV Channels, including Movies, sport, news, kids, local channels, to suit everyone’s needs. A car park is available at the back of the Resort, complimentary and under 24 hours surveillance. Regarding the infrastructures outside the resort boundaries, it is not legally allowed for the Resort to perform any work, installation or replacement. However, we do have a security guards to assist our Guests to cross the road safely. Shall you find the comfort of the bed too firm, we do propose mattress toppers to make them softer. As for the Wi-Fi, is complimentary to all guests in the resort and protected by a firewall. Last but not least, happy hours and MyResort offers are available at different time and location, so you can enjoy more for less…  We do hope that we will have the chance to welcoming you back in the future, feel welcome to contact me directly at jp.lovotti@accor.com then  Warmest regards, Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: 5 Stars isn't enough!!!
review: We spent 5 days, 4 nights in Phuket. 2 nights in Patong area and last 2 nights at Novotel Karon. Our flight tickets were non-changeable otherwise we would have extended our stay at Novotel.   This is a hotel which knows how take good care of their guests. From the warmth welcome and smile during point of arrival to departure. Staff are always with a smile, approachable, friendly. Sincere smiles not those 'plastic type of smiles and treatment' you get at some hotels. My kids love the hotel so much especially the Kids World day pass , which for less than Sgd$15 per day per kid,  kids get all- inclusive kids' meal, drinks, desserts, and activities (refer to hotel for more details). My 8 yr old daughter made new friends at the kids club and went eagerly to the frontdesk counter…

title: Decent Hotel
review: Overall the experience was good. The rooms were big and spacious with a great rain shower in the bathroom, I had upgraded to a Deluxe Room. I did have to move to 3 different rooms because of minor problems but Paulla, the assistant manager dealt with them very sympathetically and professionally. I was told when I arrived at the hotel that one of the 3 pools was a quiet pool for people to relax but this didn't seem to happen whilst I was there, it appeared to be an overspill from the childrens pool so ended up being quite noisy. On the whole the staff were very good although there seemed to be some who were unsure of what they were doing, I presumed these were new staff who would improve over the season. There are 2 members of staff who I would single out for special praise and…

title: Would not recommend
review: Fantastic hotel no complaints unlike the reviews some have stated previously.  Great location for beach and 10 minute ride into the busy Patong district.  Karon Beach and quieter town is within 10 min walking distance.   Now back to the hotel:  Breakfast had plenty of choice to choose from a little repetitive but not enough to skip breakfast for somewhere else. Rooms very spacious and clean, air conditioning unit easy to use and kept the room at an pleasant temp when required. Hotel had 3 great pools, enough sun loungers for all, plenty of bars for snacks and drinks throughout the day.  Staff very welcoming and polite, made me feel at home. In all an exceptional 9 nights stay and would fully recommend it..well it is a Novotel after all.

title: A perfect stay ever
review: Our first oversea trip and we couldn't wait to go home.   ~ Wifi inconsistent. had to leave our room to get it to work and still then it was vare. (We bought a infinite mobile data package for $12 AUS and had 5+ devices connected and it worked better.)   ~ Pool is unsanitary. I have worked in aquatics for many years and there was no chlorine or salt, pools were filtered with something the size of a forty gallon drum afew hours each night and the pH of the water burnt your eyes and calcium build up was left over all my swimmers. p.s. Spa is not a proper spa   ~ ! Out the back of resort there is a WASTE TREATMENT PLANT! And a garbage sorting yard. The wind blows the wrong dirrection and it is awful, as it is all out doors. To make it worse we were placed the the very back room at…

title: Something for everyone! Amazing stay!
review: My husband and I are traveling with another couple (family) and are currently staying the this hotel.   Beautiful well kept grounds, incredible breakfast buffet to suit everyones needs, several swimming pools and amazing bar food and drinks.   The hotel has a themed Buffet every evening, Fiesta, Thai, BBQ, Italian, etc. We have tried most nights. If tou do not like what is on offer at the buffet there is another fine dning reataurant and while sitting in the buffet dining room you can order other food(hambugers, pizza, etc.)   The hotel actually plays a movie for the kids during the dinner buffet, which i am sure give the parents a break to be able to enjoy their meal.  We are extremely impressed with the hotel and their services. The Spa is a must. It is a little bit more…

title: Great hotel
review: Great way to end our trip to Thailand.  Very clean and food was excellent.  Room was big and bathroom was clean, modern and nice large size.  breakfast buffet (not included in room price we had chose to add it on) was very good with many options.  Beach is directly across the street, quick walk.  Beautiful beach but the hotel also has beautiful pools if you choose to stay on the hotel grounds. I'll be honest with the price we paid we expect to be able to write a review like this.  For us we do not enjoy the $60 hotels where we have to guess if the sheets are clean.. We have standards which this hotel met nicely.

title: Great family resort
review: Room was excellent - we had a private plunge pool and a large outdoor area which was fantastic. The two hotel pools are also really nice. The staff were very friendly and the breakfast was great - best bacon in Phuket.

title: Very good hotel in a great location
review: We stayed at this hotel for six nights at the beginning of November.  On arrival we were impressed with the reception area and found the check in trouble free and the staff friendly.    We booked a standard room and found it a reasonable size.  We arrived after 11pm and went straight to bed.  The following morning there was a strong smell of urine in the bathroom.  We reported this to reception and in less than ten minutes a guy arrived to check it out.  He said the drain wasn’t blocked so he would send a cleaner, she arrived within five minutes.  She gave the bathroom a thorough clean and sprayed with a fresh air spray.  This seemed to solve the problem but 48 hours later the smell was back.  We purchased a spray to use but that evening the smell had spread to the bedroom.  My…

I love this place. Another thing thank you very much to James and FO team were profession service, warmest welcome me and friends like family as usual : )   Cheers!  Jane

title: Great family resort in Phuket!
review: Every time when we plan to have a family holiday, Novotel Phuket Karon will always comes up! Location, friendly staffs, good service etc. Especially when they treat our young children very well in every mean. No need to think twice if you looking for family friendly place to stay in Phuket!

review: We had a family room bunks bed for kids. Should have a blockout screen separating the shower not frosted/clear glass...Only let down.... awesome location. Fantastic staff. definitely caters for the family. 10 min walk to the hub of karon across the road from the beach.

title: Superb!
review: Admittedly this resort was a bit of a let down! The facilities were tired and dirty, the staff didn’t speak very good English and were not overly friendly, and the prices for some things were just crazy!   Both pools had no grout between the tiles making them sharp and slippery, leading to cut toes, knees and elbows.   The upholstered furniture in the common areas was filthy and in need of a very good clean, including the chairs in the breakfast buffet restaurant and the lounges in the main foyer. This was actually rather off putting while eating breakfast as it felt so dirty!   Another off-putting thing at breakfast was the lack of cooling in the restaurant which lead to very hot and sweaty dining experiences, and food that looked warm and unappealing. The selection was also…

title: Great
review: Great resort, loved every everything! No complaints.. I will be back in November for my 2nd trip, thanks to my great experience. My daughter is excited to have a pool outside our door again! Thanks Novotel!!

title: Large complex
review: Loved our stay there wonderful staff rooms were spotless and very roomy.My foster daughter loved the pool.Stayed here then moved on to other hotel in patong.It made me appreciate the Novotel even more.Food was better while all staff were great Novotels staff where slightly more genuine.Would recommend this hotel as excellent value for money.

title: My stay :)
review: My husband and I stayed for 8 nights. We had a Delux room with balcony, the bed was huge and very comfy. The resort is quite large with 3 pools we always managed to find a sunlounge. The main pool has a swim up bar and staff service around the pool. There are two poolside bars and can get meals. Towels are well stocked. The staff are lovely and helpful. The day spa have great specials and a nice treat. The location is really good close to town and beach.the resort has a kids pool and kids club great for families

title: 4 star but 5 star service
review: We have been traveling Phuket area for 2 weeks and finished at Novotel Karon. We had stayed in 5 star resorts everywhere else and Lydie and her staff here could teach them a thing or two, we were so well looked after. It’s location is great, 5 minute cab to Patong, 10 minute walk to Karon shops and beach across the road. Happy to recommend.

title: Great Family Resort, 5 Star Service
review: Visited hotel with 2 child 2 years and 6 years and booked superior plunger pool room arrived by 11 pm checkin was very smooth and quick but the room was not as we expected small and the pool wasn't safe for my kids went to the reception and asked if I could change the room and immediately they said yes ( they thought the room its self wasn't ok) but I explained that its not what I expecting and i need to see the family room, they asked me to come in the morning, next day went and they took me to the family room much bigger and there is toys for the kids and i asked that I would like to upgrade to family room they upgraded me free of charge. ( Fantastic thank you) Overall all the stuff are very friendly and the hotel is very clean, pools are fun for all the family and you could…

title: An apartment block guised as a hotel
review: The Novotel Beach resort was fantastic and is highly recommended, 5 Star Staff and hospitality.   Stayed for 6 nights in a plunge pool room. The room was great, spacious and clean. Hugh bathroom. The outside area of the room was great, especially early morning drinking coffee, very relaxing !    All staff including ground staff greeted us every morning with a smile.   The 3 swimming pools one of which has a water slide were great. Kids had a great time and couldn't get them out of the pools.  Horizon cafe buffet breakfast had enough variety each day with the standard stuff but also some different things that we saw daily to keep the kids and us interested.  A special mention to a trainee staff called "saw" she was very pleasant and also treated us with a friendly smile, my kids…

title: A much better option
review: We stayed at the Novotel in Karon for 3 nights after leaving the baan laimai in patong (don't stay there). I had a total of 5.5hours spa treatment,Buffet dinner, mini bar soft drinks, pizza by the pool and room service and that cost me just over $200aud. Of course if I'd gone down to the main street it would have been cheaper but I didn't want to leave. We had a plunge pool room and it was amazing. I loved being able to swim late at night or early morning without having to go anywhere. We had wifi issues the whole time though and it did my head in - trying to run a business in Australia is hard without wifi. They tried their best to fix it and gave me 200baht credit at the end. They also have this great program where you can choose not to have your room cleaned and they give you…

title: Brilliant place to stay
review: We arrived late on the first to start our honeymoon. We stayed in a plunge pool suite welcomed by a fruit platter the service was amazing and the food was great. Went from Le Club classic to Silver over night

title: lovely place for a family holiday but our rooms wilst large and clean were very uncomfortably damp
review: Dear James, We are very happy to read your great review on TripAdvisor.  Thank you so much for giving us a perfect five-star rating and a great compliment. We really appreciate it. title: Excellent Hotel, Beautifull location, Very good service
review: We have had a seven night break at this hotel. I find it hard to fault as I list my requirements in order of what I want. 1) rooms are large and comfortable and very clean. Maid service excellent. Nice touch for me was the green earth promotion 200 tbh if you did not want your room cleaning and made up. We were happy to participate as we were only using the room for sleeping and the bathroom. 2) we stayed as bed and breakfast guests. The dinning room was well organised with guests shown to the table. (Far better than a free for all.) The staff were all genuinely welcoming and were very attentive to our needs, plenty of tea and coffee. Food was of very good quality and verity the general variety of the many nationalities staying here. I felt that there was a lot of pride in both…

title: Convenient location, comfortable stay
review: We stayed at Novotel Karon last week during our Phuket visit. Our stay was not very long. We stayed for 3 days only. Although our check-in was at 1AM we received a warm welcome and our check-in was quick and smooth.  Everything was fine. The breakfast buffet was well laid out and there was a good choice of food items. We loved the fact that the hotel was near to the beach (just 5 mins). Our daughter had a great time in the kid's pool. The room was clean and neat.  Our only suggestion would be the semi-transparent shower stall which is a bit inconvenient if you share the same room (with family). The wifi service could also be better in some spots.  Overall we were happy with the hotel and the staff. We wished we had planned a longer trip so that we could have enjoyed the hotel…

title: Could have been excellent!

title: I expected much more!
review: So we had booked this hotel a year in advance, 2 twin rooms  - connecting. When we arrived ( to be fair late) we were given 2 double rooms so ok it's late we were tired and will be sorted tomorrow.next morning they did change us to connecting double rooms ( my kids are twins girl and boy aged 15) the receptionist did try and help and in the end had to settle for a rollaway bed. Not the best start and would expect better having a years notice! The hotel itself was good and the rooms very up to date and clean, top tip - if you don't get the cleaners to come in you get 200 bacht voucher to use for food etc. Breakfast was strange with some days having a good choice and other days you could struggle to find anything, staff were friendly and at breakfast very helpful and full of…

title: A great place to stay as a family with young children
review: I'm at the hotel while writing this review. Booked for 4 nights from 5th to 9th of October 2017.  Me and my wife arrived after a long van ride from Ao nang to the hotel and were greeted with smiles and welcome drinks. The check in procedure was fast and I asked for a good view room as we are in phuket for our anniversary and recalling our honeymoon in phuket. Got a buggy ride to our room at the farthest end of the resort, maybe 200m from the lobby. The room is spacious and nice with a big LCD tv and a small balcony, but the view couldn't be worse! My window opens toward the backyard of the hotel where they've dumped all broken beds and seats there! Not a big deal as I know I paid for a standard room. Anyway I asked them to give us another room and I'll pay extra for it but they…

title: Nice short break
review: Overall, we were happy with this hotel and would recommend it. We came from Singapore for 3 nights, as a long weekend break. The hotel we felt was a good 4 star, the swimming pools were lovely and relaxing, the restaurants good, with a variety of food and decent drinks available. The hotel is opposite a decent beach with a lovely view of the cove and mountains behind. Patong was about 12 minutes in a taxi (at 400thb) however we personally felt it wasn't worth the journey in. I felt our room could have been better. I think we were in the older part of the hotel, this room was the cheapest option (as I said, we just wanted a mini get-away so didn't want to spend a lot of money) It had a slight stale stench (although this went with the air con on) but had everything you needed,…

title: 6 nights, family of 5.
review: If you are traveling with your mate don’t choose this hotel. It is a family hotel with children and noise. And the people are not very kind. They don’t  help about recommendations about restaurants or bars, only the hotel’s. The good thing is that the hotel is very near the beach, and this beach, Karon Beach, is beautiful and calm, far from the noise and night life of Patong Beach.

title: Highly recommended
review: Dear Mata,  Thank you for sharing your thoughts on TripAdvisor. At Novotel Phuket Karon, we are dedicated to create experiences all our guests love. We are certainly sorry that you did not feel this way. The Karon district offers a large choice of restaurants and bars, and our Teams is certainly available to give you great recommendations to you could discover further the Amazing Thailand. Could we share also that more families would travel during school holidays, but that the resort was also designed with 3 swimming pools with different restaurants and bar so everyone can enjoy its holidays.  We do hope we will have a chance to welcome you back in the future. Feel welcome to contact me directly at jp.lovotti@accor.com .  Warmest regards, Jean Philippe Lovotti  General Manager

title: Lovely hotel
review: Stayed with a family of 5 in ajoining rooms for 6 nights.  Good: - rooms were a good size and balconys good size too. - room service was usually prompt...they promise within 30 mins. - can pre-buy credit which can be used for food and spa giving 20% discount.  Not so good: - Expect a walk to eat (footpaths in the dark with kids are fun) or be held ransom to the transport desk who charge at the top end of the rates. - Housekeeping remove items from the room e.g. glasses, but you must call to have them replaced. - wifi was terrible in our room and didn't work in the cafe for the last few days. To be fair they did offer to move us rooms.  Overall resort is looking a little tired, road noise is significant, kids facilities and stafd are mostly good.  Probably wouldn't stay again…

title: Fantastic Resort
review: We have recently returned from a 10 night stay at Novotel Karon Beach and highly recommend it.  The hotel itself is clean and modern and the staff were friendly and welcoming.  The facilities are great.  Our children enjoyed the kids club and the activities on offer, and thought it was the best kids club they've visited.  The pools were great and not overcrowded.  The day spa was a 10/10 for a great massage and the buffet breakfasts and dinners were great and of great value.  The only downside for us was the location. 10 minute walk to the beach and approx 15 mins walk into Karon (the town itself).  A couple of special mentions to the staff that really stood out for us were Saw - a lovely friendly staff member who was very attentive and went the extra mile to make sure our stay…

title: Good hotel overall
review: Dear Smith Familee, We are really happy to hear that you and your family left our resort with a great experience and had such an amazing stay! Our Teams are delighted to create Experiences our Guests Love, and it is our pleasure that you could have enjoyed it. We will not miss sharing your appreciation with our team members, for their utmost pleasure. The Team and I will look forward to welcoming you back soon. Feel free to contact me directly at jp.lovotti@accor.com then. Warmest regards, Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: The Novotels (Accor Hotels) are always consistent with quality
review: Stayed here for two nights recently  Pros :  Nice pool Nice clean spacious room  Polite staff  Cons :  Not a good location right on main road on a busy corner- pray to whatever gods are applicable before attempting crossing the road out front   Need to walk a fair way to main area of karon  or catch taxis/tuk tuks  In house restaurant called Tai is expensive and not very high quality thai food based on the few dishes we tried  Be aware this is a 'family friendly' hotel so there are lots of screaming kids around the pools and during breakfast buffet  Especially the area near the back of hotel with the kids water slide that is really loud   If noise bothers you ask for something not in this area  Overall a decent quality hotel though

title: Quality hotel, facilities and service
review: Dear Dodgy Davey, Thank you very much for choosing to stay at Novotel Phuket Karon and for taking time to share your positive feedback with other travelers. The resort proposes a large selection of restaurants and bars for you to choose from, with each a unique culinary identity, from authentic Thai Cuisine, all-time favorites, as well as Chef’s recommendations. The resort also offers 3 distinct swimming pools, so everyone can find their preferred place to chill out. We do hope that we will have a chance to welcome you back in the future. Feel welcome to contact me directly via jp.lovotti@accor.com then. Tropical regards, Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Excellent Stay
review: The Novotel Karon is a beautiful hotel with plenty on offer. We booked a pool suite which was really nice and comfortable and the rooms were very clean. The hotel is starting to show a bit of age with things like grout from the pool missing, curtain rods broken and just niggling little things that build up over time if not replaced or maintained. This wouldn't though stop me from booking this Hotel again. Its ideally situated across from the beach, a short 200 baht ride to Karon by Tuk Tuk or Taxi and only a 10 minute walk along the beach if you choose to walk. The staff are amazing, nothings is too much trouble and as I mentioned its proximity to Karon is great but you also have the exclusivity of seclusion.

title: Wonderful Experie
review: Just returned home from a wonderful 5 day luxurious stay with this fantastic Hotel. Great meals, service, accommodation, staff and particular praise for young Saw who took great care of us and our needs.  First class rooms, exceptional quality linen and housekeeping service, after coming back from an exhausting day out, it was nice to return to a beautifully made up room again. Fantastic Buffett breakfast every morning, in the Horizon Restaurant with a menu hard to criticize. Lovely freshly cooked eggs any way you like, cereals, pancakes, bacon, vegetables and the like. Too many to mention, but all nicely fresh and presented. Experienced some wonderful Thai cuisine in the Champions Bar and Joe Kools, where we met the wonderful Saw. Enjoyed lounging by the pool or sitting at the…

title: I didn't enjoy my stay

title: Novotel @ karon Beach
review: My 8-day-stay at Novotel was not fun as i expected. But 1st I want to give credits to the guest service personal n also the taxi driver that waited for me for a long time at the airport due to my delayed flight.  Ok, let me just share my review about my stay. First arrived to my room, i smelled something teribble,mouldy smell, almost like urine smell, yes it's bcause u need to turn the aircond on. But can u imagine if u get cold n turn it down abit, u will definitely have to deal with the terrible smell. I request for air freshner from the house keeping department, they came to freshen the bed, curtain, almost every corner of the room. It was ok for awhile but, the smell came back so I had to just deal with it. Wanted to change my room, but im sure it will be the same condition…

title: Relaxing place
review: Dear Tiffany, Thank you for sharing your experience online. I am glad that you enjoyed the dedicated Service from our Team and the Quality of our Limousine service. However, we are sorry that your stay would have been marred by some odour issues. Could we share that we do respect specific treatments during the wet season to address the matter. Once again, please accept our apologize for the discomfort you could have had. As for the Shuttle to Patong, we do provide this complimentary service 3 times per day so guest can enjoy some time in this lively district. We do hope that we will have the chance to welcoming you back in the future and would invite you to contact me directly at jp.lovotti@accor.com, I would be happy to assist you in the organization of your next stay!
