title: Staff abuse animals as well as guests
review: This place is nice but I booked this hotel thinking it has a private beach of its own as shown in their website gallery but it was not the case although the Karon beach is across the road it's a public beach. overall facility very good, the best thing is after check out also they give you a room to shower and change if your flight is in the night.

title: Very nice!
review: This place is nice, we had plunge pool room which was very refreshing and all the food was great and not bad prices either. The staff are all lovely (I haven't met too many nasty Thai people ever really). Swim up bar is great and we also had lunch while sitting in the pool drinking cocktails (perfect way to spend a Monday don't you think?). The first of 3 resorts we're staying at on this trip, this one gets my tick of approval certainly 👍 well done Novotel 😊

title: Thank you Novotel Karon
review: Dear Dee L,  Greetings from the Novotel Phuket Karon and thank you for taking the time to share your experience. I'm particularly happy to hear that you enjoyed the comfort and design of our Plunge Pool Suite, our lovely team, our bars and restaurants. Our Teams are dedicated to creating experiences our Guests Love, and it is our pleasure that you could have experienced their genuine sense of hospitality. If you need any assistance for your next stay, feel welcome to contact me directly at jp.lovotti@accor.com Warmest regards,  Jean Philippe Lovotti  General Manager

title: Fantastic friendly service
review: We can only say good things about the hotel and the staff. The staff will do al they can to make your stay a truely 4.5 star stay. I read something about there not being a parking? Well there is, even with a 24h parking gard. To get there you neef to drive around the cirkel and take the small street behind the hotel. Ask the staff and they will tel you how to get there.  We were surpriced with a free room upgrade because we were long staying guests. Our plunge room was big enough but we were tranferred to a 2 room studio with a langer pool and a bath in the bathroom. Novotel Karon thank you for a perfect vacation. You won our harts.

title: Great for family holiday but a little far from shops
review: Dear Chris, I would like to thank you for choosing our Hotel and also leaving us such a positive review here on Trip Advisor.  I'm more than happy to read how much you have enjoyed the services and facilities we provided and of cause our lovely team! Kindly allow me to share your feedback to my team and I believe they would be very proud to know that their efforts reached your expectations. title: Mixed feelings about this hotel
review: We would like to thank the staff at Novotel karon resort for a wonderful holiday. The customer service was fantastic, they were always helpful & friendly. The rooms were clean & beds comfortable. Breakfast was always fresh & there was lots of other options for lunch & dinner & anything in between.

title: worst and disappointing
review: we stayed there 4 days/3 nights.    good:  - good for families with kids as many facilities for kids. even in rainy day, kids would not be bored - room is big ( i stayed in superior room) - environmental friendly. you can get THB 200/night if you don't need clean up and room services  bad: - moldy smell in the bed (we requested to change the bed sheet but still smelly) - no umbrella in room (because we were only in superior room, not expensive enough). even i tried to borrow in receiption, but failed. - location is bad. it takes you 20min to walk to main street. no shuttle at all. - 3 shuttle a day to/from Patong. as the location is not good, u neither walk 20min to main street, or go to Patong. when i booked the 3pm shuttle at 12nn, it was full. and it was heavy rainy day. you…

title: Abandoned in Thailand
review: Dear ViiiK,  We would like to thank you for your review, but naturally sorry that your stay did not meet your expectations. As a Member of Le Club Accorhotels, you do enjoy a large panel of benefits and specials offers, from priority check in, room upgrade, complimentary drinks, late check out for example. You could also enjoy the great MyResort program, available at the Resort too. Could we also suggest you considering Le Club Accor Plus, to enjoy more for less in the Restaurants and Bars of the Accorhotels.  As you mention, the hotel provides a complimentary shuttle to Patong, 3 times per day, every day. Taxis are certainly available for you to go to Patong at your time of convenience. The fare of THB 400 for local taxi seems correct, and would correspond to about USD 12, not USD 51. We are unsure about the exchange rate from your bank but we would certainly be happy to facilitate exchange at a better rate during a next visit.  During the green season, the period of rain are certainly more frequent and umbrellas are available throughout the Resort for your convenience.  On the other hand, we are glad that you have enjoyed the atmosphere of the resort, the large living space of our rooms, and our commitment for a sustainable environment via our Planet 21 program.  We do hope that we’ll have the chance to welcoming you back to the resort and invite you contacting me directly via jp.lovotti@accor.com to ensure that you enjoy a true Novotel Experience,  Warm regards,  JP Lovotti General Manager

title: A sold 4 Star property with 5 Star staff = excellent value
review: Our honeymoon in China was amazing. Now the second part in Thailand is turning out to a disaster.  Today we went to do a quick suit fitting and to our shock we were left stranded. We used the taxi service desk at the hotel but when we called the hotel before the manager looked into anything she told us to get another cab. No care given that we paid for the cab in cash beside their lobby desk!  Yesterday we had used the same service from the hotel where we were informed that the taxi would stay with us and take us back to hotel. That went fine and we even asked if the taxi could take us for somewhere to eat. The cabbie let us know that it would be extra which was fine. In the end we did our running around, got food and returned to the hotel. Taxi waiting with us the whole time.  …

title: Nice - but more for families then couples!
review: Dear Princess_Polly25,  We are sorry to read that you experience did not lift to your expectations, experiences related to your transfers from the hotel to the Karon District. Could we share that in both instances, you have reserved and paid for a one way transfer from the Resort to Karon, which was done and service provided accordingly. During your first trip, you have requested to the driver to be on standby and to stay with you during the time you were in town, service that you have paid directly to the driver, and without informing the hotel. On your second trip, you have not made this request to the driver and the transfer provided was as per your request: a one way transfer to Karon.  Also the service provided were always following your requests, we were sorry about the discomfort that you could have experienced. We have met you during your stay, and offered to extend courtesy services so you could relax and fully enjoy your holiday, which you have denied.  Once again, we are sorry that you would have felt this way and could reassure you that the Team is always committed to provide our Guests with experiences they Love.  Warm regards,  JP Lovotti General Manager

title: Best Birthday Trip
review: A sold 4 Star property with 5 Star staff = excellent value  Congratulations the fine team the management have woven together. There was not a single staff member I could fault, and I include the maintenance and behind the scenes staff. All showed that Thai Hospitality.  I had heard that Phuket had lost its “Thainess” and being overrun by a certain nationality - but in an 8 day stay – we saw none of that.      However, I would like to make special mention of Ms Moo in reservations for her quiet and kind efficiency.  She made things easy and prepared the grounds for a great stay.  We felt welcomed weeks before we even arrived, and that we in friendly, efficient hands already.   You can’t ask for more than that from your reservations staff.  So Ms Moo received our family “employee…

title: Delightful
review: Had a wonderful trip weather was great even though it was classed as the rainy season only had one day of rain but was still warm we had room 821 which overlooked the sea and is well worth asking for has a balcony also which was a bonus. Overall the food was good breakfast was great but the evening theme night's were a bit of a let down food could have done with being a bit warmer, the staff were great nothing a problem, big thanks to Patti on the reception team she was great kept us right with where to go and always took time to speak to us and ask if everything ok a real assett to the hotel. The wife had a daily massage which she says was heavonly

title: Totally  Amazed.
review: We have a hotel pick up booked and the hotel representative was waiting outside of the airport building while most of the other hotel representatives were waiting for their guests in the building... We found her eventually but the van we booked was late and having to wait in the humid and sticky weather outside the airport was really uncomfortable...  We booked 2 plunge pool rooms for 4 nights this time...the priority check in counter lady was busy dealing with queries so was complete ignoring us and had no time to deal with Le Club Accor members checking in...  We were however quickly served and checked in through the normal counter...still very old fashion where guests stand and wait in line to check in instead of sitting down....  We got just the usual welcome drink vouchers…

title: Great for a family trip
review: Dear 8KKC8,  At Novotel Phuket Karon, our objective is to create experience all our guests love.  Reading your review, we have let you down, and I am sincerely sorry that you trip did not meet any of your expectations.  We do hope that we would have the opportunity to welcoming you back again and would invite you to contact me directly via JP.LOVOTTI@accor.com as I would be pleased to personally assist you designing your next journey at Novotel Phuket Karon.  Best Regards,  JPL  Jean Philippe Lovotti  General Manager

title: What an excellent welcome
review: During our stay my wife and son both had a bit of a stomach upset.  This was caused by them eating out a restaurant and possibly the sudden climate change etc... I cannot say thank you enough to the food and drinks director at the hotel Mr Slavo for his kindness and sincere concern for my family's Health. Upon finding out their condition after myself speaking with him on the phone to request a late light breakfast in the room due to being up most of the night, he confirmed to myself that this will not be a problem at all, and personally visited us in our room.  He went out of his way to prepare remedy food that will assist in my family getting better. His concern was genuine and he advised on what to eat and what not to eat. Hands on Heart my wife and son followed his advice,…

title: first time in Phuket
review: Went on a Luxury Escapes package, and enjoyed the complimentary massage for two of us.  Our masseurs, Kate and Tong were lovely and listened to our needs.  Very relaxing way to spend an hour.  The resort is close walking distance to a few really lovely restaurants, overlooking the lovely beach - nice for sunset drinks.

title: Here are the Pros and Cons
review: Dear Value Customer, Many thanks for your kind review. We were more than happy to know that you had a great stay with us and we'll be sure to pass on your kind compliments to Khun Kate and Khun Tong at Novotel Phuket Karon. We are definitely looking forward to welcoming you back again here soon. Warm regards, JPL Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: great family holiday, thanks Novotel!
review: I travelled with my friend and stayed here for 6nights in separate rooms (no kids). We are first time visitors to Phuket. We travelled in the low season.  PROS: -	The Main pool was very warm (no cold shock) and it was family friendly. Guests   brought their blow up pool toys. Also had a swim up bar but I didn’t use it. I loved the pool. -	Good shower, firm bed & soft pillows, just what I like.  -	Wi-Fi worked well on my IPad & phone. Sometimes when you get back to the hotel, you have to click on Safari to reconnect.  -	Security was great – they have security to escort you walking across the road through the busy traffic. My room could be double locked with a chain as well. I felt safe at all times and was able to sleep like a baby.  -	Free Shuttle bus to Patong at 12, 3 and 6pm.…

title: A great place to stay
review: Dear Value Customer, Thank you for your wonderful feedback. We love reading how much you have enjoyed your stay at the Resort, should it be for the Facilities and services, but most importantly for the dedicated attention from our Teams. I will certainly share your encouraging comments with our team members. They will be more than happy to know that we made a positive impact to your stay. title: Nice and friendly family hotel
review: The hotel is not at a centre of Karon beach but yet in a walking distance to local restauran. We were offered room upgrade on arrival. Very comfortable beds and pillows. Modern spacious rooms. Hotel offers plenty of activities for all ages. Great kids club. Nice gym. Swimming pools are very well looked after. Helpful stuff. The beach is just across the road and there's traffic assistant at the hotel  who will help you and your kids to cross the road. Breakfast is very satisfying. The only thing we found a bit awkward was a glass wall between the bedroom and bathroom.  We stayed for 5 nights and it was not enough, very happy and will come back nexxt time when in Karon!

title: Family Holiday in Thailand
review: We stayed at the Novotel due to its location...just a quick walk down to the main street along the beachfront.  Loads of restaurants to choose from!  The hotel itself was well appointed and the pools were great for our family...particularly the pool slide in the kids pool.  We had a two room suite for our accommodation which worked out just great...mum and dad in a separate room...kids in lounge/sitting room on bed and trundle.  Staff were extremely friendly and helpful and we all enjoyed the breakfast buffet each morning.

title: Good for a few nights
review: Dear Janine636,  Many thanks for taking the time to share your experience online. I am glad to read that you enjoyed your family stay and that you enjoyed your spacious and modern room. Indeed, the resort features 3 swimming pools, and the water slide is an all-time favorite among our little guests. I shall not miss sharing your praise for Breakfast buffet with our Chef. We will look forward to welcome you back to your Holiday Home’. Feel Welcome to contact me directly via jp.lovotti@accor.com to design your next stay at Novotel Phuket Karon. Warmest regards, JPL Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Winter holiday break
review: Found this place ok. I didn't like how the pools were so spread out and their happy hour rules were weird and not clear. Also the happy hours changed- why not just have happy hour at all the bars at the same time. Confusing. Taxis from the hotel were expensive compared to a taxi or tuk tuk down the road. Lunch from champion bar was Nice but expensive. Much cheaper to walk into town plenty of nice restaurants. Breakfast was pretty good kids always love a pancake machine! Would probably try somewhere else next time.

title: Novotels normal high standard
review: Dear Thetraveller789,  Thank you for sharing your experience with other travelers. We are happy that you had an overall good stay at the resort. Be sure that I will share your suggestion regarding happy hours with our Food & Beverage Manager. Regarding the food prices, we conduct regular benchmark on the island to be sure to offer the best quality/price to our guests. We do hope to have a chance to welcome you back in the future.  Sincerely, JPL Jean-Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Great family resort
review: We both had a great stay,a couple on plus's and negatives. Firstly the Jet Lag massages were the best ever!! My partner stepped on a piece of small glass coming in from the plunge pool which cut her foot slightly,which we reported to reception.They were most caring and a day later we received a complimentary I hr massage we much appreciated.I unfortunately got sick from eating outside the hotel(ANN House,just down the road),staff again were most caring ,with the offer of tablets and hydralite etc,so thank you. Staff at the front reception were fantastic ,no matter what day or time. Couple of small negatives,First few days we had to battle with room cleaners to leave at least 4 coffee satchets daily,they were only leaving one or two,anyway all sorted,not sure what their…

title: Very pleasant stay
review: My family of 4 stayed here in late July. We were very pleasantly surprised with the size of our family room. The staff were very helpful and welcoming and there was always someone to help us cross the busy road when we needed to. The children loved the pools and there were plenty to choose from. The grouting does need doing in the main pool, I snagged my costume getting out. The buffet breakfast was delicious and plentiful. We always got there early enough to get a table no problem, but there was usually a bit of a queue when we left. There are a series of little eateries by the beach which we ate in regularly which was a lot more cost effective than eating at the hotel. The only negative point I would give is the lack of signing for the gym. I had nearly talked myself out of…

title: Fantastic stay would recommend 100%
review: Dear Victoria S,  Thank you for sharing your feedback online. We always love to read how much you have enjoyed your holiday with us. We aim to offer the best products and services to our guests, and we couldn’t be happier to know that you spent great holidays with us.  Looking forward to welcoming you again.  Warm regards, JPL Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Great holiday at Novotel Karon beach
review: Beautiful hotel with friendly staff, great food and a location that's away from the hustle of the town but close enough to not cause any problems. Booking excursions was simple and had a great selection on offer.   The breakfasts each morning were something to look forward to, the amount of selection was overwhelming with all of it being fresh.  The room itself did have a few minor problems such as the smell of sewage from the drains every so often (which is pretty standard anywhere in Phuket it seemed) but still felt like a welcome retreat from a busy day and was beyond comfortable!  If you're coming to Phuket and you're looking for relaxation look no further than Novotel

title: Beautiful hotel, beautiful staff
review: Dear Ksaunders97,  Thank you very much for your Fantastic review. I am glad to read that you enjoyed your stay at Novotel Phuket Karon Beach and appreciate the buffet breakfast, with its large choice of local and international food items. I will certainly share your comments with my team. We will look forward to welcome you back to your Holiday Home’. Feel Welcome to contact me directly via jp.lovotti@accor.com to design your next stay at Novotel Phuket Karon. Warm regards, JPL Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Great Hotel and Great People...
review: Brilliant hotel, lovely staff as are all Thai people, great swimming pools the kids loved. Breakfast buffet was well stocked with all types of food. Bar food was cheap and really good.  Only slight downside was the drinks in the hotel bars which were too expensive (even more expensive than Central London). There were only limited happy hours when the drinks were cheaper. Overall though would definitely go back again.

title: Great Family Hotel
review: Stayed at Novotel Karon Beach July 2017. Nice property, lots of pools, great service, reasonable breakfast, great kids club, great Thai food and kids meals but only okay western adult food (burgers were good but the ribs and chicken wings were very ordinary).   Our family really enjoyed staying in this hotel.  Special mentions for Kitty (kids club) and Mint (food and beverage).

title: Great Hotel in a Great Location
review: Dear MajorSolution70,  Thanks for you sharing your experience with other travelers. We couldn’t be happier to read that you had a great family stay at Novotel Phuket Karon. Indeed, the resort offers a large choice of activities and facilities for children: Kid’s Club, Water Slide, cooking class and more. I will certainly share your encouraging comment with Kitty and Mint. The team and I are looking forward to welcoming you again, and I will be happy to help you design your next stay at Novotel Phuket Karon. Warmest regards JPL Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Still not bad!
review: We booked four deluxe rooms, they were immaculate. The hotel is ideally located in Karon, well within walking distance of the centre of Karon town. Without exception every member of the Novotel Karon staff were genuinely friendly and really helpful. The breakfast was superb. We spent most of our time around the sports bar and sports bar swimming pool. The guy behind the bar who was there most days and evenings looked after my family like royalty. When we revisit Phuket we will definitely, without hesitation, rebook this hotel. Thanks for a great stay Novotel Karon Beach.

title: Good Location
review: Dear Neil S,  Many thanks for your great review. We are glad that you enjoyed your stay at Novotel Phuket Karon thanks to our team genuine services and the benefit of our location. The buffet breakfast, with its large choice of local and international food items is always popular among our Guests, and I will certainly share your comments with our Culinary team. title: holiday
review: This is my second time residing at this hotel ever since Last year. Hotel amenities does not seems change much, whereas, the service standards are still superb. Location and security of the hotel are excellent as well.  However, room seems to be comfortable but the toiletries are not comprehensively enough for a 4 - 5 stars resort. Since, this is of the best resort at karon beach, I will definitely stay here again when I returned.

title: Overall lovely stay
review: The Good/Great:  * Acceptance of the Scoopon inclusions: I buy a lot of Scoopon/Cudo/etc... vouchers for meals and activities but this is the first holiday I've done this way. I specifically chose a Novotel hoping their generally good standard of service would extend to Scoopon customers and I was not disappointed. Within 30 minutes of purchasing the Scoopon (we booked the dates when we bought the voucher) we had an email from the hotel confirming the booking and the inclusions and offering additional information. On check in we were given the vouchers for our included meals, drinks and massages. All staff seemed to be fully informed of the need to accept the vouchers, we never had any trouble.   * Main pool: large, beautiful and varied so kept our 6 year old entertained for…

title: Great staff and comfortable rooms
review: Dear teresha,  Many thanks for sharing your experience online. It is a pleasure reading how much you have enjoyed the living space and comfort of rooms, as well as the modern facilities, or the warm services from our team. We are delighted that you could have made the most of the activities proposed at the Resort, from the movies sessions, yoga classes, SPA offers. Our Culinary team is also dedicated to the pleasure of our Guests and we love reading how much you have enjoyed their cuisine. We will look forward to welcoming you back soon and invite you contacting me directly via jp.lovotti@accor.com to design your next journey, Warm regards, JPL Jean-Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Good stay!
review: The Novotel was a good stay. We stayed in the basic rooms with a Garden View. The bed was very comfortable. Housekeeping will come and clean your room each day but don't expect it to be cleaned until late morning/early afternoon. The staff were outstanding and always ready to service. It's a good location - not too far from town (10 min walk) but not in the thick of it. The only real let down was the very poor wifi that dropped in and out often. We were in room 3307 but when we got near reception it was much better. The winner for this hotel is the staff.

title: Good

Our staff will be thrilled to know that their commitment was the highlight of your stay. Regarding WIFI connection, we are consistently upgrading our WiFi and related services to keep up with the increasing demand. We will look forward to welcoming you again in the near future. title: Not Great - wouldn't return
review: Service in this hotel was amazing. Thanks to Jay in the pool bar, Sun in the restaurant, Katherine in the kids club. I've forgotten a few names but thanks again.   The kids club was great and loved option for movies in the day aswell and characters visiting at breakfast time was enjoyable for children. We used babysitting services and happy with that too.   The swimming pools and pool bars awesome too! Happy hour is a must by the pool. Unfortunately the tiles in pool can be quite slippery and sharp and my husband and uncle cut themselves open so maybe swimming shoes for children.   The suite we stayed in was beautiful. Unfortunately we got rained out. We left to another suite in a rush and left some clothes and shoes in a closet! These were never too be seen again which was…

title: Good
review: We stay for 4 nights. Check-in staffs was not friendly. Great Location, away from busy area Patong, but quick taxi ride will get you there. Free Wifi but really slow. Room was spacious and clean. Beautiful pool area.  Overall is good.

However, I am sorry for the discomfort you may have experienced during check-in. Be sure that I will emphasize on staff training to avoid this matter in the future. title: Disappointing for a Novotel
review: My Family and i just returned home after a wonderful 10 night stay in a plunge pool suite , we found all aspects of the hotel fantastic,  the staff couldnt do enough for you, the accommodation itself was great and we all loved the location at Karon Beach !!  Huge thank you to the staff for making this the best holiday we have ever had !!  Cant wait to return again next year !!  regards  ☺☺☺☺

title: Potential
review: This was not the relaxing break we had hoped for.  We liked the modern, spacious rooms (but had to move when water through a light fitting could not be resolved), the large bed, beautiful bed linen and modern bathroom, the great welcome and helpful staff.  However, Wifi continued to be a problem throughout our stay, although Management did try its best to resolve this.  And, there was nothing Management could do about the chaotic, overcrowded, non air conditioned breakfast each morning.  With no option to sit outside, we stewed lightly each morning on chairs with filthy upholstery and did battle with a constantly empty pancake machine and items not replenished on the buffet quickly enough.  It was a fiasco, far from the relaxing start anyone would wish for on their holiday.  The…

title: Nice Hotel But Maybe There's Better
review: We are staying at the Novotel Karon Beach for 9 nights.  The hotel is very clean and has been modernised so feels quite contemporary for a Thailand hotel.  The Thai are beautiful people and this applies to all the the staff here.  House keeping is twice a day which is great when you have sand coming in from the beach.   The beach is across the road (quite a busy road but on most occasions there was a security guard to hold back the traffic and assist a safe passage).  While the beach is across the road, when we went, the swimming flags were about 300 metres walk to the left and right.  I wouldn't recommend swimming outside of the flags as the current in the water was very strong and the waves also bowled us over on occasion.   There are fantastic amenities at the hotel like…

title: Great stay
review: Dear icklefritz,  Thanks for sharing your thoughts online. I am glad that you enjoyed the hotel design, the facilities and our team sincere services and care. I will certainly share your encouraging comments with them. As you rightfully mention, the resort proposes a wide range of activities for both adults and children: Yoga, Muay Thai, cooking classes among others. You can also walk 5-min to Karon village, where there is dozen of restaurants, market, bars, and shops. Could we share that the sea conditions varies with the season and that security recommendations are in place by the local authorities to inform guests and minimize the risk of incident. On the other hand, the sea conditions are among the best on the island during high season; Karon beach being recognized as one of the Best in the Region. Regarding Patong area, we do provide free shuttle to/from Paton 3 times per day. The team and I are looking forward to welcoming you again, and I will be happy to help you design your next stay at Novotel Phuket Karon. Warmest regards JPL Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Wonderful Stay, Wonderful Hospitality
review: Highly recommend this Resort to families with kids. We had an excellent experience at the Resort: our little one enjoyed the pools and kids club. My husband and myself liked fitness classes. Staff was amazing: reception, fitness instructors and kids club ladies were helpful and  friendly.  Our room was spacious and clean. Location is good, close to the beach and local restaurants and shops. The highlight for us was the pool's cleanness; it was a pleasure to swim in clean water with no strong chlorine or any other chemicals smell.  Thank you, we will be definitely back one day...

title: Excellent stay
review: Dear Irina,  Many thanks for your great review. We are glad to read that you enjoyed your family stay at the resort thanks to our team sincere services and the benefit of our location. Indeed, the water slide at the Kid’s pool is an all-time favorite among our little guests. I will certainly share your encouraging comments with the team. We will look forward to welcoming you back and I invite you to contact me directly via jp.lovotti@accor.com to design you next journey at Novotel Phuket Karon. Sincerely, JPL Jean-Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Another Fantastic Stay - 3 Years In A Row
review: Our family of four stayed for five nights in room 4215, next to the breakfast buffet and elevator. The hotel was beautiful and very family friendly! the staff really work hard and make the experience what it is. Special thanks to Paula, Waew, Pink, Jan, Rinnie, Nu and many others for going beyond the basics and trying to make us as happy as possible during our first trip to Thailand and any Novotel hotel. Night manager Paula (dressed in black) at the front desk helped me book a diving trip and spent a great deal of time and effort confirming the details with the dive shop (Eco Divers). Everything went well! Paula's English is very good, so we went to her whenever we needed help. Most of their staff seemed to be multilingual and were all extremely cordial and represent the…

title: Hospitable Hotel
review: I stayed here couple of days and I feel like home the hotel was very accommodating. First day I arrived Izzy from the front office assisted me with a warm smile I was in the prioty check in that time, she was very helpful and kind she upgraded me to a much bigger room for I requested my room be accessible to all outlets.  Staff assisted me up to my room 4114 I was amazed how big the family room was but I'm quite disappointed, the room was not that good... though it's clean but not well maintained I tried to check the bathroom and smelled stinky I called the housekeeper to clean it again she brought some scented oil burners to remove the unpleasant smell.  Pool was very nice I like the idea of the waiter button on each table that helps to call the waiter/staff without standing…

title: Great location rooms a little run down.
review: Dear Nico N,  Many thanks for your review. We are glad to read that you enjoyed your stay at Novotel Phuket Karon, thanks to our team since services. May I share with you than our burger won the 2nd prize at Phuket Best Burger Competition 2017. I will certainly share your encouraging comments with the team members, especially Joke and Izzy. They will be more than happy to know that they made you feel like home. Thank you once again for choosing us for your holiday and we are looking forward to welcoming you back to your ‘Holiday Home’. Feel Welcome to contact me directly via jp.lovotti@accor.com. I will be pleased to facilitate the organization of your next visit. Warmest regards, JPL Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: A wonderful place to stay in Phuket
review: The rooms are a little run down and smell a little of mildew.  Our shower did not work properly.  The drinks and food was exorbitantly expensive.  The pools were good.  I went and visited the Mandarava resort down the road.  If I had a choice I would stay there as it looked magnificent and around the same price. The staff were not that friendly, especially the egg cook in the morning.  The breakfasts were a little average compared to some of the buffet ones I had at other resorts.

title: Comfortable
review: Dear brettapettingill,  Thanks for sharing your experience online. At Novotel, we are dedicated to creating experiences our guests love, we are truly sorry to read that your experience at the Resort couldn’t meet your expectations. Be sure that I will take your comments into consideration for further improvement, as we strive towards excellence. We do hope that we’ll have the chance welcoming you back in the future and I invite you contacting me directly via jp.lovotti@accor.com then. Warm regards, JPL Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Excellent family friendly hotel
review: A wonderful resort  I booked two rooms for a family trip based on reviews on Tripadvisor and I must say this is one of the best places I have visited. From the start to the end everything was perfect. We had one Plunge Pool and one Deluxe room, I must say the pool in the room is wonderful, it was so good that I didnt even use the pools in the resort. My sons enjoyed their Kids play room as well, its very nice and clean.  The food served is very good, they have separate kids menu as well. The breakfast served was quite lavish with many options. They have 4 restaurants serving different menu options which were too good.  The Inbalance spa was wonderful. Though the Gym is a little under equipped but that really doesn't matter when you are on a vacation.  The place is very near to…

title: Great stay
review: We really love the room, very spacious and clean. Kids love the plunge pool. WiFi connection is fast and friendly staffs. The location is about out of the way but l a little bit of travelling is fine.

title: Nice resort
review: Dear Rose C,  Thank you for your great feedback. We are glad that you and your family enjoyed your spacious and comfy plunge pool suite, and our team’s hospitality. The team and I are looking forward to welcoming you again, and I will be happy to help you design your next stay at Novotel Phuket Karon. Warmest regards JPL Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Can recommend for all particularly for families.
review: Before I start my review on the hotel, I need to warn you about the dangers of the beach here, after nearly getting swept away in the sea!  It is very dangerous- only after nearly drowning, I checked the statistics for victims of drowning at Karon beach and I was horrified- please be careful, you have been warned!  The hotel itself is modern, with spacious rooms and a lovely layout.  We had adjoining rooms and on the first day, both toilets in the rooms blocked and overflowed and we had to get maintenance in to fix them- this happened on another occasion a couple of days later also. The rooms were not cleaned to a good standard, with the towels not changed, despite being left on the floor and the bed linen wasn't changed- it was only cleaned properly when I stayed in the room…

title: Good Stay
review: Dear choonkaloonks,  Thank you for sharing your thoughts online. I am glad to read that you enjoy your holiday in your spacious and modern room. As you rightfully mention, the resort is located in a quiet area, just across the beautiful Karon Beach, and our security guard help our guests to cross the road 24/7. Could we share that the sea conditions varies with the season, and that security recommendations are in place by the local authorities to inform guests and minimize the risk of incident. On the other hand, the sea conditions are among the best on the island during high season; Karon beach being recognized as one of the Best in the Region. I will also share your nice comments with the team; they will be thrilled to know that their commitment was the highlight of your stay. However, I am sincerely sorry for the discomfort you may have encountered on your arrival to your room. Be sure that we are taking correctives measures to address this issue. The team and I are looking forward to welcoming you again, and I will be happy to help you design your next stay at Novotel Phuket Karon. Warmest regards JPL Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: 7 Great nights at Novotel Karon
review: From the time of arrival at reception, when we were handed cold towels and a drink I expected to have a good time. I was not disappointed. Wonderful caring staff at times went beyond the call of duty. The rooms were spacious and clean. The breakfast buffet was a mixture of European and Asian, plenty of choices, and it was great to try some of the Asian breakfasts. The only downer was erratic Wi-Fi which tended to drop out sometimes. After  casually mentioning the problem to a waiter, unexpectedly a technician turned up to remedy the issue. I would return there as a priority choice, and recommend it to all.

title: Wonderful resort
review: Its awesome resort, good facilities and staff. Beach is just across the road. Offers free drop to market area for shopping and fun. Vegetarian food options are very limited, whatever I got was tasty. I would suggest hotel to include more Indian Vegetarian dishes in the menu.  Pool and Pool side bar is just amazing.

title: Really enjoyable experience
review: Dear Ameya S Thank you for your wonderful feedback. We are happy to read how much you enjoyed your stay at Novotel Phuket Karon Beach, thanks to our facilities and the genuine sense of hospitality of our Teams. I will certainly take you suggestion into accounts regarding the Vegetarian food option. We will look forward to welcoming you back soon and invite you contacting me directly via jp.lovotti@accor.com as I would be delighted assisting you designing your next journey, Warm regards, JPL Jean-Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Mr.madyousop aiadtam
review: The Novotel Karon Beach Resort and Spa was primarily booked because I was looking to utilise my Accor Plus membership on a Karon Beach property. The reception area is classy and very well maintained. I found the check in process to be straightforward and the staff both friendly and efficient. In fact all our interactions with a wide range of staff over our five day stay were happy and engaging. Our enquiries on a couple of issues were resolved within a few minutes. We would like to acknowledge to promptness of the brekky crew in servicing our needs each morning. We utilised the InBalance Spa each day and would like to especially record our thanks to their receptionist Nuch for her outgoing welcomes each time and the design of our treatments - we all found the masseuses to be…

title: Good hotel. Close to the beach.
review: Dear G_Landsell,  Thank you for sharing your experience online. We are happy that you enjoyed your stay at the resort, and glad that you have experienced the genuine sense of hospitality of our Teams. They are dedicated to create experiences our Guests Love and it is our pleasure to read your appreciation. Regarding the cleanliness of your room, I will certainly share your words with our housekeeping team, they will be glad to know that they have contributed to your perfect stay! We will look forward to welcome you again in the future. Feel Welcome to give me an e-call via jp.lovotti@accor.com to facilitate the organization of your next holiday. title: Best family holiday ever!
review: This hotel is the greatest hotel in Phuket . Staff are so cute and  smiling  all the time especially there are one guy he was speaking to me in Arabic that's very fantastic Thai guy but speak my language .I'm so appreciate to staying here .The room very beautiful and also the swimming pool .i promise I will come back to this hotel again .love live love  "buhari"

title: A Notable Novotel
review: We just stayed here for 1 night, would have liked to stay for longer but unfortunately they were fully booked.  Our room was very large, good quality bed linen and a great shower.  The location of our room was quite close to the road and you could hear some road noise at night so I would recommend trying to get a room away from that part of the hotel if you can.

title: Not disabled friendly
review: Dear claret78, Many thanks for sharing your experience with other travelers. It’s a pleasure to read how much you enjoyed your spacious and comfy room. However, we are sorry that you could have been affected by some noise level from the Karon district. The Resort is located on a beautiful landscape and we would be pleased to accommodate you in a more quiet area next time. Feel welcome to get in touch with me at jp.lovotti@accor.com to facilitate the organization of your upcoming journey. Sincerely, JPL Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Great staff, quieter location.
review: Stay here for 6 nights we booked a room with a plunge pool , on arrival they said we hadn't paid for the upgrade they wanted to see the card we use to pay , but it had to be replaced as it went through the washing machine ,they couldn't understand we even showed them the bank account on the laptop , when we did get to the room the plunge pool had just one step into a 4 ft pool and no hand rails,I am  4 months post Anterior cruciate ligament hamstring graft so it would have been impossible for me to get in and out , we asked for a normal room with walk in shower which we did get in the end, refund for upgrade will take a least a month we have been told, breakfast not a lot of choice if you don't wanna eat fruit, only one lift in the whole building , had food poising was up all…

title: Perfect relaxing holiday!
review: Dear karen1963, Thank you for your review. At Novotel Phuket Karon, we are dedicated to create experiences all our Guests Love. Reading your review, I am sincerely sorry for the discomfort you may have experienced during your stay. Please rest assured that I am taking your remarks into account to address the issue you have highlighted. We do hope that we will have an opportunity to welcome you again. Sincerely, JPL Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Great stay and great staff with very comfortable rooms
review: The staff are amazing we really had good service from everyone, we travelled with a toddler and all the staff loved her. They have a good kids club and awesome baby sitters- we had Katty sit for us. The resort itself is close to the beach, we went a couple of times (there is a security guard that helps you cross the road) but preferred to just swim in one of the pools. The food costs alittle more at the resort but it is really good, we did the Italian themed evening and the chef cooked us some fresh pasta. Would say it was the best meal we had in or out of the resort. the breakfasts are great too, lots of choice and the chef's are happy to cook your style of eggs. We had a superior room at the rear of the property and it was quiet, close to the kids pool so perfect for us.…

title: awesome resort,perfect location and very friendly staff!!!
review: We have been in Novotel 6 days and we enjoy it a lot! We booked plunge pool suite, This suite is for 2 people more then enought (pool with massage huge bathroom, living room, bedroom)  See you next time and thanks for very nice stay!!!

title: Great holiday
review: Dear Dominik T Thank you for your wonderful review. I couldn’t be happier to read that you enjoyed your plunge pool suite and the genuine sense of hospitality of our Teams. I will certainly share your comment with our them, they will be glad to know that they have contributed to your perfect stay. Feel Welcome to contact me directly at jp.lovotti@accor.com I will be pleased to facilitate the organisation of your next journey. Tropical regards, Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Nice resort hotel for couples
review: Excellent resort, food and facilities. Very clean resort. Staff were so friendly and helpful. Three swimming pools and kid friendly and across road from beautiful Karon Beach. Within easy access to Patong.

title: Super place, especially if you are going with kids
review: Dear Stephen W Thank you for sharing your journey with us. It is our utmost pleasure to read how much you have loved your stay thanks to the true sense of Hospitality from our Teams, and our 3 swimming pools. Indeed, Karon beach is a one of the most beautiful beaches in Phuket. We will look forward to welcome you back to your Holiday Home’. Feel Welcome to contact me directly via jp.lovotti@accor.com to design your next stay at Novotel Phuket Karon. Warmest regards, JPL Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Nice resort,poor location
review: Hotel was well maintained & staff was really friendly. My room was spacious with all the necessity that you need. Reception and room service was very professional. Breakfast was good with a good variety of choice. The rooftop bar however was always close so we had to use the pool bar instead which close at 11.30 which was a shame if you wanted to stay later. They offer a free shuttle bus to Patong which was good. The one downside here was the wifi was not that great & was always cutting out. Would highly recommend this hotel.

title: Excellent and professional staff
review: My family and I spent 2 weeks at this great hotel. Which is perfect for both families with young children and for couples.   Buy their SPA-treatments, it's worth every penny and I regret that I didn't use it more.  And I want to give a special thanks to Mint who works there, she took such great care of our daughter (9months old Felicia) if she was sad during dinner. Mint always made her laugh. Mint should get a raise!  Best regards Rasmus Nilsson & family

title: Lovely hotel
review: Dear Rasmus N, Thank you for your wonderful review. We are glad to read that you enjoyed your family holiday at Novotel Phuket Karon and that you had a great spa treatment. Indeed, our Spa Therapists are dedicated to provide comfort and well-being to our guests. I will certainly share your kind words with the team and especially K. Mint, she will be glad to know that she delighted you stay.  The Team and I will look forward to your next visit and invite you contacting me directly then via jp.lovotti@accor.com  Tropical regards, JPL Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: A very good place for small children
review: Stayed at this hotel for 2 weeks, although we are on a main road there is a security guard who makes sure you are able to cross the road safely & there is a lovely beach nearby. Our room was quite spacious with a balcony but due to the level of traffic passing, we were not able to sit out for a quiet drink in the evening/ daytime.  Staff are very courteous & friendly & if your a late raiser, the maid is happy to change towels etc later in the day. Joe Kools bar was a good place to eat in the evenings, but don't eat too late as the buffet food goes very quickly.  Downside is the cost of taxi's ..... as they all seem to charge the same 400 bht, even if your going a short distance.   * Note The hotel charges the same price for a cab, there is no price reduction for being a guest*…

title: Very nice place
review: Dear Carol U Thank you for your lovely feedback. We are very happy to read your comments about our team genuine services and about the resort facilities. Indeed, our security guard is available 24/7 to help you cross the road safely. However, we are sorry that you could have been affected by some noise level from the Karon district. The Resort is located on a beautiful landscape and we would be pleased to accommodate you with your room is a more quiet area. It would be marvelous to welcome you again in the nearest future. Feel welcome to give me an e-call at jp.lovotti@accor.com to design your next visit in Phuket. Sincerely, JPL Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Stay away from Phuket
review: I like everything about this place. The room was clean and spacious, the pool was nice, they have great facilities for the kids, the thai food from their restaurant was so tasty, i also ordered their pizza twice from the sports bar. Its far enough from the busy and noisy area of Phuket.

title: A wonderful place
review: A wonderful, safe and clean place to stay . The staffs  from the front office to security, everyone is helpful. Rooms were clean and tidy,close to beach , market and shopping, recommend to anyone . They wonderful buffet dinners on a daily basis , tried one and it was very good . Buffet breakfast many choices and you are surrounded with choices and choices. Bar prices are steep , but again it's a premium hotel . Pool and its surrounding are beautiful and clean .

title: Amazing place
review: Dear kpshaju,   Many thanks for your wonderful feedback. We love reading how much you have enjoyed your holiday at Novotel Phuket Karon, should it be for the dedicated attention of our Team, or for the relaxing atmosphere of our resort. As you rightfully mention, the resort is ideally located  in a greenery and quiet area, steps from Karon District where you can find local boutiques,  markets, as well as a large selection of restaurants and bars. Our Culinary team will be very happy to hear your comments regarding  their theme night buffet. Could we share with you that we also offer Happy Hours on beverages, at our bars and restaurants.. title: One of the best stay ever
review: 6 nights of absolute perfection Great breakfast  Amazingly friendly helpful staff and room was brilliant  Wifi was a bit hot and miss  Location was perfect across road from beach  Would not hesitate to stay again

title: Beautiful, Best service, great facility
review: Dear Lynda2015,   Thank you for sharing your feedback online. We are more than happy to read that you enjoyed your stay, thanks to the delicious breakfast buffet and  our team services. title: Very pleasant resort - recommended
review: Had the best stay at Novotel. Being a vegetarian, it was hard to find a vegetarian hotel in Phuket, place being surrounded by sea food. Novotel had wonderful Vegetarian cuisine helping us enjoy our stay.

title: Fantastic place and outstanding staff
review: I lived 2 weeks in this beautiful hotel, and lived on my own there.   The surroundings is fantastic and the beautiful beach is close to the hotel.   The staff was really outstanding and wonderful people. They were always ready to help if needed  I really have to come back to this place and I can highly recommend it to others

title: Great Family Orientated Resort
review: Dear Krammedyret,   Thank you for your fantastic feedback!  I am delighted reading how much you have loved your stay at the Resort, and glad that you could have experienced the genuine sense of hospitality of our Team members.
