title: Great stay
review: We recently had a family holiday in Thailand and stayed six nights at the Novotel Karon Beach Resort. We found this hotel great value for money and a nice quiet location within a easy 5 to 10 minute walk to the town area for markets and eating options. An area for improvement was that we booked two connecting rooms and one room had a shower in the bath with a maximum height of less than 1.80 metres and a shower head that only went to approximately 1.5 metres. As the resort was fully booked, we did not have an option to relocate rooms.  Also, as is normal practice at resorts, it is frustrating to find all pool side couches reserved by people who normally found their way down to the pool around 11.00am leaving those who got up early struggling to get one. This is an issue for all…

title: Great family hotel
review: Dear Gleneen,   Thank you for sharing your experience online. We are delighted that you had a great time with us, thanks to our team genuine services and the benefit of our location. As you rightfully mention, the resort is ideally located in the Karon District, where you can find local boutiques, temples, night markets, as well as a large selection of restaurants and bars. Our team members will be glad to know they have delighted your stay. We will certainly share your great feedback with them, with special mention to Culinary team. I hope that we will have a chance to welcome you again. Feel welcome to get in touch with me via jp.lovotti@accor.com.   Tropical regards,  JPL  Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Nice hotel close to the beach
review: Spent 2 weeks at the Novotel for my birtrhday and loved every minute of it. The villa with the private plunge pool is a must. The staff, service and food were excellent throughout our stay which is difficult to do when guests are staying for that long. Can't wait to return next year.

title: Very good hotel
review: This hotel was amazing. We booked the standard room and room was nice You get 2 small bottles of water daily Breakfast is a mixture of east n western. We have to wait to be seated and no air con which it could do. There was a variety Staff are friendly and always smiling and helpful Good pools including children Its 15mins to patong. Mainly for shopping where we went most of the time Free courtsey buses unfortunately just 3x a day. 12om 3pm and 6om Return times 12.30 pick up n 3.30 and 6.30pm from hard rock cafe Some ppl would like to go out to vars and the hotel could do offering the free shuttke buses say anither 2 or times like 10am and 7pm and 9pm or 10pm or another one after that. Let down is they have 1 bus. Only max 13 which is not goid as should offer more buses. This…

title: Excellent hotel and nice location
review: Dear londonBradford,   I’m pleased to read that you had a great time with us and that you could have experienced our team warm services and care. As you rightfully mentioned, the resort is located just across the beautiful Karon Beach, and our security guard help guests to cross the road 24/7.  Please rest assured that we are taking your comments into account regarding the breakfast buffet area and the free shuttle bus services to Patong. We are looking forward to welcoming you again. Feel welcome to get in touch with me directly at jp.lovotti@accor.com to facilitate the organization of your next holidays.   Tropical regards,   JPL   Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Nice hotel but busy
review: I stayed 3 nights. Staffs were very kind and cooperative. The room was clean. The pool was big and clean too. I have really good memory of this vacation, thanks to Novotel. The location is nice as well. You can just cross the road then you have the beach. You can walk along the beach to go to Karon village. We could book the activity at the Coral island, taxi from+to the airport with Novotel. They made our vacation very easy.   One thing I want Novotel to improve is to have more hangers in the bathroom or at the balcony. As we play in the water everyday, we need hanger to dry the cloths. There was only 2 hanger in the bathroom and it was just right above the toilet paper which is not a place you can hang something with full of water. No hanger available apart from this... I wish…

title: Great hotel and location - bad timing though, Australian School Holidays
review: Dear Ga-young,   Thank you for your  feedback. We are delighted to read your holiday’s experience at Novotel Phuket Karon. Indeed, the resort benefits for a premium location, steps from Karon Beach and few minutes from Karon village.  Our team members would be more than happy to know that they enhanced your stay thanks to their kind services. I will certainly share your words with them, with special mention to Housekeeping. The team and I will look forward to welcoming you again. Feel welcome to give me an e-call at jp.lovotti@accor.com.    Warmest regards,   JPL   Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Phuket April 2017
review: We are a family with one teenager and a younger kid. The hotel area is fairly large with three pool areas and three restaurants. We had a suite consisting of two rooms of good size and one shared bathroom. Beds are ok and so are the pillows. There is closets in both rooms.   The hotel is family friendly with a kids club and kids eat free. You can also buy a 299++ card allowing kids to drink and eat whenever they want plus access to the kids club.  Breakfast is good with a variety of different western and Asian disks. Food is mostly Western and generally good. I like the concept of having a different buffet every night for a decent price.  The hotel lies close to the beach but in order to get to the beach you have to cross a road that is fairly busy. Luckily there are guards that…

title: Great for families, not for couples looking for a relaxing break.
review: I was really looking forward to this leg of our Thailand trip and I'm pleased we selected Karon Beach as a location - it's much calmer than other areas of Phuket.    As a couple without kids I definitely wouldn't stay here again though as this hotel is absolutely aimed at families once you get here which isn't publicised on the website.    We don't mind small children but the overwhelming majority of occupants had small families which means lots of noise - each morning we would be woken by kids crying or screaming in the pool area. The queue for breakfast everyday took ages as there were families there who would take forever to dine trying to stop their kids just having the donuts for breakfast and the restaurant in the evening had kids movies on so it wasn't quite the…

title: We stayed hear in April 2 adults & 1child had a lovely time.
review: Dear vacationqueen1980  Thank you for sharing your experience in details. At Novotel Phuket Karon, we are dedicated to create experiences all our Guests Love. We are sorry that you could have felt that the resort was more designed towards receiving families. The resort was actually designed to offer every guest a place to relax, chill out or to have fun. Three swimming pools away from each other and offering a different atmosphere (Lagoon Pool at the Heart of the Resort, Oasis Pool is a perfect place for couples, and the Kids Pools with its Waterslide to entertain the little ones). Regarding the spa treatments, they are performed by professional therapists to ensure the well-being and security of our guests, which could certainly explain the difference of prices. May I share with you that we offer daily Happy Hours, to allow our guests to enjoy more for less. I do wish we will have an opportunity to welcome you back at Novotel Phuket Karon. Feel Welcome to get in touch with me via jp.lovotti@accor.com.  Warm regards,  JPL  Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Paradise - Love it!
review: We stayed for 12 days in April great place to stay 3 pools a water slide . The food is very nice but  definitely cheaper to eat out, easy to get to other places. Easy to get good tours, and their is  security  to help cross the road, anyway thumbs up.

title: Family friendly property
review: Dear jlindon3,   Thank you for your 5-star review given to Novotel Phuket Karon. I’m pleased to know that you had a great family holiday thanks to our facilities and the Funtastic water slide at kids pool. As you rightfully mention, our security guard is available 24/7 to help you cross the road. The Karon district offers a large section of restaurants and Bars; with the restaurants and Bars of the Resort, our Guests are spoiled for choice... we are also conducting frequent benchmark with the other resorts of the island to ensure that we provide the best value and quality for our Guests.  We will be glad to welcome you again, and I invite you to contact me directly at jp.lovotti@accor.com to facilitate the organization of your next holidays.    Tropical regards,   JPL     Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Package holiday with safety issues
review: My husband and I stayed here with our 2 children for 12 days in April. We had the most amazing time. We loved Novotel Karon Beach.   The staff were all amazing. Very friendly and helpful.  Reading a few other reviews from people saying service was slow and they had to ask several times for certain things. Those people need to seriously chill out abit hey. The staff are doing their absolute best.  Its quite a busy resort. Your drinks/ food WILL come.  Just learn some patience.  The rooms are massive.  We had a family room and it satisfied us 100%. Rooms were clean and tidy.  The only 1 thing I will say is we did get a room on the busy road side and it was a little loud but I don't think there is much they can do about that. So if your fussy I recommend requesting a room away from…

title: Better than I was expecting
review: This is pretty good value for money in my opinion. We were in a Family room, and despite the kids bunk not being made up or having a ladder, it all worked out in the end. The pool areas was nice for relaxing, and playing (the kids pool has a slide which the kids enjoyed) and the lady at the pool bar made an excellent Mojito. The restaurants are decent and what you would expect, with good variety for all tastes. Breakfast in Horizon was standard fare, although the staff in that particular area of the hotel were not the friendliest.  The beach is across the road and is a nice calm, safe beach for kids, with a few basic eateries and bars scattered along it.  All in all, a good value for money hotel, well situated for day trips out, or for getting to and from the more hectic locales…

title: Awesome Resort... Mesmerising Stay... spellbound hospitality
review: Dear eagle79,  Thanks a lot for sharing your thought online. We love reading that you had a Funtastic family holiday at the Resort. Indeed, the Waterslide is an all-time favorite among our little guests. As for the Drinks around the poolside, the Resort is the perfect place to chillout. We do wish to have a chance to welcome you again and I invite you to give me an e-call via jp.lovotti@accor.com I will be pleased to facilitate the organisation of your next journey.  Sincerely,  JPL  Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Excellent Hotel for families!
review: Hello,  We have stayed in "Novotel Phuket Karon Beach Resort & Spa" from 26th march 2017 - 30th March 2017.  Have had one of our best holidays and perhaps the most memorable experience in here. Staring with the cab arrangement from airport to Novotel, we were supposed to reach phuket at 13:55 pm, but due to some last minute changes in out flight timing, have reached phuket @11:30. Post conveying the message to Novotel that we have reached early, they have arranged the cab asap. Once we reach Novotel, pleased by the way they welcome us, served us the complementary welcome drink. we have two rooms booked, and one of them was not ready yet, but they have handed us the key of one of our booked rooms instantly.  The rooms are quite big, having almost all the essentials things, very…

title: Only come here if you have kids.
review: Dear Subhro1986,  Many thanks for choosing us for your memorable holiday in Phuket. We love reading your words from the beginning to the end. I can assure you that your well-being is our first priority, and we always do our best to satisfy guest’s requests. I will certainly share your words with our team members. As you rightfully mention, our breakfast buffet features a large choice of both Asian and western dishes. Our Culinary team love delighting our guests with their cuisine. Thank you once again for the recommendation of Novotel Phuket Karon to other travelers. We couldn’t wait to seeing you enjoy your family holiday with us again. Feel welcome to contact me directly via jp.lovotti@accor.com I will be pleased to help you design your next journey in Phuket.  Sincerely,  JPL  Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Beautiful hotel
review: Traveled here with wife and kids. We all had a fab time! Thought the staff was very friendly and helpful. This hotel is away from the "party places" of Patong etc and perfect for families. It has multiple pools, and a kids play room etc. We stayed there for 4 nights. Did tours of Phuket on all those days and each tour had a pick-up from the Hotel and hence the location of the hotel did not matter. We did not try the spa so  cannot comment on it. My youngest kid had food poisoning on our final night and the staff went out of their way to make boiled rice for her during breakfast(Not in the menu). Very much appreciated. The Hotel had lovely buffet breakfast. One of the pools had a slide which was fun for the kids! They had decorated the bed for our kids with stuffed toys which my…

title: Amazing serivce, aging facilities
review: The staff at Novotel are amazing, particularly the spa staff. One of the best massages I've had. Our room needed some work though - the air conditioner leaked all over the floor and the bathroom smelled of sewage.

title: Great hotel close to the beach
review: We stay at novotel for a week in their pool suite. The room was excellent, very spacious and the plunge pool for the kids was great. Food was excellent and the chef Cyril was very attentive to the guest satisfaction. Our kids love him and are still asking for him. Also a good job to the concierge ( i forgot his name) who help me to fix my car and always very welcoming whenever we meet him. Keep it up!

title: Tour Desk
review: Dear radennovrita,  Thanks a lot for sharing your wonderful family holiday with us. I’m glad to read that you had a great time in your Plunge pool suite. I shall not miss sharing your comment with Chef Cyril and our team. Your kind words encourage us to continuously deliver excellent services to our guests. We will look forward to welcoming you back soon and I invite you to contact me directly via jp.lovotti@accor.com.  Tropical regards,  JPL   Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Did not live up to expectations
review: Indah and her supervisor Mr. Tok  are both lovely friendly people who can not do enough to help you decide where to go on tours which depart from their resort. If they didn't know something they would find out for you. They always had time to stop for a chat and to help you learn more about Phuket and Thailand. They looked after us like royalty. On some of the tours they supplied us with towels and bags to put them in and on return to the resort we were given cool lime drinks and face washers to refresh ourselves. Thank you Indah and Tok.

title: Disappointed
review: Beautiful grounds, very attentive and friendly staff!!  That's where it ends - from the moment we arrived things seem to go downhill. We stayed for 3 nights in a standard room, the housekeeping leaves a lot to be desired. No toilet paper, no replacement of towels, no replacement of water, when there was s towel replacement only 1 towel was replaced. Pretty hard to have a shower for two people in the room with one towel! It was also concerning that the smell coming from our bathroom made us both feel unwell.   I found it SO frustrating that other guests would go to the pool early in the morning to 'reserve' a day bed. I, on several occasions witnessed other guests reserving the beds, not to use them for hours at a time. It's quite inconsiderate and rude to do this when other…

title: Excellent - Excellent - Excellent - Best Stay of our trip
review: We were booked for about 3 nights in Superior King Rooms & I must say the most expensive leg of our trip. So we were looking forward to something exciting. Upon Arrival the staff told us that they were Happy to Offer Upgrade to plunge Pool Suite ... I said how much ? they said Free !! Whoaa this is where the best part of our trip started already. We were greeted by a very welcoming staff & it seems they love kids. "Toom" was asked to escort us to our room & he was very welcoming. He became friends with our kid on the way to the room & made us feel very welcome at the resort as well. The private pool was awesome addition to the room & we had fun. But wait till you see the 3 pools in the resort. Im sure you will not come back to your room. The pool on the first floor had a water…

title: Excellent pool resort with some flaws
review: Dear mahajansahab,  Thank you for your generous review given to Novotel Phuket Karon. We love reading how much you have enjoyed your stay at the Resort. The Kids Pool and its Waterslide is indeed very popular, so is our Breakfast buffet selection. Most importantly, we are glad that you could have experienced the dedicated attention and care from our Team, as well as their genuine sense of hospitality. The Team and I will look forward to your next visit and invite you contacting me directly then via jp.lovotti@accor.com   Tropical regards,  JPL  Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: handicap accessible room
review: Stayed 11 nights at this resort in beautiful karon beach area. To ensure i got a nice room i booked the deluxe room...booking made 6 weeks prior with requests of room with view, top floor, and quiet.  None of these requests were met. Being a fussy traveller i left my luggage at reception until i was shown an acceptable room. 5 rooms later, after requesting a refund, i was shown a room that was ok.  That night at 11pm, in our "deluxe room" i tried to sleep through what, can best be described as, next to a formula one racing track, double doors on the balcony did nothing to lessen the noise. I went to reception and spoke with the manager....fuad ahmadll.....very helpful...moved again that night to a quiet room with a view on the top floor.....go figure.... Apart from the initial…

title: Winter escape
review: Dear Terry,  Many thanks for sharing your experience online.  We were delighted to welcoming you during your holidays and glad that you have experienced the genuine sense of hospitality of our Teams. They are dedicated to create experiences our Guests Love and it is our pleasure to read your appreciation. The resort also offers 3 distinct swimming pools, with each a different atmosphere that gives everyone a great place to chill out during the day. As you rightfully mention, the resort is ideally located in the Karon District, where you can find local boutiques, temples, night markets, as well as a large selection of restaurants and bars. As for the Karon Beach, it is considered by the locals as one of the most beautiful on the island. Glad that you could have discovered this little paradise on earth! On the other hand, we were sorry to ready about some shortfall you could have experienced during your stay, certainly not to the standard we aspire for our guests. rest assured that corrective have been taken to address the matters, glad to confirm that the elevators was since fixed, as well as the cross training machine in the gym. We will look forward to welcoming you back soon and invite you contacting me directly via jp.lovotti@accor.com as I would be delighted assisting you designing your next journey,  Warm regards,  JPL  Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Perfection!
review: Handicap accessible room: The bathroom is large with grab bars at the toilet and a roll in shower with grab bars, shower chair and hand held shower head in addition to a rain shower. The sleeping area is again large with a firm bed. Entering the room is a little difficult as there is slightly steep down ramp just before the door and a very high ramped threshold at the door. There is an elevator in the building that has the handicap accessible room and the restaurant for breakfast is on the same floor. The buffet breakfast was very good with many choices available for both Asian and western breakfasts. The rooftop bar had a ramp to enter. The other bars and both restaurants have steps and some uneven walkways. There are some areas around the largest pool that can be accessed by…

title: Great experience
review: Our holiday in Novotel Karon Beach was a great experience in every way. Arrival was friendly and it continued through the whole our holiday period. Room was a cozy and clean. We stayed in the deluxe room and there was a enough room to us. Food in the breakfast and the restaurants was delicious. Our kids (ages 8, 3 and 1) loved the pool areas and playroom.  Tip, join to the Le Club AccorHotels value club and use the value vouchers.  Only bother was a wifi connection in the room.  Thanks to the whole group and hope we see again soon! Special thanks for your staff for helping us when we left home. Our travel agency left us down and transport to the airport did not come to pick up us.

title: Short stay
review: Dear MH1972FIN,  Many thanks for sharing your thoughts online.   We are more than happy to read that you enjoyed your stay, thanks to the generous living space and comfort of our rooms, as well as for the team genuine attention and care. From our Culinary team that loves delighting our Guests, up to our Kids World and the Kids pool that are all-time favorite among our little guests. On the other hand, we are also working on internet connection improvement. We will be looking forward for your next return to your holiday home and I invite you to get in touch with me directly via jp.lovotti@accor.com   Sincerely,  JPL  Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Top hotel near the beautiful long beach.
review: Booked for 3 nights in delux room. Website states most delux rooms are in centre of resort however discovered  from the hotel layout plan given on arrival that  most delux rooms face onto a busy main road. First room we were shown faced directly onto main road( delux room ??) and although room had double set of patio doors they didn't help reduce traffic noise. We were then shown another "delux room" this one was situated slightly back from the main road and although still noisy we accepted it as we were only staying for 3 nights. Had we been staying longer than this I would definitely have requested a move as the road is busy and noisy up until 4 in morning. As a matter of interest the standard rooms in this hotel are situated at the back of the resort surrounded by lovely…

title: Wonderful experience
review: Dear lindast 101,   Thank you for sharing your family journey with us. We are glad that you enjoyed our team services, our spa and the benefits of our location. However, we are sorry that you could have been affected by some noise level from the Karon district. The Resort is located on a beautiful landscape and we would be pleased to accommodate you with your room is a more quiet area. We do hope that we will have a chance to welcome you again in the future. Feel welcome to get in touch with me directly via jp.lovotti@accor.com   Tropical regards,  JPL  Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Marvellous place
review: This Novotel is located a few steps from the beautiful Karon Beach. This beach have clear water and soft white sand. You can make a walk from more than one hour.  The hotel have clean and large rooms. The personal is very friendly and helpful.  There are also a few bars and restaurants in the hotel and also a few swimming pools.  They have even make a hole swimming pool for kinds in another part of the building. Breakfast is good and you find certainly your favourite breakfast. So we are coming now for the second time and it will not be the last time.

title: Second Time Around - Ever so Pleasing!!!
review: I recently had the opportunity to visit Novotel Karon Beach for a second time. First time in January 2016 and now again in January 2017 and I am still ever so chuffed with this property. Although there´s been a change in the General Manager, from Fraser Ross to Jean-Philippe Lovotti, the property remained the one to beat along the strip.  On arrival, staff remembered me from my last stay from Reception, through to the pool and the bar areas. Genuinely there to help, it really made it worth the while to trek all the way from Africa to Thailand. Housekeeping and Reception delivers service second to none and they are really to be commended.  I had one slight hick-up at breakfast, which was dealt with instantly. The rest of my stay went seamless.  Well done Jean-Philippe and Team!

title: Vacation with family in Phuket, Karon beach
review: Dear Johann,  Many thanks for your review online! It was a sincere pleasure welcoming you back to the Resort, delighted that you have enjoyed this stay as much as the first one. Our Teams are dedicated to creating experiences our Guests Love, glad that you could have chilled out in this relaxing environment. The Team and I will look forward to welcoming you back; feel welcome to contact me directly via jp.lovotti@accor.com before your next visit,  Warm regards,  JPL  Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Getaway
review: If your decision is Karon beach Novotel is great choice. Clean big room, polite hotel staff. I recommend to choose a room with swimming pool epecially if you are travelling with children and you plan not to stay all day long on the beach. There is no direct access to the beach from hotel(you have to cross very rush road) and there are no hotels umbrellas on the beach.

title: Great result - pick of Karon
review: Dear Jan,  Many thanks for sharing your journey at Novotel Phuket Karon. We are all delighted that you had a ‘Funtastic’ stay, thanks to the design and atmosphere of our Plunge Pool Suites, as well as for the genuine sense of hospitality from team. The Karon Beach is considered as a public area, and the installation of chairs and umbrellas is ruled by the local authorities. Nonetheless, we do propose Chic Picnic Sets with beach mats, large sun umbrellas, beach towels, snacks and soft drinks for our Guests to bring along when going to the beach. We will look forward to welcoming you again and I invite you to contacting me via jp.lovotti@accor.com as I will be happy to assist you designing your next holiday at Novotel Phuket Karon.  Warmest regards,  JPL  Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Worth coming back!
review: Wifi - If you are staying for Business, forget about using their wifi, it barely connects, invest in a local SIM card, if you really cannot live without data. If you are on holiday and do not need data connection, it's not an issue Pools - 3 pools to choose from, spoil for choices Breakfast - Compared to Novotel Vintage Patong that I stayed 2 wks before arriving at Karon Novotel, it was a total difference. Starting from the hosts after entering the restaurant, the table assignment was a mess, once our table got taken over by another family, 2nd time, we got asked to change table while eating halfway. It's a total shock, not to mention culture difference, you do not ask your guests to change table while they are halfway through the meal!!!!The spread is very limited and quality…

title: Amazing experience
review: Absolutely beautiful resort and staff. Can't wait to visit and in the near future. Couldn't fault the facilities, staff, pools, weather and value for money. Breakfast was lovely as was the variety for dinners.

title: Fantastic hotel - great for families!
review: Dear Stephanie,   Thank you for your review online!   We are delighted to read that you have enjoyed a fantastic stay at Novotel Phuket Karon and could experience the genuine sense of hospitality of our Team. We will look forward to your next visit; Feel Welcome to contact me directly via jp.lovotti@accor.com to facilitate the organization of your future trip with us.   Tropical regards,   JPL   Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Souless place with terrible half board option..Needs improvement!
review: We stayed for 13 nights and loved it! The staff were wonderful with the kids - they loved the kids club (aged 9 and 6) and the pools! We stayed in a plunge pool suite which I highly recommend. The kids especially liked Bird - a Recreational Manager -  who taught them magic tricks and played with them.

title: Not bad
review: Dear Samantha1771,  Thank you for sharing your family holiday experience at Novotel Phuket Karon. Khun Bird and his recreation team will be very happy to hear that your children had a great time at the Kids World, and that you have enjoyed the comfort and design of your Plunge Pool Suite. We are looking forward to welcoming you again in the future. Feel welcome to give me an e-call at jp.lovotti@accor.com.  Tropical regards,  JPL  Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Enjoyable stay but could do better
review: Booked family room for 4. Great clean room, and cleaned well by house keeping.  On arrival had booked half board option, which I asked to be removed, whereby I pay for the room only, as we didnt require the half board option.  This I requested before we had even checked into our room. After some back and forth, Was told by managment that this would be not be possible.    So now stuck with the half board. We tried it out. A themed night (Italian) whith extremely limited selection of food choices. 3 pizzas and a couple of pastas. The was tasteless and dissappointing.  Management to their credit , devised an a' la carte menu for us on the third day, which went some way to help.   I would definaltly not reccomend the half board option. It's mostly geared to Eastern European palate. …

title: Pleasant Stay in Koron
review: Hotel was nice and well maintained. Service was good. Staff at Front Desk were very helpful. Over capacity at the restaurant during breakfast time was a little setback though. Overall it's a very nice hotel.

title: Never again....
review: Dear Eric,  Thanks a lot for your generous feedback and for choosing Novotel Phuket Karon! I’m glad that you had a pleasant stay with us and could experience our team sincere services and care. We love to assist all guests in any possible ways we could. May I share with you that we also open our signature restaurant TAi at breakfast time, during holiday season.  We will be waiting for your return to your holiday home. Feel welcome to contact my directly at jp.lovotti@accor.com   Sincerely,   JPL  Jean-Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Pool villa
review: We booked for 5 days and did not get a good impression of the hotel. The looby was tight and few people to attend. I asked to be put on the top floor and they put us on the second floor and on top of our room a family with children jumping and making noise all the time. First disappointment was that they had no toothbrush in the bathroom, poor amenities. It had a half-transparent glass of shower that you could see from the room. I went with my sister and it was embarrassing, it seemed love hotel. Separate beds in the hotel in most of the case is for friends or relatives, should not have that kind of toilet. The energy of the hotel drops all the time from the first day to the last! The breakfast had a great buffet but did not have coffee at will, you had to ask all the time for…

title: Great location, superb food
review: Dear Antonio Carlos  Thank you for your valuable feedback. Please accept our sincere apologies for the discomfort you may have encountered and assure you that we are taking the measures to ensure that our Teams deliver warm services with a true sense of hospitality and experiences our guests love.  Could we share that the power outage recently experienced was due to a road accident, but that no one was injured and the local authorities managed to address the matter during the course of the day.  We are sorry for the privacy issue you were referring to. Could we share that we do provide shower curtain to address the glass semi transparency of the bathroom.  As were are dedicated to create experiences our Guests Love, we will certainly review the service issue you could have encountered. The team and I hope we will have a chance to welcome you again in the future. May I invite you to contact me directly at jp.lovotti@accor.com as I will be pleased to assist you in any possible ways.  Sincerely,  JPL  Jean-Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Staff Training Required
review: We have been here since Monday and we are leaving next week and every day we have had to ask the pool people to clean our pool which looks like the only pool which is dirty. Few nights ago the pump kept going off all night every 20 min which we didn't sleep that much. Pay the extra money and you would expect it to be cleaned daily not coming home to green. I'm sick of asking them and then it takes them hour to put a machine through to clean it. By this time we are over it and have to go to the main pool.   The team in the day spa get the two stars and if it was rating them out of five they would get the lot.   Power on and off and on and off.  Not good when you want to beat the heat on ya day away from tours.   The lady's in the spa are welcoming and service is great which the…

title: Almost perfect
review: Overall this hotel was pretty nice. We stayed here for 4 nights after Christmas which was quite a busy time.   The resort was clean and modern. There was some needed maintenance in the bathroom and pool however it was nothing major.   It is located across the road from amazing Karon beach which is a plus however if you want to hire a beach umbrella you need to walk down the beach a bit further. Restaurants and shops are bout a 10-15 min walk from the hotel which I was happy to walk. The only issue with the location is that to go anywhere by foot you need to cross a very busy road. There is a guard at the front of the hotel that will assist with stopping traffic but he wasn't always available. If you are coming with young kids I'd keep this in mind. We struggled a little as a…

title: A great family resort
review: Dear foli99,  Many thanks for your valuable feedback and for choosing Novotel Phuket Karon for your holiday home! We are dedicated to create experiences all type of Guests love, family, couple and solo. It is a pleasure reading that you have spent a great time with us. Our Culinary team will be very happy to hear that you experienced their efforts to delight our guests with creation of food and beverage.  We are looking forward to welcoming you back. Feel welcome to contact me at jp.lovotti@accor.com as I will be more than happy to make your next holiday in Phuket perfect!  Tropical regards,  JPL  Jean-Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Second trip to this resort
review: Lovely week break with 3 families over Christmas Lots of things to do for kids, a few different pools, one for kids with a water slide which was very popular. The only 2 improvement areas from my side are to lift the standard of the breakfast (food and venue) and to improve the gym facilities. Other than that, really good place, beautiful villas - new and spacious, friendly and professional team. Breakfast - really nice to have crepes available (They should be warm) - not sure how you can get the food so right in the restaurants and not so right for breaksast though. The gym, hmmm - one bike and some treadmills which were from 1990 possibly lol?? the rest of the hotel - wonderful beach is across the road lovely!

title: Overall pretty good
review: Dear Mackens,  Thank you for your comments and suggestions. I’m glad that you liked your overall stay with us. It’s our pleasure reading how much you have enjoyed your family accommodation and the activities prepared by our team members. May I share with you that our 24-hour fitness also features weight training machines and free weight training equipment. Regarding the breakfast, I will certainly share your words with our Culinary team.  We will be waiting for your return to your holiday home in the future. Feel Welcome to contact me directly at jp.lovotti@accor.com  Warm regards,  JPL  Jean-Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: NOVOTEL KARON BEACH
review: This is a really nice resort and I enjoyed the time we spent at this hotel. The positive aspects of my trip. The staff at this hotel are beyond great can't do enough for guests it was our second stay here in two years and as a returning guest the staff made us feel very very welcome. A specific mention to the entertainment team for the children run by Bird what a superb bunch of people my boys loved them and they really make every child feel very very welcome! They were the main reason for our return. Room spacious and well maintained food in the resort well priced and very good as well! Breakfast was good. Gym again has enough for you to get in a workout. Can recommend this hotel as very good value for money and a great place to stay in Karon beach.

title: Awesome!!! Real Enjoy!!
review: An awesome property with all amenities. Spacious and vet well done rooms, excellent maintenance. Food was awesome and refreshing breakfast.   Location is also very good. Cross the road and you are at Karon beach again a clean very well a I gained beach. Clean water and u can enjoy chilled beer!!!  Hotel is quite kids friendly- kind play area with good games and activities, kids pool etc, kids meals - all is available. Karon Market is very near by and this property is around 10 to 15 min max drive from Patong. They have shuttles going to Patong and is free of cost but you have to be on time!   A great hospitality too! !! Everything is just too good.  I would definitely like to visit here!! Highly recommended for a comfortable stay!!

title: Great Time
review: Dear Aatish,  Thank you for your fabulous review!  I have enjoy reading your feedback in details. Your well-being is one of our commitments! We are more than happy to know that you enjoy your spacious and comfy room as well as the amenities. Our Culinary team will be very happy to see their effort could delight your morning. Karon beach is indeed one of the most beautiful beaches in Phuket, located just across the resort. We highly appreciate your recommendation to TripAdvisor readers. We will look forward to welcoming you back and I invite you to contact me directly via jp.lovotti@accor.com to design you next journey at Novotel Phuket Karon.  Sincerely,  JPL  Jean-Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: No luxury but family friend hotel with kids playarea and pool with waterslide
review: We enjoyed staying at this resort.  The beach is actually across a busy street from the resort, which can be challenging to cross during rush hour-- even with the hotel supplying a crossing guard.  The staff is very friendly, the various bars and pools are wonderful and the restaurants were very nice to have on site. Our friends that were with us had a one year old toddler that just learned to walk.  The staff was absolutely wonderful with her as well as our older kids.  I wouldn't hesitate to recommend this hotel, but would be sure to point out that it's not exactly on the beach.

title: Great facility! Perfect for families!
review: Dear Jason,  Thank you for sharing your holiday online! I’m pleased to read about your great holiday at Novotel Phuket Karon. I will certainly share your comments with the team, especially to Recreation team members. They love delighting our little guests with creative activities. We highly appreciate your recommendations to other travelers.  The team and I are looking forward to welcome you again in the future. Feel welcome to get in touch with me via jp.lovotti@accor.com as I’ll be happy to facilitate the design your next journey with us.  Tropical regards,  JPL  Jean-Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Room for Improvement
review: As expected with Novotel no luxury but a nice hotel with good layout. 3 different swimming pools, one for kids with waterslide. Nice indoor play area for kids to hang out and conveniently close to the rooms (at least our). Several restaurants, but found them very poor value and not genuine compared to eating out at the many options for true thai food. Friendly staff, nice but no frills family rooms. We enjoyed it and would stay again. About a 10 min walk to the town with restaurants and beach.

title: Good hotel for families
review: Stayed for 4 nights and our stay was ok. We asked to move rooms after the first night as our room was right next to the busy road. The room has double glazing but this didn't really help. There was no problem about moving us, I get the feeling that it happens often as when we arrived a family was moving to the room next door to the one we ended up in. The balcony furniture had fungus growing over it in both rooms but again when this was pointed out it was removed straight away. It would have been far better had housekeeping checked this regularly though!  Beds were ridiculously hard but my friend thought this was a good thing so it all comes down to preferences in the end! The 3 pools are lovely, there is a kids pool with a slide as well as a smaller one. It did get busy at…

title: Lovely hotel
review: Beautiful hotel. Clean rooms and grounds. Staff were all lovely. Recommend to families, our family room was huge. Beach just over the road. Night market up the road within walking distance, food was lovely on stalls and cost next to nothing. Wish we'd stayed longer

title: Great resort with great service
review: Our family, two adults and two children had a great stay at this hotel in Decemer 2016. We stayed for 11 days. We were extremly happy with the service and the facilities. Three pools, several restaurants on the hotel premise. Good food, nice pools. The spa treatment was perfect! We had three treatments during our stay. The room was spacious and had a great location. The location of the hotel was also very good. Just crossing the main road brought us to Karon beach.  During our stay our youngest child had to be admitted to the hospital due to an infection. The hotel provided transportation and one of the staff personel exorted us. The hotel's care and follow up was superb! In general the service of the hotel staff was very good.  We would not hesitate to choose this hotel again!

title: Adequate but flawed - could so easily be so much better
review: This hotel is across the street from the northern part of Karon Beach itself, but getting across the road, essential for any activity outside the hotel grounds, is quite hazardous. They sporadically provide a security guard to hold up the incessant traffic so you can get across. At other times it's a bit scary. Why they didn't just provide a footbridge or a controlled crossing beats me. As a family group with a small child we found this dangerous road crossing situation troubling.  The location is otherwise really good as the northern end of the beach is beautiful and not at all crowded. The town is a short walk where there's a night market and restaurants, bars and shops.  The hotel property is in good shape and the Superior rooms were very comfortable.   Breakfast buffet was…

title: Dissatisfied. Hotel didn't address to any pre-arrival request even confirmation received
review: Dear 0591TimS,  Thank you for sharing your experience online. We are glad to read that you have enjoyed the advantage of Novotel Phuket Karon location. Indeed, our location is ideal for a relaxing time with easy access to entertainment, shops and restaurants nearby. Our culinary team is delighted to have provided you with a great breakfast buffet. Regarding the crossing bridge, there are local laws and permission requirements for any action as Karon area is considered as a public area. Our security officer is always available to assist our guests. Please rest assured that we are taking your feedback and suggestions into account to further improve our products and services. The issues you have raised help us focus on our journey of improvement, thank you once again. We do hope that we will have a chance to welcome you again and I invite you to give me an e-call via jp.lovotti@accor.com I will be pleased to facilitate the organisation of your next journey.  Tropical regards,  JPL  Jean-Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Super amazing hotel in paradise
review: This hotel delivers right from the moment you arrive. Really happy and helpful front desk. One night i wasn't well and they even brought me more toilet paper (got sick up in the rainforest) i man how nice is that. Room was great, cleaned to a high standard fresh water every day pool topped up and cute towel animals on my daughters bed. Room service food was excellent as were the sports bar food and the 2 for 1 cocktails. The ribs weren't great but all the other food was fantastic. Breakfast is palatial and there is so much to choose from.  Pools are nice although we did have a villa pool on our room so we only used 2 of them. Great kids club kept my daughter very entertained (she's 10) they have a variety of activities and some fun crafts to do too. It's surrounded by greenery…

title: Nice stay at the Novotel Karon
review: Dear Becstarz,  Many thanks for sharing your review online! We are delighted to read how much you have loved your stay at Novotel Phuket Karon, should it be for the comfort of your Suite Plunge Pool, for the ‘Funstastic‘ experiences at the Kids World, or for the design & atmosphere of the Resort that offers a relaxing environment surrounded by beautiful tropical gardens. Most importantly, our Teams are dedicated to the comfort and wellbeing of our Guests and it is our Pleasure that you could have experienced their genuine sense of hospitality. We do hope that we’ll have the chance to welcoming you back in the future and invite you to contact me directly via jp.lovotti@accor.com to facilitate the organization of your next journey,  Warm regards,  JPL  Jean Philippe Lovotti  General Manager

title: A Weeks Relaxing Stay
review: We arrived here at 10:00am after a long flight. We asked the receptionist if we could check in early and she had a look and was very pleased to inform us that we could check in early and we had been upgraded to a deluxe room!  On arriving in the room we realised there wasn't much of a view but it wasn't a problem. The beds in the room were extremely comfortable and the room had the usual amenities. The hotel had three pools, one lagoon style pool a child's pool with slide and a quiet pool. There was plenty of sun loungers available and beach towels were provided but we used our own. Be aware the drinks served at the pool and the other bars in the hotel are extremely expensive compared to other hotels. Breakfast was included in our rate but it wasn't that impressive. The fruit…

title: Exceptional "Best Vacation Ever!"
review: Dear Jimbob077  Many thanks for your review online, We are delighted to read that you had a great stay at the Resort, should it be for the different atmosphere proposed around each of the 3 swimming pools, for the comfort of our Beds, as well as for the décor and ambiance of our Rooms. Most importantly, we value your appreciation for the dedicated attention and care extended by our team. Nonetheless, we are sorry about the shortfalls you could have experienced and reassure you that we have taken the corrective measures to address it. As for the restaurants and bars, we conduct regular benchmarks to ensure that our guests would enjoy the best value and quality products & services. We will look forward to welcoming you back soon and invite you to contact me directly via jp.lovotti@accor.com to design your next journey,  Warm regards,  JPL   Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Disappointing
review: For a person travelling alone, it was a really lovely, relaxing stay. Staff are impeccable, and the plunge pool suite room I had felt very decadent. With your own small pool, there were days I never really left my room space. Sure it's a ten minute walk from Karon, but it didn't effect me at all. Breakfasts were extravagant and never crazy busy, and other restaurants were nice if a little over priced, so if you don't want to pay hotel prices, then take that walk outside for a few minutes. I'd come back.

title: Fabulous stay
review: Could not fault this hotel whether you want a resort style holiday or to use as a base for other activities. Service, food, gardens, pools and facilities all excellent. Beautiful staff, nothing was too much trouble. Recommend the plunge pool suites.

title: Amazing hotel
review: Dear Karen,  Thanks a lot for your fantastic review. We love to read that you have enjoyed your holiday at Novotel Phuket Karon in your Plunge pool suite.  It’s always a pleasure to read our guests’ feedback and know that we have successfully meet and exceeded our guests’ expectations. It would be marvelous to welcome you back in the future. Feel welcome to give me an e-call via jp.lovotti@accor.com.  Warm regards,  JPL  Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Dissatisfied
review: I stayed here for 1night.  Amazing hotel amazing staff too.   Nice room goood customer service ... upgraded to suite room freem of charge.   I really recomnd this hotel for you visit to phuket.   Good job keep it up

title: Relaxing family break in tropical setting!
review: Dear imad,  Thank you for your generous feedback. I love reading how much you have enjoyed your Suite at Novotel Phuket Karon. I will certainly share your comments with the team. We also do appreciate and value your kind recommendation of the hotel to Tripadvisor’s readers.  The team and I are looking forward to welcoming you back to your ‘Holiday Home’ in the near future. Feel welcome to get in touch with me directly at jp.lovotti@accor.com.   Warmest regards,  JPL  Jean-Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Fabulous hotel with friendly staff and immaculate rooms! Would 100% recommend to everyone wanting a relaxing holiday.
review: So i was informed that there be no electricity in my room & or hotel for 9hours during the day (middle of the HEAT)☀️️ the maid left a note on my bed. After reading it I called & asked if there was gonna be compensation for the INCONVENIENCE & I was offer drink coupons 😂 guess they thought if I got drunk I would forget about the HEAT , NO TV , NO PHONE CHARGING, NO COLD WATER OR FOOD IN FRIDGE , NO IRONING CLOTHES , NO LIGHT TO SAVE BY & NO COMPENSATION. Top it off the charge extra for transportation than the TAXI standing right outside the hotel. They smile while they rip you off ... just saying

title: My kid loved it and wanted to stay longer...
review: I will come back here because my son loved it.  He loved the kids pool and the kids club.  I will like to highlight one specific staff there.  On Saturday 11Dec, my son met Tua (or was it Dua) who was very sweet and genuinely interested.  She is indeed very good with kids.  As for the resort, it is well maintained.  My husband saw staff cleaning pools on a daily basis early every morning.  I too saw staff painting external walls to keep it pristine white.  When I reported an aircon issue after the first night, I had two staff coming to check it and even received a letter that evening about it.  The room was fine.  Only issues, the hot water kettle was missing but that was quickly fixed when the staff brought a replacement.  In terms of amenities, as what the other guests…

title: Kids will love it.
review: Me and my friends stayed at Novotel at Karon for 4 days and it was raining most of the time. Luckily there is a kids club to keep our boys entertained in the hotel. We also managed to play at one of the kids pool which is just outside of the kids club when the weather is better. There are total 3 pools in this hotel.   The hotel is nice but the housekeeping need to improve. When we checked into our room for 2 adult + 1 kid, there is only 2 bath towels and no hand towel, bedroom slippers, dental kits. We have to call the housekeeping and they told us they only left with 1 pair of slipper. On day 2, no one came to make up our room.   Overall the hotel is ok but I giving a good rating due to the kids club.

title: Lovely hotel - pity about location.
review: I stayed here for 4 nights. The welcome was very friendly and the front of house staff were lovely. I was upgraded to a suite which was fantastic and really warranted a five star review. The breakfast buffet was excellent. The grounds were immaculately maintained and the pools were good. There were however some negatives. The price for food and drinks was a little too high - exactly what you would pay in a hotel in UK. The location, in my opinion, is not ideal. This may have been because I went as a single guest. The hotel is positioned on the outskirts of Karon, which yes, may add to an element of peace and quiet but does leave it quite remote. The walk into Karon and shops is 10-15 mins, which at night is poorly lit. The beach is also across a very busy road and when I visited…

title: Family getaway
review: The whole stay is pleasant with the following points to improved on.  1. The family room we stayed has a few cushion in the room, i found the cover to have mould stains and musky smell on it.  2. the pillows were either too soft or too firm for our comfort. But the bed is very nice to sleep on. 3. some of the anemities in the room like toothbrush and bathmat was not provided when we checked into the room. 4. Our room was not make up during 1 of the day as my boy was taking his nap. The housekeeper came knocking on the door (we put DND) and passed us some towels n the bottle drinks and informed us that she will be back at 6pm to clean up which nv did.  5. The dining chairs in Horizon also had mould stains on it.   We especially love the Kids World as it almost rain throughout our…

title: Nice hotel good location but felt very money driven
review: This review is based over a year ago as I wasn't so sure it was the best way to say my view but here goes we were picked up from the airport by a private taxi arranged by the hotel  upon arrival we were greeted with drinks and provided with are keys while the bell boy took are things to are room upon arrival at the room we were not happy as it was me and my partner and no children we were placed right next to the children's pool and to top it off just outside are balcony was the pool slide we requested to move and they were very quick to get it sorted for us once in the new room we soon realised we had been placed next to the main road running to patong which was very busy as the holiday went on I had noticed with every meal you have on site there was a service charge I found…

title: Highly recommended
review: Spent 5 days at this wonderful hotel under the care of the amazing Ariel the manager.  We had  several issues and Ariel was magnificent she made our holiday fantastic.  This hotel is perfectly placed opposite the beach where you can hire bed mats and an umbrella for 200 baht - there are no sun loungers on the beach at all and only 10% is allowed for umbrellas.  The breakfast is good and open til 10.30.  Although there are 3 swimming pools they were not many beds available so we preferred to be by the beach, Rooms are great clean and very modern plenty of towels and toiletries are lovely .  Nothing to complain about it is fabulous hotel and we had a great holiday

title: Really nice hotel
review: Dear LondonEssexgirlie,  Thank you for sharing your journey online. It is a pleasure reading how much you have enjoyed your stay with us! We will certainly share your words with our team members with special mention to Ariel. We also value how much you have enjoyed the Quality of our Cuisine, in particular during the breakfast. We are looking forward to seeing you again in the nearest future and I invite you to contact me via jp.lovotti@accor.com as I will be happy to design your next visit in Phuket.  Tropical regards,  JPL  Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Not quite up to Novotel standard
review: This hotel is on a seriously busy road. Wasn't a problem for us and the hotel has a security man who helps with crossing. On arrival check in was fine with very polite helpful staff. Golf buggy took us to our room. We booked a suite with its own plunge pool. Clean spacious and daily maid service. The hotel is maintained to a high standard with immaculate gardens. Great buffet breakfast but the tea and coffee is served by the waiting staff and if like me you need plenty of coffee to start the day it can be frustrating to get refills.......however after a couple of days the staff gave me my own coffee pot. The choice and quality of food was excellent. We did find the cost of drinks and food in the hotel to be quite expensive compared to the town. The beach is wonderful and close…

title: A nice resort with a few issues
review: Arrived at 1.30 expecting our room to be ready but still had to wait an hour  The room is very spacious but the bathroom is odd If you want a shower you have to kneel in the bath as the pole isn't high enough also the window to the bedroom from the bathroom is frosted glass but there are stripes of clear glass embedded in so you can clearly see the person in the bathroom  Also getting in and out of the bath can be quite awkward as it seems high up Breakfast was bedlam for the first couple of days  I'm guessing because of high occupancy but the food choice was ok  The pool areas are ok but again there seems only just enough sun beds so you have to be quick in the morn to get one where you want  Location is ok About 15 min walk to the centre  Bars and restaurants are decent and…

title: It's not perfect 👍🏽it's Immaculate 👌🏽
review: Dear mcfc20  We would like to thank you for your review, As you rightfully mention, our Rooms offer a very large living space, with a décor that blends a modern style with a Thai Look & Feel. They have been designed to offer a comfortable and bright atmosphere. As for the bathroom, you can certainly choose between a bathtub or standing shower, we are always happy to accommodate your preferences. We also provide and install additional shower curtain if you like so. The Resort offers 3 distinct swimming pools; Lagoon Pool that is in the Heart of the Resort, Oasis Pool that is always the preferred Pool for the Couples, and the Kids Pool with its Funtastic Waterslide, the favorite for the Families and Children. We also follow a non-reservation policy for the Sunlounger to allow every guests to chill out and relax around their preferred swimming pool. We do value your words on the Quality of our Breakfast; Could we share that you may experience a larger number of guests at breakfast during the peak demand. And for the Karon District, it is a right balance between one of the most beautiful beach on the Islands, vibrant streets with a large panel of restaurants and bars, night markets or traditional temples. We are glad that you would have discovered this great location. We hope that we’ll have the opportunity to welcoming you back to the resort and invite you to contact me directly via jp.lovotti@accor.com as I’ll be happy to facilitate the design of your next journey,  Warm regards,  JPL  Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Nice Resort but needs to take a leap forward to make it great.
review: Stayed for 7 days in a Family room with two kids 3 year old and 7 month old. The resort presents well and is very clean and well maintained but it's the smaller things that have been overlooked which could make this resort excellent.   The Room: A Family room has a Queen bed and a bunk bed the staff present the bunk bed with stuffed animals for the kids to play with and a hidden treasure of chocolate in the room safe for the kids to find. However there is no fold out clothes airer or clothes line in the bathroom to hang up the wet kids clothes after a day in the pool. There is also no microwave in the room to heat up bottles for babies which I thought a family room would have. There is also no bath for the kids to wash in, my Wife and I had to bathe our kids in the shower and it…

title: Fantastic holiday destination
review: Dear Zeus30167,  Thank you for sharing your thought online. We are glad to read that you have enjoyed the excellent service and care from our team as well as the 3 swimming pools with different atmospheres. We will certainly share your feedback with the team members included special mentioned to Jay. Novotel Phuket Karon aims to meet and exceed our guests’ expectations. Please rest assured we are taking the suggestion and issues you have raised into account to further improve our products and services. May I share with you that, next to every Sun lounger is placed a call-button so our team is ready to assist you with food and beverages any time, promptly. We are now also providing a free shuttle to Patong 3 times per day, giving you an easy access to an even larger choice of shops, restaurants and entertainment. On another hand, Karon area is considered as a tranquil area with its peaceful and family friendly atmosphere and easy access to entertainment nearby. It would be marvelous if we have the chance to welcome you again in the future and I invite you to contact me directly at jp.lovotti@accor.com   Sincerely,  JPL  Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Perfect
review: We had the best holiday at this hotel staff were superb our favourite was Mint she went above and beyond to make us comfortable beautiful girl, always smiling. Could not complain about 1 person or anything about the resort.. I really can not wait to go back there. Breakfast was outstanding as was the rest of the restaurants in there, food was delicious. Thank you Novotel Phuket Karon beach....  you should be extremely proud of your resort and staff...  love and miss you Mint

title: Karon Oasis
review: Dear Michele,  Thank you for your feedback! We always love reading how much you have enjoyed Fantastic holiday with us! I shall not miss sharing your experience with our team with a special mention to Culinary Team and Mint as they will be very happy to hear your encouraging feedback. Thank you once again for choosing us for your holiday and we are looking forward to welcoming you back to your ‘Holiday Home’. Feel Welcome to contact me directly via jp.lovotti@accor.com. I will be pleased to facilitate the organization of your next visit.  Warmest regards,  JPL  Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Great stay
review: Was staying at the hotel for 10 days. Liked it much - the territorry is good, lots of facilities, large territorry with vivid tropical vegetation. The staff was perfect - polite, attentive and helpful. The only thing I did not like is bad wi-fi quality, but my opinion about the hotel is great anyway.

title: Nice hotel, but location isn't great
review: We stayed in a room with a private pool, which was really nice, even though it's not very private. The hotel itself isn't great though. It's not very clean and the restaurants didn't seem too great.  The hotel is also a little bit in the middle of nowhere, and it is quite a distance to get to town. The service cannot be faulted.  The hotel was nice, but if I do return I would choose somewhere else with a better location and better amenities.

title: Perfect for Families & Great Customer Service
review: Stayed in a suite for 10 nights. Room was modern, very comfortable, with an ideal layout if staying with kids. Bed was comfortable, shower nice and hot, dual vanity, two TVs, and very quiet.  The hotel has 3 pools, we only used the main pool which was lovely with a few shallow areas for kids and always somewhere to sit.  On site spa was terrific too.  Kids club is fantastic, especially for our little 2yo to play in.  During the stay it rained a bit so we had a few minor leaks in our room, but the Front Office Manager Ariel quickly attended to it and bent over backwards to make our stay more comfortable.  It was also my birthday whilst there and they surprised me with a cake - thumbs up! Location wise it is a short stroll to Karon center, but really not an issue as there are some…

title: Nice on the Surface
review: Dear XOXODive,   Thank you for your fantastic review! Novotel Phuket Karon has been designed to offer a relaxing atmosphere with modern facilities for our Guests expectations. We couldn’t be happier to know that you had such a memorable holiday with your family. The team loves surprising our Guests and it was our pleasure to be part of your Birthday celebration. I shall not miss sharing your kind words with them with a special mention to Spa Team, Front Office Manager and Recreation team.
