I will be pleased to facilitate the organization of your next journey.   Tropical regards,   JPL  Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Nice place
review: We arrived at the hotel at 23:00 and were greeted by friendly and helpful staff. We were checked in immediately. We were taken to our room 4413. The room looked nice and spacious. After unpacking and settling into the room, I began to realise there was a mouldy smell. I made a room service call and the phone even smelled mouldy, which was very odd, but still it had that distinctive mouldy smell.   I then noticed the timber floor between the bed and shower wall was in a very poor state and looked like the timber floor was 10-20yrs old, and I was surprised because I had read the hotel is only 6 mths old. I took a shower to cleanup and noticed the pool of water already in the shower. After I finished my shower I also noticed the water run in the opposite direction of the drain…

title: Family oriented resort
review: Dear Mr. Wright,  At Novotel Phuket Karon, we are dedicated to create experiences our Guests Love. Reading your review, we have let you down. Please accept our sincere apologize.  The issue you have raised regarding the flooring has been recognized in identified rooms. We are glad to share that we have taken corrective measures by replacing those wooden floors with tiles, tiles that till give the look and feel of a wooden floor. This is also addressing the potential odors that could be linked to the moisture in the wooden floors. To improve further on the soundproofing in our rooms, we are also installing thicker glass panels in areas that could be more exposed to higher noise levels. This will certainly contribute to create more comfortable and tranquil environment for our Guests.  We were really sorry to read about the food reaction you have described and trust you and family have recovered well since. We do value your feedback as we do pay the highest level of attention on the matter. Could we share with you that we respect very strict procedures in food handling and preparation, hygiene and cleanliness, as well as in the selection and control of our Suppliers. We do also conduct regular quality tests that are done by independent and specialized labs. This is to ensure the premium quality of our offerings and food safety for our guests.  On the other hand, we do appreciate your recognition of the dedicated attention and friendliness of our Teams.  In the meantime, feel welcome to contact me directly via jp.lovotti@accor.com for any support or assistance I could provide you with, Warm regards,  JPL  Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Awesome hotel with fantastic staff
review: We stayed in our suite for 1 week which was clean, big and child friendly. Our balcony was facing the poolside and the rooms are isolated, so you could not hear the noise outside. In addition, the hotel provides fast wifi, which made me able to work and have video conferance calls without any issues.   Good gym room and other facilities which was provided by the hotel.

title: Overall good resort for stay with family with few negatives.
review: Dear Sunny,   Thank you for your valuable feedback and for choosing Novotel Phuket Karon! We love reading how much you enjoyed your Suite as well as the fast connection and facilities around the resort. I couldn’t wait to share your comment with our team members with special thanks to our Housekeeping team who always puts their efforts on cleaning and ensures that the resort is at its best. It would be marvelous to welcome you back in the nearest future. Feel Welcome to contact me directly at jp.lovotti@accor.com as I will be more than happy to assist with the organization of your next journey.   Warmest regards,   JPL  Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Great Hotel on a good location .
review: It is a good hotel with friendly staff, a great breakfast menu and 3 swimming pools and overall well kept. There are few issues I saw eg the location is opposite Karon Beach but no shops or restaurants nearby and gets lonely at night. If you need to have a quick dinner etc either you have it here or walk for 15 minutes to other places which I didnt like much.Also there are no do not disturb/clean my room placards which can be seen by cleaning staff. I was disappointed to come back on 2nd day evening and find that room was still not cleaned. On calling the manager, she said its very late in the day and cant be cleaned. I said its not acceptable only then did they send someone to have the room cleaned.The bathroom in Deluxe room was also weird. The glass etched partitions are…

title: Really awesome resort
review: Dear Sandip,  Thank you for taking your time sharing your experience online. We love to read that your family enjoyed a great Family Holiday at Novotel Phuket Karon and that your kids had a Funtastic time with us. The Resort is located in district of Karon, that offers beautiful beaches, restaurants and bars, traditional temples, authentic night markets… all within a short walking distance. Tuk Tuk are always available should you prefer not to walk. Besides, we are now providing a free shuttle to Patong 3 times per day, giving you an easy access to an even larger choice of entertainment, shops and restaurants! As for the servicing of the rooms, it is scheduled during the day and could happen in the afternoon in case of high occupancy (necessary time to service 224 rooms). Nonetheless, we are always happy to prioritize the service upon a simple request. We do hope that we will have an opportunity to welcome you again. I invite you to contact me directly via jp.lovotti@accor.com as we would love you to see you experience The True Novotel.  Best regards,  JPL  Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Lovely hotel, superb staff
review: The room is okey ,double sliding doors to keep the street noise out,still noisy. The distance from the lobby to car park is long. Breakfast very good and very friendly staff Al around a nice hotel on a good location .

title: Friendly caring staff & clean resort
review: We stayed for 8 nights. The hotel staff were amazing. Very friendly and most up for a chat. The resort is very clean and walking distance to karon shops and restaurants. Transport is in very close proximity and cheap to get to Kata and Patong.

title: Family Holiday
review: Dear RobynLeigh01,  Thank you for your generous feedback! It is great to read that you have enjoyed the excellent services and care from our team as well as the benefit of our location. At Novotel Phuket Karon the team is entirely dedicated to offer Fantastic Stays to our Guests. It’s always a pleasure to read how much you have loved staying with us. I will look forward to welcoming you again and I invite you to get in touch with me directly at jp.lovotti@accor.com to facilitate the organization of your next holidays.  Warm regards,  JPL  Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: We love Novotel Karon
review: We enjoyed 10 days at the Novotel, 2 adults 2 kids, adjoining rooms. Staff were excellent, all restaurants were high quality service & food. We had 2 great rooms, small issue with a blocked toilet that was fixed immediately. We had a late flight on check out day(9pm flight) the staff were very accommodating and allow us all to use one of the rooms to relax, shower etc at no cost until 5.30pm, our shuttle left the hotel at 6pm.....my only small criticism was the bathroom towels, very thin, very tired for such a great hotel....Overall we all felt very happy with the Hotel we choose to stay at while in Phuket.....Very safe for families, young or old.

title: Matorphet
review: Dear BMABP,  Thanks a lot for sharing your journey with us. We are glad to read that you enjoyed a Funtastic Family holiday at Novotel Phuket Karon thanks to the efforts of our team. We are pleased to read that our team was able to solve the unfortunate matter quickly. As for the bath linen, we are continuously replacing them, and will have them fluffy again for your next visit. The team and I hope that we will have a chance to welcome you back in the nearest future. Feel Welcome to contact me directly at jp.lovotti@accor.com.  Warmest regards  JPL  Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Awesome!
review: Booked Novotel for celebrate our 15th wedding anniversary. I wanted something very special and memorable and the Novotel didn't let me down. My wife, daughter and I stayed for 5 days (11-15/Oct/2016) in a deluxe family room with kids facilities. We are very love this room. These room are spacious, clean and comfortable. The staff are very excellent especially your Assistant Front Office Manager. She is very kind helpful and always have a smiling face. It is too regret that the water slide was under maintenance during our stay.

title: Great rooms, facilities, food and location
review: I have nothing to fault about this hotel. The location is super handy across the road from the beach and a short walk to shops and restaurant. The facilities are great. Our kids especially enjoyed the kids club which has fabulous staff. We stayed in a private pool plunge room which was perfect for our familiy.  My only complaint is that these rooms do not have private courtyard areas and are open for everyone to see, so it's private use pool but not really private.

title: Perfect Oasis
review: Dear wheressharon,  Thank you for your generous words and for choosing Novotel Phuket Karon for your Family Holiday!  We always love hearing that our guests enjoyed their stay thanks to the modern facilities of the resort, warm services and the benefit of our location. We are pleased that you could have experienced the best Novotel Phuket Karon has to offer. It would be marvelous to welcome you again in the future and I invite you to contact me directly via jp.lovotti@accor.com to facilitate the organization of your future trip.  Tropical regards,  JPL  Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: So Enjoyable...!
review: The perfect oasis to come home to relax in after day trips or just to laze around the pool during the day. Clean, and very spacious suites,with friendly staff always on hand to look after you......only negative was food ordered in room service was never collected after we'd finished,we had to phone reception to come and collect....... Would definitely recommend for couples and family's with small children

title: Definately would recommend
review: Dear laninoz68,   Thanks a lot for your fantastic review.  We are pleased to read that you enjoyed your holiday at Novotel Phuket Karon, thanks to the modern facilities and comfort of your spacious Suite as well as for the Warm welcome and genuine care from our teams. Regarding the Room Services, we are concerned about your privacy and do not wish to interrupt your delicious moment. Nonetheless, our team is on standby to collect or assist you with a simple call to our Operator.  The team and I will be more than happy to welcome you again. Feel Welcome to get in touch with me directly via jp.lovotti@accor.com to design your next visit in Phuket.  Warmest regards,  JPL  Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Comfortable and Spacious Room
review: It is my first visit to Novotel Phuket Karon Beach...  Overall the first impression is the hotel and public facilities are new and tidy. The staff is welcoming, helpful and courteous.  The most enjoyable part is its outdoor pool which is so spacious surrounding by a lot of green trees and plantings.  Choices from buffet breakfast are adequate and acceptable.  Withing the guest room, the bed mattress is comfortable and air condition is quiet.  However the washroom is a bit small. Its shower rail is almost broken that the hand shower and the whole rail can be fallen off easily.  We have no idea how to turn on the TV as it is not set as TV mode when first turned on.

title: Friendly,  enjoyable and quiet
review: Stayed over a week at the hotel. Rooms and premises were clean, and surprisingly free of flies and bugs (I expected to a lot of them during the rainy season). Plenty of facilities,  including swimming pools, gym, bars and good eats. Staff was very friendly, always available to lend a hand. Had a great vacation. One negative comnent: cab to and from the airport is 1000 Baht, whereas the hotel charges 1900 Baht (claiming it is their shuttle...)

title: Amazing secluded resort with very helpful staff.
review: Dear ronger5,  Thanks a lot for your fantastic review!  We are happy to read that you had an enjoyable stay, thanks to the facilities of the Resort, as well as for the meticulous attention from our Housekeeper whom always ensures that the resort is at its best. We are pleased to see you could experience the warm welcome from our Team. For the transportation services from Airport, we do recommend using officially licensed company for your peace of mind. While Local service providers remain available, they could offer a different level of comfort or security.  The Team and I are looking forward to meeting you again in the near future. Feel Welcome to give me an e-call via jp.lovotti@accor.com to assist with your next journey with us.  Tropical regards,  JPL  Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Great Holiday
review: I stayed for two nights at this resort, and wish i could have stayed longer. We took the plunge pool room - which has a separate living room, bed room and large bathroom - it can sleep four as the living room has two roll out single beds from the sofa.   The plunge pool is much larger than the photos show - and very much worth the extra bucks compared to the normal rooms. Do note that you are not completely private in the plunge pool as the pool is visible to all walkways including the outdoor patio and outdoor tables - so other guests and/or staff walking by will have a clear line of sight however indoors you can shut the blinds for complete privacy.   The hotel is not on the beach-front however and you have to cross a street and small bridge to get to the beach-front however…

title: Fabulous Family Resort
review: Dear bbigote   Thank you for your fantastic review and for choosing Novotel Phuket Karon for your holidays! We enjoyed reading your lovely words and highly appreciated the praise given to our resort. Indeed, 2 nights at Novotel Phuket Karon will never be enough given the amount of facilities, activities and services available at the resort. We wish you could stay with us longer to experience all of them. Our Team is dedicated to create experiences our Guests Love and we are glad to have successfully contributed to your holiday  thanks to their true sense of hospitality. I shall not miss an opportunity to share your words with our team members with a special mentioned to Khun Alex for his outstanding services.  The team and I couldn’t be happier to know that you will be staying with us for your next visit in Phuket. We look forward to welcoming you back to your ‘Holiday Home’ and I invite you to contact me directly via jp.lovotti@accor.com to facilitate the organization of your upcoming journey,   Warmest regards,   JPL  Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: AMAZING HOLIDAY
review: We have just returned from a one week stay at this hotel. The property is in a good location directly opposite the beach at the northern end of the resort just a short walk from the centre where you'll find lots of shops, restaurants and a handful of bars. Be aware that the hotel is on a sharp bend and the road is busy, however there is a traffic warden 24/7 who helps guests cross when required.    The staff are extremely friendly and helpful especially when a member of our party fell sick. The hotel provided a nurse and complimentary room service as well.    There are three large swimming pools including a childrens pool with waterslide (currently closed for maintenance). The main pool has a swim up bar and restaurant whilst the other slightly smaller pool has a sports bar.…

title: Nice place to enjoy your holidays
review: Spent 5 days for a company outing with colleagues from all over the world . The staff were all smiling and willing to help .Fauad the guest relation manager who was handling our group was very accommodating.  The resort has 3 swimming pools to choose which one to dive in . Breakfast was good and our gala dinner was a success . Only shortcoming was the bathrooms were a tad too small compared to the rooms . The hotel is 400 m from karon circle n beach . 300 m from a 7/11 . Patong is couple of km from the resort.  The hotel has free shuttle at specific times or else you can grab a tuktuk for about 300 bahts. Our team was very satisfied .

title: Enjoyed our first trip to Karon
review: Dear bibiNfifi,   Thank you for taking your time to share your experience online.  At Novotel Phuket Karon, we have a passion for delighting our Guests. I’m pleased to read that Fuad was outstanding and we were able to be part of your great gala dinner in Phuket!. I will certainly share your comment with the team. We do hope that we’ll have the chance to be your venue for any future occasion and I invite you to contact me directly via jp.lovotti@accor.com   Warm regards,   JPL  Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Excellent
review: We enjoyed our six nights at Novatel last week. A big thank you to On, the waitress at breakfast for looking after my dietary requirements - the gluten free pancakes were delicious. On arrival we discovered our suite was near the road. My husband is a light sleeper so when we requested a room change, Jamie and the reception staff organised a room change - this was a hassle free process and was not a bother to them in slightest. Being an Accor member we used our card on food at resort and found food to be reasonably priced and very nice.

title: second trip to Phuket
review: Dear Tamina T,  Thank you for sharing your review online.  We love reading that you enjoyed your stay at Novotel Phuket Karon and could experience the genuine attention and care from our team. Our Culinary team loves providing gastronomic journeys to all of our guests regardless of specific diets. I will certainly share your comment with the team as well as the highlight for On and Jamie. The team and I are looking forward to welcoming you again and hope to see you enjoy the great benefit of being an Accor Plus Member at your ‘Holiday Home’. Feel Welcome to get in touch with me at jp.lovotti@accor.com.  Sincerely,  JPL  Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: 3 swimming pools and nice breakfast
review: Stayed at Novotel Karon Beach last week and was extremely impressed not only by the standard of the hotel but the amazing staff. Slavo, Sergey, Plam, James to name afew really went above and beyond in every way to make our stay in Phuket a truely relaxing, stress free enjoyable experience. From being picked up at the airport ease of check in and the cleanliness well appointed rooms I knew it was going to be a memorable stay.  Pool water quality was excellent, which in tropical areas can be taxing at the best of times especially being in the rainy season.  Breakfast choice, quality and quantity was excellent all made better by a fantastic staff which Accor should be proud of.  The restaurant menus we're fantastic as you really did get what's in the picture and description. Hot…

title: Great Resort, Extremely friendly staff
review: The resort is excellent, great location. couple of minutes to the beach and the town area. Extremely friendly staff and always going the extra mile to provide an excellent service. Food and beverages were great too.

title: Excellent family hotel.

title: Very Clean
review: Very good family hotel . The room was nice and clean . The breakfast was good except birds kept flying inside but the hotel's staff tried as best as they could to get the birds out. The swimming pool on the second floor was very nice except the pool was very high in chlorine . But the water slide was very fun.

title: Great family friendly resort
review: Stayed at Novotel and found it was extremely clean. During our stay the resort was nearly at capacity but this did not seem to cause a problem.  The staff were very helpful.  There were only a couple of downsides and they were the breakfast area is quite confined and once food etc runs out it takes a while to replenish. The other downside was that our room was never cleaned until late in the afternoon. We did ask for  late checkout which was denied even though our room was not cleaned until late that afternoon. We were advised that we could have shower in the spa but when we attended the spa staff were very rude and not helpful until the reception staff arrived and explained what was occurring.  Overall the resort is in a great location and only 5 min walk from the main area of…

title: Very nice and spacious, if you book a suite
review: Me and my girlfriend spent there 7 nights. I booked a suite with a plunge pool. This hotel has some problems. We arrived around 3pm which is a normal time for check-in. They informed us that our plunge suite is not ready and will be around 7pm, because of some maintenance. They put us at another suite and apologized, gave us some fruit for free, which was nice, and also some free cocktails. The suite is nice, spacious and clean. Not the greatest quality furniture, but modern and good. The bathroom is huge, modern and very convenient. There is a private space in front of the suite with some chairs and a table, next to the plunge pool. The plunge pool is more of a big bath tub, not really a pool. But still a nice touch when you want to relax a bit in the evening. Breakfast is…

title: Fab Hotel
review: Dear VentsiBeast  Thank you for taking your time sharing your experience online and for choosing Novotel Phuket Karon for your getaway. The resort has been designed to offer a relaxing atmosphere with modern facilities to suit the needs of our Guests. Our Plunge Pool Suite is indeed the perfect choice for those looking for a spacious and modern accommodation. At the same time, the lush vegetation all around the resort provides an ideal setting for a relaxing stroll. I’m glad to read that we could meet your expectations and were able to earn your valuable 5-star review. Could we share that Karon Beach is considered by the Locals as one of the most beautiful beach on the Island. Nonetheless, weather conditions during the green season might affect the scenery. Thank you for your kind recommendation of the hotel to your friends.  I  hope that we will have a chance to welcome you back to Novotel Phuket Karon in the future and I invite you to contact me directly via jp.lovotti@accor.com   Warm regards,  JPL  Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Stressful check in but beautiful hotel.
review: Check in was quick and organised with free cold drink and face cloths on arrival.  Staff friendly and always willing to help.  Security man very welcome in an evening when crossing road.  Our room was suite with splash pool/Jacuzzi which was great.  Fantastic bathroom and beds were large and comfy.  Great having 2 flat screen TV's so kids could watch tv in their room. Ample wardrobe space/drawers.  Breakfast had everything you could wish for - excellent food.  No need to get up early to put towels on sunbeds, always free ones to pick whatever time of day.  Price of meals and drinks in hotel were fractionally more expensive than other restaurants in town, but we did eat & drink at hotel (there are happy hours).  Average price of meal when in town (family of 4) was approx. 1500…

title: Right choice of hotel for a family vacay
review: The man who checked us in created unnecessary trouble as I did not have the card I had pre-paid the accommodation with (it expired and I had booked a long while before we came) yet gave him every proof of my identity. This was a stressful hour but he finally let us into our room and then we heard nothing more about it. They also ask for a bond which we (and the other families we stayed with) had no idea about until we got there. Be prepared to hand a couple of hundred Australian dollars over on arrival.  The breakfast was beautiful, as were the pools, gardens and rooms. After the arrival it was a very enjoyable stay.

title: Fabulous Hotel
review: Great hotel, fabulous pools nice and clean and quiet so always guaranteed a bed. Pool staff did not have the best English but you can eventually get your point across. All staff very friendly and helpful.Rooms lovely we got upgraded to a superior room with plunge pool which was great! Only thing for us was the location, more variety of nice restaurants and bars in patong and shopping so ended up getting taxi there most nights which cost €10 from the hotel and around €7 back in a tuk tuk! But overall lovely hotel, beach 5 minutes walk but only small area to swim in this time of year due to choppy water.

title: gorgeous hotel, nice pools, perfect room

It is a pleasure reading how much you have enjoyed your stay with us, should it be for the design and atmosphere of the resort, for the dedicated attention & care extended by our Teams, or for the Quality of the Services we propose. title: Fantastic hotel!!!!
review: We stayed with 4 adults and 2 toddlers in 2 DELUXE rooms. Check in process was a little long due to some mistake in the reservation. They managed very well and do not charge us extra... Deluxe rooms was perfect for us. Special mention for the quality of the linen and mattress. Hotel offer plenty of services and we mostly use all of them: Kid's room, 3 large pools, restaurants, room service, bar. Nothing to add: just exactly what we need. Price is affordable so far. Staff service was efficient. Housekeepings great. A lot of personal attention for our kids. Location of the hotel is not the best but we knew it. 15 minutes far from Karon town. Not very safe during night time as no/few light on the road. The beach is just opposite but across a fast road. Not make us so easy to reach…

title: Lovely Resort, Lovely People, great amenities.
review: Dear Alex C  Thank you for sharing your review online!  We are glad to read that you have enjoyed the dedicated attention and care proposed by our team. They have a sincere passion to create experiences our Guests Love and we are delighted that you could have enjoy it. The resort has been designed to offer a relaxing environment, great fun facilities with 3 swimming pools, and a large panel of restaurants & bars as well as kids facilities. We are glad that you liked them and enjoyed all of them. Icing on the cake is the ideal location on Karon Beach, just next to a lively and cultural district. Tropical regards,  JPL  Jean Philippe Lovotti  General Manager

title: Perfect beautiful idyllic place
review: This is the first time in Thailand and what a wonderful experience we have had. Looked at many hotels beforehand but so glad we chose this one. Seen many other hotels here which we had looked at on the internet and lets just say the pics of some of them leave a lot to be desired. The pics of this hotel, well what you see is what you get :)  We stayed in a plunge pool suite (highly recommend for the extra money), which also has your own deck area. Also had a pet frog living in the pool screening which kids thought was pretty cool so if you stay in room 212 he lives in the 4th pole along under the big leaf. Please take care of him :) Garden areas are green and lush and are tended to meticulously. Beach is 2-3 mins walk and is beautiful to watch sunset. Nightlife in Karon is quiet…

title: Fantastic place to stay
review: We purchased an 8 night holiday here via one of the group deal sites for a very cheap price which included 3 x dinners + 4 massages + daily breakfast + free cocktails etc. We have done this a few times for Thailand and you never know the quality of the hotel. We chose this trip due to the location of the hotel and the fact that it has the Novatel reputation to uphold. We were not disappointed! Even though we were on a "group buy deal" with vouchers, we were never made to feel inferior by the staff (which has happened to us before). The main pool was fantastic with heaps of deck chairs / cabanas available and it was only a 3 minute walk across the road to Karon Beach. The staff could not have been better and the day spa massages were the best we have ever had. Maybe the food…

title: Great Atmosphere
review: This hotel has a great set up for families. They have a kids pool with slide, a kids play room as well as special lunches & dinners for kids. We stayed here as a couple & also found it quite relaxing even with all the kids. It is about half an hour from the bustling Patong Beach but still has it's own little shopping and dining area. Close to a lot of attractions such as Big Budha, Old Phuket town and Trick eye museum.

title: Great Family hotel not so good for pensioners
review: Dear Jasna S,  Thank you for your lovely words.  We love reading how much you have enjoyed your stay with us, as much for the design and atmosphere of the resort, for the quality and the comfort of our rooms, but most importantly for the dedicated attention and care extended by our Teams. title: Lovely Resort in Tropical Paradise
review: Great venue very family oriented. Good with keeping kids entertained. Very helpful staff especially the girls at the restaurants can only remember few names though. But overall, I hope they are paid enough for all the work they do. Downside is food portions for kids meals were enough for possible a 2-3 yr old. I wasn't happy either when I asked for a bread roll for my son who had just had at the TAI restaurant only to be told by the guy working that they can't supply any as they have been accounted for the evening. Not the way you ran a restaurant especially when one is paying for food not getting it for free.

title: Good location and friendly staff
review: This hotel is great for kids, it has 3 pools, one has a slide and pool games for the kids.  There is a kid's club which you can leave your kids there for the morning/afternoon with a variety of things to keep them out of trouble like clay painting, watching a movie. The breakfast is a good spread with a good mix of Western and Asian to suit everyone.  The room we stayed in was a family room and it was big enough for us (3 boys).  We had a huge double and a bunk bed. The location is great, it's about a 15 mins walk into town and you can walk along the beach to reach town too which is nice. There are some good restaurants nearby if you do not wish to venture into town. Overall a good hotel and service with a smile.

title: Horrible check In
review: They took time to get done with the check in formalities They told me to wait for an hour to occupy the room since I was early. Even after an hour all I get to hear from the reception is they will check from House Keeping Staff if the room is ready. It's unbelievably hot in the lobby and my wife and I were drenched in sweat. Due to the delay they offered me two cocktail coupons. The welcome by Novotel is a huge disappointment!

title: Lovely hotel and staff - relaxation
review: Stayed here for 2 weeks and enjoyed our stay. Rooms were well presented and house keeping was generally good. We found it a bit of a pain with timing for having our room cleaned as it varies so much, for example sometimes cleaned before lunch but at other times not cleaned until after 6pm. Also towels are not always replaced, one might be changed but the other left?   Breakfast was really good- so much choice and we never had a problem being seated. Meals weren't too expensive but of course more so than in town.   Location is ok- it is a 5/10 minute walk to town but it is nice to be out of the way of the hustle and bustle.  One think that I didn't like was having a payment held on my credit card at check in. We had pre paid for our stay and to be asked for more money on arrival…

title: The Art of Hospitality
review: 3 nights in Phuket and the team went out of their way to make us feel very welcome throughout and at every interaction.  The room was great especially when travelling with 2 kids with soft toys etc. Great variety at the poolside cafe nightly and breakfast was good throughout. Special thanks to Ake, James, Sergey, Toom and Snow for ensuring we had a comfortable stay. There are many more who made it special and thank you to all at the hotel. We will be back!

title: Great experience
review: As part of a party of 28, Just back from 10 fantastic days spent in the Novotel in Karon!  As reflected in previous reviews the facilities are excellent! Much use was made of the three pools (no problems finding sunbeds and the kids loved the amazing slide) kids club, gym, massages in the spa, free yoga sessions, but what stands out are the staff, they are simply brilliant and go above and beyond. There were a few problems, including a couple of blocked toilets, rude guests jumping the queue at breakfast refusing to move from our allotted table, but all were sorted out by the patient staff without fuss and a smile.   I was in Thailand to celebrate our friends’ special birthdays. Special thanks goes to Ake, who helped with a surprise celebratory birthday party organised in the…

title: Great Hotel for Families with Wonderful Staff
review: We spent 9 nights at the hotel and have absolutely no negative feedback that can be attributed to the hotel.   We had a delux family room which easily fitted the 4 of us.  The room was spacious the only thing was the glass wall for the bathroom so we used some tape etc to cover it up.   I can't really comment on the F&B as we ate all meals except breakfast outside the hotel. Breakfast was great though after a week some variety would have been a bonus.   The kids club was great and my son enjoyed it almost every day. The pools were all well maintained and we only struggled occasionally to find some sun loungers.   With easy access to the beach which was well policed so crossing the road was no hassles. I managed to hurt myself and their first aid was top notch well followed…

title: Wonderful
review: We stayed in a family room at the Novotel for 5 nights. We were a family of 4, 2 adults and 2 kids (aged 7 and 3). The room was very spacious and clean but had a bad smell. When the receptionist first took us to the room we raised this to him but he assured that the smell will go away soon, however it did not but we didn't report it again anyways. Also, room towels and pool towels are worn out and need to be replaced.   On a separate note, there was a nail which had come out of the room's flooring which cut my son's foot. This should have been noticed and fixed by the resort before the incident ( specially in a family room which is meant to have kids). However, this was fixed only after we've reported the incident.  There were 3 pools, one of which was a kids pool with a slide…

title: Lovely place, friendly staff, great break with young kids
review: Stayed in this hotel during 3rd week of July. Not ideal for honeymoon / couples. For family it is awesome as reflected on other reviews too.  Little far to the city but very close to the beach and amazing view from the hotel. The enviromemnt is superb and hotel staffs were great and helpful too.  The dining in option had limited number of vegetarian food.  Overall it's a good clean hotel with beautiful view and close to the beach.

title: Great Hotel for the Family

title: Holiday at Novotel
review: Really nice place to stay and explore a little on our first trip to Phuket. A little quieter and away from the big night life centres, but a nice selection of restaurants on site and within walking distance.   The kids club is truly brilliant, made so by the staff. My little ones are pleading to go back. Would strongly recommend this hotel.

title: Amazing resort, modern and clean
review: We stayed here for 6 nights over July/August 2016 and it was amazing! Great breakfast buffet, lovely friendly staff and excellent facilities. There are several different dining options and all were Hugh quality. The location is awesome, easy walk to the Karon shops, and only a 10 minute drive to Patong. We found a lovely taxi driver who acted as a chauffeur for us for a few days and was very helpful.

title: Villa life at Novotel
review: Dear anna_nz2016,  Many thanks for your amazing review! We all love reading that you have enjoyed the resort’s ideal location as well as its facilities. We are glad also that you could have experienced our team genuine sense of Hospitality during your stay. The Culinary team aims to delight our guests by providing great quality products in our different restaurants. We will be more than happy to welcome you again. Feel welcome to get in touch with me at jp.lovotti@accor.com.  Warmest regards,  JPL  Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Fantastic
review: This Novotel has a great asset; apart from the normal rooms they have small appartments with a separate bedroom and room for one or two children in the sittingarea. The bathroom is enormous with two sinks, a freestanding bath and a walkin shower. Just beautiful! You also have a dech ouside with a smal diningtable and four chairs, a lounge sofa and a small pool to cool of in. Beautiful greenery all around to keep things a bit private. The only thing that wasn't really well designed is the pool being next to the entrance to the bedroom. The wood flooring is bound to get wet in our case was ruined already.  The swimming area of the hotel is just wonderful, with even submerged chairs in the water. Food and drinks are easy to order and its great to have day by the pool here! The…

title: Exceptional
review: Dear diederika,  Thank you for sharing your feedback online. We couldn't be happier to read that you spent a wonderful holiday at Novotel Phuket Karon. Our resort facilities indeed received many praises, especially the Lagoon Pool with swim-up bar which allows you to grab some refreshment easily. Our Chefs aim to delight our guests with their passion for gastronomy by providing various options to suit the taste of each of our guest. We will look forward to welcoming you back soon. Feel welcome to contact me directly via jp.lovotti@accor.com.  Tropical regards,  JPL  Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Amazing service from staff
review: Wonderful hotel and staff so helpful and friendly.  Spotless and gardens so well kept. We stayed in a suite which consisted of a room with a huge bed with 2 glass walls which opened up onto a covered balcony.  There was a lounge where the sofa transformed into 2 separate single beds- perfect for preventing our 2 young sons arguing over covers!  The bathroom was perfect, an oval free standing bath tub and a separate waterfall shower.  Usual TVs, minibar etc. Breakfast consisted of a wide range of dishes and defied anyone not to find something they would like to eat!  Children loved making their pancakes with chocolate sauce.  3 swimming pools, the main one with restaurants and swim up bar also with waiter service.  Another had a water chute for the children beside the kids club…

title: A great place to Stay
review: Not our normal holiday to stay in one place at a resort, but this place is very good.We stayed 10 nights. The staff really make a difference, they are very friendly and helpful. The food at the restaurants was great. We meet our Son and daughter in law and grandkids there. It is very kid friendly, but also adults are looked after as well. Would reccommend a stay here.

title: Mixed feelings but the novotel karon beach service crew was great
review: Dear PT01,  Thank you for your fantastic review! We are pleased to read that the team made a difference and that Novotel Phuket Karon stand out as a great resort for your 10 days holidays. The Resort has been designed to provide facilities for everyone: 3 swimming-pools and Gym for your entertainment, Restaurants and Bars to suit your culinary preferences, Kids pool with waterslide and the Funtastic Kids World for kids it would be our pleasure to see you back at the resort. Feel Welcome to contact me directly via jp.lovotti@accor.com to assist with your next journey   Warm regards,  JPL  Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: A great resort
review: Overall, the stay at Novotel Karon was average - I have had better experience at other Accor group of hotels.   The front desk reception folks tried their best but the crew taking care of our luggage and driving us via the buggy were great.   The hotel is about 40 mins away from the Phuket International AIrport. Taxi fare is THB$1000 one way for a four-people.   Room Booking - Terms and Conditions  Booked two rooms some time ago before my trip and the terms and conditions were for pre-payment. Paid upfront via credit card at the point of booking. Upon checking in at the hotel, I was told that my earlier pre-payment will be cancelled, refunded to me in 40 days and I will need to make a new payment of the same amount upon checking in. That totally didnt make sense. I would have…

title: Supreme Resort

We also appreciate your recommendations regarding the breakfast and bathroom that we will certainly take in account as we strive towards delivering Excellence.  Nonetheless, may I share with you that the prepaid booking requires our guests to present the credit card used when making the booking. This is to minimize the risk of fraud for our Guests.   Feel Welcome to contact me directly via jp.lovotti@accor.com I will be more than happy to assist you in any possible ways.  Sincerely,  JPL  Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Comfortable accomodation
review: Booked 2 connecting rooms for our anniversary trip with kids, the staff decorated our room with heart shaped towels and flower petals which was a very nice gesture. Our kids really feel welcome with their names written on the door hanger upon arrival, giant teddy bear on the bed, and little surprise gifts hidden in the room. This is a kid friendly resort, the kids club is excellent, 3 swimming pools including one with slides and giant bubble ride in the afternoon. The only downside is actually for the location, it's quite a distance to go anywhere especially with kids / toddlers so you'll have to go with taxi / tuktuk which will add an extra cost.

title: Great location.... Luxury at a great price
review: We loved the Novotel..... It's on the edge of town but we didn't mind a 10 minute walk. Staff are lovely and the extras such as yoga and Thai boxing classes really made our stay. We had one standard room and one with a plunge pool.... That was worth the extra money. The pool area is great and the drinks not too unreasonable (although obviously much cheaper to go to a supermarket).

title: Great hospitality and perfect venue for young and old!
review: Dear Sarah M,  Many thanks for your fantastic review!  We love to read that you have enjoyed a well-deserved holiday at Novotel Phuket Karon. Our team is dedicated to provide experiences pour Guests Love and glad that you could have enjoyed it. Our Recreation Team loves sharing the Fun and couldn’t be happier to have contributed to your great stay!  We hope that we’ll have the chance to welcoming you again and I invite you to contact me via jp.lovotti@accor.com to design your next visit in Phuket.  Tropical regards,  JPL  Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Great resort
review: Booked this hotel for my daughters 21st birthday. I wanted something very special and memorable and the Novotel didn't let me down! I was meeting my daughter in Thailand as she lives in England and I live in New Zealand, so a half way point. The hotel catered well for us both, with extremely clean facilities, rooms were spotless, food was great and good value for money too! Getting a taxi to experience the night life of Patong was easy and cheap too and only a 10 minute fun tuktuk ride away. Many local eateries within a few minutes walk too. We had 10 nights there and no disappointments whatsoever, in fact the reverse as all the staff went out of their way to make arrangements for my daughters special day extra special including decorating the breakfast area with banners and…

title: Fantastic resort
review: Dear TullyWiseacre,  Thank you for choosing Novotel Phuket Karon for your reunion with your daughter!   At Novotel Phuket Karon, we are aiming to delight our guests with a true sense of hospitality and genuine care. Indeed, with 3 swimming pools, modern rooms and a large choice of activities, the resort caters to everyone. Its location close to Patong and Karon center also makes it a popular choice for everyone. It has been our pleasure to be part of your daughter’s 21st Birthday.  I will certainly share your message with the team during the next meeting.  It would be marvelous to welcome you back at the resort for your next celebration. Feel Welcome to get in touch with me directly via jp.lovotti@accor.com to design your next journey.  Tropical regards,  JPL  Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Good experience at novotel karon!!
review: Stayed here for about a week and it was amazing. Cocktails in the pool and the all you can eat breakfast were the best. Very clean and large hotel room, very friendly staff.  Not too far from patong, just rent a motorcycle, cheaper than paying for tuk tuks.

title: Great Resort
review: We stayed for 5 days in the room with a plunge pool- it was worth the extra $$$. Family of 4 was well spaced Great pool, facilities, restaurants and bars. All reasonably priced. Only a short walk into Karon- and just over from the beach. Would stay here again.

title: Nice hotel and nice location
review: Excellent facilities. Friendly staff. Great location. Great place for a young family. Pity we couldnt stay longer becasue there are so many facilities to explore. Close to the markets and 15 minutes from Patong beach.

title: Relaxing family holiday....
review: Very nice hotel, nice breakfast and restaurant. " pools ideal to hang around in the evenings. Very peaceful. The road just off the hotel is quite dangerous but there is always someone from the staff 24/7 to help you with that..although still be very careful. The beach is very close so ideal if you have not planned any day trip. You can walk to town and on the way you will find currency exchange points, super markets and shops where you can buy clothes, snorkeling kit (not great but ok) etc. On the high street there is a very nice lady who runs an agency (right next to the currency exchange point, almost at the beginning of the road coming from the beach, on the right). Strongly recommend to go there, she is very nice and prices are cheap. Enjoy your stay! :)

title: Great Hotel with even better staff and food to match!
review: Staff are unbelievable here, Food is even better offering 3 restaurants to eat from and 2 bars, rooms are clean and tidy. Stayed at this hotel a few times, had a minor issue with one of the rooms this stay and got upgraded instantly no questions asked. Highly Recommended

title: 😍😍😍love this place

We look forward to seeing you back to the Resort and I invite you to contact me directly via jp.lovotti@accor.com for the organization of your future trip,  Tropical regards,  JPL  Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Fabulous Hotel
review: Thanks for the best time. Such a great place,  very clean and comfortable. Fantastic breakfast, lovely helpful staff. Our first visit to phuket Thailand,  was made a great experience thanks to the place we stayed.

title: Gluten Free diet
review: Dear Deeni,  Thank you for your great review! We love reading that you had a Fantastic Time at the Resort and great experiences throughout your stay! Feel welcome to contact me directly via jp.lovotti@accor.com then,  Warmest regards,  JPL  Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Oasis Resort!
review: Our stay was nothing but outstanding! The staff are extremely happy, friendly and do everything they can to make your stay  enjoyable. Had interconnecting rooms, beds, bathroom , everything was clean and comfortable. Breakfast was sensational, everything you could possibly want. Loved water aerobics in the morning, the staff always making it enjoyable and entertaining. Nothing not to like about this place, highly recommend, thanks Novotel we thoroughly enjoyed our stay.

title: Family holiday
review: We stayed at the Novotel Karon Beach earlier this month, we are a family of seven aged 7, 12, 21,23,25,46 and 48 so we all wanted something different from a hotel. Everyone enjoyed the Novotel. The 20 somethings could jump in a tuk tuk for 300 Bhart  to Patong and have a great night out. The little ones loved the kids club, waterslide and zorb. The resort was within easy walking distance from the Karon restaurants and shops but a nice quite resort. The facilities were in great condition and the staff extremely helpful. The resort taxi drivers would drive you to a destination and wait while you did your sightseeing or shopping.    Highly recommend this hotel.

title: Fantastic Place
review: Dear MissieManners  Thank you for sharing your feedback online.  We are glad that your entire family had a Funtastic holiday!  At Novotel Phuket Karon, there is indeed a choice for everyone! Located in Karon, our hotel is known for its tranquil atmosphere providing an easy access to nearby entertainment. The Kids club with its daily program of activities and Kids’ pool are always popular spots for the children. We’re glad that your kids enjoyed their time there. I am pleased to read that we successfully contributed to your family escape.   It would be our pleasure to welcome you again in the future. title: Near Perfection
review: From the efficient and happy check in right through the week to check out nothing was to hard for these guys. Always happy to help and always smiling. The hotel facilities are great, 3 clean pools, happy hour pool bar cocktails are lovely and good buffet breakfast. Comfortable rooms and super room  service  Made the kids feel really special and even sent them a follow up email after leaving.  Would recommend to families in a heart beat

title: Awesome Stay @ Novotel Phuket Karon Beach
review: Dear daf1976,  Thank you for the fantastic feedback of your recent stay at Novotel Phuket Karon.   Our teams have a passion to delight our Guests with a genuine attention and care. In fact, each kid is a very important guest at the resort! I’m glad to see that we were able to provide you with a perfect family holiday. Our 3 swimming pools and daily happy hours are always popular.  We are glad that you have also enjoyed the comfort of your room, facilities and services. Warm regards,  JPL   Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Good family hotel
review: From the attentive staff to the luxurious room to the excellent location everything about the Novotel Phuket Karon Beach Resort was outstanding.   I stayed in the plunge pool suite and it was everything you could expect - spacious, comfortable bed, great shower head and big tub, even the wifi worked great and was fast all the time. The plunge pool was just big enough to enjoy a relaxing dip in the cool water at any time I felt too lazy too walk over to the big lagoon pool.  All the restaurants on the property had good food; even the breakfast buffet had a great variety and everything was tasty - definitely not your standard breakfast here.   I stayed in Patong on my previous trip to Phuket and was disappointed by the quality of the beach and all the dirty bars and street…

title: Great resort with cosy room and customer service, but substandard breakfast
review: Booked via my Accor account and pleasantly received an email the next 1 or 2 days to inform me of my gold member benefits and enquire if I would like an early check in or check out. One of the rare times that i received such emails originating from the hotels. Marvellous.  Check in was smooth and speedy. I suppose that front office staff tried to speed up the process even though there was nobody else (unsure if it was their performance indicator), but I was more chilled and relaxed for them to take longer. Cannot fault them for trying to reduce waiting time of guests at check in. The front office lady got a buggy to drive me to my room. Nice.  Room was cosy and beautiful - both bedroom and living room. Comfortable and relaxing.  Pool area had sufficient chairs and recliners for…

The Benefits are design to suit your needs and certainly a recognized program across the Brands.   The Resort has been designed to provide you with a comfortable environment, wherever you are: 3 distinct swimming-pools, Restaurants and Bars to suit your culinary preferences, a great Gym and Funtastic Kids’ World… On the other hand, we also appreciate your recommendations and suggestions that we will certainly take in account as we strive towards delivering Excellence. title: Outstanding
review: Stayed here for a week in June with my family. Had already stayed a week in Patong so was happy to stay in Karen even though the hotel doesn't offer a shuttle to Patong. Stayed in a room overlooking the kids pool was very nice however standard items like face towels and slippers were not provided in these rooms. Spoke to David the office manager and he managed to organise these for us. After 4 nights Alex and David upgraded us to a plunge pool suite which was extremely nice. I'd recommend these rooms if you were staying longer than 4 nights. Hotel is accessible to beach. We Walked from the hotel to kata beach, not very far. Breakfast was good with a range of western/Asian and was changed daily. Restaurant gets very hot due to it being open and exposed to the heat. It is also on…

title: 2nd Visit to this Fabulous Resort
review: Dear ColeHolidays,  Thank you for sharing your experience of your recent stay online.  It is a pleasure to read your review, and how much you have enjoyed your stay with us. Our Team are dedicated to provide experiences our Guests Love, with a genuine attention and care. We are glad that you enjoyed their  remarkable sense of Hospitality during your stay. Karon is indeed known to be a tranquil destination with an easy access to the beach and nearby entertainment. Our Kids club and slide at the kids’ pool is always very popular among our guests, and we’re glad that your kids enjoyed some fantastic moments there.   The team and I are looking forward to welcoming you back, feel Welcome to contact me directly via jp.lovotti@accor.com. Warm regards,  JPL

title: Great for Kids
review: Our heartfelt thanks to the wonderful staff who made our stay so enjoyable and relaxed. A superb resort for all types of travellers. We stayed seven nights in the suite with a plunge pool. Our package included all meals and soft drinks. This is definitely terrific value given we travelled with our three year old son. The heat throughout the day ensured our purchase of drinks was never a cost issue like most hotels. The package deals are wonderful. And we would use this again. Kids Club was awesome and staff were always engaging with the children. The food at the restaurants was good. Access to shops is a fifteen minute walk. And the cost of transport ... Paris prices : 600 Baht return to Patong (20 minute round trip) and we found that we spend a considerable amount of money on…

title: Fantastic!
review: This is our first time at this resort and it's fantastic! It's great value for money and looks as though it's been recently refurbished so is lovely and modern. Buffet breakfast is a winner! Huge selection and although a latte isn't included in the standard buffet it's well worth it as the coffee is great! It's not easy to find good coffee in Thailand so it was definitely a bonus!! Staff are amazing and a great selection of food for kids and adults from western to Thai. I don't normally eat pizza but even the pizza is good here! A bug kids club too. A perfect resort for families - highly recommend it!

title: Family holiday in Phuket
review: Dear Mon2670,  Thank you for taking the time to post your review online.  We are delighted to read that you enjoyed a Fantastic stay at Novotel Phuket Karon. The buffet breakfast, with its large choice of local and international food items is always popular with our Guests. We are glad that you fully appreciated it during your stay! Our team is dedicated to provide genuine services with a great sense of hospitality to our Guests, and we are glad you could have enjoyed it! title: Family friendly
review: Fantastic family resort located in karon beach, recently renovated resort with 4 cafes, Thai, sports bar, poolside and buffet for breakfast that caters for all the fussy eaters in your family, can sit at Thai and order pizza or burger! Clean rooms that are well maintained by staff! Kids club more than just a room with computer games, also offer a good range of activities for the children, kids pool needs some love but serves its purpose, other two pools fantastic!! Great value for money resort with amazing staff!

title: Nice and new hotel, friendly staff .
review: Dear Justin5570,  Thanks a lot for the feedback of your recent stay at Novotel Phuket Karon.   We are delighted to read that you enjoyed a Funtastic family holiday with us! title: Fantastic for Families
review: Very good location, just across from Karon Beach.   Resort style concept.  Family friendly, with facilities for children. Kids would love Kids World.  Only drawback is the lack of an air conditioned room for guests to meet and mingle.  Good fast free Wi-Fi.  We enjoyed our stay very much.

title: Perfect for families
review: My partner and I spent 10 days here. My only regret is coming to Thailand and staying here without our little boy. We didn't realise the amazing facilities Novotel has to offer for children. But it's also a great place for couples to visit too.   For families this includes:   * A designated play room with toys, tv and games with staff supervision (like at child care)  * A magnificent pool area with a big water slide just for children includes pool toys etc  * Children's program including cooking lessons, activities and games planned by the hotel   * Breakfast, lunch and dinner and drink menu for the little ones  * Children's bedding etc.  The location is perfect if you want to get away from the hectic night life of Patong. It's only 10 mins away via bike ride. You get privacy, a…

title: Excellent service, Clean and spacious rooms, Nice location
review: Dear Pearl K,  Thank you for taking your time to post your feedback online.   We Love reading how much you have enjoyed your stay with us, and wish that your son could have enjoyed it too. We will certainly look forward to welcoming the entire family back soon! As you mention, Karon is the right balance between the perfect Beach location with lots of authentic restaurants and Bars in the district; this is also a place to relax and chill out with family and friends.  Once again, we hope to welcoming you back soon, Feel Welcome to contact me directly via jp.lovotti@accor.com, I will be pleased to help you design your next journey in Phuket.   Warmest regards,  JPL  Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Great stay with Spa Package
review: We stayed in Novotel Karon beach for 3 days during June 2016. We had booked standard room with King Bed. The room was nice and clean. The staff was very helpful.  Karon beach is at a walk able distance from resort, you just have to cross the road and the staff helps you to do so:). The food menu also has vegetarian options like pasta and they are happy to serve it in your room.  There is a pool bar which serves all kinds of cock tales and other drinks.  All tour operators provide free pick up and drop facility from this hotel which makes it convenient to go out.  There are many pubs and  small market near by where you get all kind of food and drinks. We were also able to get Indian food.

title: Great hotel!!
review: Dear Anoop R,  Thank you for your generous 5-star review.  We appreciate your praise about our resort, the team and their passion for service. It is always great to see that we are successfully achieving our mission to provide top  services toour guests.   It would be marvelous to serve you again in the future and I invite you to get in touch with me via jp.lovotti@accor.com.  Warmest regards,  JPL  Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Perfect for families!
review: We stayed in the hotel for 4 nights. Taking plunge pool suite room. Our son staying at hotel for free with breakfast. We took the spa package and had spa everyday. Spa receptionist is very nice and welcoming us everyday. The room is very spacious with small plunge pool. As member we also got free drink at the bar where you can play pool and dart. We also got a small cake for my wife birthday.

title: Disappointing
review: Not the same service as other Novotel hotels.  Stayed here in a superior room for 3 nights. Housekeeping provided 1 tube of shower gel and 1 tube of shampoo on the first day. Didn't bother checking whether there was any left or to replace with new ones everyday. It was disappointing that I have to call them on 3rd day night when I discovered there was nothing left, right before I showered.   Only cotton pad was provided in the bathroom. No comb, shower cap, toothpaste toothbrush and no in-room slippers. Not acceptable for a 4 star establishment.  The towels and linen appear to be overused. The pillows and duvet are not comfortable.   Location wise not convenient if you would like to venture out. We used Grab most of the time and a metered taxi ride costs about 200 THB to Patong.…

title: Almost Perfect
review: Clean, comfortable, smiling faces, friendly staff, kids friendly, excellent breakfast, top notch service, etc, etc ,etc.    This resort fits the bill for fun fun fun.  I travelled with another family, a total of 4 adults and 3 young girls.  The resort have thought of the small nitty-gritty details, right down to the kids activities.  Our 3 girls received a "Top Secret" mission in an envelop.  There were some tasks they had to complete and when they have done so, they submit it and get a goodie-bag.  Brilliant!  This kept the girls busy for awhile.  They even hid a small "treasure box" in the room and the girls had to find it.  So fun!  The Kids Club staff are just perfect.  They interacted with the kids and played with them not only in the Kids Club, but throughout the resort! …

title: Excellent resort
review: Enjoyed my stay very much; hotel staff were very attentive and service was excellent. My Superior Room was big, bed was extremely comfortable too. Location of the hotel is a little further away from Karon town, but it takes only a direct 10 mins walk along the beach to get there. Spa service was excellent too, but it can be considered pricey if you didn't get the unlimited spa pass. Getting to Patong Beach from the hotel is fast too, about 10-15 ride by taxi which costs between 300-400 baht. Was slightly disappointed when I realised there was no toothpaste provided by the hotel; had to walk 10 mins to the nearest 7-11 just to get a toothpaste. Otherwise it would have been a perfect stay overall.

title: Holiday with small kids
review: Very nice hotel with perfect position. Hotel is kid's orientated and the kids love the small pool with tobogan. Very good thai kitchen. Excellent stuff. Especially FoB manager is professional. We have enyojed this hotel even during rainy days. Play room with ps4 is excellent. Beach is 100m and is very nice.

title: amazing
review: The heat the heat the heat.....out of all the public places there was only one restaurant that was air conditioned.  Even for breakfast it was so hot which they tried to cool down with a couple of fans. The breakfast buffet was excellent. Reception again was very hot as it was open air and after nice air conditioned transport from airport it was just too hot.  Need to make sure there is heaps of water on offer at reception. Found the activities staff in reception area very unhelpful. The pools were far too hot.....at least near the swim up bar they turned on the waterspray which was a huge relief. There was not enough life music out of the four nights we were there they had a guitarist for people who were dining. Would have been nice to have him as well for the sports bar.  He…

title: Above average property : Leaves you wanting for something more
review: Dear Katja J,  Thank you for sharing your thoughts online.  The month of April is traditionally the hottest in the year, and the temperature can maintain high levels for a long period. You will find relatively cooler temperatures between November to February, or during July & august months. Nonetheless, we do our utmost to provide our Guests with refreshing cool towels, shaded areas around the 3 swimming pools of the Resort, and a large variety of drinks to quench thirsts.  On this note, the waterslide is always a hit and loved by both Kids and parents…  We do hope that we’ll have the opportunity to welcoming you back in the future. Feel welcome to contact me directly via jp.lovotti@accor.com  Warmest regards,  JPL  Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Friendly atmosphere ever.
review: it was too good to stay staff was friendly ti was really nice it is very near to beach and there was very nice swimming pool as well as kids pool also there was jacuzi bath tub outside at swimming pool area

title: Excellent
review: Staff are very friendly and helpful,  rooms are excellent, the pools are spectacular and views are great too, the buffet breakfast and dinner are excellent great variety which changes daily,  will definitely recommend it and will be back

title: Nice room, friendly staff...
review: Overall stay is satisfactory, staff we met are very nice. We will come back in the future. Two withdrawals i found is the location of this hotel is at the edge of Karon Beach, not a walkable distance to both Karon and Patong downtowns. Breakfast choice is very limited as well...

title: Perfect for kids and adults alike
review: We arrived late and the staff at the Novotel couldn't have been more helpful or friendly. A quick room service meal was above expectations and the bed really comfortable. The private spa attached to the room was really nice and the grounds well kept. We were made to feel very welcome and wouldn't hesitate to return.

title: Good hotel then there is the management attitude issues
review: Staff are great and friendly nice hotel but the complete downer on the trip is to find out the charged you twice for the deposit and refuse after a few emails. Then we had the issue of having a staff member walk in without knocking while you are getting dressed and the hotel tells me he knocked when I was standing next to the door don't tell me stories tried to get answers from both the hotel and the Accor group all the issues raised were totally ignored there seams to be a real arrogance problem with the management

title: Thankyou for a wonderful stay

title: Hotel Staffs are very friendly and helpful
review: To start i would just like to say "THANKYOU!". Thisnis our second trip to Phuket and i am glad we stayed here at the Novotel Karon Beach. Reception and room service staff AMAZING and HELPFUL, pool side service and bar staff FABULOUS  (those mojitos are the best ive ever tasted), the restaurant staff  are EXCELLENT, the most pleasant and professional wait staff i have ever seen and kind and friendly and helpful. We had a cooking class here and for someone who does not cook, i had the BEST TIME. The chef was sooo lovely. And the spa WOW... i have never felt so relaxed in my life and the lovely lady at reception in the day spa, you were an absolute GEM!! You recommemded place to visit and things to do and were just so lovely. And to the assistant manager the biggest THANKYOU.. you…

title: Amazing!
review: I stayed in an amazing double king room with my total life savour! Mr Air-con himself! Rooms were very clean and comfortable. 24 hour room service was awesome! Pools and bars + Breakfast was simply devine and ALL staff soo friendly! Nothing was a bother! Local shops and restaurants- Very local and beach was just across the road! Would definitely recommend staying here!

title: Great hotel & service
review: This resort is awesome! The staff are wonderful and very friendly.  Room: we stayed in the plunge pool suite. Room is very big and clean. They have set up a play corner for my gal. Kid World: staff are very friendly and are good at handling kids Breakfast: good spread Overall: will be back again!

title: googd value for money for hotel but disturbing location, no go for families with small kids
review: About 10-15 minutes walk to the heart of Karon - but less than 5 minutes walk to the beach.   Place was very clean and staff was very friendly. Room was spacious and modernity designed. Overall was worth the money paid!  I celebrated my birthday during my stay and the hotel prepared a surprise cake!   If you like somewhere quiet & chill with child friendly amenities do consider this place. It was enjoyable chilling by the pool too!  Will come back.

title: Excellent service & great management !
review: We stayed at Novotel only 2 nights but all staffs are great and provided us the best service. We were also been upgraded to Family room which was very comfortable and just few steps from the lobby. Thank you Alex, Cyril and team for outstanding service and well attention. What you could ask for more !

title: Great hotel.
review: Location was good for tour pickups.  It is a quieter location therefore if you want to be away from the throng of tourists this is a great spot.  2 minute walk to the beach across the road, 5 - 10 minute walk to the shops.  The rooms and resort were lovely, a few minor details such as buckled floorboards stopped us from closing the bathroom door fully but other than that it was excellent and well worth staying.  The staff in the bar and restaurant were lovely and remembered us each time we visited.  I cannot speak highly enough of the hospitality.  I highly recommend this resort for families.  Movie night on the screen over the pool after dinner was lovely.

title: The wet Season arrived when we arrived .
review: Dear Taroco72  Thank you for sharing your journey. We are all pleased to hear that you had a great stay with us. I’m glad that you like our peaceful resort and hospitality found at the resort. Your words are an energy booster for the team. Regarding the bathroom’s door, I have passed your comment to our Engineering team. We are looking forward to seeing you return.  When you feel like joining our Movie night again, kindly get in touch with me on jp.lovotti@accor.com  Regards  JPL  Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Wonderful stay!
review: The only real let down with this hotel is the location. As a family with young kids it's a 15/20 min walk into town. We hired a car which made things a lot easier for us. We got the suite with our own small pool.  Rooms were good with lots of room which was good as we were travelling with our 10 month old daughter so whilst she slept we could relax in our pool until she woke. Staff are friendly but the surcharge they put on everything adds up when you check out. Beach was too rough when we were there but the pool at the Novotel was great.

title: Fabulous hotel
review: Great hotel: room was excellent ! Pools are cool and clean. Beautiful gardens and surroundings. Very Good food at break fast with great selection. We ate out in karon town in the evenings - food was very very good and very cheap.   Clean beach towels everyday and lots of sun beds which are policed to prevent any sun bed hoggers putting towels on - great idea ! If the bed hasn't been sat on for 30 mins the towels are removed and belongings and put behind the desk for collection on their return.   Beach is across the road and security assists with safe crossings  Will definitely return

title: Pure Bliss
review: Dear Joll_es49  Thank you for your fabulous review! I shared your words with the team this morning. We all appreciate your kind feedback and we are happy to know that you had an enjoyable holiday. Our Gardening and Culinary teams are very proud. The team is waiting for your return.    When you plan to return please contact me directly on jp.lovotti@accor.com.  Tropical regards  JPL   Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Wonderful experience
review: This stay with another Accorhotels franchise has been more than wonderful. Though every According members maintains it's own standard in a crisp and clean way, Novotel Karon has gone a few steps further. Though I booked a standard plunge pool room, the Novotel Karon (Nk) upgraded me to a Suite with Plunge Pool and the upgraded room is so well done there is no scope to complain. Every basic amenity has been provided from iron, ironingboard, safety box, bath tub, private pool big enough for four, two sitting areas (inside and outside) two TVs.The restaurants and spa is reasonably priced. I have already received a discount on spa and hoping to receive more. So is the minibar. Carry ur own insect repellant as there are some little friends who may bother you all day. Nearest 7eleven…

title: Perfectly relaxing
review: Dear sirsanya   Many thanks for your 5-star review! I shared your kind feedback with the team this morning. We are all pleased to know that you had a pleasant stay. The team will continue to maintain the facilities and warm services for our guests. Thank you once again for your kind review.   Should you plan to travel around Karon beach again please contact me directly on jp.lovotti@accor.com.   Best regards  JPL  Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Relaxing Solo escape
review: Been couple times to Karon, decided to try Novotel hotel for the first time, and we didn't regret the decision The staff were very helpful and friendly. We  booked Superior room, and were upgraded to Suite upon arrival. On top of that, as we arrived at the hotel just before noon, we were allowed to check into our Suite without having to wait 2 hours which is the normal check-in time. Many thanks David. The hotel is clean, and within easy access to the beach. Will definitely stay at Novotel again if we decide to visit Karon in future

title: Holiday
review: The hotel was very clean, and the staff were very friendly. My room was very comfortable, but i would go for the basic room next time as a solo traveller. My only criticism would be the headline pricing of meals, and drinks. The price advertised did not include tax, or the 10% service charge, and there was also a tip portion on the bill, in spite of a service charge already being added.

title: Great for kids
review: Dear Slimlegin  Thank you for sharing your thoughts. Our team  truly appreciates  your positive feedback. Regarding the price, we are taking your comment into consideration. Regarding the tip option on the bill, this is not mandatory and up to each guest discretion.   When you decide to travel this direction again kindly get in touch with me on fraser.ross@accor.com  Cheers  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Great, modern hotel
review: Good hotel with sufficient amenities & things to do for kids. Breakfast ok, beds sightly hard (depends on preference of course), staff attentive - specifically the staff at the kids club. Billing seems to be a bit messy, had to correct items on the bill 3 times in a 4 day stay. This part of Phuket gets flooded by Russians who can be somewhat rough around the edges (to use an understatement), but in low season at least for us it was ok.

title: Holiday
review: Dear Max-Pols  Thanks for the praise about our Kids facilities and team.  I would like to apologize for any inconvenience caused by the billing process. I shared your feedback with the team in order to improve our staff training and make sure this issue won’t repeat in the future.  Please let me know when you are travelling this way again on fraser.ross@accor.com - I'll make sure everything on your bill will be correct!  Cheers  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Beautiful hotel
review: We stayed here for a week at the end of April and had a lovely time mainly lounging by the pool. Pool was clean and not overcrowded. Restaurants and bars on site were more expensive than in town, but that's no surprise. Location was fine, just across from the beach and slightly outside of town. Would definitely consider stating here again.

title: Nice
review: Nice hotel but not centrally located be prepared to walk a good 10-15mins to get to the main area. Room was lovely & clean (we stayed in a deluxe King with private plunge pool) pools where nice & they also had a kids play area (perfect for families with small kids) staff where friendly.  Food in the hotel very average & over priced don't recommend eating there, you can get better food & much cheaper in town.  Not sure if I'd stay there again, for the price we paid we could probably get something better

title: Best hotel we stayed in when travelling Thailand
review: Dear 1972-mariam  Thank you for taking your time sharing your experience with us. I’m glad to see that you enjoyed the room and plunge pool. The team is very proud to hear they have made a positive impression. Regarding the price at our restaurants, the service, atmosphere, staff training and procedures to put in place in order to ensure hygiene and food safety explain the difference with outdoor restaurants.   I do hope to have a chance to welcome you again. If you do have plan kindly contact me directly on fraser.ross@accor.com   Tropical regards    Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Amazing Resort
review: This was by far the best hotel I stayed in when travelling around Thailand!! From the moment you arrive to the moment you leave the staff are very helpful and friendly!! Our hotel room was amazing right outside the pool and right next to the sports bar which was ideal!! There drinks offer was a great idea as we used it all day every day and got our money's worth!! While staying here if recommend taking s taxi trip up to the big Buddha well worth the journey!! The hotel will arrange a taxi for you who will wait at the big Buddha while you look around!!

title: Thailand
review: Dear Tarynlily  Many thanks for the high praise about the team and hotel. We do appreciate all the comments! What we would like to see the most is our guest enjoying their stay with us. We’re glad to know that you liked your room and took advantage of the drinks offer.  Please let me know directly on fraser.ross@accor.com when you're coming back -we'll have open arms!  Tropical regards!  Fraser  Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Good Service and Spacious Room
review: Recently stayed at the Novotel Karon Beach Resort, this place is absolutely amazing. The staff were friendly, rooms were huge and the main swimming pool was excellent. Upon check out, they stored our luggage while we went to the beach. The hotel even gave us a room to shower and change before our flight.   Keep up the good work Novotel Karon.

title: Hotel Stay
review: Lobby staff are friendly.  Hotel room is fairly new but there are a number of faulty items. Wifi is weak. Kids Club services are a disappointment. Don't think we are returnig to the same hotel in near future.

title: Exactly as expected.
review: Dear serenesl2016  Thank you for your feedback. In regards to the WiFi, we are currently working on a solution to make the network more stable in all areas of the resort.
