I have shared your feedback regarding he kids club experience and we are dreadfully disappointed to have let you down  - Your feedback on our direct survey has been noted and used for retasking our team’s focus so we’ll be able to improve the experience. Look forward to hearing more about your experiences. Please let me know on fraser.ross@accor.com  Warm Regards  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Duty Manager DAVID FANTASTIC please all staff learn from him!!!
review: After 5 weeks on the road, travelling the world. I needed a few days to chill and relax. As a repeat customer I knew what I would get. The usual great service, good food from Executive Chef Cyril and his team. Clean and well appointed room a great pool with outdoor dining. Great beach across the road which is ideal for a early morning walk and watch the sunrise over the Big Buddha Statue. Walk into the town centre a short 10 minutes walk. The Hotel is very family friendly. On a personal note congratulations to Alex on his well deserved promotion to Hotel Manager. More than happy to recommend.

title: Very nice hotel
review: Dear Bruno035  Many thanks for your generous review! First of all, thank you for your congratulations note to Alex- I’ll surely pass him the message. I shared your words with the team this morning – your review made their day! They were all wearing a beaming smile the entire day, especially Cyril and his team. We could not be happier to know that we could keep on delivering great services up to your expectations. We  look forward to seeing you again in the near future!   Cheers!  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Great for kids
review: Great Hotel for Kids very clean and handy to the Beach.The Duty Manager David could not be any more accommodating 5 stars for him alone!Great Buffet Breakfast and Day Spa.Kids will love the waterslide.Check out Ma Ma Jins on the beach and the Markets on Saturday and Tuesday nights at the Temple.

title: The best hotel in Karon
review: We were very impressed and enjoyed the Deluxe room a lot, big and clean. The beach is beautiful, the pools was excellent. Staff extremely friendly and accommodating. Service is impeccable. close to tons of restaurants and bars.    I didn't want to leave the hotel really....

title: AMAZING RELAXATION HOLIDAY -  HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!!!!
review: Dear Nanami N  Thank you for the best review which I passed on to the team this morning. We truly appreciate your kind feedback and the team was delighted to see  their efforts made such a positive impression.  We wish you could spend more time with us as well.  We look forward to welcoming you back at any time in the future - please let me know your plans on fraser.ross@accor.com  Sincerely   Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Nice stay !
review: We stayed there last year and had the most amazing holiday there..  The staff is oh so so friendly,  helpful and professional and I would never ever hesitate to recommend it to anyone,  EVERYONE!!!!! . And families will love it also..  Extremely children friendly..  Going back in August 2016 and can't wait!!!! Seriously we are counting down the days!!

title: Great Hotel & Resort
review: Dear Dino S R R  Thank you for your fantastic feedback! I shared your review with the team this morning- it was just like an energy boost for everyone. I could see beaming smiles going all around the meeting room while reading your review. We are glad to hear that you will come back this August and we are looking forward to welcoming you back.   Please let me know what if I can assist in any way on fraser.ross@accor.com   Cheers  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Romance time ever...
review: We had a wonderful stay at Novotel and the hotel reception staff were extremely helpful, Beautiful view, relaxed, three differnce level of swimming pools - I had a great service from Tom! The dinner at Coffee House Restaurant on each night was delicious. I would definitely recommend this hotel !!

title: Amazing Hotel
review: I stayed here in April 2016 for 11 nights. The hotel is absolutely beautiful. The staff are lovely and do what they can to help any time of the day or night. I stayed in a standard room which didn't feel very standard. The air-conditioning was great, room very nice and tidy. Bed and pillows were very comfortable too. The hotel is on a busy road. But security is always there to help you cross or order a taxi right to you. Buffet breakfast was good with a good range of food. Loved the pool bar and mexican night at Joe Kool's restaurant. And the live singer was a great bonus. Would definitely stay here again.

title: Kids loved it
review: Dear Hayley S  Thank you for your thoughts and your amazing review! The team loved to hear that you had an amazing stay and they were part of it. I'm glad to know that our standard room set up and amenities were beyond standards. I also passed your comment to Food & Beverage team- very good for encouraging them.   If you fancy coming this way again let me know on fraser.ross@accor.com  Cheers!  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Not as good as you think you are
review: Great hotel if you are visiting with young kids. Kids pool and kids play area are amazing game to keep the kids busy. Staff are super friendly. They make an effort to make your stay comfortable.   I stayed at the plunge pool suite. I wanted the take the bed home...it was quite comfortable. Had some great sleeps. Room was very spacious as well.  I loved hotel giving me the option to have the same bedsheet used again for next day. It is environment friendly and I was party to the idea. Bathroom was modern and clean.  Loved the plants and trees. They are all around the hotel and very well maintained.  Beach is a 5 min walk. White fine sand beach. I found it fairly clean all the times.  Just 5-7 min drive to patong. You can easily hire taxi or Tuk Tuk. Approx 10 min walk to the…

title: Depends on What You're Looking for...
review: Dear Ranjeet M  Many thanks for your words. We really appreciate the feedback- the team is delighted to hear that you have highlighted their efforts to accommodate your stay and made it as smooth as possible. At the same time, I’m glad to know that you are a fervent supporter of Accor 21 planet project and supported our efforts in term of sustainability during your stay. I passed your kind comment to our Recreation team who is pleased to hear that your kids had a great time at the kids pool and game zone April is the hottest month in Thailand, so the temperatureof the water at the pool can raise up quite fast.    I would be delighted to see you back. Let me know your plans directly on fraser.ross@accor.com   Tropical regards  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Great rooms!
review: May be it was the heat or just that we had come from the Banyan Tree in Bangkok. I'm not sure but the hotel seemed dated and in to making money not concerned with the guests. The drinks in the pool bar were, even for me a bit excessive for the quality of the hotel. I saw one guy with 4 kids and four adults pay pay £40 pounds for four drinks and four ice-creams ? Breakfast was OK staff were very nice but if you ask for a courtesy room make sure you get a room and not a shower room as they have no air con and after the shower you as just as bad as before Overall would not go back again

title: Mixed feelings
review: When I first arrived tired and in need of a shower I was most disappointed that my room would not be ready for another 2 hours. I had booked this holiday a year in advance you think that they would be aware of my arrival time, but no they had let the previous tenant of the room have a very late check out. That's ok I thought as I have two rooms booked one should be available alas no the other room would not be ready for another hour. Offered a free drink and somewhere to sit was ok at least they looked after my bags!  The rooms when we got them were not next to each other as I had requested although they did say that we had been upgraded ( don't think so really)  Still it was a nice clean room, the staff were nice although no one told us anything we just found our way around to…

title: Nice hotel
review: Dear Janice B  Thanks for sharing your experience with us. First of all, I do apologize for the inconvenience caused by the ladders maintenance as guest safety is our top priority. In term of check-in time, our policy is 2:00pm and your original booking were Standard rooms which we upgraded both of your rooms to Deluxe. I also emphasize with team to be more helpful with delivering important information to the guests. I passed your comments to our Housekeeping department and we’ll be emphasizing on staff training. I’m glad to know that our Food & Beverage staff was able to make a positive impact during your stay- they were thrilled to be able to make you happy. It would be nice if we have a chance to welcome you back for  your next stay in Phuket.  When you plan to stay with us again please get in touch with me on fraser.ross@accor.com – I’ll will make sure that we’ll be able to meet your expectations.  Best regards  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Nice new hotel in Phuket
review: Very nice hotel for families. Our family room was a great size and our kids loved the three pools with slippery slide. Air con didn't work all the time but was manageable. Mini fridge did not work at all which was a little annoying. Breakfast buffet was good. Drinks around the pool were a little overpriced as were dinner nights. 300 baht by tuk tuk to Patong. Nice staff. Transfers to and from the airport a little overpriced. Trip back to airport was spoiled as the taxi hotel transfer vehicle stank of cigarette smoke and made us want to be sick. The lady who greeted us at the airport on arrival was lovely.

title: Fantastic family resort
review: Dear David D  Thank you for your feedback. Firstly allow me to apologize for any issue you came across during your stay. I’m glad to know that you like our spacious family room and your kids had great time at all pools. I passed your comments regarding the air-con and the refrigerator to our engineering team. Regarding the taxi service, it is regulated in price by the local authorities and given the training provided to drivers, safety and insurance involved, the transport service comes at a slightly higher rate than local services. However I will pass your comment about the cigarette smell on the car to the transfer company we are working with.  Should you plan to return to our resort - please contact me directly on fraser.ross@accor.com and I’ll be more than happy to help with any enquiry.  Warm regards,  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Exceptional stay
review: Nice hotel with a nice staff. Big swimming pools and a lot potential (slider for the kids and adult zone for the old kids). The food was good and the room very clean. Walking distance from Karon center and only 10 minutes to Patong.

title: Great resort, great staff!
review: Just stayed 7 days in a plunge pool room.  I will return.  Some info:  - Staff very friendly and a good standard of English.  Regular visitors to Thailand will know this is sometimes a problem. - Very happy with room - well maintained and cleaned well every day.  Plunge pool nice and cool.  Lacking privacy a little (however this may be a good idea....)  ;) - Breakfast your standard fare - kept well stocked even up to closing time. - Food at Tai restaurant of a high standard (although very mild).  The restaurant name is "Tai" and serves Thai food..... - Joe Cools (around the pool) lunch menu includes pizzas etc.  Dinner was the standard themed nights - they were very popular, well priced and even had a queue one night! - Clientele initially was mostly (very loud and boisterous)…

title: Love this hotel
review: Dear Comoman1  Many thanks for taking your time sharing your 5-star review. I loved to read it out in the morning brief and saw a beaming smile showing up on my team faces. We all appreciate every words on your review and very happy to know that you had a great time. Our goal is to find the way to make our guest life easier- we were successful in your case thanks to a button! Indeed, we are very proud. Thank you once again for all the details you had highlighted.    When you have plans to meet us again- kindly contact me on fraser.ross@accor.com   Cheers!  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Great hotel
review: The customer service and hospitality is second to none in this hotel. The staff were amazing and nothing was too much for them. They often went out of their way to make our stay as comfortable as possible.  The negatives points were the wifi connection was not that good in our rooms, the bathroom had an awful smell but once we reported the problem we were offered another room immediately, and I would recommend that they put microwaves in the rooms. Besides those minor points the hotel and staff are excellent and I would definitely stay here again and recommend this hotel highly.

title: Relax & Beautiful Stay
review: Dear Asmara G  Thanks for your encouraging review! Firstly, allow me to apologize for the unpleasant smell- I’m glad to know that our team was able to make up for everything and made a positive impact during your stay. Regarding the wifi connection, we are currently conducting a project to upgrade our wifi network and improve our internet service throughout the resort.   When you have plans to meet us again- kindly contact me on fraser.ross@accor.com   Best regards  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Novotel Karon Beach
review: Room was spacious/clean.  The food was excellent and great massage/spa at reasonable rates.   All in all not much to fault, and would recommend it to others.  The chef at the "Tai" restaurant really put in a lot of effort and it showed in the food.

title: Excellent
review: My husband and 2 kids stayed in a Suite which was in a very quiet part of the hotel. The room was large, comfortable with divided sleep areas (and I love staying in rooms that are so clean and new looking!). Pool area is excellent with plenty of sunshine. I really like the open-ish breakfast area that looks down to the street giving you a real feel for where you are! The kids pool with waterslide is so much fun and is perfect for staying at while the kids are at the kids club (right next to it)  if you want a break without going too far away - kids club staff are lovely. Breakfast food was ok (but where wa the crispy bacon?!?) Thai restaurant food was delicious. Spa was fantastic.Check-in was pretty slow. Beautiful beach across the road. No restaurants and shops right out the…

title: Amazing, didn't want to leave.
review: Dear April078  Many thanks for your gracious words. I’m glad to know that you like the open-ish breakfast area and the food at TAi restaurant. I shared your feedback with the team – they were delighted to know that you had an excellent stay and that your kids had fun on the waterslide. Thank you once again for the praise of our staff and our resort.  We would love to see you back at the resort in the future and should you plan to head this way again please let me know on fraser.ross@accor.com – I’ll make sure that crispy bacon will be available during your stay.    Warm regards  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Last stop of the trip...
review: We are only just home after a fantastic 11 night stay at this lovely hotel which we would highly recommend.  Had a lovely big room for our family of four, the bathroom was in the middle so it was like having two rooms.  The room was always clean, with fresh towels etc. Our room was by Champions Bar and Oasis Pool and was nice and quiet just like we’d asked for.  The staff  were great, always happy to help, we’d especially like to mention Doy, Nampu, On and Pumpui who always asked us how our day was going. Our son hurt his toe one night and Nampu was quick to get a first aider to take care of him.  Our daughter got food poising (from a restaurant on the beach, not the hotel) and they gave us advice, extra water and asked after her the next day.   Food was always good and the…

title: Very good
review: Dear foxie68   Many thanks for your lovely words – this positive review is the best way to encourage the team. We all appreciate your kind feedback and the highlights of our team members- they love to see their name on a positive review. I shared your review with the team in the morning brief – which brought a beaming smile on everybody’s face around the meeting room. I’m glad that our team was able to assist with the unpleasant  situation that your son and your daughter came across. It’s our goal to deliver an amazing stay to our guests- we seem to have succeeded in your case. We wish you could stay longer as well. Look forward to welcoming your whole family again.  It will be marvelous to welcome you back, so when you’re planning your next trip contact me on fraser.ross@accor.com and I’ll be on hand to help with any enquiry  Tropical Regards  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Enjoyable stay
review: Had a slow check in but otherwise the plunge pool suite is worth the money spent. The suite is big enough and well lit and the plunge is also a good add on. The rooms are quite spacious and would stay here for a longer period next time. They had decorated the room as per my request as it was anniversary trip. the property is really new as you can find everything tip top condition. The rooms service is little slow as we had asked for a box of ice which would take something between 10-15 mins, still not a much issue as we had most of our meal outside the property. The property location is really good as it is right between Patong and karon and max 10 min walk to the nearest karon market. The beach is just 5 mins away and the walk to the beach is also refreshing with a lake in…

title: Great hotel for families!
review: Bagus sekali! The best part of our stay was the attentive staff, and how much they loved our children and made them feel welcome. My family of 5 stayed in 2 connecting rooms in April. The rooms were clean and next to the kids' pool. Although it was close to the kids' pool, it was still quiet enough that my young children were able to nap just fine. The rooms were spacious. The beds were very comfortable. We asked for and received a complimentary baby crib (a Graco playpen) which could easily fit in the hallway in front of our room door or in the doorway of the bathroom (with the door opened).   Breakfast was complete with Asian and Western fares. Highlights were the egg station, the variety of jam selections, and the fresh pancakes from the pancake machine. It was above average…

title: Couldn't of asked for anymore from this hotel!
review: Dear livingbygrace  Thank you for your lovely words.  I'm glad to know that our manager solved your issues and made a positive feedback. I shared your feedback with my team- they were happy to know that you had a great stay and your kids enjoyed the slide. Our Kids club is open to children of all ages. Nevertheless, children below 4 years old require parental supervision or parents can subscribe to a paid baby-sitting service. The fact that our friendly and attentive team was the best part of your stay is the most powerful energy booster for all of us. Regarding the air-conditioning, I passed your comment to our engineering team. Thank you once again for your highlights and suggestions.  Should you plan to come back to our warm resort, please contact me directly on fraser.ross@accor.com  Tropical regards  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Phuket is great
review: By far the most helpful, considerate, polite and do anything for you staff we came across on our trip to Thailand! The hotel is immaculate, constantly being cleaned. We luckily had a free upgrade from them to a deluxe room which was great! Drinks and a cold flannel on arrival. Both pools were nice and clean, bar staff were excellent, especially at the champions bar! On site they have a very good choice of food and the Tai restaurant was just amazing flavoured Asian cuisine! For anyone who is slating this hotel then they are being impossible to please, it's great for kids to with pool activities in the afternoon. Pool side service. I will say though if you want a better room then pay that little bit more if you can, makes a lot of difference, as we was kindly offered a shower…

title: HoneyMooners
review: Dear ryanjob  Thank you for taking  time posting your thought- delightful to read to start the day!. I shared your words with the team – they were happy to know that they made a positive impact and earned your valuable 5-stars review. Especially culinary and Champions bar team – who are thrilled to be highlighted on your wonderful comment. Regarding the price, we will take your suggestion on board for consideration. It would be nice to see you back to our resort and enjoy our services in the future.  Whenever you have plans to explore Phuket again, please get in touch with me on fraser.ross@accor.com   Tropical regards  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Big mistake
review: We found the hotel to be reasonable although by general Accor standards not what we were used to. Having said that we usually opt for the Sofitel brand. The internet access was fairly poor. I believe that some remedial works such as spot painting around the place is warranted. The breakfasts were only "just"!

title: Nice hotel
review: We stayed there for 9 days on our recent trip to Thailand. Great hotel with good location in Karon. Walking distance ( 10 min)  to all the bars and restaurants and what's more important just cross the road from the beach!!!  3 great swimming pools, one especially for children with a slide and activities in the afternoon.  Spa at the hotel is amazing!!!  Me and my husband went for a massage few times during our stay and it was great experience!!! Stress relief massage is a must!!!  Kids club is good too for your little or bigger one. Movies/xbox/games etc Every day different activities at certain times like pizza making or fan/ umbrella decorating etc Breakfast is good too with massive choice of everything! Pancakes/ variety of bread/ English breakfast/cereal /yoghurt /fruit/…

title: Great Place to stay
review: Dear kasia j  Many thanks for taking the time to post your experience.  We really appreciate your feedback. I shared your energy booster review with the team- your words put a smile on everybody’s faces here. I passed your feedback to Spa team- they were thrilled to be part of your positive experience. We are always trying to ensure that the variety of breakfast will meet every guest’s needs – in your case, our efforts were successful!. Thank you once again.   It would be wonderful to welcome you back to our resort and if there is anything I can do to help with your future plans – let me know directly on fraser.ross@accor.com  Cheers!  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Loved it
review: We stayed at the resort from 25th March 'til 4th April 2016. There is not a lot to say against the hotel it is very well run and the staff were very good and helpful. The rooms are a good size with plenty of space. The hotel is not located in the township of Karon only a short and enjoyable walk away. If you are going to walk into town do not follow the road as it takes much longer, instead cross the road at the hotel,there is a security guard who will stop traffic for you. Follow the pathway until you see the 7/11 on the other side of the road and cross there. Next to the 7/11 is a Soi [lane] that will take you into the town of Karon. If you prefer you can cross from the hotel and walk toward the beach and follow the beach. There are a group of restaurants here and the food is…

title: Amazing resort! Perfect family getaway!
review: Dear jungle1952  Many thanks for taking your time sharing your journey. I shared your feedback with the team- they were pleased to know that we achieve to deliver the holidays you deserved! Regarding the check-in process- I do apologize for all the rush and passed your valuable comment to our front office team for improvement. In term of English program channels and shuttle bus, we are taking your suggestions on board. Thank you once again for all of your suggestions. I hope that we will be able to see you back in the near future.  If there is anything I can do to help planning your next visit, please contact me directly on fraser.ross@accor.com  Tropical regards  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: A convenient hotel, great for kids
review: Great resort. 3 pools. Great breakfast buffet. Great kids club and kids pool with slide. Our room had a view of the big budha (distance) which was nice to sit on the balcony and look at. We spent 10 days with ease here. Short walk to Karon town. Beach across the road. Loved it. Highly recommend.

title: A great family resort that almost has it all
review: We stayed at the Novotel Karon Beach in March/April 2016 for 10 days. As a family with 3 kids we were really impressed with the large suite rooms that provided a separate living area in which the kids all slept. Being separated from the main bedroom allowed everyone a good night sleep.   The resort was really well kept and any small issues that arose were dealt with quickly by the super friendly staff.   The food was great and the themed dinner buffets were a great addition to the daily cuisine.   The kids club were very friendly and our kids aged 8,6 & 4 loved it.   The only complaint we had revolved around the cost of babysitting. We were staying there with 2 other families and we wanted to go out for a nice dinner without the kids. The quoted price was 300BHT per child per…

title: Very nice hotel
review: Dear JackiePerth  Thank you for sharing your thoughts with us. I shared your highlights with my team. Regarding the babysitting price, we try our best to offer a reasonable price for our services and ensure that your children are in good hands. Our babysitters are carefully chosen and certified, which come up at a cost. However, I understand that the cost can rise up quickly when coming with more than one child and I’ll take your suggestion on board for consideration. I’m glad to know that our friendly team assisted with your issues quickly. We are more than happy to see you enjoyed our spacious suite room.  If you plan to head back to Phuket- let me know on fraser.ross@accor.com-I’ll try my best to make sure the resort has it all for you.  Warm regards,  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Great hotel with fabulpus customer service
review: We stayed at Novotel Karon during our vacation in Phuket and me and my husband really much enjoyed it. The hotel staff are attentive, amenities are nice, breakfast was delicious. The beach is across the road, but that's not a problem at all. Karon beach is very clean and not too crowded. We really want to come back and stay at Novotel next time in Phuket

title: Almost Perfect
review: Dear asemochka_k  Many thanks for your 5-star review- short but lovely. I passed your review to our team. We are pleased to know that you like our hotel and enjoyed your stay. We are all looking forward to welcoming you back to our tropical resort in the future.  When you plan to come back here- contact me on fraser.ross@accor.com  Cheers!  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Perfect week in the sun
review: We stayed 5 nights in 2 standard inter-connecting rooms with children aged 11, 9 and 6. They loved the kids pool and kids club facilities. Every minor issue we had with our room was sorted out quickly and efficiently. Furthermore, when our daughter was ill, the hotel sent a first aider to check on her and helped us get (and then cancel), a doctor in the middle of the night. I'd highly recommend this hotel to anyone travelling with children as you know they will help you in any situation. The beach is also beautiful and there are lots of great restaurants on the beach to eat at.

title: Fantastic service
review: Myself and partner stayed here as part of my 30th birthday celebrations in a suite with a plunge pool!  Check in was absolutely seamless with a welcome drink on arrival and the guest service manager Faud offering us a personal welcome and explaining the facilities etc to us before personally showing us to our room!  The room itself was huge with an amazing shower and large bath! During check in the hotel manager Alex even made a point in welcoming us to the hotel! We booked for 7 nights and found the staff to be more than accommodating to our every need, everyone is really friendly and made our stay very pleasant, rooms were cleaned to a very high standard and the tuk down service we received added that personal touch! There are 3 pools in the hotel which can get pretty busy but…

title: Delightful Stay
review: Dear TripAdvisor Member  Thank you so much for your fantastic review. I have shared the review with the team and they are thrilled they made a great impression. Faud and Alex are delighted to be part of your memorable experience.  It's always our goal to make our guest’s stay pleasant and in your case we have succeeded. We are all looking forward to welcoming you back to our resort.  When you plan to head back, kindly let me know on fraser.ross@accor.com  Cheers!  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Vlaued Deal
review: Had booked a Family Deluxe room with bunk bed and an extra bed for my teenage son. I was pleasantly surprised when the front desk staff informed me that I had been upgraded to two interconnecting deluxe rooms instead. We arrived in the morning and had put in a request for early check in. As our room was not available yet, we were temporarily put in a Standard room to freshen up and relax.   Novotel Karon beach is not a hugh resort but the available space has been well used. The three swimming pools are lovely. Rooms are neat and clean although I must mention that the wooden flooring in one of our rooms was a bit wavy and seemed worn. Surprising, considering that the hotel has opened just about one and half years ago. The bathrooms were nice and clean, however, I don't understand…

title: Fantastic stay
review: Dear MRahul  Many thanks for sharing your thoughts. First of all, please accept my apologies in regards to the wooden flooring and our wifi quality. I passed your concerned to Engineering department in order to repair the wooden flooring. In term of wifi connection, we are conducting a project to improve our wifi-connection to be more stable and reliable. We are taking in consideration the issues you raised about curtain. Many thanks for the praise of the team and both of the restaurants.  If you have plans to head back to this way, kindly let me know on fraser.ross@accor.com  Warm regards  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Reasonable stay
review: We booked this hotel, based on other reviews on tripadvisor and we were not dissapointed. Check in was quick, and we were welcomed by a drink. Our rooms were spacious and clean, with good linen. The only drawback i see here, is that the blankets in the beds were too warm, so you really have to adjust the A/C to a low temperature. There are 2 pools in the hotel, but finding a sunbed can be a real battle, as it seems that there are not enough to cover the guests. Some of them tend to reserve a sunbed for the whole day, by just placing a blanket on. We received also a SPA treatment, the whole experience was really nice, excellent service in a very good price. The hotel has also a kid's pool including slider and a small pool. There is also a kid's activities center. We went there…

title: Fantastic Plunge Pool
review: My husband and I with our friends have just stayed for 9 nights at the Novotel in a room with a plunge pool. We could not fault our stay everything was perfect. Our room was very spacious with a king size bed. Having the plunge pool is a must as it can be very hot and you can enjoy being in the pool whenever you need to cool off.Breakfast was excellent every morning with plenty of options. The pool bars have food menus offering thai and western food and everything we ordered was very tasty, well cooked and affordable. The staff  were all very friendly and only too happy to help. The novotel has its own spa and we had a very enjoyable massage, facial and body scrub. The hotel is across the road from the beach,  The road out front is fairly busy but there are security guards on…

title: To Tell or Novotel? That is the question.....
review: Dear 431Milly  Thank you for your wonderful words. I shared your review with team this morning and loved to see the atmosphere in the meeting room suddenly changed. We all are happy to know that you  had a great stay with us. Our team can’t wait to welcome you back to our resort. We are looking forward to seeing you again.  Please let me know on fraser.ross@accor.com- I’ll be more than happy to help with any enquiry  Tropical regards  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Certainly Room for Improvement
review: Hi readers,  I haven't contributed for a while. I went off TA after I read a complaint review about how the hotel where a couple were staying had beds that were too short for the six foot seven partner and that the hotel should have told them before they booked.....But anyway.  Before I start, I have to let you know that I had a medical emergency within the first 12 hours which needed hospitalisation. I was travelling by-myself which only exacerbated the problem. I have to thank very sincerely all the staff at the Novotel but especially Ake, David, Tree, Print and Slavo. They called an ambulance, secured all my belongings in my room safe and gathered the prescription medications to assist the doctor because I was unconscious. For the rest of my stay I was asked regularly if I…

title: Loved our 10 night stay.
review: Dear Easy229  Thank you for taking your time telling your experience in details. First of all, please allow me to apologize for your inconvenience. In term of wifi connection, we are conducting a project to make up our wifi-network to be more stable. I showed your review to the team. We all appreciated every single word!. I passed your thanks to Ake, David, Tree, Print and Slavo, they are all happy to hear from you and we wish you are doing very well. Many thanks for your understanding regarding our sunbed issue, we do try our best to solve it. Our team is looking forward to seeing you again.   When you plan to come back, kindly let me know on fraser.ross@accor.com   Cheers!   Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Can't fault the Place
review: As someone who travels a lot and reviews hotels and restaurants a lot.. I have put off writing this for quite some time, primarily as it was disappointing and that makes it hard. I have stayed at pretty much every Accor property in Phuket and as with the brand it has met my expectations and excelled many times, sadly a couple of things let this hotel down. The rooms are well appointed and clean..great size and the resort is very well laid out with lots of smiley staff. The 1st disappointment is breakfast service there is no system for seating and several times we were abandoned mid restaurant to find our own table and then catching someone's attention got tea/coffee hit and miss. There is no one taking control and the staff do their best but it's an uphill struggle sadly.…

title: Decent hotel
review: Stayed here to use my loyalty points up, but not a bad hotel at all. Really clean nice rooms. Strange that they dont have proper crossing to get across busy road to beach but security guards are really attentive. Diddnt eat here at all as loads of close eating options.

title: Great Hotel Resort
review: Dear heathster  Thank you for your kind review.  We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay at our resort.  Regarding the crossing of the road to get access to Karon Beach, we have been working on getting a zebra crossing install on the go with the local council – the surety guards will still be in hand to ensure safety first!   When you plan to come back to our resort, please let me know on fraser.ross@accor.com  Tropical regards,  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Great value but could improve
review: Location is at the North end of Karon. The beach is an easy walk, as is Karon Center. Plenty of restaurants within 10 min walk. The rooms are modern and clean. Three pools and plenty of space for everyone. We would return.

title: Amazing Experience
review: Dear Charlie F  Thank you so much for sharing your experience.  Our team would be more than grateful to welcome you back to our tropical resort in the future.  Whenever you plans to come back, kindly let me know on fraser.ross@accor.com  Tropical Regards  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Reasonable standard Novotel, very busy, very slow check-in and checkout
review: The hotel is a 10 minute walk away from Karon town and stands on a busy road across from the beach. The service at the reception and the spa were superb, the staff couldn't be friendlier. However, we found the staff at the restaurants/pool bar to be a bit overwhelmed by the number of guests--they forgot our orders and weren't always quick to clean up the table. This is especially apparent during breakfast--the staff needs to do a better job at cleaning the tables.   The food selection at breakfast was amazing--everything from sushi to fresh fruit to numerous pastries to pork ribs. The one thing we didn't like was the location of the restaurant where the breakfast was served--it faces the road and is hence very noisy.  We had a standard room, which was very spacious and clean and…

title: great location out of the busy patong
review: we stayed in a plunge pool room from Feb. 8-15. the room was clean and quite nice. As for the pool yes the water gets cleaned daily the pool itself does not. the tiles need to be clean as you can feel the slim on them. As there is very little room from the door to the pool having selves or hooks on the wall would be a bonus so things don't get wet. I have seen people state that there is mosquitos. we did have these in our room but while we were there the pest control was also there spraying the resort so things are being done to control them. all the reviews I had read stated to walk on the beach to the shops as it is quicker. this is true, but on the last day we walked the long way round and there is a 7/11 very close. so if you are only wanting something basic this is the way…

title: Friendly Family Focused Fun
review: Dear Toni M  Thank you for sharing this lovely review with us. Firstly, allow me to apologize for the tiles cleanliness. I have passed this issue to housekeeping for feedback to help us improve our performance. We will be more than happy to welcome you back and assist you with anything we can.  Please let me know on fraser.ross@accor.com whenever you are coming back.  Tropical Regards  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: " Excellent Hotel & Wonderful Staff"
review: Our stay at Novotel Karon Beach Resort & Spa was extremely pleasant. The staff were more than accommodating and the hotel and rooms were spotless. Even though we were on the main road with ocean views there was double glazing on the balcony doors and it was not noisy. Food was plentiful and there was great choice. There is a choice of 3 pools. It is certainly a hotel geared for families and caters well for children. In the pool the lifesaver ran children' s supervised fun times and there is a kids club. The situation of the hotel is slightly out of central Karon town area but was within easy walking distance to the town.

title: Fabulous Resort & amazing assistance given by staff!
review: Dear Moncia Y  Thank you for your kind words. Your review is a great encouragement for our team.  We are pleased to hear that our double glazing is working well.    When you plan to come to our resort, please let me know on fraser.ross@accor.com  Sincerely   Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Relax
review: Stayed here with my boyfriend for 3 nights on a recent holiday, Amazing experience at this Resort hotel, staff were excellent. Also the breakfast was amazing as an excellent choice.   We mainly chose this hotel as it had the resort style layout which we like, The pools are beautiful, big and clean. We chose to stay at Superior, the room was clean and huge bed. Thanks for Housekeeping who clean my room she was wonderful staff and always smile.  Big Thanks To Mr. Pong the guy at the front desk he is very friendly and always willing to go out of the way to help customers. he used to ask whenever he see us around about things he can help us to make my trip more memorable and smooth.   We had a great stay and  would recommend this hotel for relaxing holiday.

title: Nice and friendly
review: We stayd 2 weeks at the hotel with our family (1.5 year old son). The staff is super with the kids. We chose superior room with huge double bed. The room was clean but not so spacious. I dont't think standard room is less good. View was to the side pool above the bar. Suprisingly we heard no noise from the bar.  Room service was quick and food with reasonable price. Smoothies were delicious and pad thai super :)  We did not attend any theme dinners and ate outside the hotel territory. Plenty of places to eat at the beach, just a little walk away. Across the road and turn left, then right over the bridge and then left again.  Our favorite was Phannee Restaurant. Nice staff and authentic food.  The pool was big and clean. If you want to relax on the chair then you better wake up…

title: Our stay at this hotel
review: Dear kerlid81  Thank you for your time for sharing this valuable experience. First of all, kindly accept my apologies regarding the Wifi signal. I will surely bring this up to the team for improvement. We are pleased to hear that our bartender and Pad Thai Chef make a positive impact.  If you have plans to come back to Phuket, we would be more than grateful to welcome you again. Please let me know on fraser.ross@accor.com  Tropical Regards  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: We had a great time.
review: What a great hotel. The family and I enjoyed our stay thoroughly and would definitely stay there again. The staff were amazing and a big call out to Faud (I think that was his name) and David for the extra level of service they provided to my family during our stay. Facilities, room and location was great. The only area of improvement I would say is the pool areas, one was closed nearly everyday which created some sunlounge shortages in the other pools. In saying that staff were accommodating in moving sub lounges for us and you could see the staff working on the pool issues immediately which ensured the cleanliness of the pool.

title: Wonderfull hotel, wonderful staff, wonderful holiday
review: Dear sokratis_kokonis  many thanks for the lovely words and the kind feedback  Please accept my apologies for the pool situation - we had a major pump issue which stopped water circulating and while the pools were in safe condition we had to get the water cleared by using temporary pumps for 3 days . I am sorry this impacted the stay negatively.  The comments re Faud and K.David have been passed on and they are delighted to know they made such a positive impact.  We would be delighted to welcome you back and please let me know your plans on fraser.ross@accor.com - I'll be happy to help  with any enquiry  Tropical Regards  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Highlight of my trip
review: Novotel in Phuket Karon is a very nice resort. The pools are beautiful, the grounds are clean and well maintained, and the staff is very friendly and helpful. We had trouble with our plunge pool the first day, but the staff got on it right away and had it fixed very quickly. For our inconvenience, we were given a free dinner at the excellent in site restaurant. They always wanted to make sure that we were happy. Beautiful Karon Beach is a short walk away and proved to be a highlight of our trip. We would definitely recommend this resort, not only for couples but also for families as there are many amenities just for kids.

title: Great 4 star family resort
review: This a great spot for families. The waterslide, the staff who bring out inflatable balls and boats for the kids to play in, the excellent breakfast makes for a very positive family experience. The hotel is situated on the end of Karon beach closest to Patong. We did end up taking several tuk tuks when we wanted to go to another beach or out for dinner but it wasn't too much of a bother. Couples would relax at the lower pool but I would recommend the hotel more for families. On the website it looked like the family rooms had a small divider in the room to give you privacy. This was not the case but, everything else was so strong it didn't really matter. Poolside Thai food was excellent and the beer was not so pricy to deter you from ordering poolside. The front desk was very…

title: Nice hotel with helpful staff but wifi woeful.
review: Dear Noah B  Many thanks for the kind word and the lovely review  -the team had this one read out this morning and grins were seen all round the room!  Let me know when you plan to head this way again and we'll be delighted to see yuo - contact me any time on fraser.ross@accor.com  Cheers  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Excellent Hotel
review: We were given a nice, light, spacious, room that had a very large double bed, (the bed was firm to say the least, but relatively comfortable). We had a sunny balcony overlooking the main road, so it was a little noisy, but actually more private than an inner facing one would have been.  We didn't bother with breakfast as its always too early for us, it finished at 10am and for around 99 baht (£2) you could get an American breakfast in town (Karon cafe) which we did a couple of days - it was good value.  We were there for 6 nights and ate in the Thai restaurant twice in the evening, it was reasonable value, reasonable food and very nicely presented. We did not go for any of the buffet nights, as apart from the Thai night they were all expensive compared to what you could eat for…

title: Great Hotel, Lovely Rooms and Staff
review: Dear beth1957  Many thanks for taking your time sharing your experience. First of all, please accept my apologies for the disappointment you came across during your journey. We are currently piloting a project to upgrade our wifi in order to find a solution to improve our quality. I am glad to hear that our team made a positive impact. We hope to have a chance to welcome you back in the future. Thank you once again for your highlights which will be a great basis for improvement.  Kindly let me know when you plan to come back this way on fraser.ross@accor.com  Sincerely  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Mold
review: Stopped in plunge pool room,spotlessly cleaned every day by cheerful staff, Reception staff extremely helpful when we returned from a 3 days in Bangkok realising we had left I pad in taxi at airport they managed to trace it and was posted back to Karon Beach.Many thanks again!

title: Exceeded Expectations
review: We went in January 16 to meet relatives from the UK. This made us a group of 19 (7 kids) Rooms were clean and well sizes. Staff were exceptional.  Nothing was too much trouble, helpful & friendly. It was a wonderful stay for young and old, every age catered for. Highly recommend  this hotel.

title: Average
review: Dear Linda C  Wow thanks fothe high praise!  We loved looking after the group!  The team were delighted to know they made a good impression and we look forward to welcoming you back any time in the future  Please contact me with any enquiry on fraser.ross@accor.com  Cheers  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Class Hotel
review: We were here at Christmas with the family. We had booked 3 rooms. My brother with 2 children had booked a family room. Which was an ok size with a double bed and bunk beds but itn had a tiny bathroom with a shower and see through glass panel into the other room.. ridiculous. Kids were coming to my room for a bath in the evenings. I had  booked a suite with private pool.. the room was very spacious but the pool kept draining itself during the night?? not sure what that was about but kept calling out maintenance. who were efficient enough. Mums room was a standard and was really quite sufficient for 1 person. my main gripe was housekeeping.. we were constantly asking for extra towels. there were literally 2 towels as it was so hot we were showering in the morning and evenings...…

title: Relaxing stay, well located
review: Dear ag88  Many thanks for the time to share your thoughts. Please allow me to apologize for the disappointment you have felt and I applaud that attitude that you did not allow your disappointment to cloud your holiday  I hope that we may have the chance to one day show yuo our improvements and I would be delighted to welcome you back - contact me any time on fraser.ross@accor.com  Sincerely   Fraser  Fraser ross General Manager

title: Great place for family stay
review: Perfect service.The hotel location is very good. Only 10 minutes by car from the busy Patong and in the very beginning of Karon. The Beach is only across the road. Actually Karon has one of the best beaches in Phuket. Restaurants are on a walking distance of 15 minutes. The spa center is perfect and compared with the street Massage studios worth the money spent. If you are planning to use your balcony do not take room in the accommodation wing close to the road - it is abnormally noisy day and night. Also if you wake up after 08h30 you will not be able to get sun beds at the pool, all will be reserved with towels, books and some other personal stuff. It is quite disappointing for those who wish to spend their time at the pool. If you want to do any activities I suggest you make…

title: Beautiful hotel near the long Beach.
review: Novotel Karon beach is situated in front off a long beautiful beach. We where coming from Krabi whit a speedboat and it was hard raining, but the very good service when we arrived in the hotel gives us new energy. We has booked already a long time before and we got the very clean and luxury room like we has booked. The hotel has many swimming pools and also many bars. Just cross the road an ask before for a towel and you are on the beautiful beach and sea. Everything is available in this hotel to gave a super holiday. And the very friendly personal is helpful. Breakfast is super good and is more like a brunch.

title: THE BEST!!!! LOVED IT!!!!
review: Dear Zutterman  Many thanks for the wonderful review and it was a pleasure to know that we have made the stay enjoyable - we look forward to seeing you return!  Let me know your plans any time on fraser.ross@accor.com and I'll be around to help with any booking!  Tropical regards  Fraser Fraser Ross  General Manager

title: Nice place to stay
review: I am from Sydney and travelled recently stayed at the Novotel karin Beach Resort for 10 days. My husband and I have 2 children ages 2 and 3 and my extended family and their kids stayed at the same hotel. We initially emailed the hotel General Manger Fraser Ross whom put us in touch with the Assistant Manager Alexandre Huet by email to request rooms that are poolside for our children who take day naps. Alex was extremely helpful and was not only patient with all my requests such as adding buffet breakfast at a great rate, organising airport transfers and attending to our room requests to ensure they are adjacent to each other. We arrived early morning and we were greeted on arrival by Alex himself and he took the time to ensure we had a good flight and arranged temporary rooms so…

title: Good
review: Dear Diala E  Wow - loved reading this one out! The team are just bowled over at your generous praise!  We would love to see you and the family back to enjoy  the  resort and the local area again  Please let me know when you're planning to head this way and I'll be delighted to help in any way I can - contact me on fraser.ross@accor.com  Cheers!  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: excellent hotel
review: The first thing I have to say thank you to khun David at front desk, He was very nice and kind thanks for upgrade room type to pool villa that was amazing. Thai food at TAI restaurant was very perfect and fair price. But just one thing I don't know about time they're put chlorine in pool at room the smell so strong, Anyway we're just stayed 1 night but everything was great and perfect.  Big thanks to nice service

title: Excellent service, great for families
review: We (2 adults and and 11 year old) stayed here in late January for 7 nights.  The location was great, we walked to and from the main part of Karon, a 7-10 minute walk.  The resort itself is very well appointed with the 3 pools and numerous bars and eating places.  The bed in the deluxe room is massive!  The buffet breakfast was great and seemed to cater for a number of cuisines.  For me, it was the little things that made the difference, like staff randomly bringing out ice blocks for the kids in the kids pool, the complimentary water bottles in the rooms, the giant orbs the kids could play in in the pool, the late check out and the ever helpful staff who always greet you.  While our reservation wasn't completely without 'issues', again it was the staff's eagerness to sort the…

title: Nice stay
review: Dear jane b  Many thanks for yuor gracious words.  we are delighted that we were able to look after you and of course help you enjoy the well earned break!  We would be delighted to see you return anytime and no time is too busy to respond - let me know on fraser.ross@accor.com of your plans and I'll be happy to help with any enquiry  Tropical regards  Fraser Fraser Ross General; Manager

title: Amazing simply amazing!
review: Stayed early January - hotel is a good location and highly recommend Karon for a more relaxed Phuket experience. The hotel is a 5-10min walk to the main strip full of restaurants etc... and the beach is across the road. You do have to cross the main road (which people have complained about on here) but really its fine and there is always security there stopping the traffic for you. Staff friendly, big thanks to chef Cyril for going through the menus with me as I am gluten free, made my stay alot easier :) Rooms nice & quiet, comfy & clean.  Really nice pools, choice of 3 (one for kids). Free Water aerobics was a good laugh and did the yoga too. The spa was really nice and great value for swedish massage. Buffet breakfast good too, pretty good variety. The gym is good - i just…

title: Customer Service
review: Dear EatTravelTrain  (Cool name by the way) Many thanks for the feedback and the time to share your thoughts - we have enjoyed sharing your comments and loved the good but and taken on board  the feedback on the  areas for improvements.  We'd be delighted to see yuo back and please let me know your plans on fraser.ross@accor.com  Cheers!  Fraser Fraser ross General Manager

title: 40th Birthday celebration
review: This is one of the best hotels we have ever stayed. The staff go well beyond what is expected to make you feel welcomed and cared for. The kids program is top notch and well appreciated by mom and dad. The three pools are relaxing and the food is excellent. The beach is right across the street and shops are only a 10 minute walk away. However, we find it hard to leave the resort as everything is so convenient and wonderful. I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone, but especially those with children will appreciate the warmth and care.

title: Paul
review: We booked the hotel on February 2015 travel as a we honeymoon couple. As we request for airport taxi and which they forgot to arrange we waited for 45 minutes in airport, as we early arrived we did not expected room to be ready that's ok.When we get into the room its a interconnecting room and end of the building as a Honeymoon couple which hotel provide inter connecting room!!! Hotel Front Office Manager or Duty Manager they don't check about the booking trace then again waited for 1.30 minutes to get another room we almost finish our day. Other than that hotel is ok.

title: Perfect ending to a fantastic holiday travelling around Phuket
review: Dear T8321CXpaul  Thank you for your review. Firstly, please accept my apologies for all inconvenience that came across during your journey. I passed your comment to the team. We are deeply sorry for what happened and discussed with our team in order to prevent this kind of incident to happen again in the future.   If you have plans to come back to Phuket, we would be happy to welcome you again.  Please let me know on fraser.ross@accor.com  Warm regards  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Amazing!!!
review: We have just come back from three weeks in Phuket & Phi Phi with our last week staying in Novotel Karon Beach, the hotel is fantastic but the service from all the staff is the best we had over all our stay, nothing is too much trouble and all done with a smile...yes this is Thai culture but these guys are awesome. rooms are big and spacious, we had a king, single & bunk beds for the 5 of us and still plenty of room, spotless clean. the resort was fully booked but still had the feeling it was half empty. best breakfast we had in all of the 5 hotels we stayed in over our trip and the egg station does the best omelettes. location right across from beach with a security guard to help you cross the road, it's right at the top North of Karon Beach so nice and quiet location but short…

title: Wonderful time
review: Dear StevieDcarr  Many thanks for your generous 5-star review. It was a pleasure to assist you. Our team is pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. Kitchen team can’t stop smiling after knowing that their efforts on breakfast are successful. Thank you once again for your feedback.  When you plan to stay with us, Please let me know on fraser.ross@accor.com  Tropical regards  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Wonderful holiday!!
review: We have just arrived home and I'm already feeling homesick, I want to go back! This place has the most amazing staff and facilities. The buffet breakfast was fantastic, a huge variety of food to choose from, the front desk staff were the most helpful I have ever encountered, the food and beverage staff worked tirelessly (Slavo and his team, unfortunately it's impossible to name everyone but a big thanks to Jay, Oscar, Stephen, Andi, Bum, Pumpui, Palm, Chai, whoever I hugged when I left, sorry if I didn't name you), everyone at the Kids Club (Katty, Tour, Taer), my kids had the best time, the pool attendants, housekeeping (thanks Noom for sorting out my bedding issue and being so efficient), I can honestly say that this is the best experience we have ever had with any resort. The…

title: Very good hotel with service-minded staff
review: We stayed at Novotel Karon beach in this January. Hotel was fully booked during our stay which was reflected in little lines to breakfast (max. 5min) and very few vacant sunbeds. But everything else (food,housekeeping,spa reservations, etc) worked quite smoothly.  Our room was Deluxe room at 2nd floor that had view to Patak road. There came some noise into the room but not disturbingly. King bed was over 2 metres wide and soft so good sleep is guaranteed. Housekeeping worked well and room was clean all the time. On first night we had some issues with shower and smell of minibar. At reception Assistant Front Office Manager David took my concerns under control and after two hours serviceman had fixed the shower and housekeeping made a matchstick trick to minibar. Service was fast…

title: Beautiful hotel with friendly staff
review: Dear TeemuTTT  Many thanks for the kinds words. I am glad we were able to clear up the initial hicoughs and let yuo get on with enjoying the break you deserve!  I have passed on your comments to David and he is delighted to be able to have made an impact on yuor stay.  Please let me know when you plan to  head this way again on fraser.ross@accor.com  Cheers  Fraser Fraser Rooss General Manager

title: Disappointing
review: Had a very enjoyable stay here at Novotel Karon Beach! Our check in was very smooth and we had a beautiful room 5 steps away from one of the pools! We enjoyed the delicious buffet breakfast every morning, free yoga by the pool with Bird (that's his name!), swimming in the 3 pools and cheap drinks during happy hour. Location is pretty good as it is only a short stroll away from the main road where you can access tour agents, lots of restaurants and massage parlours.   The room itself was fantastic. I think we had the second best room (one down from the suite) and it was so spacious! We had a lounge in there as well. Everything was very clean and stylish. Will stay again!!

title: Very good
review: Dear Katieeez  wow !  Many thanks for  the great review - Bird ( it's a nick name .............his real name is a bit of a mouthful!!) is delighted to know he made such an impression!  The kitchen team  are also happy to have laid on a great spread  We'll be looking forward to your next visit and please let me know your plans on fraser.ross@accor.com - I'll be happy to help with any arrangements.  Tropical Regards  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Good Hotel!
review: Some of this things we experienced while staying at Novotel Karon Beach...Slow internet, hole in towls, lumpy pillows, main road right outside bedroom balcony so there was a lot of noise, no take away coffee cups at the restaurant, limited nail service at Spa, power outage, brown water from taps, had to pay for lattes at breakfast.

title: Wow!
review: What a stunning hotel, the beauty is not only in its aesthetics but in the work ethic and polite staff as well.  Traveling with three kids was a bit daunting but choosing this hotel was the best decision ever.  Booking the plunge pool suites was a hit with the kids.  The kids club was amazing, the kids loved it there.  All in all this hotel and it's staff made this holiday one for the books.

title: Nice hotel with great staff
review: Dear FSRW  Such a great review to share with the team . Clearly we have hit the target of making you smile and making you feel as at  ease as possible! We're so  Glad we were able to make the difference and we'd be excited to see you return  Let me know your plans on fraser.ross@accor.com  Cheers  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Great Family Home Base While in Phuket! Had everything we wanted and more.
review: stayrd in the plungepool suite for at week with two children. All was great. Had problems with our pool but the staff really did a good job. Staff was also very child friendly. Food was to western for my taste though.

title: Great stay,friendly staff
review: Dear Johanna7711  Many thanks !  Short but sweet in the end! I am delighted we were able to fix up the room issue and that the kids enjoyed the activities and fun with the team!  Please let me know when you plan to return on fraser.ross@accor.com  Cheers  Fraser  Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Fantastic
review: Staff - was fantastic. One of the managers (I wish I remembered her name so I could included it in the review) provided us with a temporary rooms until our rooms were ready, as we arrived very early and my daughter was sick. All of the staff was very friendly, helpful, and professional. Especially at the kids club. It made our staff very comfortable and relaxing.  Location - ideal for families with kids. very close to the beach and just far enough away from the night life to be quiet, but still accessible for the adults.  Spa - we went every day. Even though it was more expensive than other alternatives. The quality of massage and facility, professionalism of staff, and convenience of location, is worth the extra cost.  Hotel Restaurants -  good quality, but again you will pay a…

title: Lovely hotel with amazing staff
review: We were looking for a relaxing holiday away from the craziness of Patong but not so remote that travelling about would be difficult.   This hotel met all of our requirements, it's beautiful, not too large, lots going on (we enjoyed the aqua aerobics and water walkers), close to a lovely beach and plenty of choice for eating out. The rooms are well appointed with very comfortable beds. The pools are excellent and we tried out all of them. At the beginning of the holiday, there was no problem finding sun beds but we found that, towards the end of our stay, greedy guests had turned up that 'reserved' beds with towels and then didn't turn up all day. Just a slight annoyance. It would be good to see the polite notices regarding this followed up on but I do recognise this is not easy…

title: Perfect Getaway!!
review: Dear Mel H  Many tHanks for the kind words and the great score!  David and Faud Especially are delighted to get a mention.  We have taken note of the feedback re the pool towel booking system - While we have over 120 beds around the resort available at times there can be a bit of a squeeze - we do police this but obviously with so many comings and goings there are times when it's harder to track.  We will be delighted to welcome you back and please let me know your plans on fraser.ross@accor.com   Cheers  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: All in all a lovely  hotel
review: Went to Phuket last month for my Honeymoon and stayed at this hotel. we had booked a standard room, and the hotel staff was so good, considering our honeymoon they upgraded us to a luxury room at no extra charges... we had a nice welcome, there was always someone or the other to assist us. the room was excellent, very clean, beautifully decorated for us..and very comfortable. Also had a spa there which was again excellent. The breakfast buffets were great too..food from the room service and their thai restaurant was good too..  I would suggest this place to everyone visiting Phuket!!

title: Nice all round hotel, great location
review: Dear 764anonymous  Wow!  Thanks  for the great review and I will have to build more rooms to accommodate every who comes to Phuket!!!This was the favorite response of team today when we shared that a special holiday that got special reward with feedback like this. Please let me know your plans for the anniversary on fraser.ross@accor.com - I'll  be delighted to help in any way!  Cheers Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: A little isolated but has good amenities
review: We are a family with two teenagers and two adults who spent  6 nights over New Year at Novotel Karon. We had a standard room and a plunge pool room. Both were fine but the plunge pool room had a little odor of "mold". I think it came from the filter in the air-condition that needs to be replaced. This is however normal when you are in humid countries in Asia and nothing that we were concerned about. Our daughter has asthma but did  not get any reaction while staying in the plunge pool room for one night. We ate quite often at the hotel, both dinner and lunch. Many of the staff did their job professionally. In the sports bar they forgot, however, our order at one point and they did not apologise or try to give a compensation. On another occasion, it took about 30 minutes before…

title: Beautiful Hotel, Karon Beach Righ Across the Road, Private Pool
review: Stayed at the hotel for 3 nights. Karon beach is right across the road from the hotel, and there's a staff that will hold traffic for guests. Karon beach is quieter than Patong. Karon town is leisurely 10 minutes walk from the hotel if you want some local food or would like to check out the Karon night market. It may not be convenient for everyone, but it was ok for me.   It's a beautiful modern hotel with a touch of art deco about it. The room was comfortable and spacious. The room did not come with a view but it had a private pool with falling water feature attached to it so I forgive them. The hotel pool is also very nice. The level of service and Wifi (from the room) could be more consistent.

title: Just Brilliant !!!
review: Dear Azuarwawa  Thanks for the lovely review of the resort and while  Location is one of strongest selling points - not being Patong is a huge advantage! I agree that the Karon night life is not as a "upbeat" as Bangla road!  I hope we can welcome yuo back again to the resort - - Please contact me at any time on fraser.ross@accor.com and I'll be happy to help with any arrangements  Cheers  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Great place to stay in Phuket away from Patong
review: After reading the reviews on Tripadvisor we decided on booking the hotel.  We were not disappointed at all.  We booked a pick up from Phuket airport through the hotel, unfortunately they did not turn up.  It was not too much of an issue as we got a taxi and on the way stopped and we booked a number of tours.  When we got to the hotel the staff were lovely and welcoming and refunded us the cost of the transfer that we paid.  The rooms were lovely and big with great power showers. They were very clean and the bed very comfortable.    The pool area was excellent with a large pool.  With a separate kids pool area and another shallow pool on the other side of the hotel near the bar.  Breakfast was massive lots of choices, literally anything you can think of was available.  The beach…

title: Family Room 2 adults / 2 toddlers xmas
review: Dear travelexpert68  Many thanks for the 5 star review . I am delighted we recovered the initial issue of the pickup with the service to make this headache go away!  I have passed the comments on to the team And they are delighted to know they made such a deference to the experience while yuo were with us !  Please let me know when you are coming back on fraser.ross@accor.com, I'll be  only too happy to help with any enquiry  Tropical Regards  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Aaaand relax. The Novotel is the place to be!
review: Loved this resort as it ticked all the boxes of what we needed. Kids club was fantastic for my son 10 years old and he loved going.  Pools were great & clean. Ate at all of the food outlets within the resort and all were great. Cocktail hour was awesome too !. (long Island iced tea .. YUM !) Stayed in 2 different room types with the second being one with our own plunge pool. This was lovely and the room was nice and spacious. the beach across the road was lovely and found the restaurants here to have great food & drinks.

title: Relaxing break in a nice resort
review: Our family 2 adults and 2 teens stayed here for 7 nights from 11/12. We booked 2 rooms  being a plunge pool room and a standard room. We were a little disappointed at first as our rooms were not close together however to the resorts credit, they moved our kids after 4 nights to a plunge pool room also. The resort is clean and just a short stroll to karon beach (which is nice) and restaurants, shops. We enjoyed the quiet location and it suits families or couples wanting to avoid the hustle and bustle that exists in Phuket. The resort pools are great and free wifi handy. I think that the resort prices are a little high and they should provide more incentives to eat in, or have massage etc..  The rooms are clean although bathrooms are very small. The resort should also update their…

title: Perfect for Families
review: Dear Zorro2426134   Many thanks for taking the time to share your thoughts.  We are delighted we were able to find solution  to the room booking  situation and keep everybody close together.    I appreciate the feedback on the pillows also we will star ta pillow menu in the new year!   I hope to see you again at the resort in the near future and should your plans involve heading this way - please contact me direct on fraser.ross@accor.com and I'll be able to help with any enquiry.  Tropical Regards  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Child friendly hotel with great water slide
review: My kids (6 yr old + 2 yr old) and I enjoyed staying at Novotel Karon. I would highly recommend for families. First, location worked well for us as Karon is quieter and away from the party scene in Patong. Secondly, there were tons of kids activities and facilities catering to them. The kids wanted to hang out at at the play room everyday and they had a great time making friends or playing games. i was actually slightly annoyed one day when they did not want to go hang out at the beach with me. And lastly, interaction with the staff was superb. They were always friendly and helpful.

title: Great Hotel
review: Dear Peter K  Many thanks for the review!  The team got a big kick out of hearing this one today.  We always strive to make sure our guests are smiling and in your case we hit the spot!  Let me know when you plan to head back to Phuket on fraser.ross@accor.com  and I'll be only  too glad to help I n any way I can  Tropical festive greetings!  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Nice staff smelly pillow
review: Contemporary hotel with 3 swimming pools. Child's pool has water slide. Biggest pool has water volley ball and zorb ball ( walking on water) activity. Kids' activity room has organized activities for a fee.  Nice decor in lobby. We were upgraded from a family room to 2 rooms with connecting door. King Beds are 1.5 x king size and comfortable. But wifi was slow and bathtub had no shower curtain. Champions bar/cafe has darts and snooker table with good food-we had chicken wings, pizza, nachos and tomato bruschetta. Big gym but ran out of towels and water. Breakfast has a great spread including freshly cooked eggs, machine made pancakes, muesli, yoghurt, sushi, lemongrass/ roselle and other types of juice

title: Hey its a Novotel! Only thing Thai was the service...
review: This hotel turned out to be just what I expect, with some hits and some misses.  The location isn't very good.  If you read any reviews you already know this.  Its not on the beach, its near.  You can't see the beach from most rooms, nor can you hear the ocean from the hotel.  Its a nice brisk walk into the heart of Karon town, 10 to 15 minutes is expected, depending on how you go.  There is a cut through by the 7-11 into the heart of town.  It looks scary at night, but don't worry, plenty of people around and it will cut out 5 minutes at least.  The hotel offers a car to take you if you'd like for around 200 baht, sorry can't remember exactly.  Great pool!  A lot of chairs and varying depths.  A bar on site that you can swim up to.  Nice towels.  There was a slide and a second…

title: An excellent property worth visting
review: Dear Azgators  Many thanks for the detailed review  and the high praise for Sandra - one of our superstars.  I do take note of the location feedback- so thanks for that -  I have to highlight this is one of our greatest selling points is that we are not in the middle of Patong nightlife and all that entails. It's just 10 minutes by TUK TUK way though for a bit of adventure worlds  so Hey t's a Novotel we'll take as a massive compliment.  Let me know when you plan to return to this part of the world - even if you need to contact a Patong Hotel can help -  on fraser.ross@accor.com I would love to have to  see you back in house  - the service is Thai - we're 99% Thai staff - the brand is French so it's international standard- I guess you get the best of both   Cheers!  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Nice hotel. Okay to skip it.
review: The property is a stunning one and with multiple pools and restaurants offer complete relaxation. The hotel is right across the beautiful Karon beach, and is about 10 min drive away from Jungselon mall.  a good hotel worth visiting for a family

title: Normal
review: Dear SomaDas98  Many thanks for the  review and the kind words !  The team are delighted to get this feedback and we would be so happy to see you return  Let me know your plans on fraser.ross@accor.com and I'll be delighted to help with any arrangements   Cheers  Fraser  Fraser Ross General Manager

title: It is borderline ... Could've been 4 stars
review: My wife and I (no kids) stayed here for 3 nights (Dec 21st - 24th). We have a mix review about this hotel. In short, nice hotel, bad location. To clarify, we normally like to explore local shops and restaurants. The hotel is about 10-15 mins walking to the nearest restaurant (single). To get there (as well as to access the beach), you will have to cross the busy street. The hotel is situated in the corner, so opposing traffics will not have a clear view of you crossing the road.  We would suggest to find hotels about 1-2 miles further south (like Movenpick or hotels in North Kata beach) for more access to shops and restaurants. Additionally, accessing the beach is a lot less riskier within a few steps. If you plan to take a taxi from hotel to No Kata beach, it costs 400 THB…

title: Simply outstanding on all fronts!
review: We spent 5 days at the Novotel Phuket Karon Beach in the pamper suite for my 40th birthday and it was probably the best holiday we've ever had. I don't know why this hotel isn't number 1 of all the resorts in Karon Beach. Where to start? For a start we didn't want to leave our room (more like a villa!) which was modernly decked out with nothing overlooked. A small house really with huge bathroom, bathtub and 2 sinks, light-filled bedroom with a view over our private plunge pool, palms outside the windows for privacy, a living room, outside sitting area - beautifully landscaped, surrounded by nature. The grounds of the hotel are also beautifully landscaped with tropical plants and maintained very well - even walking around is relaxing. All the staff are smiling and greeting you -…

title: Great Resort Hotel.
review: Dear Laini26  Stop it - we're blushing !  Seriously - thanks so much for the kind words - the team were thrilled when we shared this morning.  It's always our goal to deliver the break our guests deserve and so very satisfying when we get the feedback we have hit the spot!  Please let me know directly on fraser.ross@accor.com when you're coming back -we'll have open arms!  Cheers  Fraser  Fraser Ross  General Manager

title: Great service, good location. Best staff ever!
review: Just returned from a week at this hotel.  The staff were wonderful everywhere in the hotel including bars, restaurants, pool and cleaning.  They could not have been more helpful.  The room was nice and the amenities great.  Also a good location, just across from the beach and easy walking distance to shopping and local restaurants.

title: Lovely hotel
review: Dear kerry560  Thanks for the kind words and review of the resort and local area. we really appreciate the  feedback and the team are delighted to know they made such a positive impact on the stay  Please let me know when you plan to come back  on fraser.ross@accor.com  Cheers!  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Our son's maiden vacation, Novotel created a beautiful lifetime memory
review: Everything was perfect, location, staff, room etc. I have absolutely nothing to complain about. Want to thank Pam att the restaurant who served us everyday. We will defenitly stay at a Novotel hotel again.

title: Superb hotel
review: Great staff, nice welcome especcialy when you are a Le Club Accor member!  Great food at all bars and breakfast is a great start of the day. 3 pools available, main pool includes a pool bar.
