Also for Kids much things to do including a slide at the children pool.    Not far from the centre of Karon Beach and rooms are good; King bed and great shower.   With the next visit we will Come back!

title: Could have stayed longer - Will revisit
review: Dear Kristiaan D  Wow many thanks for the great review .  We always aim to put a simile on the dial of all our guests!  The team are beaming away knowing they made such a great impression  Please let me know when you plan to return on fraser.ross@accor.com  Tropical Regards  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: No, I don't like Novotel Phuket Karon Beach
review: We stayed for 7 nights in November and the hotel exceeded our expectations.  The outdoor Check-in was pleasant.  Azman and the team were pleasant and helpful. We were upgraded from our booked superior room to a deluxe room through Gold Accor.  If you do not like road noise the majority of the deluxe rooms will not suit.  The noise was too much for me and moved to a superior plunge pool the next day.  This was done with little fuss although I specifically requested a quiet room and therefore should have not been placed in a deluxe. The rooms are very modern as the resort is quite new. A notable room size difference between the Deluxe and the superior including the bathroom. The superior room on majority did the job, the plunge pool was excellent, only issues noted were a lack of…

title: Good hotel and location.  But can do more
review: Dear PedroNastro  Thank yuo foe the detailed review and the feedback - we certainly seem to have gotten many things right and I appreciate the feedback about the entertainment - we do have movie nights and  now we have a live signer act twice per week also.  So come back and see for yourself !!  Please let me know yuor plans on fraser.ross@accor.com  Cheers' ' Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Five Star Service- Three Star Price!
review: "Beach"-Hotel: The beach is behind a major road. Lots of loud traffic and no parking for scooters! It is a big problem to park the scooter in front of the hotel.  Gym: equipment does not work properly!  Wifi: very bad signal in the whole "resort"!  Price: you pay for the name "Novotel"!  They don't pay attention to the small details. For example: The grouting in the swimming pool is horrible. The towels at the pool are bleached and old.   Bottom line: never ever again!

title: Good hotel.
review: This is a beautiful hotel with helpful staff. When we were there the floor manager would walk around the pool and ask customers what they though of novotel. Which i think is brilliant. The breakfast area needs to be improved. The hotel is five minutes away from the beautiful Karon beach and 10 minutes away from karon beach market and restaurants.

title: Family Vacation at Novotel Karon Phuket.
review: Dear Aslam M  Thank you for your review.  We are pleased to know that you like our hotel and that our Pool ambassadors program works well. I took your comment regarding breakfast on board for improvement. Many thanks again.  If you have plans to Phuket kindly notice me on fraser.ross@accor.com  Tropical regards  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Great time with the family!
review: New property, close proximity to Karon town and easily accessible to Patong although the journey from the airport can be a bit far, nevertheless the hotel did not disappoint at all. Highlights: 1. Service is top notch hence why Thailand is a favorite vacation destination for the family. 2. Hotel caters to both family and couples with 3 different pools to choose from. 3. Food here is excellent and not very expensive if you are too lazy to roam around town. 4. A nice kids club for the kids should the parents want some quiet time. Staff are warm and friendly too. 5. Pretty decent breakfast spread @ the Horizon however its not air conditioned and can be a bit warm for some. 6. Family oriented hotel  Cons: 1. Beach is across the hotel but it is clean and waters are clear. 2. Most of…

title: Good Hotel, would be great with some improvements!
review: Dear AlfredFR  Many thanks for the kind words. I have shared the review with the team and they are delighted to be part of your 5-star feedback. I’m glad that our resort did not disappoint you at all. However- we take your concern regarding the lack of  air-conditioning in our restaurants for consideration. Thank you once again for your highlights. I’m looking forward to welcoming you and your family back to our resort in the future.  Please let me know on fraser.ross@accor.com - if you have plans to come back.  Tropical regards  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Love this hotel!
review: We've been to Phuket a couple of times but it was our first at Novotel Karon Beach Resort.   Pros : 1. Great service at the reception during check in. Staff was friendly and helpful. Would like to commend Sandra & Zoe for their good customer services. 2. Pools were not crowded as there were 3 pools, one specially just for kids. 3. Nice kids' club with all sorts of activities, there was even a 'spiderman' to entertain the kids. 4. Family suites were spacious 5. Breakfast spread was average although the replenishment was pretty quick! 6. Family friendly hotel  Cons : 1. Low water pressure from the shower in the bathroom 2. Not very good accessibly to the beach. One needs to cross a busy road although with the help of the security staff. It's about 5 mins walk. 3. Closest…

title: Very nice staff and location
review: We arrived at the hotel a little after check in time of 2PM and was met with a smiling and friendly face Alex who checked us in and made sure we were looked after.  The room 2307 was both clean and spacious and ready for us to enjoy our holiday.  The internet in the room was not great which is not ideal when having to work away from home as most do in todays world, the toilet didnt flush and wasnt fixed until the following day after reporting it twice.  The food and beverages were of a very high standard at the hotel, we booked the breakfast at the hotel and wasnt disappointed with several dishes available to meet most peoples needs.  The facilities at the hotel were very good with three pools to chose from plenty sun loungers and a very tranquil atmosphere around the pool all…

title: Fantastic staff, great hotel - very sad to leave.
review: Dear DMS17869  Many Thanks for the review and taking the time to share.  I reviewed this with the team this morning and the yare very happy to have made a good impression.  we 'd love toy see you back and experience the broadened wifi capacity!!  Let me know your plans on fraser.ross@accor.com  Tropical Regards  Fraser  Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Nice hotel not far from town
review: Stayed for 10 nights originally booked into a suite but due to a problem with the room we changed room and then we were upgraded to a plunge pool suite and compensated very well for the inconvenience of the rooms changes which was very much appreciated.   Fraser Ross and his lovely team, Alex, David, Sandra, Bow (on the front desk) Ron & Jay at the pool bar, the ladies in the spa and not forgetting my lovely cleaning/turndown service ladies, even the maintenance man was great- they were all so friendly, helpful and went out of their way to ensure I had everything i needed and were quick to deal with any issues or requests.  All the staff at this hotel work very hard and really want to ensure you have a great stay with them, it really did make our stay there very special.  The…

title: Good Stay!!
review: Dear Fun loving Sun Seeker  You found the sun and  had some fun!!  it was lovely to have you both here a the resort and we enjoyed putting the smile on your face !  I'd love to welcome you back and see you enjoy some more drinks around the pool! Let me know when we can host you again on fraser.ross@accor.com  Cheers  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: 'A' For Effort
review: We stayed in a standard room at back of hotel and as far as standard rooms go this was very nice and very quiet. We could even see the big Buddah from our room. The resort is very well appointed and has great facilities, the staff are excellent and whenever we had issues they were quick to respond . I do however think that several areas need attention.....the main pool is tiled and very slippery to enter.....and for being a new resort has a lot of grouting missing. Also the breakfast buffet was only average...by that I mean it had the usual eggs to order and Asian/Western foods but unfortunately hot foods were never actually "hot". The only way to get a hot fresh breakfast food was to order the eggs....the bacon /tomatoes/potatoes were always  luke warm at best ,and any foods…

title: Good hotel
review: Good hotel,the first room we had,had a funny smelt,we complaint about it and the next day they give us a new room straight away and check were the smell was coming from in the old room,all the staff are very friendly and the breakfast was good here with a lot of choose the beech is close by just a walking distance away

title: Nothing to WOW about
review: Dear p c  Many Thanks for the review and sharing your thoughts    We'd be delighted to see you return back and Please let me know when you plan to do soon fraser.ross@accor.com  Cheers  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Good hotel,but with a few tweaks, even better!
review: Disappointed upon arrival that its not a beach front hotel. Upon arriving at hotel suite, disappointed that at 11pm, the toilet bowl was blocked and nearly flooded, we had to repack and change rooms after a tiring day of travelling, I was 7 months pregnant and travelling with two young kids. Made so many calls to front desk but nobody picks up. Hubby had to walk to all the way to front counter to talk to them. I even tried calling the emergency line but it was only picked up after 3 minutes (I recorded it on my phone if you don't believe me, because I also cannot believe it, and I called more than once!). This is something the hotel REALLY needs to improve on.  I love the pull out bed for kids, the plunge pool, the slide at the kids slide, and the kids club.  Other than that,…

title: 100% guaranteed to be satisfied
review: Dear Catherine L  Thank you for taking the time  to review and share your experience .  We missed the problems you experienced as during your stay you paid to upgrade the room type you had booked so we took this to mean all was OK  despite the hiccough after your check in .  Please accept  my apologies for the mis understanding  and I would dearly love to welcome you back to the resort in the future   Sincerely Fraser  Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Great hotel with close access to the beach
review: Great check-in! Good welcome,cold towels & bottle of water! Escorted to our rooms on the far side of the hotel,only to find out that the room's didn't have the kingsize beds that had been requested, were in fact two singles! It did'nt help that the porter spoke little English! After a couple of trips to & fro(getting hot & sticky now) sorted? One solution was to push the singles together with separate duvets! Not really! With that we were upgraded to two rooms with large beds(couldn't really see much difference) closer to beach with the road below! One of the rooms had a side door leading onto a small patio. Unfortunately the glass door was covered by squares of cardboard stuck on by gaffer tape, to keep the sunlight out, I suppose?. The beds were far too firm, requested …

title: Awesome place!!
review: Perfect for families with kids. The pool areas were nicely set out with plenty of sun lounges.   The rooms were excellent! We stayed in a Suite, it was very spacious and the bed was huge!! Would recommend getting a room with a plunge pool - the  person we traveled with had one and was a great way to relax! Food was quite good, with plenty of options and the breakfast offered plenty of variety. Would recommend the Pizza and Pasta night!!  Great location - short walk to Karon beach and only 10 - 15 min drive to Patong. Would also like to commend the staff. They were great, friendly and very good with kids.  Overall, an excellent choice and would definitely recommend...

title: Novotel Karon
review: Very good hotel, particularly for family with kids; just 5 minutes walk from Karon beach. They have kids world which is excellent & open through the day.Nice big slide at the swimming pool which is real fun for the kids, adults can use it too! The rooms are spacious with a big balcony. We liked Karon beach much more than the other beaches in Phuket. It is much less touristy. A walk at the beach road is enjoyable. There are stores and restaurants close by. Overall very well maintained property with excellent staff and services, highly recommend!

title: 4 nights stay at Karon
review: Dear ReshmaKC  Many Thanks for the   kind words and the  lovely review of the area as well as the hotel - Karon is an ideal spot that sits between the hustle and bustle of  Patong and the serenity of the quieter beaches!  Please let me know when you plan to return on fraser.ross@accor.com  Cheers  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Very impressive
review: My partners first overseas trip and he only wants to come back here. Great hotel.  Clean room with everything we needed. Beautiful staff. Fantastic, clean pools. Close to Phuket and Kata. Walking distance to the main street and the beach. Would recommend to anyone.

title: Had a great time!
review: The staff was amazing and the location was perfect; it was close to both the beach and the shopping area. The food at the restaurants was very good. The breakfast buffet was diverse and tasty. Overall, highly recommended.

title: Probably the best Holiday we ever Had.
review: Dear neveenmfm  Many thanks for your great review. Short but sweet! I shared your comments with the  team and they are all delighted to know that you had a great time.   When you plan to come back to Phuket, kindly let me know on fraser.ross@accor.com  Tropical regards  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Amazing stay
review: Just returned from a most enjoyable and relaxing Holiday. The food was excellent whether breakfast, dinner or room service. Pool areas are well set out and staff are very attentive. We are already organising a future group booking of family and close friends. Reasons are: the resort is very relaxing during the day for either enjoyment or recuperating from the night before, It is only a short walk to Karon for older members to enjoy the great food (remember the resort also has fantastic food) and evening drinks. Younger members of the family are 25+ and Patong is only over the hill by TukTuk if they want wilder nights out, Happy hour goes from 2 - 6pm over various bars and this makes cocktails very reasonable. Kids club would be a boon for younger families. Chief Executive Fraser…

title: Superior beach resort in Karon beach
review: Dear Paul S  What a way to start the week! The team are just wowed by your kind words.    There's not  much else I can say except thank you and of course please contact me direct when your coming back on fraser.ross@accor.com  so I can help with any arrangements directly.  Cheers  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Great family stay
review: We travelled to Thailand last minute as we couldn't get to Bali due to the volcanic ash -activity - we are pleased we relocated to the novotel Phuket karon beach - Fraser the general manager and his team are kind, welcoming and generous - Cyril the head chef cooks amazing food - Alex the assistant manager met us at reception and said goodbye to us also when we left - our girls loved their time there and the kids club was a hit, along with the water slide - spa was amazing and reasonably priced - breakfast was fab and there literally wasn't anything the staff wouldn't do for you - thank you and we will be back - the lovegroves x

title: Relaxing place out of the hustle and bustle of Patong
review: Stayed here for nearly a week in a 1 bedroom unit with a plunge pool and will be back again. Staff are really friendly and the resort is located a short walk from the center of Karon Beach. Buffet breakfasts were great as was happy hour at the pool bar.

title: Amazingly friendly staff, great location and value for money
review: Dear Simon L  Short but sweet! Tanks for the kind swords and please let me know when you plan to return on fraser.ross@accor.com and I'll be happy to help with any arrangements !  Cheers  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Nice child friendly hotel.
review: We had a standard room. It was clean comfortable and most importantly quiet. The staff were very attentive and always greeted us with a smile, nothing was ever a bother and they were willing to please. The breakfast was amazing which catered for various tastes. The pools were spotlessly clean and we never had a problem finding a sun lounge in the shade no matter what time of day we chose to be there. Thebeach is just the across the road. Even though the road was busy there was always a supervisor to halt the traffic so that you could cross saftey. We would definitely stay here if we came back to Karon beach

title: Really nice hotel let down by serious service flaws
review: Dear Bernadette M  Many thanks for taking the time to share your thoughts. The team  were smiling a lot this morning knowing they had made such a positive impression  on your stay!  Please let me know when you plan to head back this way on fraser.ross@accor.com and I'll be only too happy to help in any way I can!  Tropical Regards  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: A Very nice Hotel!
review: We stay here with my wife and our 2 children from 3 and 5 years old for 4 nights. We was really surprised about the resort. Have 3 swimming pools included 1 for the kids with a slider. A nice kids club with friendly staff. Kids get an icecream and they playing with them. Several times then staff ask are our stay was nice. They take good care of us. Only the Thai restaurant was dissapointed. Very expensive for what you get and little bit tasteless. Ok, kids meals we're for free. Te beach is opposite the resort but if you walk about 10 min you have a beautiful beach. City karon as well 10 min walking. We want to extend 3 nights more but have to pay double the price what we payed before. I really go back this place, for sure for the kids. Thank you a lot staff from this resort.

title: Lovely hotel good location and fantastic staff
review: Stayed here at the end of a three week Thailand trip for a relax and bit of beach holiday. Lovely clean, modern hotel... We had two superior rooms in block 3 a double and twin next door with adjoining rooms. Hotel was spotless and rooms were great. 10 min walk to the edge of karon town and 5 min to the closest beach. Pools were fab, I think there was 3 or 4 we only used the main one! Snack and pool bars were nice, quick and so convenient. The breakfasts are amazing everything you could ever want in abundance. The staff here are excellent, they have lovely work ethic and are so helpful and polite. This is a good choice for a relaxing location. Both katar and Patong are 15-20 min in a taxi or tuck tuck and are much busier and not as nice.

title: Great Place for a Holiday!
review: Dear robs67  Many thanks for the lovely review! We  always try to put a smile on every guest's face and we seem to have succeeded in your case!  The team, would love to see you back and any time you are headed this way - please let me know on fraser.ross@accor.com, I'll be delighted to help out with any arrangements   Tropical Regards  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Had great time for our first family trip with 1.5 year old daughter
review: Novotel in Karon, Phuket, is a very nice resort, with large pools, a pool bar and pool restaurant; therefore, if you wish to spend the day in the hotel, you can stay there and have some nice time. The room we stayed in was very nice, neat and clean. The only inconvenience is that it overlooked the street, so we could hear cars and tuk-tuks with loud music passing by late at night. Breakfast is good, varied and fits all tastes (if only they can add more types of cheese). The pool restaurant offers some nice international food and sometimes a specialized buffet for dinner. The hotel staff is very nice, ready to help and, most importantly, always smiling. The hotel is very conveniently located by the beautiful Karon Beach and very close to Karon town center; yet, a bit far from the…

title: Fantastic Family Holiday
review: Dear mhry_13  Thanks for the great review !  We do try and make sure there is plenty of choice in side the resort of activity or the chance just to relax.  Out side the beach at Karon is very good as yuo say and there is a bit of night life - for the adventurous Patong is jus ta short tuk tuk hpo away!  Let me know if there is anything I can for you in the future on fraser.ross@accor.com  Tropical Regards  Fraser  Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Great hotel, lovely staff, well located!
review: This was our first family trip with our 1.5 year old daughter. It was difficult trying to find an infant friendly resort and when I saw some photos of the Kids World at Novotel, I decided to give them a try. Overall, I will say that we had a great time here. We stayed at the suite with a private pool. The pool was just perfect with warm water and my daughter really loved it. Kids World was perfect to keep her occupied for hours and hours while me and wife chilled out by the pool and Champions Bar. The staff at Kids World were friendly and there were many toys, playstaions etc to suit toddlers to school kids. We were a little disappointed with the breakfast spread but the staff were friendly and attentive. The walk to the beach is a short one. Just two minutes. Only thing is you…

title: Best familyvacation ever
review: We have just come home from Our Three week Family vacation at Novotel Phuket Karon Beach Restort & Spa, and I can say that this our best vacation ever and sets standards for future vacations ...if we`ll ever consider other Places to go.  We where a Family of four, two adults and a four year old and a 7 months old baby, and this was Perfect for us.  First I would like to rate the service - second to none. We have been to many places all over the world, five star spa hotels, Maldives, Cruises etc., but we have never experience such genuine service. All the People working at the spa made our vacation perfect.  Secondly we have to give huge credits to the Kidz Club staff. Our four year old spent at least a couple of hours there every day, and didn`t get bored during the Three weeks…

title: Nice hotel and location
review: We stayed as a group of 6 and cant really fault the hotel or its staff. Staff were very friendly and helpful. The main pool is amazing and we spent a lot of time either lounging by it or in it. Breakfast was great, the pancake machine was a highlight for us all. We were upgraded to a superior twin on our arrival and another group member was upgraded to a plunge pool suite so we felt pretty happy. Was a short stroll to the beach, restaurants are a good 10 minute walk away but its always good to have a little exercise after a meal. There is some great lunch place along the beach front which is easy to access once you have crossed the road with the help of the security man at the front. overall cant really fault the Novotel at all. The Spa was great and they did a great deal at…

title: Honeymoon
review: The hotel itself and staff were wonderful. Great kids play room and kids pool with slide. Room service food was delicious. Breakfast buffet was OK but restaurant was so hot as there was no AC that I lost all appetite. There were only about 4-5 ceiling fans..its tolerable if your sitting directly under the fans...other than that, its stifling. The beach is across the street and very quite. No watersports or rentals available unless you walk or drive (taxi) to Kata beach. Main street in Karon is also a 10-15min walk. We stayed in the family room and it was wonderful. They set up the kid's beds in the living area and we had the bedroom to ourselves.  Personally, I wouldnt return mainly because of the breakfast restaurant. They need to add more fans or get some type of circulation…

title: Fantastic
review: Absolutely fantastic place to stay.  The staff were fantastic especially manager Ake.  They were always out and about checking to make sure you were happy and had everything you need. Nothing was a problem.  We went on a tour to Similan Island and we were getting picked up very early in the morning. We spoke to Ake who organised a breakfast bag for each of us which contained fruit pastries etc for us to eat on the way. Very nice..  We don't have kids but we walked past the kids area every day to get to our room and it was fantastic. They have someone allocated to entertain the kids during the day. They had an excellent kids room and a separate pool for the kids. The pizza bar and grill was near the pool and also had excellent food. Although we didn't attend any the hotel…

title: Overall good... Needs a bit more polishing though
review: We are staying 11 nights in this Novotel and it is our first occasion. We have booked a superior room and ended up at building 3 in room 3301. It is a very spacious room with private balcony (limited view though) and bathroom with rain shower. The shower is great but using it implies that your bathroom floor gets wet unless you build a dike ( I am Dutch) to stop the water from flooding. The air conditioning in the room works perfect but mind that there is a connection with the door to access the balcony. Keeping that open automatically shuts down the airco to prevent electricity wasting. The prices for food and beverages are moderate. A bi weekly pizza and pasta buffet only costs 299 baht and cocktails are around 229 baht. During happy hours (widely available) you get two drinks…

title: The pool!!!!
review: I and my wife were here for 3 days and 2 nights for our BabyMoon. Overall, this is a good hotel to stay at if you prefer to stay away from the noisy part of the town. There are a few niggles here and there which i think the hotel can(read-should) correct. So, let me start with the pros and cons:  Pros: 1. If you are looking for a quiet location, then this is your hotel. It's 100Mts from the Karon beach and it's a bit far (30 minutes drive) from the Patong beach (Main area in Phuket). I liked the location. 2. Value for money: It's not the cheapest, but still it's a good value for your money. 3. Restaurants: There are 4 restaurants in the hotel - which is a great thing. You can try different cuisines in these hotels. We tried the Thai restaurants and we liked the food there. Also,…

title: Perfect, amazing staff.
review: Adding to the excellent reviews.  I spent 10 nights here with my 16yo daughter. We had a plunge pool suite which I'd really really recommend.  To me the pool seemed bigger in reality than all the photos here and it was cooler than the main pool which we found refreshing.  The suite is large - for 2 it was very spacious.  I like the 2 lots of storage areas, plenty of room to pack everything away.  The bathroom was huge and the shower was amazing.  The grounds are beautiful, so neat and perfect and lit up like a wonderland at night.  The room service menu is good and cheap (for room service), across the road is the beach and some yummy really cheap restaurants. The staff are wonderful, I wish I'd got names but they were all great.  The entertainment guys were great - encouraging…

title: Wonderful holiday
review: The Novotel Karon Beach is a perfect choice for anyone wanting to avoid the hustle and bustle of Patong, without being too remote. The hotel is only one year old, modern, with heaps of facilities and very friendly and helpful staff. We were fortunate to be upgraded to a superior plunge pool room, which was perfect for a refreshing dip and cool off. Although the pools are not completely private, as they are only partially screened from their neighbour. Rooms are large, clean and modern offering all the facilities you would expect. Breakfast offers plenty of variety for all nationalities and was of a high standard. The resort is massive and can be quite a walk to get around, but well worth the effort. Make a point of going across the main road, over the plank bridge and left…

title: Great Hotel

review: good set up and quite new compared to other hotels in the vicinity. everything you need for a relaxing vacation is in the resort. plenty of deals and discounts available. we really enjoyed the "Jet Lag Package" at the spa where upon check in to the hotel, within first 24 hours you can buy 1 get 1 free session. (usually 1900TBH/pp) than if you book 1 day ahead of a session you get 20% off. by the end of our 5 night stay we had been almost every day, so they gave us a voucher for 900BHT for an 60min session. the spa is clean, relaxing and professional so my wife and I really enjoyed it. other discounts available included 111 dishes at the Asian restaurant and happy hour drinks. I love the room was clean and spacious specially facing sea view. The pool area was great and awesome bar just around the pool only.  The Novotel is located at Karon Beach and around 10 to 15mins walk to happening areas like Sawatdeerak Road, Rat U Tint Road and Bangla Road. (Shopping, Clubbing , Massage... etc).

review: What an awesome experience. Was planning of stay at a different hotel but so glad we stayed at the Novotel. Brilliant from arrival to check out. Great room upgrade, awesome service and one of the best places we've stayed as a family. Kids pool was amazing with so many free ice blocks! Kids loved the play room and was a great baby sitting option for us :-) Close to the beach and great value for money. If you're travelling with kids look no further! :-)

title: Not bad and close to beach
review: Stayed one week for American holiday, staff friendly hotel prices for food, drink, and excursion not very friendly would stay again. Breakfast buffet food was always cold even right at 630 when opened.Make sure to have dinner at Eat bar and grill in town while here!

title: Enjoyed my Novotel stay
review: My friends and I have just spent an enjoyable week at the Novotel Karon Beach Resort. The location of this resort is just right. We were away from the hustle and bustle of Phuket, but were only a five minute stroll from the shopping and restaurants in Karon, a beautiful beach just across the road and ten minutes by tuk tuk to Patong. I find it hard to find anything negative about my experience at the resort. The room was spacious, the facilities excellent, and the staff happy, helpful and easy to talk to. Fraser, the General Manager, was even happy to stop and discuss the state of play at the Rugby World Cup. The food at the various restaurants was fantastic and plentiful. Having three swimming pools also means that there is always a quiet, peaceful place to lie in sun and…

review: Arrived late and was upgraded. A nice surprise. i really enjoyed everything from the breakfast to the staff.  The service was outstanding .   The only improvement I would suggest is communicating in English language requires some development

title: Great Resort
review: Loved our 11 night stay at the Novotel Karon Beach resort.  The location is great - just across the road from the beach and five minutes from the main street.  Plenty of shops and restaurants nearby but the resort has everything so you don't have to leave.  The room was great and always kept clean.  The main pool is superb and the staff are terrific - nothing was too much trouble and they are very friendly.  Buffet breakfast was great with everything you could want available.  I would definitely stay here again.

title: Novotel Karon Beach, Phuket
review: Spent a week at the Novotel with my son and absolutely enjoyed it. Staff were very friendly and helpful and the facilities excellent. It is a very relaxing hotel and highly recommended fur families looking to escape the bustle of Patong. I would return in a heartbeat.

title: Great Resort and Excellent Staff
review: Spent a week with family ( two kids 14, 6) and had a great time. Resort only 12 months old and 5 minute walk to town, 1 minute walk to beach. 3 pools , kids slide, kids club and good priced restaurants. Staff were helpful and quick to respond to enquiries.

title: Highly recommended
review: Booked this hotel based on the TA reviews and was not disappointed.  Located within a short walk to Karon central and the beach   Buffet breakfast was exceptional under the control of Exec Chef Cyril who took the time to come over to speak with us noticing we were new  We booked the room with a private plunge pool which was great seeing as the main pools closed at 7pm and provided a small oasis right outside your own bedroom   Kids also loved the free high speed wifi for some downtime after a full day   Plenty of drink and meal specials each day/night with only criticism (and a very minor one) being a smallish selection for dinner at Tai, however everything we ordered was great  3 pools to choose from with our children loving the kids pool and water slide along with the…

review: Dear Bronson J  Many thanks for the  lovely review.  I have shared the comments with the team and Cyril especially is so happy to know we made a great stay part of the holiday you deserved!  Please let me know when you plan to come back on fgraser.ross@accor.com and I'll be delighted to help make any arrangements.  Tropcial Regards  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Luxury Hotel with the best staff!
review: The hotel is a great escape. It is quiet and calm with fabulous amenities. The food at Tai restaurant is to die for. It is the best food I have had in a long time. The breakfast was great! The hotel is super clean and the rooms are modern and stylish. My wife and I visited with friends of ours who have a baby. The hotel placed baby products in the room, a little treasure hunt, and even a castle! They were blown away with the thoughtfulness of the hotel. There is an excellent kid's room with a ton of things to do and great staff.  The best part, we saved for last. The hotel staff are fantastic and always courteous. They will help you with anything you need or want.

title: A Tropical Oasis to suit any holiday style!!❤️

title: Fabulous hotel
review: Our midnight check-in was a breeze and a pleasure.  We were met by the friendliest staff and it did not take long at all to be guided to our room. Our room had the plunge pool. We enjoyed this. The hotel is new, fresh and beautifully set out.  The staff were obviously very proud of their hotel. We spent most of our time by the large main pool.  They have 3 separate pools in total.  I love that they had one pool with a waterslide which is perfect for young families.   I was looking forward to relaxing on Karon beach, but to be honest, I found it disappointing.  It is definitely not the best swimming beach.  Walking to the beach was easy enough, approx 10 minutes to the waters edge. We only made 2 short visits to the beach, opting instead to spend our time by the magnificent pool.…

title: Great place for the whole family!
review: The resort is really new and has all the recreational facilities for the whole family. My kids enjoy the children pool and the activities at the kids' club. Yes, finally a kids' club actually that really entertain kids with activities! The room is big and clean and the staffs are superbly friendly. Location wise, it may not be directly at the beach front, but the distance is not far (about 5-10 mins walk).

review: We carefully chose novotel based on all the reviews and also wanting to be in karon beach for a few days. It's definitely lived up to our expectations and is very good value compared to other hotels we saw which were higher priced.   Although it is a bit of a walk from the village so are the other hotels at the other end of karon to be honest so the only ones close to the shops are movenpick and a couple of non branded ones. If you are not a good walked them don't stay there but we found it a lovely walk along the beach in the evening.   The hotel is newly renovated and the rooms large we had a standard and got upgraded. Nice balcony overlooking the pool etc. Service was generally good and staff friendly although English not always great it wasn't an issue for us. Overall the…

title: Not 4 star standard
review: Arrived late in the night to an enthusiastic welcome by the reception staff , efficiently dealt with in rapid time and whisked away in a golf cart to the suite , was easy to settle in to the new surroundings as the suite was well appointed and spotless . The staff where so attentive , making sure that we where all ok without fussing around very courteous .

title: Not worth the money or time
review: My husband and I decided to try this Novotel, as we had enjoyed the Novotel in Patong last trip and wanted a bit more relaxing time so we read the reviews and picked the Novotel Karon Beach. What mistake this was and a waste of money. What we booked was supposed to be Deluxe Room 30sqm for 5 nights with King Bed overlooking the pool and Oasis pool access and Pool butler service. When we checked in they tried to tell us we had not paid for our booking until I showed them, they then checked us into a small twin room which I told them was not right. I went back to reception with my booking and showed them what I was to have, again they checked us into the wrong room this time a disabled room with wheel chair access and no view and next to the kids resort, we were so tired at…

title: Standard of service and property needs to improve
review: Dear Kelly H  Please accept my apologies of the feeling of let down you experienced . We all strive to provide the break you deserve and we have clearly let you down in terms location , follow up and services around the resort.  Clearly you feel more at home in Patong  - If you contact me on fraser.ross@accor.com  to let me know if I can pass on your details to ensure that they have a big fan in y you would be delighted to ensure that there is a brighter end  to this episode.  Sincerely   Fraser Fraser Ross  General Manager

title: Novotel at Karon beach
review: Front desk unorganized. Property maintance poor, example pool bar chair broken and dangerous, shower tap handle falls off, loose timber with nails exposed on pool surround, pool edge stained and looks dirty, pool water very poor with very cloudy water. Service around pool basicly non existent.

title: Honeymoon
review: Dear drwhoospearing  Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts. I have taken note for your feedback on the issues requiring attention and you will be pleased to know we have increased our preventative maintenance program to include more detailed review in the rooms and of course the issues around the pool are being rectified right now!  Many thanks for highlighting this again and we appreciate the feedback for us to improve in these areas.  I would be delighted if you gave us the opportunity to host you again in the future  and if you are heading this  way, please contact me directly on fraser.ross@accor.com  Sincerely  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Not worth it
review: I had stayed here for 6 days. The resort condition was good. Especially restaurant and bar were not expensive. But, this resort location is no good. I had to spend many money for visiting downtown. It's too bad this resort location was not closed with Patong beach.

title: 8 nights in august
review: stayed in a family room with our 2 kids, superb room , the location is next to the pool and the restaurants , so very convenient.The pool is very good , plenty of space , the pool loungers are comfy, the kids loved their stay so it made it easier for us.I would certainly recommend this hotel , the staff were very pleasant and helpfull, we had a great time.

title: Absolutely Amazing.......
review: Dear Philip S  Thanks so much for the great review and taking yuo r time to share the experience .  We are dedicated to ensuring a great stay for all our guests and we seem to have hit the mark with you!   The team would love to see yuo and the family again - so please let me know when you plan to return on fraser.ross@accor.com  Cheers!  Fraser  Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Good Hotel for Families
review: What a fantastic stay we had at Novotel!!! Staff were amazing, so friendly, polite and helpful.  Resort was always clean and tidy. Pools were amazing!  Room was fantastic also.  We ate most our meals at the resort as they were fab.  We indulged in a spa treatment at the resort   And thoroughly enjoyed it.  Such a fantastic place to stay can't wait to go back, can't stop raving about our stay here!

title: Great Hotel experience
review: Dear nicola J  Amazing review!! The team loved hearing this one!!  Thank yuo so much for taking the time to share and we truly appreciate the feedback  We'll welcome you back with new activities and fun at the bar for sure  let me know your plans on fraser.ross@accor.com  Tropical regards  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Great holiday at the Novotel Karon
review: The Novotel Phuket Karon is a fairly new hotel/resort, on the main road, 2 mins walk to the beach. There are very obvious positives and negatives to the hotel from my perspective (I am a Gold card Accor member ). First the positives: Novotel staff are always very well trained, friendly, polite and helpful. I stayed (with my two teenage sons) in a plunge pool suite and was very happy with the size and layout of the suite. A large super-king bed in a spacious bedroom with French doors opening out to the plunge pool, a two-sink bathroom with separate bath, big shower, plenty of shelf and counter space (a lack of towel rails or hooks though). Tons of hanging space in wardrobes both in the bedroom and off the living area and more than enough mirrors! The pull out sofa bed and roll…

title: Nice Hotel- slightly ruined by rude Director/Manager of catering
review: We were staying up the road in apartments and were looking for a possible Hotel for a family gathering next year so came here a number of times as day visitors. We found the Novotel clean and had nice pools for the kids to play in and generally friendly staff and certainly a place we could book a large family (10-14 people) get together for next year. We were slightly put off by the Manager/director (I could see his name badge but it had Director of operations on it) of the catering or restaurant who was operating around the Joe Kool Bar on the 14th Aug. He was patronizing and shouty and wasn't welcoming at all when I order some drinks and food. He come across as very aggressive and looking for confrontation for some reason. I later saw him going around shouting at the other…

title: very nice hotel
review: Dear C N  Thanks you for the gracious  feedback,.  We certainly enjoy hearing the positives and we take on board the issue of communication from Johnnie our Director of F&B - he is actually one of our top rated associates for positive feedback and I can assure you his team adore him!! Never the less we will be most careful to ensure that the discomfort you felt at the  communication style is addressed and he has vowed to  do so.  Please let me know when your plans take you back in this direction on fraser.ross@accor.com and I'll be delighted to help in any way I can.  Tropical Regards  Fraser  Fraser Ross General Manager

title: New, Clean and helpful staff!
review: stayed here for 3 nights in August. Pretty new hotel and nice pools and lots of food/drink options around. the massage place is awesome (regretted not going there earlier). staff were friendly and helpful as well.   Rooms were very nice. Location is a little far from the karon stores (20-30mins stroll away along the beach). But overall awesome.

title: Lovely Hotel great staff
review: Dear Hhpesojj  Many thanks for the great review - I read this out to the team this morning and they are delighted with the feedback!  Please let me know your plans for the future when they involve a  return visit on fraser.ross@accor.com and I'll be delighted to assist in any way I can  Tropical regards  Fraser  Fraser Ross General Manager

title: We expected more!
review: This hotel is only a year or two old, and at the beginning of the Karon Beach stretch, 10 mins (by car) to Kata Beach and 15mins (by car) to Patong Beach.  Karon beach is opposite the hotl, cross the road and you are there.  Massage and 7 Elevens down the road and around the corner all sorts of eateries.  Very good variety for breakfast, however restaurant is open fanned and not airconditioned. There are 3 pools one being a kiddie pool with slide, middle sized pool and then the big pool with lots of umbrellas. Thai restaurant and swim up bar plus Joe Kool pool bar (eating) and Champions (sports bar).  Thai restaurant service is slow and as kids under 12 get to eat for free until 7pm, it can be rather noisy and unfortuanetly when we were there the kids ran amok, jumping on chairs…

title: Child friendly resort - Not recommended if you want a quiet time
review: A very well designed and beautiful resort which is a very short walk to the water.  3 swimming pools (one for children) which cater for the number of people.  The resort is large with many rooms and a look of people staying.  The resort really caters for family and children which was something that I was not expecting.  The children seemed to use the main pools and not the childrens pool which at times was not relaxing hearing the screaming.  The service left a lot to be desired with waiting times for drinks beyond expected timelines.  I managed to go to m room, shower, dress and return to the bar and my friends were still waiting for the drinks that were ordered when I left. One staff member who needs a special mention is Kae who was the most amazing staff member that I have…

title: Loved our stay
review: Dear 23Kezza23  Many thanks for the feedback and the  time to share .  I appreciate that family visits are not for everybody but with 3 swimming pools and the main pool being 75 m long we like to think there is space for all.  I also apologise for the slow drinks service  - we have beefed up our staff presence around the pool area to ensure this kind of delay is not experienced again  - thanks for the highlight of this issue.  In regard to the shuttle bus there are several options to head into town the local bus route, the tuk tuks , the taxis and the hotel limousine service are  all available and the team have the information assist any guest with access these services - Thanks  for highlighting this also so we can ensure we are more forthcoming with this information .  We'd be delighted to see you back and I'll ensure that a quiet area is reserved for your next visit!  Tropical Regards  Fraser  Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Away from the noise, but close to the action
review: Beautifully presented,  fantastic staff, great food. We had a romantic stay but there is plenty to amuse the kids too. Would stay there again.  Pool was amazing with a great view. Staff welcoming and attentive

title: Novotel Karon Beach
review: Dear Susanne P  Short but sweet!   Many Thanks for the great review - sometimes a little says a lot ! Really enjoyed the teams  smiling when they heard the kinds words this morning   Let me know your plans to return directly on fraser.ross@accor.com  Cheers  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Fantastic hotel and fantastic staff.
review: Stay for 3 nights at the Plunge Pool Suite back in July. Check in was a bit slow and very warm open air concept, but welcome drinks and cold towel was served with Accor membership. Requested a room near to the main pool and was given the 1st unit, really great! Room is really big, with a living room with sofa bed and big LED TV. Another LED TV in the bedroom. Bathroom is big as well and very clean. Plunge Pool has decent size for 2 persons with Jacuzzi. Resort surrounding is very spacious. They have 3 pools which is really nice. Pool bar only at the main pool near entrance. Plenty of sunbed available. A few restaurants within the resort as well. Room service is 24 hours and serve very tasty local food. Taxi is waiting across the road, standard fees to Patong is 400bath. Beach is…

title: Fun for kids
review: Our family stayed here in August. The hotel is very big and spacious property. They have a nice little kid's club for little children.  My nieces and nephews enjoyed the activities there. They have a nice little shallow pool with slides for the kids. It's a lot of fun for kids. The staff are nice and accommodating at the buffet.  The house keeping staff does not compare to the restaurant and activities staff. The rooms are not enormous,  but just ok. The shower door does not give any privacy because you can look in from the bedroom to the bathroom. The buffet food is tje same every morning. There are a lot of Chinese tourists around,  and they fight for tables at the buffet even though there is suppose to be assistance in seating.  It's a little far from town. You can get a Tuk…

title: Pleasant & Enjoyable
review: Dear phatjoynow  Many thanks for the constructive feedback - we do appreciate it when we get the pointers and the highlighting of certain issues.  I have passed the comments on to the team ad we'd love to see you back to experience the improvements   Please let me know if there is anything further I can do on fraser.ross@accor.com  Sincerely ' ' Fraser  Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Good Hotel, Good Location, Decent service
review: We stayed here for 2 nites as a group of 5 ( 2 couples & 1 single). We booked a plunge pool room and 2 deluxe rooms but all were upgraded to plunge pool rooms. Only issue is that the rooms run to the fence and the road outside is very noisy. The rooms were lovely and the plunge pool very enjoyable. We also swan at the main pool with the swim up bar. Only bad point would be the breakfast restaurant Horizons, no air conditioning and limited space. Thanks Novotel

title: Really it's a 3-1/2 out of 5....
review: Dear PamJ61302  Many thanks for the review -  I am glad to get the positive and the constructive feedback.  I hope you will return for visit again and I'd love to hear from you when you plan a trip back in this direction  on fraser.ross@accor.com  Tropical Regards  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Great hotel for family with children, great service, price is very reasonable.
review: Novotel was good, its mostly up to what you expect from Novotel. Rooms were clean, good food. We ate at TAI and liked the food. Beach was across the road. Umbrella and beach towels available from lobby on request. Staff was friendly. Massage centre was clean, hygienic. We really enjoyed the massage.  One grievance we have is jets in our pool were not working and were not fixed even after notifying. Bathroom supplies were good but not as per expectation or what we found in similar hotels, but thats little subjective.  I will give 4.5 and since don't want to make it 5 choosing 4. If not for last two things, I would have given a perfect 5.

title: Wow !!
review: I am a travel agent from Australia and I have stayed in a few other hotels in the Karon area but by far this is my favourite. We booked the plunge pool suite for 2 adults and 2 children. I could not fault this hotel. From the service and staff to the pools, kids clubs and our room. Thanks Novotel for making our stay enjoyable. I will be Highly recommending your hotel.

title: Perfect getaway for family with small children. Child friendly hotel, with yuppie feel, love it!
review: Dear Amelia J  wow ! Thanks for this review - we look forward to your customers being our guests - let me know when they are coming on fraser.ross@accor.com   Cheers  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Nice place to stay
review: 3 families, all friends, with 4 children below 5 years of age. Book this hotel via Le Accor Club Membership. Upon arrival at this hotel, we were given a warm welcome by the front desk, with complimentary welcome drinks. After the early flight (with children) , we were quite worn out by the flight. We booked standard room, so imagine how we felt when ALL of us were upgraded to the Superior Suite and were given 2 complimentary spa treatment. We were ecstatic. The staff was quite attentive to our children during the whole time at our stay, being the front desk was quite near to the main road, they kept quite a good eye to the kids. The room was AWESOME! Very chic and comfortable and the extra living room is a plus point as they have retractable bed from the couch so the kids can…

title: Friendly staff, amazing beach, loved the plunge pool in the room
review: Dear Shairil  What Can I Say ? Thanks for covering ever angle of the stay and we are just so happy to know you enjoyed the time with us on the break you deserve. .  I look forward to your next visit - let me know when you're coming on fraser.ross@accor.com  Tropical Regards  Fraser  Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Nice hotel for reasonable price
review: We visited this nice hotel in July for a week, and its very nice and modern with all facilities with out leaving the resort. Nice breakfasts and pools and gym. Beautiful gardens and cafe's in house and reasonable.  Although July isn't the best time for Phuket it did rain a few times, but seemed to clear quickly and of course its still warm at about 29 deg and a little muggy. Patong had become very busy with bars and night clubs, and the odd deviants around (Sexual)... NO deck chairs and tables anymore like they had on my last long visit in April 1997 along  the beaches??. Many hotels that backed onto the beach would have been swept away on 26/12/04. The taxi's and tuk tuks seems to be around 300-400 Bhat from Karon Beach which is about $12-16 one way. So its best to find a…

title: Nice pools and good kidsclub
review: We stayed in a Suite with our kids and the suite is big enough for a family of four. The suite has a nice and modern appearance but some design-elements are not practical (e.g. there is only one hook in the bathroom for all the towels, no drying-rack for swimsuits on balcony). But these are just minor things, overall the staff are very helpful and the pools and public-areas are well maintained. Big complement also to the Kidsclub. As others have mentioned, the “run-down-bridge” to the beach can be bothersome, but that does not belong to the hotel-property. We would stay here again if we were in the Karon-area.

title: This can be a good hotel but ...
review: Dear Yves H  Many thanks for the kind review and suggestions .   Please note in regard to bridge issue we have planning permission but not the building  permission as yet to place bridge over the Klong  We are as eager as you to get this done!  Let me know when you plan to come back on fraser.ross@accor,.com  Tropical Regards  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Fabulous Staff, fun activities, good restaurants and bars in a good location!
review: Arrived the hotel at 2am, front desk gave us a very warm welcome. We were shown to our room and we discovered that electricity wasn't working properly. Engineer came and noticed that the bell boy didn't insert the key properly and that's why air-con wasn't starting. At 3am, after a hot shower, the hotel only provide soap, shower gel, shampoo and cotton pad. It took us another 15mins to call the operator for tooth brush etc. While I understand the hotel wants to be eco friendly, and there is always an operator stand-by, its a big hassle for guest to call for every item. Kettle wasn't even provided, so what's the point of providing a tea station.  Housekeeping was very inconsistent, they never replenished the regular items like cotton pad and tea bag, and they gave us different…

title: Really fun place to stay!
review: Dear Musesilvergirl  Many thanks for the feedback - we have gone through your experience in great detail and I am glad to say we have addressed the points you have raised.  We always appreciate the chance to improve our impression so If you can give us a chance and let me know when you plan to return on fraser.ross@accor.com I think you'll be suitably impressed!  Tropical regards  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: The location is perfect!
review: Booked 2 rooms for us and our children aged 15 and 12 years. and requested then next to one another. Our request was met and staff went out of their way to ensure the room met all our needs. The rooms were modern and very clean. There were many activities for adults and children to take part in too eg: Yoga, Kickboxing, Thai Cooking, Pool Volleyball and a good Kids Club and Pool for  those that needed it. Breakfast was superb, as was the Champions and Joel Cool's Bar, which offered good variety and daily specials.  For those requiring a bit of pampering the Spa was amazing!!  However, the Staff really topped our experience. Always friendly and went out of their way to make our stay very enjoyable!  We have visited Phuket 6 times in the last 10 years and will most definitely be…

title: Great for families
review: I read a lot of varying reviews for this property before I booked. Now I can add my findings after spending 10 wonderful days there. The staff were fantastic and made my kids feel very comfortable. The rooms were great and could be made dark so sleep ins were good. The main bed was one of the biggest and comfortable beds ever. A very small walk to a great white beach and not more than 5 minutes to a main road for shopping and eating. Lovely pools and amenities. Kids loved the kids club on the rare occasions they were not swimming. The included breakfast is not to miss and the selection of food wonderful. One small thing to note is the glass between the bedroom and bathroom has clear areas so don't expect too much privacy

title: Excellent
review: Dear kristypatto  Many thanks for the kind words    I agree it's a good idea to research any product before purchase - especially a well deserved break! I am delighted you felt you made the right choice and we would love to see you back again.  Please contact me on fraser.ross@accor.xcom any time you feel like coming back this direction!  Cheers  Fraser  Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Wonderful relaxing resort
review: Had two rooms booked with a request for them to be close by.  Not only was this request met, it was exceeded because the staff had upgraded both of us to suite rooms next door.   The staff were always courteous and helpful during our stay, especially when our television wasn't working at 11pm at night and a maintainence man took care of it within a few minutes.   Didn't have a chance to experience the restaurants or other amenities as we were in and out most of the time. However what we did experience was fantastic.   Will definitely stay again when we return.   Would definitely come back!

title: Family Resort
review: Dear vinh t  Thanks for the great review - I insist you eat here next time!!  Seriously it would be great to see you back and I am sure we can persuade you to enjoy a drink or dine in the restaurants - trust me it's worth it...............  Let me know when you plan to come back on fraser.ross@accor.com - I'll be in the lobby ready to take your order for dinner!  Cheers  Fraser Fraser ross General Manager

title: Really love it!
review: We stayed for two weeks and will definitely return.We had a standard room which was at the end of the resort (very quiet) and we enjoyed the walk down the path way to the pool and restaurants.The staff were such lovely people and very accomodating (special mention to Mint in F & B) The restaurant for breakfast is very hot,not air conditioned so suggest sitting by the windows to try and get some breeze and the area for eggs and omelets has the bacon and potatoes in front so you have people reaching around you and it tends to get quite conjested.We holidayed with family who had children and the water activities the staff put on of walking on water in huge blow up ball and water game of wrestling bar were a big hit with the kids.We enjoyed days of sitting round the pool and at…

title: Great rooms
review: We stayed a night at a plunge pool suite. The room and the amenities were excellent, very comfortable.   The main pool is also quite big, so you'll have a nice time swimming around.  Breakfast was okay, the selection of proteins could have been better as there wasn't much to choose from. But there's a good selection of bread and sides to choose from.   The beach is on the other side but it's easy to access. It's a 15 minute walk to the center of town, and the only problem is that only a tuktuk or cabs provide transportation.   Service was also okay, though they could have been more proactive in showing how a lot of the stuff in the room works.  Overall it was a great stay and I'd be happy to return.

title: Great for kids, families & couples
review: Dear nico g  Many thanks for sharing the feedback the positive and the constructive - we 've noted the comments re explaining  the room and started to implement a more thorough program of guest information on arrival.  Many thanks again and If your headed this way in the future - give me a heads up on fraser.ross@accor.com   Cheers! Fraser  Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Fantabulous
review: We stayed for 4 nights in a suite which was clean, spacious and comfortable. Fitout of the room was excellent although there was nowhere to hang your towles in the bathroom, very strange.  Check in was ok although our room was not ready at check in time. Hotel & facilities are very good. Multiple pool options including a great pool with a slide for children. The staff were very good and our 5 year old was made to feel special all the time. Breakfast buffet was ok but very busy and some mornings we had to Queue to get a table and the tables had not been cleaned properly from the previous guests.  Location is good, across a busy road from the beach and a 10 minute walk from the main area of Karon.  15 minute walk from the Karon night markets and plenty of dining, drinking and mini…

title: Great family place in Phuket with beautiful pool area
review: Dear Andrew R  Thaws for the review and the feedback  we have discussed with the team how to improve the breakfast efficiency and the table resetting also .  Thanks for highlighting this s owe can continue to improve  Please let me know when you plan to be in this part of the world again and I'll be delighted to hear from you on fraser.ross@accor.xcom  Cheers  Fraser  Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Fabulous Place in a convenient location
review: A fantastic place to be. Extra caring staff, well maintained, amazing location, great food, lively are just a very few things describing this hotel. I was on a honeymoon due to which i got a free upgrade of the room. The swimming pool is nice amidst the hills. The going best beach of phuket is karon-kata beach and yes it is located very much on this beach. We are pure vegetarian indians and we were served vegetarian dishes at breakfast and the staff made sure we were well taken care of as special  guests. The rooms are a lil on the snaller side but the other things that the hotel offered made us forget this. All in all it is a fantastic place to be. Deserves a 5/5.

title: 2 days stay in Novotel Karon
review: Exellect Hotel. Novotel lives up to its reputation.  If you are a party animal and like to stay near Patong beach avoid this hotel. This Hotel is for people who wants to enjoy a peaceful holiday away from the sounds and lights of the Patong beach.  Pros:- 1. Very close to the beach (2mins walk) 2. Beach is secluded 3. Rooms are very nice and big. (I took a standard room which had a balcony with view of the street) 4. Pools are nice and you can njoy a beer sitting along the pool side 5. Complementary buffet breakfast is very good. Lots of varieties and they even make you anything which can be organised in a short time. You just have to request the chef. 6. Staffs are very nice. They smile (At bangkok Ambassador hotel staffs were pathetic and rude).  Cons:- 1. The area of the…

title: BEST TEAM EVER!!
review: Dear santanu034   A great  review straight to the point - love it !  I can't add anything really !  Let me know yuor plans to return on fraser.ross@accor,com and I'll be delighted to help make arrangements  Cheers  Fraser  Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Family Holiday
review: We visited a few weeks ago and the team was just amazing. We had a great time and did a lot of activities. Special mention to Jackapong, Bird and M. Legend! I would definitely stay again. It is in a really peaceful location and it is very safe for families.

title: Friendly staff, clean, great for families
review: Dear Guy A  I am biased but I have to agree with you!! I am so proud to be a part of a group of people who try so hard and most often succeed in making guests smile.  It's what we are about.  Lets see if we can top this fro yuor next visit - let me know when you plan to come back on fraser.ross@accor.com  Cheers! Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Beautiful grounds And great location
review: Stayed for 6 nights as a family of 3 in a suite. Check-in was smooth with a complimentary cold drink and a cold towel, was in much need of that after a flight and a 1 hr taxi ride in hot and humid weather..  Room is comfortable with a separate kids bed set up in a living area and a small balcony. Nothing special about the room, just your normal resort style room. Facilities especially the 3 pools were a great hit with our daughter and we spent a lot of time in the various pools. The kids club looks good and staff is welcoming but there weren't many kids in there so our daughter only used it a couple of times.  Had pre-booked breakfast for our stay, it was a crowded Horizon Cafe and the breakfast spread is very basic with not many options. The breakfast was a big let down as…

title: Great resort in Karon
review: It is my third time in Phuket within a year, have stayed in Karon and Patong and I must admit Karon is more relax, and away from hustle and bustle.  Novotel is great - We booked a suite and got upgraded to a plunge pool suite. Upon arrival check in was smooth, however we encountered some teething problems with the suite room the first night, damn floor/toilet blocked.  During breakfast the next morning I emailed Fraser and in no time Alex was searching for me through out the resort to sort it out for me.  This was beyond my expectation.  I was amazed with the speed and effort - we were located to another suite room within 3 hours.  Facilities are great - my kids loved the kids club, it is actually the only kids club we see staff working there all day, other resort will have…

title: Excellent hotel in Karon Beach Phuket
review: Dear Michelle L  Many thanks for the great review - I am so glad we were able to put the early hiccough behind quickly and move to the break yuo deserved .  We 'll be delighted to see you back and let me know your plans on fraser.ross@accor.com  Cheers  Fraser  Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Clean, friendly,  the best
review: Novotel resort hotel in Karon is not the biggest but one of the most refreshing. My family and I stayed in the 2nd floor suite room and really enjoyed our stay there. The air con is strong and everything is clean. The suite room on the ground floor even has pool for private use. The hotel surrounding is green with 3 swimming pools, one jacuzzy and one bar beside each pool. They also have a very nice spa massage, fitness room and kids play room. But the best they have is their service. The people are kind, and their smiles seem genuinely to come from their heart. Across the street, within 3 minute walk, there is a long, clean, white Karon beach. The waves are nice and strong both in the morning and evening. Along the beach there are a few restaurants that sell various kinds of…

title: Very Good.
review: Dear stevesudjatmiko  You should write professionally!  Great review not just of us but the Karon offerings too.  Thanks for this - I must add though the hotel limousine offering is indeed more expensive than the local taxi services - this is for multiple reason but not least correct insurance coverage, driver training and car servicing records .   I have to say compared with western pricing it's still a very good deal!  Anyway - please let me know when you are headed back this way on fraser.ross@accor.com  Cheers  Fraser  Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Get pampered in Phuket
review: This is a great, clean, safe and comfortable place for families. Highly recommended. 10 mins walk to safe Karon town Centre where there spoilt for choice of dinning places. 250 -300 bhat to take a tuk tuk or taxi to Patong or Kata town Centre which is around 10 mins ride each way. Karon beach is right across from the resort and it's clean and not busy. Seas are quite rough though but they have life guards on the beach. Very friendly staff who are very attentive to your needs and makes you feel like a royal. Beds and pillows are very comfortable and the breakfast buffet are amazing....very wide range of food choices so you don't get tired of eating breakfast there everyday.  Highly recommended to anyone looking for accommodation in phuket.

title: Fabulous resort!
review: We have just returned from an amazing stay at the Novotel Karon Beach. From start to finish, we had the most fantastic service from all staff.  The pool area is beautiful and very relaxing with plenty of sunbeds - our favourite were the ones in the water! Our room was a great size, we were upgraded to a suite and could not fault it at all. It was a great size and a lovely place to relax after a busy day. I would definitely recommend this resort and really look forward to visiting again. Thank you to all staff!

title: Second Stay
review: Dear Julie1203  Thanks for the great review - really enjoyed reading this out to the team this morning.  Our aim is to ensure each guest gets the break they deserve and has a smile on their face - seems we hit that spot with your experience  Please let me know when you are heading this way again on fraser.ross@accor.com and I'll be only too happy to help with any enquiry  Cheers  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Wonderful establishment top to bottom.
review: After staying by myself at this Hotel, I returned with my family who thoroughly enjoyed the Resort style of the Hotel. Special mention for the large pool and plentiful supply of sun beds. The food prepared by Executive Chef Cyril was once again right on the mark. We'll run Hotel with pleasant staff and value for money.

title: Great Hotel, Close to Beach but Far From Attractions
review: Dear Bruno035  It was great to see that we hit the spot with your stay with the family!    The team loved the great banter and the K.Sandra in particular sends her best wishes!  See you again soon hopefully and keep in touch on fraser.ross@accor.com   Cheers  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: My stay
review: I have travelled extensively and this is one of the best places I have stayed. The service is A +. Nothing is too much to ask of the staff who always greet you with a smile. For religious reasons we required our breakfast at 4:30 am each morning. The breakfast we received in the comfort of our room was delicious and as good as if we were able to eat at the buffet. The resort is spotlessly clean and sure there is a smell from time to time but this is Thaliand and it is not overwhelming. I have read complaints about the smell in other reviews but honestly I think they are exaggerated. I can name some capital cities of n Europe that also have a " smell" in certain places. The beach is a short walk across the road but the stormy weather meant we couldn't swim. The poos at the resort…

title: Awesome Holiday!!!!
review: We stayed at Novotel Karon Beach for 8 nights after spending 3 full on days in Singapore. 2 Adults & 2 Kids (8 & 12).  Room with plunge pool awesome - separate bedroom for kids with 2 kids in the lounge area on the sofa and trundle. Given they both slept in till 9 most days no complaints. Massive beds in main bedroom which opens onto plunge pool. Big bathroom with bath and separate shower area.   Resort - Very private, modern, clean and staff always willing to help.  Staff always keeping gardens, paths and surrounding areas very clean. Mozzies NOT an issue!! Only small gripe Horizons where you have breakfast isn't air-conditioned, but you get used to it or try and get a table under fan. Plenty of food options for breakfast. But you can order from any menu in any bar pretty much…

title: 4 Day Stop Over
review: Dear CKCAMM  "Awesome Review"!!!!  Thanks for all comments and encouragement - the team are delighted to know the impact they have made during your stay.  We are looking forward out your return - let me know the plans on fraser.ross@accor.com and  we'll aim for the next review to be titled even more auspiciously................  Cheers  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Brilliant
review: Staff friendly but some need more training .  Hotel Clean  Food below average . Breakfast was just . I observed one morning a plate of sushi on the buffet left for over 1.5 hours with no refrigeration . It was low 30's outside and hot and muggy inside .  Tried several dishes at the main restrurant and the food was very disappointing . The only thing that was good was the soup . Food on the street was leaps and bounds ahead .     Hotel is  new and looks good at a glance but close up very poor workmanship . Shower didn't have fall and doesn't drain .  I had a delux room with its own plunge pool . When you hopped in the water would flood under the skidding door and into the room .  The timber floor in the room was buckled already from the water .  At night I had to get the…

title: affordable yet spacey room
review: Dear Chris B  Many thanks for taking the time to share. I have read your review and shared it with the team- naturally we are disappointed we did not deliver the break you deserve. I would be very interested to get additional feedback on the breakfast experience - in particular the sushi comment - we do place the cold cuts and sushi on a refrigerated  surface to keep it cool.  Also this particular menu item is very popular so to have it on the buffet for 1.5 hours without running out and not being changed is deeply concerning. Please contact me on fraser.ross@accor.com - I would really appreciate the feedback s owe can address this concern  Sincerely   Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: “Excellent family accommodation”
review: Fantastic resort beautiful facilities. Amazingly friendly staff Tae (kids club) M and Jack (recreation team) and Nueng (pool area) to name a few made my kids feel so at home. Highly recommend it. There are 3 pools, pool bar, awesome kids club, great activities available during the day. Can't fault the resort. We will be back!

title: Fantastic Hotel, ticks all boxes!!!!
review: We stayed at Novotel Karon for 10 days in a plunge pool suite, and we met up with three friends who booked  into the standard rooms.  Apart from our check in experience, which was far from good at 10pm at night....however this has not affected our overall view of the hotel luckily!!!  The pools: main pool was fantastic for us to play in with our 3 year old daughter, and also relax and sit on the cabanas; the family pool was an area to be as noisy as we liked as well as enjoy the water slide, and the pool by Champions bar was used when we got sick of all the others😀  F&B Facilities such as the breakfast, Tai restaurant and the pool bars were all fantastic, we loved the range for breakfast!  The staff were just incredible, special mention to Bird and Em from Recreation who really…

title: wonderful
review: Dear Lynne B  Many Thanks for taking the time to share your thoughts!  I have passed the comment's to the recreation team and they were glowing with pride to know they have made such an impact.  I have also investigated the issue at check in and please accept my apologies for the tardiness of service there - it has highlighted a few misunderstandings in our systems and we have retrained.  - thanks fro highlighting!  If there is any plan to return please contract me directly on fraser.ross@accor.com  Cheers  Fraser  Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Excellent family accommodation
review: 10 of us stayed her for 4 days, and was wonderful,  staff couldnt do enough for us, were there when ever we wanted anything Food was brilliant and drinks as well, had happy hour from 2-4 at one bar and then 4-6 at another bar 2for 1  excellent, they also arrange trips for you and nothing to hard for them to handle and the free 15min massage was great

title: Lovely Stay
review: Dear susan t  wow - thanks so much for the high praise!   Our team do work hard to ensure they make a positive impact and to know they have made your stay great is the best reward they can get - huge grins  !  when you plan to come back please let me know on fraser.ross@accor.com and we 'll be delighted to look after you again !  All the best  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: A good experience all round but the service made it great!
review: Brilliant resort. 3 amazing pools to choose from, restaurants, swim up bar, full gym, well appointed rooms and the staff are great. The breakfast buffet catered to all (including my 11 year old son who loved the pancakes and chocolate sauce!) Having sushi was a brilliant addition :) Staff were excellent with my son and knew his name by day 2.  Free Wi-Fi provided everywhere in the hotel was awesome! Overpriced "hotel taxis" but this was easily fixed by using the taxis across the road. No hesitation is staying here again.

title: Needs improvement!
review: I stayed at Novotel Phuket Karon Beach Resort and Spa in Plunge Pool Suite Room from 24-26 Jun 2015.  The overall experience was bad. The wooden flooring in the room is in rundown condition, uneven and faded. Apart from this, had to call and fix various other things as well.  1. The sliding door in the room cannot be locked. Someone came and fixed. Though left the 2 screws on floor and almost punctured my foot.  2. The water flow in shower was very low. Only hot water was coming. Cold water flow was almost nil. Someone fixed this as well.  3. On third day, the bathroom flush stopped working. Again the cold water flow was very low. This was also fixed upon informing.  4. The bathroom door lock is not smooth. Need to lift the door up to lock.  5. The buffet breakfast spread was…

title: Little slice of Paradice
review: Dear mr_alok  Many thanks for sharing your feedback. Please accept my  apology on the issues you encountered and  for highlighting them while you were in house in order for us to fix them.  I  would dearly like to welcome you back to show the improvements.  Please let me know if you are wiling to give us a second chance to make a first impression on fraser.ross@accor.com  Sincerely  Fraser   Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Too many mistakes to forgive
review: I had the most wonderful stay at this hotel, everything was just perfect from the room which I got upgraded upon arrival to the help of the friendly staff, in particular Thaisia Tank and Ohm.
