The facilities where clean modern and the hotel was just picture perfect. I will definitely stay again when I next visit Phuket which I'm already planning. I would have no hesitation on recommending this hotel to others.

title: Best holiday ever!
review: Dear jamespark31  Thanks for the high praise and I have passed the comments on to the team in particular K.Tank and K.Ohm  - they grew another few cm in height  with pride knowing they had made the stay enjoyable!  Please let me know when you plan to return on fraser.ross@accor.com   Cheers  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: The great, the good and the silly
review: We booked on TripAdvisor to get the advertised rate. Reception made us wait in the sweltering lobby for 30 minutes.  Pool/beach towels pick-up area was blocked by several pool chairs.  I called reception, as requested,  to get an additional night. They did NOT enter it into the computer. So, when we returned from a day long excursion, we were locked out of our room. They asked that we wait in the lobby.....again. My wife was sick, so I insisted they let us into the room.  They balked. I insisted more strongly.  They tried to blame me, but I had called them the previous day. The room had NOT been made up by 4 pm. We needed water and towels, which I had to search for. A maintenance crew had ladders blocking our door. The shower did not drain properly. Water all over the bathroom…

title: Good value hotel with nice amentities
review: We just came back from a 3 day stay at Novotel Karon. We stay 1 night at another hotel but we prefer Novotel.  We were greeted warmly at the reception with towel and welccome drink. As we were rushing out for our day tour, we didn't go to our room straight. After we are back, the kids were thrilled to see their name on the card hanging at our room door. When we go in, they were so happy to see a nice tent and bouncing horse and enjoyed finding the treasure. Overall we love this resort as there was a nice kids club, the complimentary massage at the spa was great, breakfast is nice with good spread and yummy dinner at Tai restaurant. Only let down is the slide at the kids' pool is having some maintenance work and the kids didn't get to go on the slide. We will definitely return…

title: 5 Stars for Staff, Value, Wifi; 4 for Service, Room, Facilities; 3 for Food, Location
review: Dear CarrieAng  Thanks for the kind wrdrs    I am delighted the Kids were impressed - - very important !  Next time come bacl for longer - enjoy the chance to let our team look after your children with noise and fun - and the fixed water slide!  You can let the rest of the team pamper you in the spa and around the main pool!  Let me know when you plan to come back on fraser.ross@accor.com  Cheers  Fraser  Fraser Ross  General Manager

title: Good value mid-range hotel
review: Having just come from an old local chain resort at Kata that has terribly rude front desk staff, the professionalism received at the Novotel Karon is very much welcome – even though they forgot our welcome drink.  On the whole, the staff are just great. Friendly, pleasant and sincere. English is not a problem. The only hiccup we encountered was when we asked for 2 extra pillows and bath towels for our kids. Housekeeping forgot the pillows the first time. Rushed off even before we could give them a tip. We see that as a positive thing. They are out to provide service without expecting anything. Called again and none were delivered even after a few hours. But they came immediately after I called the 3rd time. No biggie, not that we were waiting in the room all those hours waiting.…

title: 1st stay at this 6mths newly-opened hotel
review: Dear PurrPurple  Many thanks for the review and the detailed feedback. We appreciate the opportunity to learn from our guests experiences .  It was great to read the at you enjoyed the stay despite few hiccoughs.  We have looked a the housekeeping communication issue regarding the pillows and thanks for highlighting this so we could fix it .  Sorry about the slide the kids pool -necessary maintenance work had to be carried out  - it's re opened!   The comments about our team being friendly are most pleasing - they do work hard to ensure we put a smile on every guest face and for the most part we have appeared to  succeeded with your visit!  Please let  me know when you plan to return on fraser.ross@accor.com  and I'll be delighted to help with any enquiry  Tropical regards  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Friendly Fun-tastic Family Hotel!
review: We just got back from a 4 night break at the Novotel Karon. Overall, it's a good hotel which gives pretty good value for money, especially for families with kids. Lots of the good stuff have already been mentioned: - very kind service staff ( Thanks Tank and Ohm for helping us with the room change) - a tasty breakfast selection (yes , the pancake maker was great!) - a good Kids Club - has x-box, psp and table soccer for older kids - 3 nice pools  - good size rooms  and nice green surroundings - good food at Tai restaurant  - nice spa which I felt was real value for money - TV has Fox Movies Premium - so  we managed to watch some good movies which was a nice bonus.  Just do take note: - not all suites (not the ones with the pools) are alike. We got allocated one near the Oasis…

title: Holiday
review: Good Service. Staff very Friendly. Good Food. Plenty of choice. Good Room. Plenty of space. Excellent Massages and Beautiful facials in Spa. The girls where Amazing. Bit of a walk into town which we liked, But Tuk Tuks everywhere if you don't wish to walk....

title: Beautiful paradise with a pancake maker
review: Dear chrissylamo  Many tanks for the great review . I have passed your comments on to the team  and they loved the praise! Thanks for highlighting the spa ladies they do  manage to provide some great relaxation time away from the world at large!  Please let me know when you plan to return on fraser.ross@accor.com - I 'll be on hand to book the spa -    I am not the guy who gives good massages - I'll leave that to the experts  Tropical regards  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Second time and it gets even better
review: This is a lovely resort. It really does look like the pictures, I've been to many places that have the professional shots on their website but then it's not quite as nice looking when you get there - this place looks and feels like paradise. The gardens are immaculate, the pools sparkle and the clean minimalist design of the place is perfect. My hat goes off to the maintenance and cleaning staff who clearly work really hard to keep the place pristine.  All of the staff are very polite, friendly and responsive but also unobtrusive. We were taken to our room on the back of a funny little golf buggy! The guards often came out and helped us cross the road :)  It is in a good location, a very easy 5 minute walk to the beach and about 10 minutes into Karon where there are some shops,…

title: Wonderful relaxing holiday
review: Dear Miki M  many thanks for taking the time to share such detailed thoughts  We read through review as a team and are delighted we have made a good impression and you enjoyed the time with us .  Please let me know when you plan to return - I'll have the online check in at reception ready  -let me know on fraser.ross @accor.com  Tropical regards  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: short visit
review: First visit was in december 2014, family of 4 (2 adults and kids age 5 and 10). Although I did not leave a review that time, but it was a lovely experience.  I have since recommended to a family friend who visited in April/May and they thanked us for the recommendation.  We stayed here again for 1wk 12-19 June and it was even better, little things that made the children feel loved, a personal note to welcome them and cake to welcome them back the second time, everything they did was with a personal touch.  We stayed 4nights at a resort few meters away and it was pretty rubish, biggest regret, but thank goodness the 1wk at novotel left a better taste in our mouth  Special mention to the care and attention from staff at TAI restaurant and kids club  We have recommended to a few…

title: BEST family holiday location you can have
review: What a DELIGHT!! There is simply no better hotel for families whose grown-ups really need a break! We were so absolutely happy with this hotel we couldn't believe it. We have a 3 and a 4 year old so as you can imagine we have had a few hectic years of craziness and stress. We REALLY needed a break. So we found our heaven in paradise, because it is the most lovely clean perfect luxurious new hotel, but most importantly from our point of view it has the most wonderful kids club to look after our little ones, so my husband and I got a real chance to relax and have fun. We all love our kids, but if we can have a break from them with complete peace of mind - how good is that?!!?  We had booked a suite, so we had a separate room for the kids to sleep, and it was lovely, but on our…

title: Great customer service
review: Dear Angela M  Can we hire you as a representative in Australia??  Thanks so much for this review, the team loved looking after you  while here and the kids  are missed big time!   I can't write much more - you have said it all......... other than see you next year!  Let me know when your plans are to return - contact me directly on fraser.ross@accor.com  Tropical regards  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Outstanding & homely
review: I have spent 2 nights here, check in 2/6 Congratulations to the management especially staff. Great customer services from check in,valet parking, smiles makes this hotel different even not a beach front resort. Besides the children facilities is excellent, the swimming pools also the highlights. However walking to the beach is a distance. I have suggestions : Area for improvement -  1.should includes shower glass for the toilet to avoid flooded  and wet.  2.those have rented car, should have proper signage to parking Area. We lost the way but the staff is excellent to park our car and guide us on that.  My daughter love the kids pool. Very children friendly hotel. Breakfast is ok.

title: Bliss
review: Dear Chantziling  Thank you so much  for  sharing. The team are full of smiles and it's great t see that it brightened your stay!  Please come for longer next time and let me know if  in advance  on fraser.ross@accor.com - we'll brush out teeth very well to ensure the smiles sparkle!  Tropical Regards  Fraser  Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Friendly staffs with pleasure stay
review: Spend 4 nights here with partner and a friend, we are leaving with big smiles and impressed of the customer service we received. We had plunge pool room which was very nice when you open your window-contains  in the morning, At night it was very relaxing having a drink and swim in your private small pool, recommended. Breakfast was very nice offering variety of food from east to west. The bars in the pools offered good service with happy hour :-). Overall great hotel, great sleep, great customer service. I would recommend this hotel. Many thanks and we will come back.

title: Great service
review: My husband stayed 4 nights on our first trip to Phuket and Thailand. Nice friendly welcome with drink and refreshing towel, able to get in to room before lunch, upgraded, 15 min massage vouchers, large, clean, pools, kids own area, spa staff amazing, awesome breakfast, close to restaurants and Karon town, beach across the road, all staff very genuine and friendly,gym more than adequate. Be good to have beach access tidied up, too much rubbish on beach Thank you so much for a wonderful holiday. We felt well cared for.

title: The best hotel in Phuket!!!
review: Dear Linda S  ManyThanks for kind words - I have had a few emails back and for the with yuor husband so I'll keep this short - we  really appreciate the feedback and  we are leading the way in the beach clean up with more engagement of all businesses as we try to build a better environmental awareness around the Karon area.  Sincerely   Fraser  Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Birthday celebrations
review: I just had to write a review and congratulate the management and staff on opening such a delightful property, and truly giving the best customer experience to their guests. My partner, parents and I were booked into two deluxe rooms - 4305/4306 for six nights from 07 May. We had booked a private transfer with a mini-van directly with the hotel, however when we arrived the transfer was not there. We waited about 15 mins at the airport and called the hotel, and there had been a mix up at the hotel's end. Not wanting to wait any longer, especially with my parents who are a bit elderly, we used another company and subsequently booked the return transfer back to the airport six days later. When we checked in the hotel staff were very apologetic regarding the mix up and offered to pay…

title: Relaxing resort with nice beach
review: Dear amroid22  BIG CALL!!!  I have to say we strive to be the best we can be and ensure that each guest smiles long after departure at the thought of returning .  We seem to have succeeded with you!  Please let me know when you plan to return on fraser.ross@accor.com - and we'll try to be the best in Thailand next time!!!  Cheers   Fraser  Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Birthday getaway NOVOTEL Phuket Karon
review: I stayed at this wonderful hotel from April 14th to April 20th. Everything was first class, from the room cleaning to the fantastic friendly staff. There was a group of us celebrating a friends birthday and the staff were extremely accommodating and friendly. I would definitely recommend this hotel.

title: Quiet Resort
review: Stayed in a suite in April.  The resort is lovely and reasonably well laid out.  Ratings out of 5 Sleep Quality: 5 Internet: 3 Room Facilities: 4 Resort Facilities: 5 Service/Staff: 5  The suite was great but not as private as I had expected.  The plunge pool exposed to the central pathway as was the outdoor courtyard.  This could be easily resolved and the area could be more private.  The floor was also lifting in our suite and we noticed that the floor was being replaced in another suite.  We encountered 3 issues: a power outage, aircon failure and intermittent hot water.  All the issues were dealt with quickly by the wonderful staff.  The Karon Bay area is very quiet and while there is a shuttle bus into Patong it is not free.  I couldn’t help but think that the shuttle bus…

title: perfect vacation!
review: Dear justabloke  Many thanks for sharing your thoughts in details. I do apologize for all of 3 issues you came across. However, I'm glad to hear that my team solved all of them quickly. I shared your review with team - we all appreciated the praise of the team and resort. Regarding the privacy of the plunge pool suite- we take your suggestions on board for discussion. Thank you for all the highlights.  When you fancy heading back to Phuket- Please let me know on fraser.ross@accor.com and I'll be happy to help with any arrangements  Warm regards  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: A quick lunch.
review: This hotel is perfect, good for couples who want to relax, families with kids ... location is perfect, You can reach karon city centre walking only for 15 mins.  The staff was super friendly and nice, and always at Your disposal. Food is excellent, pools are clean, it has been a real pleasure to relax here for a week after one year working!   Only the wifi was a bit slow, but still..

title: Great
review: Dear Claire0801  Many thanks for the praise of the team and the resort. We were more than happy to know that we delivered a break from a whole year working you deserved. To keep you up to date, we are working on a project to upgrade our wifi quality.  Should you plan to head back to Phuket, please contact me directly on fraser.ross@accor.com –I’ll be delighted to help with any enquiry  Tropical regards  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: 1st Visit to Karon Beach
review: We were on a fun driving trip through Phuket wanting to check out all the Accor Hotels. After cruising down the coast to Kata Beach we decided to stopped off at the Novotel Karon Beach hotel for lunch.   Location: When arriving at this hotel I noticed it was not on the beach but across a busy road which to me would have been disappointing. Its approx 1 hr drive from Phuket Airport & 20 mins to Patong.   Facilities - After our disappointment of the location we immediately noticed the hotel had awesome facilities like the massive 2 swimming pools , day spa, kids club (pool)  and a fitness centre.   Restaurant - We had lunch at the Thai restaurant & ordered the fried calamari & prawns which were tasty but the dishes were on the small size & the service was incredibly slow...slow. …

title: Ok Stay
review: Family trip in April, 2015. Stayed in a Plunge Pool Suite. Had a separate Standard room for my mother.  The standard room was nice, quite and fairly big. No complaints here.  The Plunge Pool suite was nice and big. The sofa in the living room can be converted into a bed which worked out great for my 5 yr old. There was a door that separated bedroom from living room so we can watch tv without disturbing our son in the evening.  Plunge pool itself was very underwhelming. It's more like a big tub to soak in because there's no way to swim in it. My wife and I did not even go in, just my two boys. The design of the pool and room is quite disappointing. As the two boys played in the pool we did not realize all the water was seeping in under the rolling door. After cleaning up the…

title: Wonderful hotel! Just awesome!
review: Dear Chris S  Many thanks for taking the time to provide the feedback. I am sorry the room did not meet your expectations and I am grateful  for the balanced  review and the compliments for the team in general.  Please also accept my apologies for the  bird  song in the mornings  - we have had words but the time keeping of our local wildlife is not up to scratch!  I would love to see you back and show you our improvements  - please contact me any time on fraser.ross@accor.com  and I'll be delighted to assist with any arrangements  Tropical regards Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Awesome place for a relaxing break
review: We arrived at this hotel yesterday and have four nights here after staying in the hustle and bustle of Patong Beach. What a wonderful place to be!   Staff are amazing. So welcoming and friendly and attentive. We had an awesome bbq buffet by the pool last night and a staff member even took my plate for me and walked it to the table then pulled my chair out for me. All done with a wonderful smile!  The whole resort itself is laid out so well. The main people is peaceful and relaxing, there is a second pool area for the kids with a water slide and then another pool that is very peaceful and quiet. Once again always staff walking around going out of their way for all guests and especially the kids.  I could be here all day saying good comments but will post again when we check out…

title: Friendly staff, near beach, great facilities
review: Dear adsa83  Many thanks for the rave review - the team are over the moon to have put smiles on the dials of our guests!  The smiles on their dials how it !!  This is what we live for and to know we have made such an impact is  the best news we can get!  Please let me know when you're coming back on fraser.ross@accor.com  - I'll prepare the team  to be on the look out again!  Cheers  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Pleasant stay, nice staff
review: A fairly new resort with great facilities The Beach is across the road and a great walk from end to end The shopping area is about 10 minutes away and the Market stalls further up the road The resort has three pools one for the kids ( yippee) The staff are so friendly and try so hard to please (although some nationalities need to learn some manners when addressing the staff) Breakfast is a Buffet with a great selection and can be very busy, so get your timing right !!) The specialty  restaurant is well worth a visit although the children can be a pain when the parents do not pay attention to there little darlings Not every one likes to eat in a kindergarten  The Massaman curry was divine  The Rooms were very comfortable and clean the housemaids very obliging  We stayed for 11…

title: Pleasant hotel
review: Stayed in the Deluxe Family room (4415)..spacious indeed,complete with bunk bed for kids. A nice pleasant hotel with pleasant staff.Very good kids club complete with PS 4 for the kids!  Hope the hotel takes note on this two issues concerning the room..the bathroom to be exact. 1) The shower room floor tends to get all flooded up either due to bad drainage or the uneven flooring?  2) The opaque glass panelling separating the bathroom and the living room is surprisingly not FULLY opaque (due to the design )leaving discomforting spaces where one can see the going on's in the bathroom !!  A bathroom is always segregated simply because it is a bathroom ...and privacy is what matters most.A pretty strange choice of design if you ask me.  I note both these issues were also raised in…

title: Thailand Invasion
review: Dear zwnrin  Thank you for your feedback. Well noted for your suggestions - We appreciated the time you took to highlight the issues mentioned. We have passed your comment to our engineering team in order to prevent the shower room to be flooded. I shared your kind words with our team- they were thrilled to be part of your pleasant stay as it guests’ experience is one of our top priorities.  Please contact me on fraser.ross@accor.com any time you feel like coming back to our resort.  Warm regards  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: It is cetainly the best hotel I stayed in Thailand
review: We really had a great time staying in Novotel Karon, It was indeed a great resort hotel. facilities are all well maintained. Staff are very friendly and accommodating. I'd probably go back and stay here in my next trip. Highly recommended! :)

title: Very Nice Stay!!!!
review: Dear lizdistor  Thanks a lot for sharing your thoughts. We are pleased to know that you had a great time during your stay with us. My team was thrilled to be part of your positive feedback.   We look forward to seeing you back at the resort - please let me know when you plan to return on fraser.ross@accor.com   Cheers!  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Terrific stay
review: I came to Phuket with my friend from France, Bryan. It was a beautiful place within walking distance from the beach. There was no hustle of having to wait long for our room even though we arrived really early about 11am which was 4 hours before check in time. There was complimentary drinks and spa facilities which were presented to us which came as a surprise! Also the pool is such a wonderful relaxing place to hang out! If you love sunsets, do take a walk along the beach in the evening. It's really a calming feeling hearing the waves and walking along the shore.

title: Accommodation for a King
review: Wow, what a wonderful stay!  We felt like royalty, from the moment we arrived till the day we left.  We loved our 10 day stay in this very modern hotel.  Good location, close to the beach, shops and restaurants. Clean and comfortable rooms. Beautiful swimming pools, gardens - felt like home.  We enjoyed the breakfast buffet, the lunches and happy hour at the Champion bar, the excellent food at the Thai restaurant, Thai dancing lessons, the Sonkran experience and last but not the least, the friendly and professional staff. We will use this hotel as a benchmark for future accommodation excellence. Well done to manage and staff! Hope to see you soon.

title: It's OK for the price.  Great for kids
review: Dear Chris M  Many Thanks  for the high praise!  it's great to know you enjoyed the stay.  There's not much I can add to that...............except when you plan to return please let me know on fraser.ross@accor.com  and I'll prepare the throne room for you personally!  Cheers Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: First Class facilities and location
review: I thought that this hotel was ok. Good points - Good breakfast, good service, great pools, good for children, good toddlers activity room, good shower.  Bad points - small bathroom, easy to hear neighbours -  people stomping next door, next to a busy road which is difficult to cross to the beach.  We didn't go to the beach directly across the road but chose to walk down a bit neat the roundabout as it was close to a 7/11 supermarket and had sun loungers to rent out.

title: Chilled lovely time
review: Dear faith 246  Many thanks for taking the time  to share yuor review.  I appreciate the kind comments on the team and their efforts to service your stay.  In regard to the location of the report we are indeed a short walk of 300 m for the beach and while the traffic goes past we do have the  security guards  on duty to assist in crossing the road  -sorry they did not see m to be on hand while this was your location.  Thanks again for the positive comments on the staff - I   have passed this on and they are delighted to know they made a good impact on you.   Please let me know if you planning to come back on fraser.rposs@accor.com and I'll be only to glad to assist with any enquiry you have   Tropical regards  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Lovely stay!
review: Novotel Karon beach is staffed by very friendly and professional people who make your stay there seamless.  The hotel is well placed near the beach, Karon town and also close by taxi to Patong Beach.  Breakfast was sumptuous every morning and the three swimming pools meant that there was plenty of room for all. Rooms were delightful - we stayed in one of the plunge pool suites and found everything to be top class.

title: Great hotel
review: We stayed here for 9 nights after a hectic few days in Bangkok. Lovely hotel - we stayed in a pool plunge suite which I would highly recommend.   The location of the hotel is good, only 5-10 minute walk to the centre of Karon for some good bars and restaurants or 10 minutes in a taxi/tuk tuk to Patong if you fancy a bit more nightlife.   The staff at the hotel were excellent and definitely made our stay more enjoyable. Special mention to the bar staff Pong, Boat and Brownie - best mojitos and Mai Tais in phuket!!! Also to Kamin who is part of the hotels entertainment team - my husband enjoyed their pool games especially since Kamin let him win a few times 😜  Will definitely think about staying here again if we visit Phuket again.

title: What a stay
review: Dear suzh213  Many thanks for the great review  The team work hard to ensure everybody has a good time  and I am delighted we succeed with your stay.   The bar staff are so happy to know that they made great cocktails for you  but I have to advise WE NEVER let ANYBODY win at pool - it was all your husband's amazing skill.................honest!  Let me know when he wants a rematch  on fraser.ross@accor.com - I'll have the guys on standby - loser buys the first beer!  Cheers Fraser  Fraser Ross General Manager

title: A fantastic family resort.
review: Beautiful and new hotel just opposite Karon Beach and a walk away from the market, stayed there with wife and 2 kids first week of April. Everything was perfect, the check in, the room (we had a suite), pool facing, activity for kids, pool slide for kids. No complaints except being vegans we did not have much choice on the menu except a pizza and some veg thai curry. The chef of the Thai restaurant was very helpful and made special veg thai curry for us ----- thanks. Maybe being an international chain Novotel Karon should include more dishes for vegans. All in all a wonderful stay and would surely be there again.

title: Good hotel & pool
review: Dear Raviriti  Many thanks for the  kind review - we  truly appreciate the great feedback.  I'll certainly be reviewing the Vegan options with the team to ensure that we are able to deliver the best we can to all tastes and requirements.   Thanks again and let me know when you are coming again on fraser.ross@accor.com   - I'll have special meal prepared!  Tropical Regards Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Good hotel
review: 2nd time to phuket. First time we stayed in patong. It was too busy. This time we wanted a more quieter place.  Stayed here for 2 weeks with my family.  2 adults and 2 children (9,8). Very friendly atmosphere.  The pools are all great with plenty of seating. The kids pool has a waterslide which was great.  The restaurants are great.  A little more pricey than if you went out into the town but this is offset by the warmth of the staff. Kids club was a hit with our girls. The kids club staff are so friendly and caring towards all the kids.  The gym has your basic running machines and a couple of weight machines.  It's about a 5-10 minute walk into the town of karon.  We stayed in a deluxe king room which had a set of bunks for our children.  The king size bed is great and very…

title: It could be a great hotel but...
review: Situated right at one end of Karon Beach, this hotel is the sort of place where you'd go if you were trying to retire from the crowds. Upon arrival, I was hit by a very Miami-vibe and loved it instantaneously (or tried very hard to anyhow!)  Check-in was flawless. The typical cold towel and drink were proffered and, to be honest, much appreciated on a hot tropical day.  We were shown to our room and the hotel amenities were pointed out to us along the way. The hotel is laid out over a fairly large area and built over four storeys. There isn't much of a sea view because it's ironically too low and too close to the beach which is about a 5-minute walk away. Wheelchair access within the compound is good but not if you are planning to go to the beach as, like many other reviewers…

title: Great holiday
review: Dear Dawn C  Many thanks for taking the time to share your thoughts. we have indeed taken onboard your comments  and have  shared the feedback with the team so we can continue our journey of improvement.  Just to bring you up to date we have been working with local authorizes since before we opened regarding the bridge - there are many local by laws and  permission requirements  for us to adhere to before we are able to address this - you are right it's not our land but on the other hand we have taken a community view of improving the area around.  Thanks again for the feedback and tropical regards  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: A Blissful Stay
review: Just spent 4D/3N in Novotel Karon beach with a group of friends. Hotel is like new, rooms spacious, modern and very clean. Staff were going out of their way to be helpful and sort out details for us. Beach is 2 min walking distance from hotel, with a choice of quiet/deserted on the right, and bustling and busy on the left (2km stretch, everyone can find their own spot as they like it!). Hotel has excellent breakfast and pool bar/restaurant. We didn't try eating at night as there are so many opportunities outside, for all budgets. I highly recommend the simple-looking restaurants on the beach front, which have a huge menu, cheap prices and excellent food suitable for both local Thais and western customers. It's a bit far from the airport (compared to other hotels), but that is…

title: Bad experience
review: Dear ignoremyname  Many tanks for thigh praise and we really appreciate the time taken to share your thoughts. It's always our goal to make our guest smile and in yuor case we have succeeded. r Please let me know when you plan to return on fraser.ross@accor,.com and I'll organise have the exotic night life  hidden away again!!!  Cheers  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Beautiful resort, great service, but few things to improve
review: They had kids in mind when they planned this hotel. One of the latest and modern accommodation in Karon Beach. Did not expect this property to be so vast. Surrounded by greens and all tended by their landscapers daily. There are 3 pools. The one with the winding slide on level 2 happens to be our child's go to daily! We truly appreciate that there's something for everyone here. The main pool with a swim up bar, the pool side restaurant Joe Kools serves different buffet theme every night. Horizon cafe has a team of chefs that whips up excellent omelette for breakfast. Tai serves delicious Thai cuisine, I liked the soft shell crab with curry. Kids under 12 eats free. The team of staffs from the reception to the housekeeping are courteous, friendly, helpful and we felt so relaxed…

title: Fantastic resort, friendly staff
review: We spent 8 marvellous nights at this fantastic resort. We booked a family suite with a king size bed and 2 pullout sofa beds in the living room.  Our room faces the main road which can get very noisy due to the traffic. The resort has a free kids club from 8.00 to 5.00pm. My 10 year old son spent most of his time there as they have a PlayStation 4 which he loves playing. The staff are very friendly and its alway handy if you want to have some time to yourself ie go for a relaxing massage at the spa. It would be nice if they have fans at the bar near the Oasis pool and also at the reception. It gets very hot when you are having drinks and playing pool. I feel sorry for the staff as you can see sweat streaming from their faces. Re housekeeping, it would be nice if they replace the…

title: Great hotel on Phuket
review: Dear ozziechrissie2015  Many thanks for the kind words - I have shared the review with the team and they are thrilled we made a great impression. I note yuor comments on the housekeeping side and while we are very conscious of our environmental impact we have perhaps been to keen in this case. Thanks for highlighting this issue.  Next time you plan to come back  -let me know directly on fraser.ross@#accro.com - I'll start practicing play station games!  Cheers  Fraser  Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Fantastic New Hotel !!!
review: Just spent  four nights at the Novotel Karon Beach Phuket. Excellent modern hotel, no hesitation in recommending it.  Room I had was very spacious Beautifully swimming pool complete with wet pool bar, also kiddies pool with water slide Definitely stay there again.

title: Brilliant manager
review: Dear Angus C  Many thanks for taking the time to share your thoughts - it is always great to know when we have fulfilled out goal to make  our guests smile!   every body says hello- you made a great impression  - The bar team in particular are missing you!  Let me know when you plan to return on fraser.ross@accor.com and I'll be at Champions to welcome you personally!  Cheers  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: OK but will stay elsewhere in future
review: I cant think of anything to complain about its a very friendly hotel. I had a supreme plunge pool room and oh boy... wasn't it nice to take a dip at will! Highly recommended for all love birds looking to have a great time together.  The location of the hotel is very centrally located, Karon beach is 5 mins away!   The only improvement i wish the Hotel management could really solve is to create a partition between the bath area and the toilet. Its very annoying to have the entire bathroom to be wet every time someone takes a shower.    Cheers to all the lovely and friendly staff!  Thank you will surely visit again:)

title: Not for solo travellers
review: As a solo traveller at this hotel I felt it was more suited for families with young to teen children. The rooms were functional, and bed comfy. The pool isn't overly large and the swim up pool bar is in knee deep water, unusual concept? The children's pool looked large and the slide always had children enjoying it. Breakfast selection was limited, but still an ok buffet to choose from if not fussy. The Spa massages were as expected. The  Spa room and ambience would definitely be more serene than any of the massage places you would find on the street in Karon. 15 minutes by taxi from Patong. Easy walk to Karon Beach and shopping/eating areas. Free WiFi.

title: Good new resort (open 5 months in November? 2014) with teething issues
review: Dear Singapura01  Many Thanks for taking the time to share your experience. I appreciate the time taken to give feedback.    The pool bar at the main lagoon pool is in shallower water to allow people to relax at the bar and watch sports channels we we have on offer.  The 75 m length of the pool gives plenty space fro all to enjoy without crowding.  I see your comments on the breakfast buffet also and would love to get some more specific feedback so I can work with the kitchen team ot improve our offerings there.  Thanks for the spa feedback the team there were delighted to get praise!   Should you be planning to come back to this area - please let me know on fraser.ross@accor.com   Tropical Regards  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Excellent place for families
review: Good resort for couple (any gender mix), married and family stay.  Three swimming pools including one for small/teenage children with water slide for children.  Not as suitable for business or single travellers.  Staff were excellent and friendly (a real bonus).  Good for a 5 month old resort, however necessary improvements do be done ASAP, Issues that need to be addressed (March-April 2015) e.g.  - Additional fans, breeze ways and air-conditioning in breakfast and reception areas.  Many people could not sit in the breakfast area in comfort without more fans and air conditioning.  - Breakfast menu should be more varied and changed every couple of days. It needs include more lighter (healthier) and asian foods such as dumpling, gyoza, fruits, yoghurt etc.  - New swimming pool…

title: Get the deluxe spa suite!
review: Dear Johnjs2010  Many thanks for the great review and the balanced feedback  We really enjoy getting the full story to be bale to continue our journey towards making every guest  smile!   It would be great to see you back again soon so we can show you what we have done to  increase our   service.  Let me know when is best fro you to come back  on fraser.rposs@accor.com and I'll be delighted to make the booking  Tropical Regards Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Relatively new resort with good potential. Great facilities. Good location
review: I stayed here for 1 week with my husband and 15 month old.   We stayed in the plunge pool suite.   The positives: The room has a separate living room area that can be used as a second bedroom for your baby/kids  Soooo convenient to just jump into your own private pool.   Awesome and clean kids play room open from  7 or 8am to 5pm. Has an area for toddlers and young kids and another area for older kids. Lots of toys and very friendly staff.  You can even borrow books for 3 days.  There is also babysitting available (need to book a day in advance)  Food was delicious. Never had a bad meal. Breakfast buffet had a lot of variety. The room service was also very good. The Japanese restaurant was also delicious - one of my favourites was the yellow curry soft shell crab. And happy hour…

title: Great value but still getting organised...great potential for family holidays!
review: Fairly new property in an established area on a very popular beach.  Karon is one of the longest, widest and more open stretches of beach on Phuket Island.  Can be wild and woolly when the westerly winds are blowing but we lucked out with perfect conditions...Karon looked like an enormous, aqua-blue swimming pool, with gentle waves lapping the white, sandy shores.   Great stretch of beach for a long walk and swim before breakfast.   Novotel Karon is a modern, contemporary style of hotel with 3 swimming pools, fitness centre, kids club, Spa, sports bar, pool bar and plenty of activity options.  Something for every one in the family.   Currently a pecarious walk across the road to the beach but the Security staff will assist you and the hotel is planning a bridge to make it safer.…

title: Half way.
review: Dear SoozeTM  Thank you for your feedback. I’m glad that you like our location and our team smiling all around the resort. In term of organization within the housekeeping department- I passed your comment to the team. I also emphasized our goal to put a smile on our guests’ faces to all departments.. It would be nice to welcome you again in the future.  If you have any plans to come back- get in touch with me on fraser.ross@accor.com – I’ll ensure that everyone accomplish the goal.  Tropical regards  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Not perfect but good value
review: Second time to Phuket but first time staying in Karon. The Novotel was better then I expected. The staff are so helpful and friendly. The Tai restaurant serves good food in an air conditioned environment. The deluxe twin although spacious didn't have a sea view unless you stood on tip toe on the 4th floor balcony and I'm already over 6'. Breakfast was included and although the selection of foods was great the room wasn't air conditioned and could get very hot and busy. The pool area was large and there are plenty of loungers. The pool bar Joe Kool's served lunch to your lounger. The food was good but could take a while to arrive. They offer morning yoga every other day. M the instructor was very good and patient with the beginners.  The hotel is close to the beach and a ten…

title: Perfect stay
review: Dear Paul W  Many thanks for taking your time sharing your thoughts. I shared your feedback with the team- they were happy to know that you had a relaxing and enjoyable stay. In regards to  the food delivery, I passed your words to kitchen team to put procedures in place to accelerate the process.  When you have plans to meet us again- kindly contact me on fraser.ross@accor.com   Warm regards  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Good Hotel, but really weak management
review: We are staying here for a little over a week and, generally, things are very good. Positives: 1. Three pools, including a children's area/pool spread out the patrons nicely. 2. Happy Hour at one bar or another most of the afternoon. 3. Clean rooms. 4. The gym is roomy and well equipped. 5. Breakfast, which can be included in the accommodation deal, is excellent value for money.  Negatives: 1. Although friendly, the service is quite inefficient and, at times, plain clumsy. Orders are often wrong (I would estimate about half of our orders came out wrong) or diabolically late (it was common to wait over 60 minutes for poolside service - yes, this IS a first-world problem!). 2. The pools are lovely but really REALLY warm. I heard they were heated, which is a bit pointless and very…

title: Nice stay
review: Lovely room, great location next to a not-so-crowded beach. Not too loud because it wasn't on a party street, but expensive to travel to and from Patong if that's where you're planning on going. The multiple pools were perfect for lounging, and the breakfast selection was above average.

title: Amazing stay without worries
review: Dear Alex o  Thanks so much for the high score and taking time to share!  We are always looking to deliver the experience you deserve and in this case we are delighted to have hit the spot  Let me know when you plan to come back on fraser.ross@accor.com and I'll be happy to help with any arrangements  Tropical regards  Fraser  Fraser  Ross General Manager

title: Excellent New Property on Karon
review: Hotel was great, staff was extremely friendly, kitchen works 24/7, view was amazing, they didn't have a problem to let us stay after check out.... really place where you can relax. Oh and beach is really less than 5 minutes walk. Just the wifi didn't work always properly.

title: Amazing family friendly hotel and fantastic service( great team at novotel)
review: Dear Jakub Č  Many thanks for taking the time to share your thoughts!    I have shred the review with the team and the smiling at the start to day is a great gift. I have noted the feedback on the wifi and we are in the middle of a review of coverage around the resort so this will be remedied in the near future - ready for your next stay! Pleas let me know when you plan to return on fraser.ross@accor.com and I'll be delighted to help with any arrangements Cheers  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Stunning Hotel with Fantastic Service
review: i was travelling with my wife and 2 teenage girls so wanted a safe place as the Patong area didn't seem family friendly . Karon beach is a beautiful white sand beach just 5 km from Patong and has access to some nice restaurants and bars . The Hotel is brand new and facilities are excellent. we took  rooms with plunge pools attached which were very nice, though the pools were not strictly private with access t neighboring rooms.The area is safe and we were quite comfortable letting our girls roam around on their own. Left the girls at the hotel , We went late one night to Bangla street in Patong which was fun . Getting there from Karon was 400bath by Tuktuk( really Fancy ones with a great music system to get you in the mood to party).

title: Great new hotel!
review: Everything was new with high standard. Great hotel for families and kids. Great pool areas and kids room. Good breakfast and restaurants. A plus is 24h room service with no extra charge. But pricy restaurants. Another negative thing is the showers got flooded every day.

title: Great but can improve
review: Dear radekgabor  Many thanks for taking the time to share your review.  We are always focused on putting a smile on our guests faces and in the main we seem to have managed to hit our target with you.  I do note the feedback on the shower flooding and we are in the process of  correcting the drainage around the resort to ensure this issue is resolved - thanks for the highlight to help us identify the specific area.  It would be great to see you back  to the resort and should you plan to return please contact me directly o nfraser.ross@accor.com and I'll be on hand to make any arrangements you need.  Tropical Regards  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Great Hotel, good Service, Must improve the reception.
review: The Novotel Karon Beach is a great resort with comfortable rooms, three pools and very good food. It has free Wi Fi in the room but it was extremely slow and connection was sporadic at times. The pools are great, but close at 7pm. I really enjoy going for a swim after returning from eating out and this is not possible at the Novotel. The room we had backed on to the main road and although there were two sets of doors to the patio area, they did not eliminate all the noise and ear plugs are advised. On a positive note the block out curtains were excellent. Also our room did not have a clock.  The free breakfast was great and all you would expect . Because the resort is at the very end of Karon beach, a trip into the town centre required either a walk, taxi or Tuk Tuk.  We enjoyed…

title: nice pool area but breakfast area awful, near noisy main street without view
review: Dear Jim C  Many thanks for the feedback in your review.  It was great to get a high rating for the over all  experience. I have taken note of the issues you raise re the pool  access times  and we are currently reviewing out policy on this to open  up the Oasis Pool longer . The main reason we close at 7pm is safety of our guests as obviously at night keeping an eye  on the pool is not as easy as during the day.  It would be great to see you back and enjoy the resort again and should you wish to come back for a race around the pool - let me know on fraser.ross@accor.com  - I won't wear speedos - not a pretty sight..............  Tropical Regards  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Mostly pros but a few cons
review: I had a good holiday in this hotel (great location, near karon beach). I stayed in the plunge pool suite ( with a small private pool) and it was very new, clean and comfortable ( thanks to the room cleaning attendant that she keeps our suite very clean all our holiday) Breakfast buffet was amazing, and also Tai Asian restaurant Was good. The SPA Was outstanding! The staff, very friendly, take care of us very good everyday. The hotel has 3 pools and a nice fitness center. I had some small issues with the reception (nothing and none are perfect) probably a misunderstanding between the staff. Overall, i had a great holiday at Novotel Karon, and im sure that i Will be back next year.

title: No music
review: We spent 2 weeks in novotel, the hotel is very nice and the staff is amazing! One thing that makes us thinking twice about coming back is the music... We are all sitting and enjoyig ourselfs in the poolbar when the manager comes and turns off the music, the music is not playing loud! We were about 25 people, young and old asking for the music but they still wouldnt turn it on.. It feelt like we were staying at a home for old people and not at a nice hotel. The barpool staff couldnt understand why we couldnt have music on! The atmosphere was killed every day because of this! So if you are a fun person who likes to enjoy your vaccation, i do not recomend this hotel!   I would also like to know why you have these stupid rules about a little bit of music in the poolbar!

title: Awesome experience
review: Dear Mimij 80  Many thanks for sharing your thoughts. We are delighted to read your comments regarding the staff  and the service- I have shared this with the team and it brings out the smile at the meetings!  In regard to the issue of music we do have different music zones in the resort .  The main lagoon pool   music is set at a level and music genre that makes for relaxation and ambience .  To have one corner of this  at a different music setting actually  draws complaints from guests around the pool. So we have the Champions bar music set at a more up tempo  genre. Please accept my apologies for the dissatisfaction this has caused you.  I would love to welcome you and your group back to the hotel- it looked like you  had a great deal of fun around the resort and that can never be a bad thing. Please contact me on fraser.ross@accor.com and I'll have a music selection ready for you at Champions to enjoy !  Tropical regards  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Clean And Relaxing
review: Great hotel!  The rooms are beautiful, well appointed with a tropical feel, wrapped in luxury.  The staff are very friendly, warm and genuine; everyone truly seems happy to see you and happy to help you!  Indeed a wonderful stay...we will be back!

title: Excellent place to stay in Karon
review: Dear Catmeetstheworld  (love the name by the way!)   Thank you for sharing such a positive review.  The team were delighted to have this read out this morning and get the feedback that the  have made the impact of making the smile of our guests come alive!  When you plan to return please get in touch with me directly on fraser.ross@accor.com and I'll be delighted to help with any arrangements.  Tropical regards  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: We enjoy our staying
review: The hotel was definitely the best one in the area its very new and has excellent staff a great beach and pool. The best part about the hotel was probably the cleanliness, and the staff. The rooms were great also but there were a lot of mosquitos. Its a great family resort with things for the kids all around the hotel. I would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone staying in the Phuket area and I am definitely coming back.

title: Great place, still things to learn
review: Now don't get me wrong. This is great new hotel, but few things are not running smoothly yet.  Breakfast, lot of staff running a round but seems like not organized well enough. Some times you need to ask three times to get something done. Also was asking one morning cappuccino which was brought to me. Ended up having charged from that even though breakfast was included in room rate. Usually this category hotels has different coffees available or at least price is mentioned when making a order.  We had once dinner at the hotel after long day trip. It turned out to be nice Italian buffet evening set up next  to pool. Nice but they never had pizza's available. Otherwise OK food that evening.  Then stuff I really enjoyed: - location close to beach and not too far away from…

title: Fantastic, chilled stay at the Novotel
review: Dear Aki_Vaisto  Thanks so much for sharing your review.  We are always keen to get feedback and you have given us a great balance  in yours.    It’s great to know that you’ll be keen to come back and try us again.  I would like to apologize for the confusion at breakfast – we do offer Coffee and tea service as a part of the breakfast  package price .  Specialty coffees are charged additionally and this was clearly not explained correctly at the time.   In regard to the service at breakfast we generally get  very positive feedback  in regard to the team’s efforts but we take your comments seriously and have reviewed the setup and organization already to improve the structure and flow of service so thanks for highlighting.  I have to agree about the kids club - having tested the facilities personally – ( OK I don’t quite fit on the slide into the ball pit) , it’s a fun place for all ages and the team are really dedicated to making it a fun experience on a personal level not just  the games on hand – so big thanks for the highlight there.  It will be marvelous to welcome you back , so when you’re planning your next trip contact me on fraser.ross@accor.com  and I’ll be  on hand to help with any enquiry  Tropical regards  Fraser  Fraser Ross General Manager

title: A wonderful place
review: I've just returned from a weeks stay at this hotel and loved it. I stayed in a plunge pool suite (room 612) which was a great size, and the plunge pool was kept clean and was great to relax in with a beer at the end of the evening. Beds are fantastic and even though the suites aren't as private as you'd hope you rarely get people gawking in. :-)  Rooms and grounds were spotless and the food (I only ate lunch, was good), it was more expensive than Karon town but that's to be expected.  A quick walk across the road (assisted by a great security guard) took you to the beach to watch the great sunsets.  Service was good around the pools and the staff were always helpful and had a smile for you.  No issues with loungers and abandoned towels were removed also  by the staff.  I'd…

title: Great pool, lots of activities with excellent service
review: Dear Gary1974Dunfermline  Thanks for the great review  and the lovely photos.  The blue sky never loses it's appeal.  I lived here for a month before I worked out the  big thing in the sky was the sun - but then I am from Aberdeen................  I have passed on the comments to the team an they are all beaming with pride so it's always good to know when we have delivered the break you deserve.  Please let me know when you plan to come back on fraser.ross@accor.com  - I'll make sure lunch is ready and waiting  Cheers  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Good price
review: We stayed for 4 nights in march.  Everything was absolutely great from beginning to end. We had a plunge pool suite, which I would absolutely reccomend.  The room was ready when we arrived, and our request for a late check-out was accomodated with a smile. This is a beautiful place, everything is new, clean and well cared for. But still the best feature of this place is the wonderful staff. Everybody are friendly, attentive and helpful.  The few minor issues we had (Wifi, towels etc) was swiftly handled by a call to the front desk. We dined at the TAi resturant on 2 nights, and in addition to the food beeing delicious,  I have to especially mention the absolutely wonderful people who work there! The breakfast is fantastic, the kids lunch menu at the pool is great. All in all…

title: thank you
review: The Novotel in Karon is a nice hotel, brand new, very good for a family.  I write this though also thank all the staff.  My 5 yrs old run through a glass door thinking it was open. The hotel staff reacted immediately. Their first aid was perfect, the manager allowed us use their van to reach the hospital and to keep it all the afternoon for no chage, nor they charged the damage we produced. I think you see the difference in between a very good and an excellent when things go wrong, this place was absolutely great. Thank you again.

title: Paradise
review: Dear Fabrizio_guide  Many Thanks for sharing your thoughts.   I believe you are right it's when things don' t go to plan that we show our  true colours.  I am delighted there as no serious injury and that's all that matters- The Doctor's prescription of a bowl of ice cream did the trick!  Please let me know when you plan to return on fraser.ross@accor.com and I' ll be only too happy to help make the arrangements - Please let your children know that 'll be waiting with another ice cream and there is no need to get it from me the same way this time!  Tropical regards  Fraser  Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Great Experience & Modern Resort
review: We have just returned from a 6 night stay at the Novotel Resort Karon Beach and I must say it was one of the nicest Hotels we have stayed in. We first booked a deluxe sea view room which however we swapped for a pool view as this was a lot quieter.  The sea view room was directly over looking the very noisy busy main road, where traffic ran almost 24 hours a day. The room it self was lovely and very large, and there was a glimpse of water we could see through the many power lines, that wasn't really the ocean but a small bay! Just wasn't the picture that came to mind  when booking a room with a sea view. However they were happy to change our room the next day and we spent the rest of our holiday  over looking one of the 3 beautiful pools where it was a lot quieter. The main pool…

title: Great new hotel but still needs improvements
review: Dear cfw117  Many thanks for taking the time to review the resort and pass on your thoughts.  I have read your comments this morning to the tam and especially in the spa group there were big smiles all round! we are always trying to put a smile on every guest's face and it seems we  have succeeded in your case.  When you plan to com back let me know on fraser.ross@accor.com and I'll be happy to book the room and spa for you again - I can't do the therapy  though  - I did join a training session but evidently I have the touch of an elephant............. best leave it to the professionals!  Tropical Regards  Fraser   Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Good choice for honeymoon
review: The reception is located outdoors which is not common but I really liked it! I booked two rooms which were both very clean, had modern decor and amazing beds! Only a short ride to the main street in Penang Beach. Pool area is very inviting, lots of people, a big pool and good drink deals at the swim up bar. The beach directly out the front has everything one would need, wouldn't need to find another beach. The only negative part was the mosquito problem the restort had. There were many in our room and in the restaurant where we had breakfast.   There were many travellers staying here from honeymooners to families but there was enough space for everyone as we were able to relax by the pool in peace and quiet.  I would stay again for sure and recommend this resort to everyone:…

title: Restful and clean
review: We stayed here 10nights in the deluxe room with plunge pool. Very peaceful away from the main pool area and kids zone. Breakfast great, we ate once at resort food good but very expensive compared to down the street, also taxes are added to final bill just be aware. Pool area always clean, some guests leave towels on pool lounges, so you never know if they are taken, maybe resort staff could collect towels. Take mossie repellent as lots of the little pests in our room, especially in bathroom, ask for a mossie zapper to plug in from front desk it did help.3 Min walk to beautiful karon beach, 7min walk to main street for food and typical tourist shops and markets, easy and safe to walk there. If you feel the need to go to patong a taxi will cost 300bach about 12aust $ one way, we…

title: Super Property, Great service
review: Dear Jude MD  Many thanks for the kind words  , we are always  striving to make every guest stay the  one they deserve and we seem to have found our target with you .  I have to also thanks for  the feedback on the little uninvited guests  -we are fogging the resort regularly to keep these at bay , but being a tropical country  we do also advise to ensure you take precautions (I take my wife with me wherever I go as the Mosquitos love her !) Thanks for highlighting the breakfast  experience the culinary team were delighted to get a mention!  We would love to see you return and when you plan to do so please contact me direct on fraser.ross@accor.com and I’ll be  happy to help in any way I can.  –I’ll have the  cocktails ready and the towels on chairs just for you!  Cheers  Fraser Fraser Ross  General Manager

title: Great Hotel
review: there in Dec 2014, 2 families ( 4 kids from 8 to 12). Would highly recommend the plunge pool suites. Really spacious, well laid out , the kids loved it.  The property is well located in Karon and well spread out. The kids loved the separate pool area with a water slide for them   Excellent service by all

title: Very nice hotel
review: Dear SamLad00  Thank you for your feedback – short but very encouraging for all of us! We are delighted to know that you and your family enjoyed the resort and our facilities. Our team would love to see you re-visit us in the near future.   Please let me know any future plans on fraser.ross@accor.com – We’ll be ready to welcome you back to our resort!  Warm regards  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Lovely place to stay!
review: We stayed at this gorgeous hotel for 10 nights in January 2015, the hotel grounds were immaculate as were the rooms which was also very spacious, we had a great view off our balcony of the hills and it was nice and quiet.Our housekeeper was such a lovely lady (sorry can't remember her name - rm 5302) and always smiling and polite. I have traveled ALOT and i have to say the only thing i found disappointing was the rudeness of some of the Russian people who were also staying at the hotel but i certainly didn't allow that to affect our trip. i would definitely recommend the Novotel to friends visiting Karon.

title: Great relaxing vacation
review: Really enjoyed staying in this hotel mainly due to the hospitable and kind staff of the hotel. Our thanks to Miss Kay (restaurant manager), an asset to the hotel, always around. She is always friendly and sensitive to our needs during our stay there. In fact all your staff are polite and we'll trained. Keep the good standard up. Hotel is also new, clean and we'll maintained. However, the plunge pool  could be made more private. Will not hesitate to comeback to this hotel if ever we are in Karon.

title: Great hotel!
review: Dear Johnson L  Thanks a lot for your feedback – short but great for encouraging the team. I passed your comment to Ms. Kay who is happy to know that she made an impressive impact during your stay. I’m glad to see a positive result from our team effort. We are counting down the days we will meet you again.  Do not hesitate to contact me on fraser.ross@accor.com when you fancy coming back to Phuket.  Cheers!  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Beautiful resort
review: Our stay at the Novotel Karon was fantastic! The rooms were big, always clean and Cumfy! The breakfast was great and the staff extremely helpful.  I just wish they wouldn't play the annoying dance music at the pool really loudly in the morning when your trying to relax!!  All in all though, a great place to stay.

title: Nice
review: Dear Adam S  Thanks for the 5 star review – great way for us to start the day!  We are delighted you enjoyed the resort and facilities. Our team try to be as helpful as possible and it ‘s  lovely to hear that they hit the mark with you!  Regarding the music at the poolside, the morning aerobics session in the main lagoon pool  is a bit of hit so Can’t reduce it down but we do have the oasis pool to retire to for a post of tranquility and calm …………….  It would be super to see you back and please let me know when you plan to return on fraser.ross@accor.com – I’ll have ear plugs ready or of course you could always  join in to work off a few calories for the night before!!  Cheers  Fraser  Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Novotel Karon Beach
review: For our week stay at this resort has been brilliant!  From check-in to check-out the services is brilliant!   However, most of our night in we did a in room-dinning, the food were ok and lack of presentation a little, I suppose its because its after midnight orso.  Also 'NOVOTEL' is a french ownership, right? employees should have least degree with a good standard english! But I found that your staff really needs to improve their ENGLISH!   But overall, I give 5 stars as that don't really concerned me.

title: Fabulous Resort... I'd stay again!
review: We stayed 10 nights, me, hubby and teenage daughter (deluxe room with adjoining room) Food, drink,  facilities and staff were all fabulous.  Loved the day spa, you pay a little more than on the streets, still a lot less than in Oz, but there is no comparison... bliss :)  our room was very clean, beautifully decorated and beds were very very comfortable, with the best sheets ever!!! Happy hour drinks poolside were a daily event for us, and we enjoyed their bbq buffet often too.  We'd stay again for sure... Loved it!!!

title: Service Plus 24/12 - 10/1
review: Dear Jools2609  Many thanks for taking the tem to share!  I now know who was the lady that floated above the sheets in the Spa!! I thought the team were joking…………. Seriously they were delighted to get the feedback.   Thanks for highlighting  the team in general  - we are all working hard to ensure that every guest gets the break they deserve and glad we hit the spot with you guys!  Let me know when you plan to come back  on fraser.ross@accor.com  -I’ll be delighted to make any arrangements required and will be waiting in the lobby  with spa team to whisk you away!  Cheers! Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Nice hotel
review: What a wonderful place to stay. i have been travelling to Phuket  for 7 years 4 times a year and have stayed at lots of places before but you have won me forever. I stayed 17 nights and live in the desert in Australia and needed the relax. Your staff are amazing, your hotel is amazing. My partner and i will be back in May and I have booked the Pool Suite. Thank you Fraser and team.

title: What a Fabulous Resort, couldn't fault it!
review: Dear Scott W   Thanks for the big plug!  I have to admit though   “crakatinny” in  Central North WA is a tad drier than Phuket in many ways!  The whole team enjoyed meeting you and your lovely partner and  felt like a bit of family had gone when you left.  So the announcement of your return has gone down very well!    I have your booking in my diary  and I’ll be waiting in the lobby  to make sure we have all covered and the only thing that sound like a cricket is the “pssst” of the first beer being opened at the poolside.  Can’t wait!  Fraser  Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Great family friendly Resort with caring accommodating staff
review: Very nice hotel 5 mins to beautiful Karon beach.Room was very new and clean / large swimming pool Good location and friendly staff... Thank you to Por receptionist and Natty House keeping manager for a warm welcome... I will recommend Novotel Karon to everyone who want to come to Phuket

title: Nice Christmas holiday!
review: Stayed in the new Novotel for 11 nights over Christmas. Overall we had a great stay, but there is some room for improvement.   The location is not very central but we did not mind the 10 minute walk to the restaurants of Karon. The beach is close but you have to cross a road with heavy traffic (unlike other hotels on the road Novotel had no one to stop the traffic for you).   The hotel is new and therefore the rooms are in very good condition and they are nicely decorated. We first stayed in a room with a private pool but the room was really really small (for three) and the bathroom was tiny, not at all adequate. Also the location of the room was not great, you almost felt like being in bunker while walking there. We requested a suite and were upgraded against a decent fee. The…

title: A newly launched hotel but there are rooms for improvement
review: Dear Pilvi  Many Thanks for the kind words and the great feedback for us to work with. Our journey to making every guest feel relaxed have fun and get the break they deserve is always helped by reviews like this!  I must apologies for any frustration you felt when communicating with the team – the plethora of accents they deal with when in conversation means that sometimes things are lost in translation.  Especially given the only native English speaker in the team (supposedly) is me – Scotsman – so the example they have to learn from is not the best!!  I am glad we sorted out the room issue and that you enjoyed the sta. I have passed your comments on to K.Sandra and to K.Kae ( restaurant manager)  and they are delighted   to get the feedback- I have asked them to be beacons of support for the learning of the team!  It will be wonderful to welcome you back  and please let me know when you plan to return on fraser.ross@accor.com  - I’ll get more weights for the gym!  Cheers Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Absolute perfection
review: The nicest part of the hotel are the pools (a slide that leads to a pool on 2nd level and the happening pool on level 1). The concierge guy is great and very helpful and friendly. The rooms were the big disappointment for a newly build hotel. The rooms are smaller than I expected, the design and decoration is rather simple/ minimum,  and the bath rooms do not have a place to hang your towels or clothes. The breakfast is alright.

title: Very good but not yet perfect
review: Dear Samyeo67  Many thanks for the feedback in your review.  I must apologise  that we made you feel that the break was a disappointment. The rooms sizes in the resort  are 29sqm   through to 60 sqm depending on the room type booked  - so I’d love for you to come back and see the options available.  Thanks though for the praise of the Concierge – I have passed this on and it’s good to know we got the service aspect of the stay right for you.  I would love to hear from you directly on fraser.ross@accor.com and see how we could improve your impression – especially of breakfast – the most important meal of the day – we’re all ears to constructive feedback.  Sincerely Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: excellent hotel
review: Staying at the Novotel Karon was an absolute dream, a perfect holiday. The rooms were lovely, the pool and bars exceptional. The staff at the Novotel Karon are friendly, polite and will go above and beyond what is expected of them to ensure your stay is divine. The location is perfect within walking distance to the market and restaurants and anything else you need. I would definitely stay here again and recommend it to everyone. The attitude and nature of the staff is what gives this hotel the edge over other resorts.

title: Fabulous stay at Novotel
review: We are currently staying in a plunge pool suite at the Novotel, Karon.  It is a great hotel for us as the suite is really big for our family (2 boys aged 5 and 10). It is contemporary and trendy and really comfortable. Great kids club. Food is great in the hotel but you can get out and about very easily into Karon town where there is lots to discover. Lots of reasons to stay here and not in Patong which is only a couple of miles north.  The service of the staff has been really attentive and we've enjoyed the sunshine, the pools and the facilities - we've got a few days left but I know already that I won't want to leave....

title: Novotel Phuket Christmas stay
review: Dear KatieWhittingham  Many thanks for your kind review. We were more than happy to know that you had a fabulous stay with us and your sons enjoyed the kids club. We wish you could stay and enjoy the sunshine at our tropical resort a bit longer. We are always ready to welcome your family again.  If you plan to discover Phuket again kindly notice me on fraser.ross@accor.com  Warm regards  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Very nice !
review: The hotel has some great staff members who are obviously doing their best in a hotel that is still trying to get their services set up. My family and I stayed in a plunge pool suite for 9 nights. There were many problems with the room which you should not expect from a brand new property.  Our bed sheets were never changed until I asked them to do so after 5 nights.  Some of the staff need more training, in particular the bar staff who did not know basic cocktails like mojitos and daiquiris and didn't even want to mention that there was a happy hour. The kids club is great but the staff should be trained about the other services of the hotel. The is no generator back up electricity to the rooms and having experienced several power outages during our stay, one lasting for 7 hours…

title: Look no where else
review: Dear  M4R1A  Many thanks for  sharing your  experience and feedback. We are always looking at how to improve and your review is helping us with that journey. Please accept my apologies for the disappointment in the  service at the bar  and inhouse keeping. I have shared your review with the team have taken on board the comments .  We are re training the bar team  in cocktail mixing  especially to ensure that they are able to  deliver the service our guests deserve.  In regard to housekeeping  oversight  this we are rechecking our system as on request we change sheets daily and in line with our Planet 21 Program  ( reduce chemical use and laundry to reduce pollution etc )we change sheets every 3 days automatically – this clearly has not been tracked correctly during your stay.  During your stay we did have some bad luck with the electricity and the generator while connected to emergency lighting in the room is not currently connected to other services .  However we are reviewing this in line with local legal requirements and capacity  of the generator to provide power.  It would be wonderful to welcome you back I nth future to show you how our journey continues and the service you deserve is delivered. Please contact me any time on fraser.ross@accor.com and I’ll be delighted to make any arrangements  Sincerely  Fraser  Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Wonderful Stay
review: I spent one week mid-November at Novotel Karon.  This is a new hotel so everything is nice and clean. Had a Deluxe room at the back of the hotel and it was very quiet. The room is big, the bed is comfy, Tv and aircon works well. A balcony with a table and 2 chairs. Room service menu but didn’t use it. Good water pressure in the shower.  The hotel is close to the beach, supermarkets, plenty of local restaurants and shops. Nothing to complain about the food. The buffet breakfast was nice. The main pool is great and you can get a sun lounger and an umbrella anytime. I found the staff welcoming in the whole hotel.  Now, a very personal remark ☺  during my stay, my only regret is that I didn’t get to know that special guy reading on his tablet at the pool all day long. I think he…

title: Clean and new but room for improvement
review: My wife and I booked two rooms, a suite (1301) and a superior room (1206) and we were there on 19-22 December 2014.   The City Breaks package we bought for the two rooms claimed that the suite came with bath tub, branded amenities and a coffee machine, but these were absent from the room when we checked in. The hotel should not be marketing such amenities under the room packages if it does not intend to provide them.   As we traveled with young children and grandparents we had clothes to hang dry but the hotel could not provide any drying rack - we had to resort to hanging the clothes around the air vents inside the room or at the balcony grille, both of which were inappropriate places.   But overall the hotel is new and very clean. It's also conveniently located close to Patong…

title: New Hotel
review: Dear Gavin C  Many thanks for the feedback in your review.  We are always looking at how we can provide the break our guests deserve and in this case in a few aspects we have fallen short. Please accept my apologies.  In regard to the room facilities Could you please forward me the description you are referring to . we do have branded toiletries in all our rooms and the tea and coffee making facilities also – I have investigated and found these to be in the room you were occupying.   In reference to the  drying of clothes, we are looking into the racks that we can use around the resort as some feedback on this is advising same as yourself– thanks for adding your weight to this and we will be fixing this issue soon.  Thanks though for highlighting we’re clean and convenient and we really appreciate the recommendation to use us a great break!  I would really like to hear from you and welcome you back in the near future – please contact me on fraser.ross@accor.com at any time  Tropical regards   Fraser  Fraser ROSS Fraser  General Manager

title: perfect stay
review: Spent 5 nights at this hotel at the beginning of December. Check in was good we were given a room in a quiet area of the property as we had requested. Huge king size bed very comfortable. Bathroom clean with lovely shower. All the electrical sockets were not working in the room and were not fixed after we told them about it.  The beach is across the road from the hotel. Loved the beach as it was not very crowded. Lots of eating places and shops within walking distance to hotel.  Patong beach is about 5 km away will set u back BTH 300/400 by taxi or tuk tuk to get there each way. I was glad we didn't saty at Patong Beach as I couldnt handle the hustle and bustle there.   On the day of our check out the room was not available for late check out so we left our luggage at hotel and…

title: 4 nights in phuket
review: Dear Fluasa234  Thanks so much for the review .   We are so glad you enjoyed the stay despite the hicough with the electrical system.  I am delighted to report it’s fixed now after replacing a faulty circuit board.   We always try to accommodate guest special requests when possible so it was great to be able to provide you with late check out this time  to make life easier.  Please let me know when you plan to return an on fraser.ross@accor.com and I’ll be happy to make any arrangements you need.  Looking forward to seeing you return – I’ll  have the power on !  Cheers  Fraser  Fraser Ross General Manager

title: New hotel, very good swimming pool!
