review: stayed in novotel in the First half of November.had an brillant stay.staff really helpfull and nice.rooms very clean and comfortable.poolarea is perfekt to spent a relaxed day.Pools cleand every day.Restaurants offer pretty good food.2 minutes walk total the beach.free wifi in the whole Hotel.Restaurants and supermarkes all in short walkingdistance. had an absolut perfect stay.  100% recomdation

title: Relax
review: Nice new hotel about a 5 min walk to the beach,  The staff were nice and helpful and the breakfast was good. Cool swimming pool for relaxing beside and topping up the tan, didn't see any kids while we were there.

title: Nice place but horrible suite
review: Dear Craig L  Thanks a lot for sharing your thoughts. We were delighted to know that you had a relaxing time with us. Our team truly appreciated the feedback and we hope to see you return to our resort in the near future.  Should you plan to re-visit us, kindly get in touch with me on fraser.ross@accor.com   Warm regards  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Potential to be number 1 in all of Phuket
review: Not  able to close the door. Issue in the suite Floor where people can get hurt in room 812. Nobody came to clean. Closet near the  bed cannot be closed properly. Needs a lot of improvement to reach the needed standards. Nice location near the beach

title: Great resort but not without some issues
review: Dear Ghaz87 Please accept my apologies for not providing you with break you deserve.  I would like to be able to speak with you personally to express my sincere wishes to remedy the situation and have you return to  replace  your current memories with great ones. I can be contacted at any time on fraser.ross@accor.com.  Sincerely  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Thank you a lot
review: I had the most amazing stay at Novotel Karon last week. My wife and I checked in on December 6th and stayed 5 nights till December 11th. We stayed in a plunge pool suite and I am glad to say that everything about this resort is world class. Sure they do have had some unbelievably bad luck with issues they cant do much about, but I will surely cut the some slack. They are new and they are doing all they can and sometimes go above and beyond the call of duty to ensure we have a good stay. I just wish they hadnt gone 'full rate' yet. I had got the early bird offer having booked in October, but considering they have gone full rate from mid December, maybe, just maybe, they could have waited for a couple of more months. The front office ladies and gents are just wonderful folks to…

title: Karon Novotel
review: Well appointed hotel conveniently located close to Karon beach and only 10 minutes away from Patong by taxi. Great resort for families with facilities for kids. Would stay there next time I go to Phuket.

title: EXCEPTIONAL  GOOD HOTEL  - KARON BEACH
review: Dear Nullaboy,  Many thanks for your generous 5-star review,  We are all glad that you like the location and found our resort was great for families. My team and I will definitely be happy to welcome you again. When you plan to stay with us again, you could contact me directly via jp.lovotti@accor.com   Tropical regards,  JPL  Jean Philippe Lovotti General Manager

title: Wonderful wonderful stay.
review: This is a  " WORLD CLASS " hotel . From the time you arrive , the porter , reception staff are well trained and extremely helpfully with our check in . The check in took less than two minutes ..... The  hotel GM Mr Fraser Ross was there to welcome us to his hotel  - was most impressed !!   The hotel is beautiful with a number of pool , restaurants situated throughout the hotel , food selection is excellent , and breakfast buffet was one of  best we had in Thailand !   We would highly recommend this hotel to any of our friends or visitors to Thailand !!   Mr Fraser Ross - a job  Well Done !!  !  Keep up the good work !!

title: Recommended New Resort at Karon Beach
review: Dear Rudi T  Thanks so much for the  kind words.  It was a please for all to welcome and look after you during the  stay.  I see  that our journey to make sure all guest have fun and relax has hit the spot with you!  I truly hope we can welcome you back in the near future and enjoy the chance to look after you again.  I'll be at the lobby ready  to take the bags!  Cheers  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Great New Resort in Phuket / Karon Beach
review: The staff are the best. When we stepped out of the taxi, there were people jumping out to carry our luggage, and checking us in. The bell took us to our building with a golf cart that saved us some walking. I have to special thank Por Gsa at the front desk to give us wonderful suggestions of where to go about, arrange transportation and make reservations for us. She even bought us some fruit after we told her that we were crave for some without charging us. Of course we paid her afterward. All the staff just made you feel so welcome there. The hotel is new, there are still some touch up work going on. It works out for us since we were out most of the time. The spa service is great. The breakfast is kind of boring though. We were having the same menu for 4 straight days. I have…

title: Fantastic time
review: We were staying in a Deluxe room which was in a great position within the complex. Short walk to the pools/breakfast/reception. The rooms were a fantastic size & the bed is the most comfortable I have ever slept in. We sunbathed by the oasis pool most days & the staff at champions bar were most attentive. We got cold towels when we were too hot ( which was AMAZING ) you also got free water & they came round with wee ice lollies as well. Would be great if the whole resort did this, not just at this pool. This pool was also nice and quiet, I think it would be a good idea to make this pool an adults only pool. We had pizza & chips at lunchtime from champions and it was great, very reasonably priced too.  Breakfast was great - lots of choice - loved the pancake making machine, never…

title: Great Stay - Nice Hotel
review: Dear Bluebell 1977  Thanks for great review!  We are always trying to ensure the guest stay is fun and relaxed.  The team were “Chuffed Tae Bits” ( you’ll understand!) to get the high praise.  In regard to the pool service we have the 3 pools – the main pool, Oasis pool and the kids pool and we are giving each of these their own  identity – the Oasis pool is exactly that -  a calm spot in the resort to chill out so the extra touches are enhance the experience.  Thanks for the compliment re breakfast too- the most important meal of the day sets you up for a hard days relaxing and we take this very seriously.  It would be great to see you back here and catch up – let me know your plans on fraser.ross@accor.com – I’ll be delighted to help out in anyway.  Slante!  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: very nice and new hotel
review: After reading some of the other reviews I was concerned about my booking and given that the hotel has just opened I thought i may get some issues. It is clear though from my stay whoever is in charge is taking note of guest feedback and doing a great job in making this a great hotel  Good points to mention:  Front office - Check in was quick and easy, friendly smiling staff and was helpful with questions on car hire, WIFI etc ... they seem to have brains or have been trained well Pool - GREAT Pool - and pool staff - love the swim up bar Rooms - clean, housekeeping done timely and again smiling happy staff - they even speak English, which for housekeeping is pretty good. No teething issues with the rooms everything worked well. Breakfast - staffed well, again staff seem to have…

title: The Best Resort in Karon Beach
review: Dear AdinHev  Thanks for the great review – really appreciated when the team gets the special mention.  We are always looking at how to train effectively and make sure that the resort is providing a great experience – we have hit the spot with your stay! The Main lagoon pool is a great area with plenty of space and of course the swim up bar is a good excuse not to have to leave the area!  I  hope to see you again in this part of the world – nice and warm – think about returning soon – I just the forecast for the UK this winter – Brrrrrrrr!  Let me know if there is anything I can do on fraser.ross@accor.com  Tropical regards  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Absolutely Superb
review: The hotel is new, nice and is well decorated. Suit has large bedroom and a living room that has extended couch for kids but that’s occupied the most of the room. Breakfast was excellent Big and nice pool and also another big pool for kids with one small waterslide

title: New hotel with great service
review: i booked this hotel because it is brand new, and we had a great time here. The bed are very comfortable (super king size), beautiful nice setup. Close to local restaurants ( about 10 mins walk) and Karon beach is only across the street. All the hotel staff are really friendly, Tank and Sharon are very helpful, I was here with my parents (in their seventies) - Sharon was very kind to upgrade us to give us a quiet and comfortable room with easier access for older people.  For room, i recommend the pool facing one and the plunge pool suite is definitely worth it. You have a nice outdoor sitting area and a jacuzzi.

title: excellent new hotel
review: Dear penpen  Many thanks for  the review.  We always try to ensure that all our guest needs are attended to and in this case it was great to be able to provide a good solution for your parents ease of access.   I have passed your comments on to Sharon and Tank and they were thrilled to get a mention!  It would be great to see you back and  I hope you can contact me on fraser.ross@accor.com so I can help with any plans you need to make  Tropical Regards  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Fantastic
review: Great staff very friendly and helpful. We got upgraded to a deluxe room not sure if that was a plus point as balcony looks over the road, but soundproofed and spacious room.  Only downside drinks and food expensive in the hotel would like to spend more time enjoying facilities.  A suggestion would be to have at least a few hours as happy hours to get more clients to use both bars. Most 4 and 5 star hotels are more expensive but still have happy hours.  You would get more clients to use your facilities

title: It's not ready and never will be
review: Dear Sharon V  Thank you so much for your feedback and recommendation. I’m glad to know that the double glassis working well. Our team was delighted to know that you had a great time and they had been helpful during your stay. To keep you updated, we are currently having happy hours available at both bars. We appreciate your kind suggestion – very nice for our journey of improvement. It would be great if you come back to our resort to enjoy our facilities along with happy hours.   If you have plans to return to our resort, kindly let me know on fraser.ross@accor.com  Warm regards  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Poor arrangement, keep wasting our time
review: After a long trip Novotel Karon Beach is a touch of paradise. Staff are so helpful & friendly. There was a mix up with my booking, but with in 5 minutes, the staff had it sorted & was very apolgetic & sympathetic to the situation. Words cannot describe how amazing the rooms are. And very quiet. Double glazed doors so you dont hear any noise from the road. If I have to say something negative & its clutching at straws, theres no where to hang your wet towel in the bathroom. Extremely minor thing in my book, especially when you take into account your private balcony & outdoor setting. Am coming back in a weeks time. Its that good in my book.

title: Great Hotel but
review: Great Hotel but has been opened when it was not ready. Some big mistakes in the recrutment specially in the Kids Club. And i am  still waiting for the extra points i was promissed on my Club Accor Card following  all the problems we faced during our stay.

title: Wonderful Experience
review: Dear Keyvanou  Thank you for the review and the chance to work on our services.  I apologise for the problems during your stay and I know that we have posted the points for the  Le Club program to your membership card. Please let me know directly on fraser.ross@accor.com  if they have not been received by now.      I know we had the electricity cut in the area of Karon which posed some issues for you during the stay but we did not receive any feedback on the kids club services – I would be most grateful of you could contact me directly to advise your concerns.  This is a crucial service of the resort and to date we have had only positive comments so I am anxious to correct anything we can.  I would be delighted to welcome you back and replace your current feelings with fun memories!  Sincerely   Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Great hotel, wonderful service
review: Arrived around 7pm to warm welcome and nice cold drink. We were escorted to a marvelous suite with a private plunge pool. Later, we had dinner in Tai, the pan Asia restaurant. Service, food and atmosphere were fantastic. Breakfast the next morning offered a wide selection, prompt service and a well made omelette. Woudl highly recommend this hotel for couples - book the suite with punge pool!

title: Fantastic New Resort
review: Dear Santa Fe M   Thank you for sharing your wonderful experience with us. I’m glad you could feel the warm at our resort. It’s our goal to make your stay as pleasant as possible. I passed on your kind words to Culinary team- They could not stop smiling till the end of the day. It would be marvelous to see you again in the near future.  If you have plans to return to our resort, kindly let me know on fraser.ross@accor.com  Warm Regards  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Really Good Hotel, Really Great Serives.
review: A friend and I stayed for a week in late October just after opening and it was a little chaotic, having not slept properly for around 36hours we were keen to get to the room but check-in took some time and then the room keys didn't work. After some delay during which the staff were very apologetic they upgraded us to a pool room which was fantastic. Only draw back is that having a pool instead of a terrace means no outdoor space to sit outside the room. There was a also a reasonable amount of construction work/finishing off happening, one pool was closed the entire duration of our stay and one night there was a power cut which lasted about half an hour. All these should now be resolved, the staff are friendly, you can be on the beach in two minutes and the pool and other…

title: If in Karon Beach.  This is the place to stay.
review: We checked in to Novotel for 4 nights. From the time we stepped in , one thing was verit's oticeable, it was the smiles and the service.  Rooms are very spacious, beds are big and plenty of space . Breakfast buffet was full of choices for every age. Service team at brekky is awesome Parew served us each morning with a big smile. If you wanted to try some dinner outside of the hotels, there are plenty of choices available  only within few minutes walk. Fraser the GM was kind enough to mention a few places for some local cuisine. Overall it was an excellent experience.  With a team like that. You cannot go wrong.

title: Great start to honeymoon
review: Dear RPerera1980  Many thanks for the review and the time to post it .  We really appreciate the feedback and the positive comments.  K.Parew is excited to know she got a mention and her face is beaming!  Thanks for highlighting the whole team, we are striving to have the atmosphere guest can relax in and it’s great to know we hit the spot with your stay.   It would be great to welcome you back to the resort and if there is anything I can do to help with plans – let me know directly on fraser.ross@accor.com  Cheers  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager  PS  I recommend our restaurants before anywhere else - they are great! 

title: Couldnt ask for a better experience
review: We came here for 3 nights from october 20! It was the first stop on our honeymoon, the hotel itself was great with staff that go above and beyond!! We got a pool room so had our own private plunge pool which was greay! We travelled with our 5 month old baby also and the service staff provided to her was also fantastic The only issue there was no cot for her so we had to put her on the couch cusion on floor! The bed for us was very comfortable tho, one of the best we've had! We ate breakfast daily which was yum! Lunch we ate by the pool also with dinner and the food was very good! Joe kools!! Staff were helpful when getting in and around hotel also.  We also used the spa for massage and it was very nice!! Professional staff! My only major concern was the amount of mosquitoes…

title: A place that makes you feel like you have really had a holiday
review: Dear Kristy-Lee W  Thank for the tie mot post your thoughts – most welcome reading first thing in the morning !  I have passed the  comments onto the team about service and attitude  which has given them a real boost. In regards to  the baby cost – please accept my apologies we have now got enough for all. During your stay we went out to buy more.   For the mosquitos  around – we have regular fogging to keep the numbers down and we are also  looking at the best solution in the rooms with a coil or electronic system to keep them away from people as much as possible.  I am delighted you enjoyed the stay and relaxed at Joe Kools and the Spa services the team are dedicated to making the stress of everyday life disappear……..  We would be  excited to welcome you back for your anniversary ( or sooner!)  to your Novotel. If there is anything I can do to help you plan the next trip – let me know on fraser.ross@accor.com  Tropical regards  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: New Resort .. Wonderful !
review: We checked in as a family with two small children on their opening day.  We had a wonderful room with plunge pool and about 50m to the main resort pool.  We were expecting the room to be swim out as per the hotel description but it still wasn't far.  A few teething issues being a brand new resort but the staff were so wonderful, I couldn't fault anything really.  Breakfast was lovely and a special mention to the breakfast staff Mon, Kook and Mint.  Front desk were only too helpful with any requests.  The manager, Fraser, takes the time to get feedback on the experience off all guests.  Probably the only thing that's negative is the location.  To get to the beach you need to cross over a dodgy little man-made bridge (or more like a few planks) over a waterway.  I think this needs…

title: Opening day stay
review: We checked in the opening day 15/10.The hotel has been totally remodelled and looks brand new.We had a suite for our family of four which was excellent with a plunge pool in our ground floor balcony area. The bed was the most comfortable ever!!The price for the room was amazing as an opening special. About 90% of the resort is fully completed.We had a few small opening day  trivial issues like the fire alarm false alarming at breakfast and one of the 3 fantastic pools was not up and running on day one.There is lots of staff putting in lots of finishing touches and making great progress over the week we stayed there.Our kids aged 9 and 7 loved the kids club as well as the staff, i think Jac went over the top to make our kids happy.The kids water slide is great, only issue is that…

title: Excellent stay
review: Dear NoodlesNilsson  Many thanks for the review.  To read about how we have managed to make you feel at home is a great way to start the day here! Our team really understand the value of making sure the kids are well looked after and they were delighted to know they made a good  impression.   I have passed your comments on to the team in each are so they know to  keep doing what they are doing!  Regarding the feedback on the  English  lessons for the team to help them deliver the service they want to provide – thanks for highlighting this it helps us pinpoint the training need areas.  We will be looking forward to your next visit and if there is anything I can do to help you plan for the  visit please let me know on frasr.ross@accor.com   Cheers!  Fraser Fraser Ross General Manager

title: Fantastic New Resort
review: We stayed on 17/10 for 3 nights. The hotel is brand new and well-located at Karon beach. The resort had 3 swimming pools and my kids enjoyed the Kidsclub even though the toys/games were not fully completed. The staffs were friendly, especially Lena at Front desk. We will surely be back next time!
